column2: HATITYE EGYPT: ZIM
column3: VATAMBI vechikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors vanoti vagadzirira zvikuru mutambo wavo weAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) apo vachatatsurana neEgypt nemusi weChishanu chino.   MaWarriors ndiwo achavhurira makwikwi aya apo ari kusangana neEgypt mumutambo wekutanga uyo uchatanga na10pm.   Kwayedza svondo rino yakaita hurukuro nevatambi vemaWarriors vakasiyana avo vanoti vagadzirira mutambo uyu. Knox Mutizwa – uyo anove mutambi wemaWarriors neLamontville Golden Arrows yekuSouth Africa – anoti zvikwata zvese zviri kukwikwidza kuAfcon zvinofanirwa kuvhunduka chikwata chavo.   “Gore rino takatodya nduru, zvikwata zvese zviri kuAfcon ngazvitodedera nekuti isu takatosimbisisa.   “Chikwata chedu chakasimba zvikuru uye tine vatambi vakawanda vane tarenda vari kutambira zvikwata zvekunze kwenyika saka tinotokwanawo pamamonya ipapo,” anodaro Mutizwa.   Kubva maWarriors paakatanga kukwikwidza kuAfcon mugore ra2004, chikwata ichi hachisati chambobuda muboka rachinenge rapinzwa. Asi, Mutizwa anoti zvinhu zviri kushanduka gore rino sezvo shuviro yavo iri yekutamba nhabvu yepamusoro kuti vagosvika kure mumutambo uyu.   “Takwikwidza makore akawanda kuAfcon asi tichingoburitswa mutambo uyu uchangotanga saka gore rino zvinofanirwa kushanduka.   “MaWarriors rwendo runo ndiwo chikwata vazhinji vachange vachitaura nezvacho chete nguva dzose nekuti takagadzirira. Chimwe chinhu zita handiro rinotamba nhabvu saka zvekuti Mohamed Salah hatizvitarise izvo isu Khama Billiat naKnowledge Musona, Tino Kadewere naNyasha Mushekwi vese avo tinavo vatambi vepamusoro,” anodaro.   Gore radarika, Mutizwa akanwisa chibodzwa chakanetsa zvikuru mumutambo weAbsa Premiership wechikwata chake neMaritzburg United uye chibodzwa ichi chakasvika pakuvhoterwa kuve Goal of the Month mumwaka waNyamavhuvhu 2018 iye ndokupihwa mubairo. Anoti kana akawana mukana wekutamba kuAfcon anoda kudzokorodza zvaakaita kuSouth Africa nekunwisa chibodzwa chinohwina mubairo weGoal of the Tournament.   “Mukana ukauya kuAfcon ndinoda kuita zvinorova sezvandakaita kuSouth Africa pamutambo wechikwata changu neMaritzburg United. Ndoda kuuhwina mubairo weGoal of the Tournament, zvandakaita kuSouth Africa.   “Kana zvikaitika ndingafare zvikuru, asi chikuru kwandiri kuhwina sechikwata mikombe mikuru yakaita seAfcon iyo tiri kuenda kunorwira. Hapana chinoramba uye kana kutitadzisa, zvese zvinogona kuitika,” anodaro Mutizwa.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa naTendayi Darikwa uyo anotambirawo zvakare Nottingham Forest yekuEngland achiti vagadzirira kubata basa sebasa.   “Afcon inoonekwa pasi rese wena, yakakosha zvikuru uye inoteverwa nekuti vatambi vazhinji vane mukurumbira vanouya kuzokwikwidza kumakwishu aya saka tinofanirwa kunge takagadzirira kuti tibate basa.   “Isu chedu chete tinofanirwa kutamba sechikwata uye hatifanirwe kutarisa zvinoitwa nevamwe vatambi.   “Isu ngatingoita basa redu chete ratakafambira,” anodaro Darikwa.   Thabani Kamusoko – uyo anotambira nhabvu yake kuTanzania – anoti anozviziva kuti maWarriors ari muboka rakaoma zvikuru asi vanofanirwa kushanda nesimba kuti vafambire mberi mumutambo uyu.   “Ndinoziva hangu kuti tiri muboka rakaoma zvikuru asi tikashanda nesimba tinosvika kure uye isu chatiri kuda kusvika kure mumutambo uyu,” anodaro.   MaWarriors ari muboka reGroup A nezvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Egypt, Uganda neDemocratic Republic of Congo.   Zvakadai, Hurumende yakatoumba komiti yekutsigira chikwata chenyika ichi nemari yeWarriors Fund Raising  Committee.   Mutungamiriri wenyika President Mnangagwa vakadoma komiti iyi nechinangwa chekuti iunganidze mari ichashandiswa nemaWarriors mumakwikwi aya.

column2: Mapurisa Oparadza Zvinotengeswa Mumigwagwa
column3: Vanotengesera mumigwagwa vari kurasikirwa nezvinhu zvavo zvinokosha zviuru nezviuru zvemadhora izvo vari kutorerwa nemakanzuru mumaguta zvichetevera mashoko emutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ekuti makanzuru anofanira kubvisa mumigwagwa vese vari kutengesa zviri kunze kwemutemo. Kunyange hazvo mamwe madhorobha asati atanga kubvisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa, mumaguta akaita seHarare neMasvingo, mapurisa ekanzuru pamwe neeZimbabwe Republic Police, ZRP, ari kufamba mumigwagwa achitora zvinhu zvevanhu vanonzi vari kutengesera panzvimbo dzisangabvumidzwe. KuMasvingo vaye vanenge vatorerwa zvinhu zvavo vanokwanisa kunozvitora kumahofisi ekanzuru kana ZRP kana vachinge vabhadhara faindi. MuHarare kanzuru inoti iri kuparadza mirivo, michero nezvimwe zvinhu zvinosvika matani maviri zuva rega rega. Mutauririri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti zvinhu izvi, zvinogona kuora, hazvibvumidzwe kudzorerwa mumigwagwa. Asi vanoti vaye vanenge vatorewa zvinhu zvakaita sembatya kana mbozhanhare vanokwanisa kuenda kunotora zvinhu zvavo kumahofisi ekanzuru vabvisa mubhadharo. VaChideme vanoti nyaya yekuparadza chikafu, michero nemiriwo inoitirwa kudzivirira zvirwere zvakaita sekorera sezvo zvinhu izvi zvinenge zvatorwa munzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe. VaChideme vati kana zvinhu zvikagarisa zvisina kutorwa, kanzuru inozvitengesa. Zvichakadai, VaChideme varamba mashoko ekuti mapurisa nevamwe vashandi vekanzuru vari kutora zvinhu zvinenge zvatorerwa vanoitengesera mumigwagwa vachiti izvi hazvibvumidzwe nemutemo. Imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe Home Industries Association, Amai Martha Shumba, vati manyepo kuti vese vari kutorerwa zvinhu vari kutengesera panzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe. Vati semuenzaniso, kanzuru nemapurisa vari kutora zvinhu zvevanhu vari pane mimwe misika yakavhura kare kare. Zvichetevera mashoko aVaMugabe, gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reHarare, Amai Mirriam Chikukwa, vakaita musangano nekanzuru yeHarare, mapurisa, masoja nemagadhijere vakatanga chirongwa chekubvisa vanotengesera mumigwagwa icho chinonzi chicharamba chiripo kusvika guta rachena. Izvi zviri kuitwawo mune mamwe maguta nemadhorobha asi mamwe madhorobha achiri kuronga kuti ofambisa chirongwa ichi sei. Vanhu vakawanda munyika havana mabasa izvo zvave kuita kuti vararame nekutengesa mumigwagwa. No media source currently available

column2: Zec Inovhara Mahofisi Ayo kweMasvondo Maviri Zvichitevera Kubatwa neCovid-19 kweVanhu Vakawanda Kusanganisira Vashandi Vayo
column3: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, inoti iri kuvhara mahofisi ayo kwemasvondo maviri kutanga nemusi weMuvhuro unouya zvichitevera kukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19, kusanganisirawo vamwe vashandi veZec. Muchiziviso chayo kune veruzhinji sachigaro weZec, Justice Priscilla Chigumba, vati mahofisi avo ese munyika achavharwa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Amai Chigumba vati danho ravatora rakanangana nekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri. Mukuru anoona nezvesarudzo muZec, VaUtoile Silaigwana, vaudza Studio7 kuti danho iri rakanangana nekuchengetedza vashandi vekomisheni pamwe nevavhoti. Vati komisheni haisi kuvhara mahofisi zvachose uye paichavhura mwedzi unouya, munhu wese anokodzera kuvhota anofanira kunyoresa. Vati vashandi vekomisheni yavo vachange vachishanda vari kumba vachiita basa ravo semazuva ose. Asi mutungamiriri weDemocratic Party, Dr Wurayayi Zembe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zec inofanira kushandisa michina yechizvinozvino kuitira kuti vanhu varambe vachinyoresa kuvhota kunyange kuine denda reCovid-19. Asi VaSilaigwana vati Zec ine tarisiro yekushandisawo michina yechizvino zvino pakunyoresa vanhu kuti vavhote, asi pari zvino mutemo hauvabvumidze kuita izvi. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano reResource Centre, VaSolomon Bobosibhunu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti danho ratorwa neZec rakanaka, asi vakati Zec inofanirawo kutaura nevamwe isati yatora matanho akadai. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vati nyaya dzesarudzo dzinoda kuti vanhu vashande pamwe kunyange kuine Covid-19. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubato reZanu PF sezvo mushandi mukuru muchikamu chekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato iri, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Zec iri kushorwa nenyaya yekutadza kuita sarudzo dzema by-elections panguva iyo dzimwe nyika dziri kuita sarudzo asi pachitevedzwa mitemo inobata chirwere cheCovid-19. Zec pachayo inoti inokwanisa kuita sarudzo idzi nguva ipi zvayo asi yakabatwa nemutemo wehurumende wekudzivirira Covid-19. No media source currently available

column2: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Choshura Mare neKurima Bindu muSouth Africa
column3: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muSouth Africa chiri kushura mare nekurima miriwo yendudzi dzakasiyanasiyana, izvo zvave kuchipa raramo yachakanga chisingatarisire muhupenyu hwacho mushure mekumboomerwa nezvinhu munyika iyi. VaLeonie Kuchakanya, avo vane makore makumi matatu ekuberekwa, vanoti vakafunga kutamba nevhu mushure mekunge vaona kuti zviroto zvemafuro manyoro vari muSouth Africa zvakanga zvisiri kubereka michero. VaKuchakanya, avo vanobva kuMasvingo asi vakakurira mumusha weOld Highfield muHarare, vanoti pavakapinda munyika iyi vaive netarisiro yepamusoro sevakawanda vanobva kuZimbabwe, asi izvi handizvo zvakaitika, izvo zvakazoita kuti vashande mabasa akawanda asi hazvina kugadzirisa matambudziko avo. Vaona kuti zvinhu zviri kuramba kubatana, vanoti vakazofunga kuedza mamwe mabhindauko izvo zvakazoita kuti muna 2016 vatsvage nzvimbo yekurima muPretoria, uko vakawana gombo ravakatotanga kugobora voga. Mushure memakore mashanu, VaKuchakanya vanoti vave kudya cheziya ravo sezvo vave mumwe wevarimi vepamusoro vari kuwanisa vanhu muriwo wendudzi dzinosanganisira makabheji, tsunga, hanyanisi, matomati nezvimwe zvakawanda. Vanoti vanhu vanotenga zvirimwa zvavo vanobva muPretoria nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza, kusanganisirawo neguta reJohannesburg, uko vakawanda vanobva vachinohodha zvekuzotengesawo mberi. Asi VaKuchakanya vanoti hausi mutserendende nguva dzose mubasa ravo sezvo vari kusangana nedambudziko guru rembavha dziri kuvashanyira dzichifunga kuti vari kuchengeta mari mumba. Vanotiwo munguva ino yechirimo vanosangana nedambudziko remvura, izvo zvinoita kuti vade kuisa bhohoro kana mukana wacho wawanikwa. Vanokurudzirawo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika kuti zvishande nesimba kunyange munguva yekuomerwa, pane kuti zvitsvage ruramo kuburikidza nekuita mabasa erima. No media source currently available

column2: Paramende Yozeya Mutemo weSarudzo weElectoral Amendment Bil
column3: Dare reNational Assembly riri kuzeya mutemo wesarudzo weElectoral Amendment Bill, uye chibvumirano chemapato ezvematongerwo enyika chekuita sarudzo dzakachena dzisina mhirizhonga, cheElectoral Code of Conduct for Political Parties and Candidates and Other Stakeholders chapinzwawo mubhiri iri kuti chive mumutemo wesarudzo. Bhiri iri rakanangana nekuvanduza mitemo yesarudzo kuti nyika ikwanise kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Zvimwe zviri kudiwa nemapato anopikisa kuti mapato aya avewo nechekuita pamwe nekuongorora kudhindwa kwemagwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot papers. Mapato aya anodawo kuti mitemo yesarudzo usungire mapato kuti ape mukana wakaenzana kuvanhukadzi nevanhurume pazvinzvimbo zvese zvino kwikwidzwa musarudzo. Chibvumirano chemapato chekuita sarudzo dzakachena icho chapinzwa mumitemo yesarudzo, chinorambidza nyaya dzemhirizhonga uye chinosungira kuti vemapato, vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, vanokwikwidza musarudzo vapanane mukana pamwe nekuregawo vamwe vachitaura pfungwa dzavo pamwe nekupinda mumisangano pamadiro. Chibvumirano ichi chinosungurirawo kuti vanhu vapihwe mukana wekuzvishambadza uye chinoti vaye vachazenge vachibvisa kana kubvarurwa zvinyorwa zvevamwe kana kuti maposters, varangwe nemutemo. No media source currently available Chibvumirano ichi chinorambidzawo kutenga vavhoti kana kutyityidzira vanhu kuti vavhotere bato rinenge richida munhu. Chinorambidzawo vemapato kuti vataure zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo zvisati zvaziviswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vati danho rekuisa chibvumirano chemapato mumutemo wesarudzo chakanaka chose. VaMadhuku vati sezvo wave mutemo vanenge vautyora vacharangwa. Vati kana mutemo mutsva wesarudzo ukatevedzwa, nyika inogona kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Chibvumirano ichi chinosungirawo vemapato ezvematongerwe enyika kurega vatapi venhau vachipinda mumisangano yawo yekutsvaga rutsigiro pamwe nekuvachengetedza. Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati vanofara nenyaya yekuti vatapi venhau vachengetedzwe pavenenge vachiita basa ravo. VaMoyo vati vatapi venhau vanogara vachishungurudzwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika zvikuru munguva yesarudzo uye mutemo unofanira kubuda nezvirango zvakaomarara kune vanoshungurudza vatapi venhau. Dare richiri kuzeya bhiri iri uye rinotarisirwa kuripasisa chero nguva

column2: Huwandu hweVari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Vagara Vari Munyika Hwoshusha Nyanzvi dzeZvehutano
column3: Kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vasina nhoroondo yekubuda munyika vave kuwanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 kunonzi nedzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano chinhu chinofanirwa kuvhundutsa hurumende pamwe neveruzhinji kuti patorwe matanho nekukasika. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ebazi rezvehutano akabuda nemusi weChina ekuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika hwakanga hwakwira kusvika pachiuru nemazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri, kana kuti 1 362 pakupera kwezuva. Bazi iri rinoti huwandu uhwu hwakakwira zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 273, vaine chirwere ichi, mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu kana kuti 260, vari vanhu vagara vanga vari munyika, gumi nevatatu kana kuti 13, vari vanhu vakadzoka munyika kubva kunze. Huwandu hwevanhu vafa munyika hwakakwira kusvika pamakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 23, uye vapora vave mazana mana nemakumi maviri nevashanu, kana kuti 425. Vanhu vakaongororwa kana vaine chirwere ichi nemusi weChina vaisvika chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nemumwe kana kuti 1 551. Dunhu rinonzi rine vanhu vakawandisa vari kuwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi idunhu reBulawayo, iro rine vanhu vanosvika mazana mana negumi nevapfumbamwe, 419, richiteverwa neHarare ine vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 389. Pave nekutyirwa kuti sezvo guta reBulawayo riine vanhu vakawanda vari kubatwa vaine chirwere ichi, rinogona kunge risina kugadzirira zvakakwana kuchengeta vanhu vari kuwanikwa vaine Covid-19 ava. Asi zvipatara zviviri zvakagadzurudzwa mazuva apera aya kuti zvitambire varwere veCovid-19 zvinoti Thorngrove ne Ekusileni, zvinonzi zvatanga kushanda. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica, iyo iri kutevera kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematatu nezviuru mazana masere kana kuti 13.8 million vabatwa pasi rose, vafa vachidarika mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe ezviuru kana kuti 590 000. MuAmerica chete, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 3.5 million vabatwa nacho uye vafa vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nezvisere kana kuti 138 000. South Africa, iyo inove ine vanhu vakawandisa muAfrica vane Covid-19, uye iri muvakidzani weZimbabwe, yave nevanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi maviri nezvina kana kuti 324 000 vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa muSouth Africa vasvika pazviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 4 669. Vazhinji vevanhu vari kuwanikwa vaine covid-19 vachibva kunze kwenyika vari kubva kuSouth Africa. Doctor Gilson Mandigo, avo vari muHarare, vanoti havasi vose vari kubva kunyika iyi vari kupinda nepamiganho iri pamutemo, sezvo kuine vamwe vari kusvetuka muganhu vachipinda munyika vasina kuvhenekwa. Vanoti izvi ndezvimwe zvezvinhu zviri kuwedzera dambudziko iri munyika sezvo hurumende isingazokwanisa kuziva kuti apinda munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo ndeupi. Doctor Mandigo vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kusimbisa mutemo wekusafambafamba, zvikuru kurambida vanhu vanobva mumatunhu ane dambudziko guru rechirwere ichi kuti vasashanyira dzimwe nzvimbo. Hurumende iri kukurudzirwawo kuti iwedzere kuvhenekwa kwevanhu vagara vari munyika, zvikuru vari kumaruwa, uko kunoshanyirwa nevakawanda vanobva mumadhorobha nemaguta ane vanhu vari kubatwa vaine chirwere che covid-19. Vanotiwo veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuita bandiko ravo kuburikidza nekupfeka zvekuvhara miromo nemhino kana kuti ma mask, kugeza maoko avo nesipo pamwe nekukoshesa nyaya yesiya mikaha pakati pavo uye kusangoungana. Doctor Mandigo vari kukurudzirawo hurumende kuti kana yodzamisa mutemo wekurambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu iisewo mukana wekuti veruzhinji vakwanise kuwana chekudya, vachiti panogona kuzoguma pave nedambudziko rekufa kwevanhu nenzara, kwete necovid-19. Asi vanoti mitengo yezvekuvhara miromo nemhino iri pamusoro zvakanyanya muzvitoro zviri kutengesa, vakati dai pawanikwa zvinokwanisa kuwachwa kana zvashandiswa kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasarasikirwa nemari yakawanda.  No media source currently available

column2: VanaChiremba Vanorwira Kodzero dzeVanhu Voramba Kuti Typhoid Iri Kudzikira muNyika
column3: Sangano ranachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti chirwere chemanyoka cheTyphoid chadzikira, humbowo hunoratidza kuti chirwere ichi chakateshera muguta reHarare nenzvimbo zhinji munyika. Vachitaura mushure mekuenda kuchipatara cheBeatrice Infecttious Hospital muHarare uko kuri kurapwa vanhu vanfungidzirwa kuti vanetyphoid, gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vakati kanzuru yeHarare pamwe nebazi ravo vakamisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Vakati pavanhu makumi mashanu vanofungidzirwa kuti vane typhoid kuchipatara ichi vazhinji vacho vaibva kuMbare uko kwashaya mwana ane makore gumi nematatu nechirwere ichi musi weKimusi. Asi munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights Dr Evans Masitara vati pane vanhu vakawanda zvikuru vari kubatwa neTyphoid muHarare nedzimwe nzvimbo munyika. VaMasitara vati vanhu vakawanda vari kuenda kuzvipatara zvakazvimirira uye vane humbowo hwekuti nyaya yetyphoid haizi kutaurwa nemazvo nebazi rezvehutano. Vanotiwo zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere chinokwanisa kudzivirirwa uyewo vati vese vari kubata nezvirwere zvemanyoka vanofanira kuendesa kanzuru yeHarare nedzimwe dziri munzvimbo dzavanogara kumatare kuti varapwe pachena vachiti makunzuru ndiwo anebasa rekuona kuti vanhu vawana mvura yakachena uyewo kuti marara atakurwa. Asi mutauririri we kanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kurapa vanhu vese vane zvirwere zvemayoka pachena. Humbowo kubva kubazi rezvehutano hunoratidzawo kuti mwedzi uno chete pane vanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi vakabatwa nezvirwere zvemanyoka munyika yese uye pane vanhu vana vakatofa nekuda kwezvirwere izvi munyika yese. Zvirwere izvi zvakwanda kuMashonaland Central neManicaland kozotiwo Mashonaland West, Harare neBulawayo. No media source currently available

column2: Mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance Unoita Musangano Wekutanga muHarare
column3: Mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weMDC Alliance, waita musangano wawo wekutanga mumusha weEpworth muHarare, uyo unonzi wapindwa nemazana evatsigiri vemapato ari mumubatanidzwa uyu. Mumwe wevatungamiri vemapato ari mumubatanidzwa, VaJacob Ngarivhume vanoti vatora mukana uyu kutsanangurira vatsigiri vavo vapinda mumusangano uyu pamusoro pehurongwa hwemubatanidzwa wakatarisana nesarudzo dzegore rino. Vangarivhume vanoti nyaya huru yavaudza vatsigiri vavo ndeyekuvandudzwa kunofanirwa kuitwa mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo idzo sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. VaNgarivhume vanoti zvavanyunyuta nazvo nedezvekusachinja maitiro kweZanu PF muzvinhu zvakaita sekuwaniswa kwemapato ose mikana yakaenzana panhepfenyuro dzehurumende. “Saka tati isusu zvimwe zvezvinhu zvatichagara tichipusha, kana kuti tichirwa kuti tiite hondo yekuti zvinhu izvozvo zvirongeke, zvigadzirisike,” vanodaro VaNgarivhume. Musangano uyu unonzi wapindwa nevatungamiri vemapato ari muMDC Alliance ose kunze kwemutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, avo vanonzi vanga vakamirirwa nevatevedzeri vavo VaElias Mudzuri naVaNelson Chamisa. Mutungamiri werimwe bato reMDC, VaWelshman Ncube vanonzi havanawo kukwanisa kunge vari pamusangano uyu, asi vachinzi vanga vakamirirwawo nemutevedzeri wavo, VaEdwin Mushoriwa. VaTsvangirai ndivo vachamirira mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

column2: Mapurisa Anonetsana Zvakare neVanotengesera muMigwagwa muGuta reHarare
column3: Sechave chigariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga, vanotengesera mumigwagwa yemuguta reHarare nemapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police vaswera zvakare vachitandanisana, izvo zvinonzi zvaita kuti mapurisa aridze pfuti pamwe nekushandisa hutsi hunokachidza mukuedza kudzikamisa zvinhu. Mumwe wevanorarama nekutengesera mumigwagwa aona zvichiitika, uyo ati anoda kunzi VaTodzidambura Mhandu, vanoti vashamisika panguva dzemasikati kuona mapurisa achienda pavanoshandira panosangana migwagwa Kwame Nkrumah Avenue naAngwa Street, pedyo nechitoro chinotengesa mishonga cheQV Pharmacy. VaMhandu vanoti mapurisa aya, ayo anga achitungamirwa nemukuru wemapurisa muHarare, azoedza kusunga mumwe mukomana anotengesa mbatya vasina kana kumbotanga vamuudza mhosva yaapara, izvo zvazoita kuti mukomana uyu arambe kusungwa. Vanoti izvi ndizvo zvazoita kuti paite mhirizhonga yaunganidza vanhu, zvazoitawo kuti mapurisa aridze pfuti pamwe nekukanda utsi hunokachidza. Vanotiwo mapurisa aya aenda nembatya dzanga dzichitengeswa nemukomana uyu, dzinosanganisira midhebhe neshangu. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vanoti manyepo kuti mapurisa aridzira vanhu pfuti, vachiti mapurisa anga achitokanganiswa kuita basa ravo mushure mekunge aedza kuferefeta nyaya yekupambwa kwemumwe murume anogadzira pamwe nekutengesa nharembozha nevanhu vana. Assistant Commissioner Nyathi vanoti mushure mekunge vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava vaungana, mumwe wevanhu ava abva apwanya fafitera rechitoro cheQV uye kuita ruzha nekutuka mapurisa izvo zvazoita kuti mumwe mupurisa azoburidza pfuti yake yebasa achiedza kuvatyisidzira achimirirawo kusvika kwemamwe mapurisa, ayo azodira utsi hunokachidza. Mutauriri wemapurisa uyu ati mapurisa anga achiri kuferefeta nezvenyaya iyi, sezvo vanhu vapamba murume wemafoni uyu vamumanikidza kuti avabhadhare mari, iyo vanoti yatobva kumba nemudzimai wake. Assistant Commissioner Nyathi vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vasiyane netsika yekuvhiringidza mapurisa paanenge achiita basa rawo. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende Inoti Yatenga Nhomba yeCovid-19 Mamiriyoni Makumi Maviri Asi Vari Kuda Kubayiwa Vashoma
column3: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti richiri nechivimbo chekuti vanhu mamiriyoni gumi vange vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 munyika mukupera kwemwedzi unouya kuti intyatsoshande zvakanaka kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vanoti Zimbabwe yakwanisa kuwana nhomba dzinosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri zvichitreva kuti inokwanisa kubayiwa vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi vari kudiwa nehurumende. Mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika, Dr Agnes Mahomva vanoti havasati vadududza pachinangwa chavo chekuti vabaye vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba mukupera kwemwedzi unouya. Kunyangwe hazvo huwandu hwevari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere ichi munyika huri kudzika, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti chirwere ichi chinogona kudzoka zvine mutsindo kechina kana vanhu vasina kubayiwa nhomba. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti vari kushushikana nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubayiwa nhomba parizvino. Dr Enoch Mayida vakambotungamira chipatara cheChitungwiza vari munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Medical Association mudunhu remashonaland vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba sezvo chirwere ichi chichiramba chichishanduka. MuAfrica, Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chegumi panyayaya yekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19. Pamusoro pane Sychelles ichiteverwa neMauritius neMorroco. Botswana ndiyo iri pamberi kuchamhembe kweAfrica iri pachidanho chechipfumbamwe, South Africa iri pachidanho chegumi nerimwe. Pasi rose vanhu vanodarika mabhiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mamamiriyoni mazana mana kana kuti 7, 4 billion vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. America ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabayiwanhomba yeCovid-19 vanosvika mamiriyoni mazana mana nemakumi mana kana kuti 440 million. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti kuti chirwere chisapararire zvakanyanya muAfrica vanhu zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana vanofanira kubayiwa nhomba, Africa ine vanhu bhiriyoni imwe chete nemamiriyoni zviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 1,3 billion. Asi vanhu vabayiwa nhomba Africa parizvino vadarika zvishoma zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana chete kana kuti 6, 06% zvinoreva kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Vanhu vafa muAfrica vanosvika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nemasere kana kuti 220, 958. Sangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi rose reWorld Health Organization rinoti chirwere ichi chatodzoka zvine mutsindo kana kuti fiurth wave kuEurope zvikuru kunyika dzakaita seGermany, Britain, Russia neFrance. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano munyika idzi dzinoti vasina kubayiwa nhomba ndivo vapa kuti chirwere ichi chitange kuita mutema rege wembada. Sezvo nyaya dzekushanyirana dzatanga, pane mukana wekuti chirwere ichi chinogona kupararira zvakanyanya muAfrica mune vanhu vashoma vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19.

column2: Nyanzvi muNyaya dzezveHutano Dzotyira Kupararira kweChimbwamupengo
column3: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti dziri kutyira zvikuru kuti chirwere chechimbwamupengo chichapararira zvakanyanya zvikuru sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kurumwa nembwa dzisina kubaiwa jekiseni rinodzivirira chirwere ichi. Vanhu vanodarika mazana mana vanonzi vari kurumwa svondo rega rega nembwa dzisina kubaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere chechimbwamupengo, izvo zvava kutyirwa kuti dambudziko rechirwere ichi, rinogona kuvhiringa hutano hwemunhu vakawanda vanenge varumwa. Imbwa dziri kuruma vanhu idzi dzinonzi dzinenge dzisina kuchengetedzwa mudzimba, zvinopa kuti dziswere dzichizvifambira muguta reHarare. Nyazvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr. Josephat Chiripanyanga, vanoti kana munhu arumwa nembwa, anofanira kuona muridzi wembwa yamuruma kuitira kuti azive kana yakabaiwa nhomba yechimbwamupengo. Dr. Chiripanyanga vanoti chirwere chechimbwamupengo chinonetsa kurapa zvokuti murwere akanonokerwa kurapwa, anoguma ave kuhukura sembwa kusvikira azofa nokuti anenge anonokerwa kurapwa. Dr. Chiripanyanga vanoti munhu anofanira kuenda kuchipatara mukati memazuva matatu kubva paanenge arumwa nembwa kuitira kuti majekiseni aanozobaiwa akwanise kushanda kuuraya huturu hwechimbwamupengo. Nyanzvi yezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa mubazi rehutano, Dr. Portia Manangazira, vanoti vanhu vanodarika mazana mana vanorumwa nembwa uye zhinji dzacho dzinenge dzisina kubaiwa nhomba yechimbwamupengo. Dr. Manangazira vanoti pasi rose hakuna munhu akararama mushure mokunge arumwa nembwa ine chimbwamupengo. Sekuru Kamwelo Banda veku Cranborne vanoti zvinoshamisa kuona vanhu vanogara nembwa dzinodarika gumi padzimba dzavo zvinova zvinhu zvisingabvumirwe pamutemo weHarare City Council. Dr. Manangazira vanoti mutemo wePublic Health Act unoraira maguta ose kuti vatevedzere zvakatarwa maererano nehuhwandu hwembwa hunofanirwa kuchengetwa paimba yoga yoga vakati asi mutemo uyu hausi kutevedzerwa. Dr. Manangazira vanoti vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvisere vakarumwa nembwa gore rakapfuura munyika zvikaonekwa kuti chikamu chikuru chembwa idzi dzaiva dzisina kubaiwa nhomba yechimbwamupengo. Studio 7 yakaedza kunzwa kubva kumutauriri weHarare, VaMichael Chideme, kuti sei kanzuru yavo isiri kutevedzera mitemo inovasungira kuona kuti imbwa dzemuguta dzabaiwa nhomba here kana kuti kwete, asi havana kuda kutaura nezvazvo. Asi VaChideme vanoti munhu wese anosungirwa kuchengetera imbwa dzake pamba pakakomberedzwa nemudhuri uye paine ghedhe rinovharwa kuitira kuti dzisaruma vanhu vanenge vachizvifambira. VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kushushikana zvikuru nenyaya yembwa dziri kungomhanya mhanya munzvimbo dzakawanda dzisina muridzi wadzo. Mumwe mushandi wekuZimbabwe Society for The Prevention of Cruelty to Animals, uyo akaramba kudomwa nezita rake, sezvo asingabvumidzwe kutaura nevatori venhau, anoti vanhu vazhinji vari kutadza kuchengeta imbwa dzavo nepamusana pekuoma kwaita zvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi. No media source currently available

column2: Varwere Voomerwa neKushaikwa neKudhura kweMishonga
column3: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuchema chema nekushaikwa uye kudhura kuri kuita mishonga zvopa kuti hupenyu hwevarwere vakawanda huve munjodzi. Zvipatara zvikuru zvehurumende zvinonzi zvasara nemishonga yakakosha isingadarike mazuva gumi. Vanotengesa nekugadzira mishonga vanoti hurumende haisi kuvapa mari yakakwana yekunze yekutenga mishonga kubva kuIndia neSouth Africa kunyanya. Sachigaro wePharmaceutical Manufacturers Association of Zimbabwe ,VaEmmanuel Mujuru, vatenda kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka nenyaya yekushaya mari vachiti vanoda mamiriyoni maviri emadhora asi vari kuwana zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvemari iyi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo naMuzvare Emily Nyathi vanotengesa mishonga muHarare. Amai Nyathi vati nyaya iyi yave nenguva ingatosvika makore maviri isina kugadziriswa. Hurumende inoti iri kuyedza kutsvaga mari yekubatsira mukutenga mushonga uye nemusi weChina yakapa vanotenga mishonga mari inosvika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zviviri mushure mekunge yambovapa mari inosvika mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru zvisere svondo rapera. Asi chiremba Dr Rutendo Bonde vanoti mari iyi idonwe remvura mugwenga. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo naAmai Nyathi. Mukuru wechipatara cheMpilo Hospital, Dr Solwayo Ngwenya, vaudza nhepfenyuro yeZBC kuti vasara nemishonga inokwana mazuva gumi chete. Matambudziko aya ndemamwe kuParirenyatwa, Harare Hospital, UBH nezvimwe zvipatara zvehurumende. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vatendawo kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzemishonga. Vanotiwo vamwe vanhu vave kutopotera kumaporofita nekun’anga Vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vati vave kutoita mapiritsi ekudimbura nepakati kuti vakwanise kutombowana chekunwa pazuva. Vamwewo vanoti vave kutopona nekuenda kunyika dzakaita seZambia neSouth Africa kunotsvaga mishonga. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti hurumende inofanira kumutsiridza makambani anogadzira mushonga kuti varerutse dambudziko iri. Mari zhinji yeZimbabwe inosvika zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana inobva kumasangano akazvimirira akaita seUnited Nations Children’s Fund, Global Fund neUS Presidents Emmergency Plan for Aids Relief neDepartment for International Development yekuBritain. Pharmaceutical Society of Zimbabwe inogadzira mishonga inoti inoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemashanu kuti itange kushanda zvakanaka. VePharmaceutical Wholesalers Association vanoti nekuda kwechikwereti chemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu, havachapihwe mishonga kwavaitenga. Vanoti pamwedzi vanoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni masere. No media source currently available

column2: Mitambo yeCastle Premier Soccer League Yopfungaira Hutsi Zvekare
column3: Makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League adzoka zvine mutsindo mushure mesvondo rimwe chete rezororo. Nemusu weMugovera masikati nhandare yeRufaro Stadium ichange isingadanwe anonzwa apo pachatambwa mitambo miviri apo Yadah neBlack Rhinos dziri kushandisa nhandare imwechete, zuva rimwe chete, mumitambo yavo yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League yevhiki remakumi maviri nemaviri. Yadah iyo iri kuti nhasi yabaka moto, mangwana wodzima, ndiyo iri kutanga kupinda munhandare yeRufaro Stadium iyi kusangana neChapungu iyo iri kukwikwira zvishoma nezvishoma muhurongwa hwemakundano aya. Yadah, iyo yaimbotungamira makundano aya yave pazvikwata zvina zvakatarisana nekubuda mumakwikwi aya zvekuti inofanira kukunda kuitira kuti isaverengwe pazvikwata zvaingopinda muPremier Soccer League nekubuda gore rimwe chetero. Mutambo uyu ukapera, uri kuteverwa nemutambo mukuru pakati peBlack Rhinos neChicken Inn iyo iri pachidanho chechipiri mumakundano ezvikwata gumi nezvisere aya. Chipembere chadonha zvinotyisa mumakundano aya zvekuti chikwata cheZimbabwe National Army ichi chave pachidanho chechisere mushure mekumbotungamira makundano aya, kwemasvondo akati wandei. Kunyange hazvo varohwa mitambo mina yakataverana murairidzi weChipembere Stanford Stix Mtizwa anoti iyi yave nhoroondo achiti iye varikuda mapoinzi ese matatu vakatarisana nechinangwa chavo chekuramba vari muPremier Soccer League mwaka unotevera. Asi machikichori muRufaro Stadium haasi kutanga nekugumira pamitambo miviri iyi, sezvo nesvondo maGreen Machine eCaps United achange achiedza kupunzira pasi Ngezi Platinum Stars iyo iri pamusoro petafura yeligi. Mushure mekutora poindi imwechete kubva mumitambo mina vabuda mumakundano eCaf Champions League, Makepekepe irikubhebha moto mushure mekutora mapoinzi manomwe kubva mumitambo yavo mitatu ichangopera kusanganisira wemusi weChitatu uyo yakarova FC Platinum 2-1. Mapoinzi manomwe aya asiya Makepekepe ave pachinhanho chegumi neina mumakundano aya asi vaine mitambo mishanu yavasati vatamba nemhaka yekukwikwidza kwavo muCaf Champions League. Kunyange hazvo vakawanda varikuti maGreen Machine haasisimo mukurwira kutora mukombe weligi uyu, mumwe mutsigiri wechikwata ichi VaTakunda Mupereki vanoti Makepekepe anokwanisa kudzivirira mukombe uyu, uyo vakatora mwaka wapera. Asi sachigaro weNgezi Platinum Stars VaJeremiah Getiseni vanoti vanonokerwa nemutambo neCaps United uyu vachiti ivo maGreen Machine haasi kumira. Mimwe mitambo iriko yakamira seizvi…  Bulawayo City v Harare City Hwange v Bantu Highlanders v Tsholotsho Pirates Shabanie Mine v ZPC Kariba Triangle v Platinum Dynamos neHighlanders hadzina mitambo svondo rino, sezvo zvikwata zviviri izvi zvaifanira kuve zviri kuBotswana kumakundano ezvikwata zvina aifanira kusanganisirawo Taffic Stars neMochudi Centre Chiefs. Makwikwi eSupa Power Cup aya haasi kuzoenderera mberi mushure mekunge vange vakaronga makundano aya vakundikana kuzadzikisa zvange zvichidiwa nezvikwata izvi. Asi zvikwata izvi hazvichaenda kuFrancistown asi vePremier Soccer League vazivisa kuti hapana nguva yekuti mitambo yavo yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League ienderere mberi. Dynamos yanga ichifanira kusangana neHow Mine, Highlanders ichibandana neTsholotsho Pirates. Zvakamira zvakadai, makundano eEnglish Premier League arikupinda mumitambo yechipiri apo chikwata chirikutungamira makwikwi aya cheManchester United chiri munzira kuenda kuWales kunosangana neSwansea. Vanoziva zvemutambo wenhabvu vanoti Swansea haisi kumira zvekuti varikutarisira zvekare kunaya kwezvibodzwa sezvakaitika svondo rapera apo maRed Devills akabvarura West Ham 4-0. Asi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mukamba yeChelsea iyo yatarisana nemutambo mukukutu apo varimuguta ravo reLondon as kuWembley uko varikunobandana neTottenham Hotspur iyo isingaroveke roveke pamusha.  Mimwe mitambo mugungano iri ndeiyi… Liverpool v Crystal Palace Southampton v West Ham Burnemouth v Watford Stoke v Arsenal Burnley v West Brom Huddersfield v Newcastle Manchester City v Everton KuSpain, makundano emwaka uno ari kutanga svondo rino apo chikwata chine mukombe weLa Liga che Real Madrid chir ikutanga chiri kunze kwemusha kuDeportivo La Coruna panguva iyo Barcelona iri Nou Camp neReal Betis. Madrid neBarcelona, zvakasangana pakati pesvondo pamutambo wemukomba apo Barceloma yakadamburwa 2-0.

column2: Hurumende Inoti ZEC Ndiyo Inofanira Kuona Kuti ZBC Yapa Mapato Ose Mukana Munguva yeSarudzo
column3: Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaKindness Paradza vanoti munguva yesarudzo sangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC ndiyo inofanira kunge yoona kuti ZBC yapa mapato ose mukana wakafanira panguva yesarudzo. VaParadza vaudza Studio 7 kuti vose vanoda kuziva nezvemashandiro eZBC munguva yesarudzo vanofanira kuenda kuZEC kwete kubazi ravo. Izvi zvinotevera, mamwe mapato anopikisa anoti haasi kufara nekambani yenhau yeZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation nekuburitsa kwairi kuita misangano yeZanu PF chete panguva yainenge ichiitwa asi mapato anopikisa aya asingapihwewo mukana mumwechetewo paanenge achiitawo misangano yawo paari kutsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzema by-elections dzakatarisirwa kuitwa musi waKurume 26. Frank Chikowore anotipa nyaya iyi. Sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vavimbisa kuti vachaburitsa gwaro rinoratidza kuti mapato ose anenge achipihwa mukana sei panhepfenyuro dzemunyika dziri pasi pehurumende idzi. Mamwe mapato anopikisa akaita seCitizens Coalition for Change neMDC Alliance anoti haasi kufara kuti ZBC iri kungoburitsa misangano yeZanu PF chete panguva yainenge ichiitwa iwo asingapihwe mukana mumwechetewo. Mutauriri weCitizens Coalition for Change, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere, vati zviri kuitwa neZBC zvekuburitsa misangano yeZanu PF chete pachivhitivhiti pamwe nema radio ekambani iyi nguva inenge ichiitwa misangano yebato iri vemapato anopikiswa vasingapihwe mukana wakadai zvinoratidza kuti hapana chati chachinja munyaya dzemafambisirwo esarudzo munyika idzo dzinogara dzichinzi hadzina kufamba zvakanaka nguva dzose. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaWitness Dube, avo vati zviri kuitwa neZBC izvi kutyora kodzero dzevanhu sezvo ZBC iri kambani inoshandisa mari dzinobva muhomwe dzeveruzhinji uye vati nyaya dzakadai dzinokwanisa kugadziriswa kubudikidza nenhaurirano munyika. Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vaudza Studio 7 vari kwaMurehwa kuti bato ravo hariudze ZBC zvekuita. Sachigaro wesangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa muZimbabwe, VaGolden Maunganidze, vati pavakanyorera tsamba kambani yeZBC vachida kuziva hurongwa kwekambani iyi hwekuti ichazodii nenyaya yekupa mapato ezvematongerwo enyika mikana yakaenzana vakafara kambani iyi payakapindura ichiti yakanga ichiziva zvainotarisirwa kuita nenyaya iyi. Vanoti ZBC yakaratidza sekunge yainge yakazvipira kupa mapato ese mikana yakaenzana uye kambani iyi ikavazivisawo zvakare kuti yakanga yanyorerwawo tsamba nezvenyaya imwecheteyo nekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC . VaMaunganidze vati ZEC inofanira kutora matanho akasimba kuti nyaya iyi igadziriswe sezvo iriyo inotungamira nyaya dzesarudzo munyika. Mibvunzo yatatumira mukuru weZBC, Muzvare Adelaide Chikunguru, kuti tinzwe divi rekambani yavo panyaya iyi yanga isati yapindurwa pataenda pamhepo uye nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kudairwa. Asi mutsamba yavo kuMisa, Muzvare Chikunguru vakati vakavimbisa kuti vachaita sezvanotarisirwa nebumbiro remitemo kuti vape mikana yakaenzana kumapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Elections Support Network, VaAndrew Makoni, vati zvinobuda musarudzo hazvizotambiriki zvakanaka kana mamwe mapato anenge achikwikwidza musarudzo ari kugunun’una kudai uye vakurudzirawo vemapato ane zvichemo kuti varambe vachigogodza pagonhi reZEC. Mapato anopikisa anogara achigunun’una kuti haapihwe mukana wakaenzana nebato riri kutonga panhepfenyuro yeZBC pamwe nemamwe mapepanhau ehurumende akaita seHerald neChronicle izvo zvaanoti zvinobatsiridza kuti sarudzo dzisafambiswe zvakanaka. No media source currently available

column2: Vashandi Vanga Vasara Vanowana Mabhonasi Avo
column3: Hurumende yazokwanisa kupedza kupa vashandi vayo vose mari dzemabhonasi zvichitevera kutambira kwaitwa mari nevashandi vehurumende vose vanga vasara. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende ava, re Public Service Association, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti nhengo dzavo dzatanga kuvazivisa kuti dzawana mari idzi kumabhanga kwadzo. Izvi zvinoreva kuti hapachina mushandi wehurumende asati awana bhonasi yake. Hurumende yakanonoka kubhadhara vashandi vayo mari dzemabhonasi idzi kubva muna Mbudzi wegore rapera nekuda kwekunetsekana kwayo mukuunganidza mari. Mwedzi uno hurumende yakakundikana zvakare kubhadhara vashandi vayo paine nguva izvo zvakazoita kuti iendese mberi nesvondo rose mazuva ekutambira aya. Varairidzi vaifanirwa kunge vakatambira mari dzavo neChipiri chesvondo rino vaudzwa kuti vave kuzotambira neChipiri chesvondo rinouya. Amai Alexander vanoti dai hurumende yaonawo kuti vashandi vayo vose vaenzaniswa kwete kuti vamwe ndivo vanogarotanga kutambira nhengo dzavo dzichingoramba dzichipedzisira kutambiriswa.

column2: Zvikwata zviri kundichemera: Wenger
column3: anoti zvikwata zvakawanda zvauya kwaari zvichida kumutenga apo ari kugadzirira kubva kuArsenal iyo yaarairidza kwemakore anodarika 22.   Wenger acharairidza mutambo wake wekupedzisira apo chikwata chake chichasangana neHuddewrsfield musi weSvondo.   Paakabvunzwa kuti pane zvimwe zvikwata here zviri kuuya kwaari zvichida kumutenga kuti agozvirairidze, Wenger anoti, “Hongu, zvakawandisa chaizvo. Asi handisi kumbofunga nezvazvo kana kuzvitarisa. Ndinoda kuramba ndichishanda kuno kusvika zuva rekupedzisira rekondirakiti yangu.   “Zveshuwa ndicharamba ndichishanda. Njere dzangu dzinoda chaizvo kuti ndirambe ndichishanda. Asi chokwadi chaicho handizive. Ndinofanirwa kufunga nezvazvo. Ndinofarira huswa hunyoro uye ndinoda kufamba pahuri mazuva ose. Handizive kana ndikaramba ndichizviita mazuva anotevera, zvinogoneka.   “Ndine ruzivo rwakanyanya munyaya dzenhabvu. Saka ndicharamba ndichishanda, ndichiitei, handizive.”   Achibvunzwa kuti achazoshanda nechimwe chikwata chemuEngland here, Wenger anoti, “Panguva ino zvichiri kundiremera. Handitarise nguva iyoyo. Handidi kufunga nezvazvo panguva ino kana kutaura nezvazvo.” – SportsMail Football

column2: VaMugabe Votaura kuMusangano weUnited Nations nezveMinda neKuvandudza IMF
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weChishanu vakataura pamusangano weUnited Nations wechishanu muchikamu chechimakumi manomwe kana kuti 5th Plenary meeting, 70th Session, Sustainable Development Summit 2015. VaMugabe vakaudza musangano uyu kuti muZimbabwe hurumende yavo yakapa vanhu minda kuri kuyedza kuvaburitsa munhamo. VaMugabe vakati izvi vakazviita kunyangwe hazvo paine vamwe vaishora chirongwa ichi zvikuru kubva kunyika dzakabudirira. VaMugabe vakati chirongwa chekugovera minda patsva change chabatsira vanhu vakawanda. VaMugabe vakakurudzira nyika dzose dzepasi rino kuti dzibatane kuti dzikwanise kuzadzikisa zviga zveUnited Nations zvekubatsira varombo. VaMugabe vakatiwo mabhanga akaita sereInternational Moneteray Fund neWorld Bank anofanira kuvandudzwa mashandiro avo. VaMugabe vanoti izvi zvingadai zvakaitwa kare kare. Vanoti kuita izvi kunobatsira kubatsira nyika dzevarombo. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu riri kumusangano uyu Amai Nyaradzayi Gumbonzvanda vakakurudzira vatungamiri venyika dzepasi rino kuti vaendese mari yakawanda kuzvirongwa zvekubatsira vanhu kwete mukurwisana. No media source currently available

column2: Vadzidzi Gumi neVana Vosungwa Vachiratidzira paUniversity of Zimbabwe
column3: Vadzidzi vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe vanoti vacharamba vachienderera mberi nekuratidzira kunyangwe vamwe vavo gumi nevana vakasungwa nezuro vachinyunyuta nekuwedzerwa kwemari dzedzidzo. Vachitaura neStudio 7, rimwe remagweta arikumiririra vadzidzi ava vaPaidamoyo Saurombe vanoshanda nesangano remagweta anorwira kodzero reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vati vadzidzi gumi nevana vakasungwa nezuro havasati vaudzwa mhosva yavari kupomerwa VaSaurombe vanoti pavadzidzi vakasungwa apa pane vamwe vakakuvara. Studio 7 hainawo kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau nhasi muHarare vanomiririra vadzidzi vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe vati mari dzechikoro dzirikudiwa dzinokatyamadza sezvo vazhinji vavo vasiri kukwanisa kuzounganidza mari dzirikudiwa idzi. Mutungamiriri we Student Representative Council yepaUZ vaAllan Chipoyi vanoti mari irikudiwa iyi ichasiya vana vevarombo vasingawani dzidzo University of Zimbabwe yakakwidza mari dzechikoro izvo zvichasiya vaibhadhara mari shoma pachikoro ichi vobhadhara mari inosvika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mana nezvishanu kana kuti 340 000 kubva pazviuru makumi mashanu nezvinomwe 55 000. Avo vanoda kuita zvidzidzo zveMasters varikutarisirwa kubhadhara mari inodarika miriyoni yemadhora emuno. Munyori mukuru muSRC , VaMunashe Cuthbert Masiyiwa vatsigirawo vachiti ongororo yavakaita inoratidza kuti vadzidzi vazhinji vari pachikoro ichi vanobva kumhuri dzisingawani mari yakawanda. VaMasiyiwa vatiwo vanoda kuti mapurisa asungunure vadzidzi vakasungwa. Vadzidzi ava vanyorawo tsamba yenyunyuto iyo vanoti yasainwa nevadzidzi vanodarika zviuru zvishanu. Vati vachanosiya tsamba yenyunyuto iyi kudare reparamende, kubazi rezvedzidzo yepamusoro pamwe nekuZimbabwe Human Rights Commission. Vadzidzi ava vanotiwo kana mari ikasadzikiswa vachange vachizoendawo kumatare. Muzvare Everjoy Chidindi vebato rinopikisa reLabour Economists and Afrikan Democrats vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti zvinokatyamadza kuti mari dzinodiwa nehurumende hadzienderani nemari irikutambiriswa veruzhinji. Hatinawo kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro Muzvinafundo Amon Murwira kana vakuru vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe. Asi vachinyora padandemutande reTwitter , munyori mubazi rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko vaNick Mangwana vanoti vasingakwanisi kubhadhara mari dzechikoro kumauniversity kune zvirongwa zvakadai sekubhadhara mari padiki padiki pamwe nekupiwa zvikwereti. Vatiwo pane varikuda kupinza zvematongerwo enyika munyaya dzekukwidza kwemari dzechikoro asi izvi zvarambwa nevamiririri vevadzidzi avo vatiwo hazviiti kuti vanzi vabhadhare mari iyi zvishoma zvishoma nekuti yakawandisa. Zvimwe zvikoro zvedzidzo yepamusoro zvakwidzawo mari zvakanyanya zvinosanganisira Masvingo Polytechnic iyo yakakwidza mari dzeNational Certificate kubva pazviuru makumi maviri nezvina zvemadhora emuno 24 000 kuenda pazviuru zana nezvishanu (105 000). Gweru Polytechnic neLupane State University ndovamwewo zvakare vakakwidza mari dzechikoro.

column2: Vamwe Vanoti Zvakarwirwa Hondo Hazvina Kuzadzikiswa Sezvo Nhamo Yatekeshera
column3: Apo Zimbabwe iri kucherechedza zuva remagamba vamwe vanoti zvakarwirwa muhondo yerusununguko zviri kuzadzikiswa, asi vamwe vachitiwo kutambura kuri kuita vana veZimbabwe, chiratidzo chekuti nyika haisisiri mugwara raitarisirwa nevakarwira nyika. Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association, VaDouglas Mahiya, vanoti zvimwe zvakarwirwa muhondo yeChimurenga, kutora masimba ezvematongerwo enyika kwakaitwa nevanhu vatema. VaMahiya, avo vanove nhengo yeZanu PF, vanotiwo chimwe chakagonekwa munyika kupihwa kwakaitwa vanhu vatema mapurazi, kunyange hazvo zvakarwirwa muhondo yeChimurenga zvisina kubudirira zvese. VaMahiya vanoti hurumende yaiva yaVaRobert Mugabe yakavhiringa zvinhu nekuisa vanhu muzvinzvimbo asi vasina ruzivo rwezvakaenderwa kuhondo. Mumwe aive murwiri werusununguko, VaShadreck Makombe, vanotiwo chakanyanyobudirira kuwaniswa kuwaniswa minda kwevanhu vatema. Asiwo VaMakombe vanoti vamwe havachakoshesi vaimbove varwiri verusununguko, kunyanya vechidiki, vavanoti havachaoni kubatsira kwekusununguka kwenyika nekuti vanoona zvinhu zvavo zvisingachafambi. VaMakombe vanoti tarisiro yavo huru ndeyekuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, varange vese vane huori munyika. Mumwe muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika, Dr Tinashe Mawere, vanoti kwavari hapana chakachinja patsika dzehutongi sezvo kuchine hudzvinyiriri. Vanotiwo vanoona sekuti ropa rakadeukira mahara munguva yehondo. Mutauriri webato reMDC, VaDaniel Molekele, vanotiwo zvakarwirwa muhondo yekusunungura nyika zvakasiyana zvikuru nezviri kuitika munyika pari zvino. VaMolekele vanoti Zimbabwe yava kutoda kuvakwa patsva. Asi VaMahiya vanoti kutambura kuri kuitika munyika kwakakonzerwa nehutongi hwaVaMugabe, uhwo husina kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika, izvo vanoti zvava kugadziriswa nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Vakawanda vanoti havaoni kukosha kwekuzvitonga kana munyika musina mabasa, kodzero dzevanhu dzichityorwa nehurumende, muzvipatara muchishaikwa mishonga, zvinhu zvichidhura muzvitoro, vanhu vachiita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro soro asi vachipedzisira votengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa nepamusana pekushaikwa kwemabasa. No media source currently available

column2: Zvekumhanya zvakabva kuna tezvara: Muzhingi
column3: SHASHA yemujaho wemarathon, Stephen Muzhingi, anoti akatanga zvekumhanya mushure mekunge aona tezvara vake, baba vakabereka mudzimai wake, vachimhanya uye nehupenyu hwavairarama uho hwainge hwakanaka zvikuru.   Muzhingi — uyo akazvarwa mugore ra1980 kwaGutu — anoti tezvara vake, Esau Magwaza, vaive shasha yemumujaho wemarathon vachikwikwidza nekuhwinha mijaho yakasiyana uye vachirarama hupenyu hunoyemurika izvo zvakamukwezva mwoyo.   Tezvara vake ndivo vakave murairidzi wake wekutanga avo vaida chaizvo kumuona achibudirira mumutambo uyu.   Asi, vakazoshaika Muzhingi achangotanga zvekukwikwidza mumarathon.   “Ndaigaroona tezvara vangu yaive shasha panyaya dzemarathon uye vaive nemukurumbira zvekuti ini ndivo vandaitarisira kwavari nevamwe vanosanganisira anaAbel Chimukoko.   “Ndaingonzwa kuti ukaita zvekumhanya unogona kurarama hupenyu hwakanaka uye ndakazvionera ndega nekuti ndichitarisa Magwaza uye nanaChimukoko vairarama hupenyu hwakanaka,  vachifamba nemota kuburikidza nemarathon. Saka ini ndikati ndizvo ndinoda kuitawo.   “Handina kuzotarira shure, asi tezvara vangu vakazoshaika havo vasina kuzonyatsoona kubudirira kwangu kwandakazoita,” anodaro Muzhingi.   Muzhingi akakwikwidza mijaho yakasiyana muno nekunze kwenyika, asi zita rake rakazonyatsoita mukurumbira apo akahwina mujaho weComrades Marathon katatu kakatevedzana kuSouth Africa.   Haana kugumira ipapo sezvo akaenderera mberi ndokunohwina mimwe mijaho inosanganisira Two Oceans Marathon iyo yaakahwina kaviri kuSouth Africa zvekare.   Panguva yaaipisa chaizvo, shasha iyi yakabuda yega pachena rimwe gore kuti kune zvizvarwa zvekuSouth Africa zvakauya kwaari zvikamuti arambe nyika yake azviti chizvarwa cheSouth African kuitira kuti nyika iyi ipembedzwe izvo akaramba sezvo aida kusimudza mureza weZimbabwe.   Pakumhanya kwese kwaakaita muno nekunze kwenyika, Muzhingi anoti mijaho yeComrades Marathon uye neTwo Oceans Marathon icharamba iri mundangariro dzake pamwechete newekutanga waakaenda kunokwikwidza kuNew York, kuAmerica.   “Mijaho mitatu iyi ichagara iri mundangariro dzangu kusvika muguva nekuti ndakadadisa ndikasimudza mureza wenyika yangu, zvinhu zvinofadza chose,” anodaro.   Kuhwina kwaakaita mijaho yakasiyana muno uye nekunze, Muzhingi anoti akashandisa mari yake yaaihwina zvine musoro izvo zvakamuona achitenga dzimba nhatu – mbiri dziri muHarare uye neimwechete iri kuChitungwiza.   Anoti vanhu vanofanirwa kurongera remangwana ravo vachishandisa mari yavanenge vawana vachiita zvisvinu pane kunakidzwa nekudya mari vasingagadzire remangwana revana vavo.   “Gadzirai remangwana renyu uye nerevana, ini mari yese yandaihwina ndaitenga dzimba iye zvino ndine dzimba nhatu. Ndakange ndisingade kuti mune remangwana rangu vana vozobvunza kuti baba zvamaive nemukurumbira chii chamakaita, tisisina pekugara, izvo ndakaramba,” anodaro.   Muzhingi anoti gore ra2019 harina kumufambira zvakanaka sezvo akatadza kukwikwidza kumijaho yakasiyana apo ainge akakuvara.   Asi iye zvino anoti ari kushanda nesimba kuti gore rino agokwikwidza kumijaho mikuru inosanganisira yeOld Mutual munaKukadzi kozoti Comrades Marathon neTwo Oceans Marathon.   Shasha iyi yakakomborerwa nevanakomana vatatu uye mukuru wacho — Methane (10) — ari kutevera matsimba ababa vake achiita zvemujaho wekumhanya kozoti mumwe wacho ari kuita zvemutambo wekarate.

column2: Bhanga reStandard Chartered Romisa Vamwe Vashandi Basa muZimbabwe
column3: Bhanga reStandard Chartered rinoti riri kuzogumura vamwe vashandi sezvo rave kuendesa mamwe mapazi aro zvikuru anoda humhizha kuChina, India neMalaysia. Vanhu makumi maviri vakatomiswa basa pavashandi mazana matatu nemakumi masere nemana vari muZimbabwe. Bhanga iri rakatonyorera vashandi varo chiziviso richitaura nezvenyaya iyi. Mumwe mukuru muStandard Chartered Amai Lillian Hapanyengwi vaudza nhepfenyuro yeBloomberg kuti vamwe vashandi vachatatsvagirwa kumwe kwekuenda. Vanotiwo zvavari kuita zvakanangana nekuderedza mari dzavari kushandisa. Mutungamiri wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union VaPeter Mutasa vanoti vashandi vakatotanga kumiswa basa gore rapera. Vanoti vanhu ava havasi kunyatsopihwa mari yavo yemudyandigere sezvo hurumende isiri kuvapawo rutsigiro. Vati zvinhu zvinovashungurudza kuti vashandi vemuZimbabwe vari kusiiwa vachinonga svosve nemuromo nevemakambani. No media source currently available

column2: Torres hutu kuJapan
column3: weAtletico Madrid neLiverpool — Fernando Torres — obuda pachena kuti ari kuenda kuJapan kunotambira Sagan Tosu mwaka unotevera.   Chizvarwa chekuSpain ichi change chichidiwa nezvikwata zvekuUnited States neAustralia, asi akataura nevatori venhau kuti ari kuenda kuAsia.   Torres akazivisa kuti ange achishevedzwa nezvikwata zvakawanda asi akafunga kutevera shamwari yake, Andres Iniesta, kuJapan.   “Ndange ndichidiwa nezvikwata zvekuFrance, Germany nezvimwe zviri muSpain,” anodaro.   “Asi ndange ndisingade kutambira chimwe chikwata chemuEurope ini nekuti ndakawana zvose zvandaida nechikwata changu Atletico.   “Ndichange ndine shamwari yangu futi kuno Andres. Saka tiri kufara tose nemukana uyu wauya kwatiri.”   Iniesta naLukas Podolski vese vanotambira muVissel Kobe uye Sagan Tosu ichange ichisangana navo mumutambo weJ1 League mwaka unotevera.   Torres akabva kuchikwata chake chaakakurira cheAtletico Madrid uko akatamba mitambo 45 ndokuhwina mukombe weEuropa League.   Mutambi uyu akambotambira Liverpool uye ari kuenda kuchikwata icho chakapedza mwaka wadarika chakagara pechisere palog.   “Ndiri kutotanga svondo rinotevera, ndinovimba kuti ndichatanga zvakanaka nechikwata changu chitsva uye ndigotamba mitambo yakawanda nekunwisa,” anodaro Torres.   “Ndinovimba kutanga kutamba musi wa21. Ndinovimba ndichave kuno kwemakore akawanda uye zvichange zvichienderana nekuti ndiri kutamba sei.” — SportsMail Football

column2: Varairidzi Voronga Kuzivisa Hurumende neDanho reKuda Kuramwa Mabasa
column3: Varairidzi vari pasi pemubatanidzwa mutsva weFederation of Zimbabwe Educators’ Unions (FOZEU) vanoti vari kuronga kusvitsa kuhurumende neChitatu tsamba yekuzivisa nezvekuronga kuramwa mabasa panovhurwa zvikoro mwedzi unouya. Masangano evaraidzi mashanu anoti Zimbabwe Teachers Association (ZIMTA), Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (PTUZ), Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (ARTUZ), Professional Educators’ Union of Zimbabwe (PEUZ), neZimbabwe National Teachers’ Union (ZINATU), akabatana akaumba mubatanidzwa unonzi Federation of Zimbabwe Educators’ Unions (FOZEU) senzira yekurwira kodzero dzavo. Varairidzi ava vanoti zvichemo zvavo hazvisi kunyanyonzwikwa kana vakaenda kunhaurirano sevashandi vehurumende pasi Apex Council, iyo inomirira vashandi vehurumende vose, izvo zvakaita kuti vade kuzvimirira voga. Mutungamiri wePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti vakaita zvose zvinotarisirwa mukuedza kuti vataurirane nehurumende, asi hapana chinoratidza kuti hurumende iri kutirimuka. Vanotiwo hurongwa hwekuti vashandi vehurumende vakwanise kuita hurukuro dzemihoro, kana kuti collective bargaining, hunonzi hwakapasiswa nedare remakurukota inzira yehurumende yekuda kuedza kunyaradza varairidzi pamwe nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vari kurwira kuti vapiwe kodzero yavo iyi, iyo iri mubumbiro remitemo. No media source currently available

column2: Vabereki Vane Vana Vane "Autism" Votarisana neMatambudziko Makukutu
column3: Vabereki vevana vanoita matambudziko pakutamba nevamwe kana kuita zvinhu zvinotarisirwa pazera ravo kana kuti vane "autism" vanoti vatarisana nedambudziko guru pakuriritira vana ava. Vanoti hupenyu hwavo hwakaomarara nepamusana pekuti vana vane autism havakwanisi kuita zvinhu zvinoitwa nevamwe vechidiki kana kushamwaridzana navo. Baba Luke Pencil veku Malbereign muHarare vane mwana wavo ane makore gumi ane autism. Baba Pencil, avo vane makore makumi mana nematanhatu ekuberekwa vanoti dambudziko guru rinosangana nevabereki ava nderekushaya ruzivo pamusoro pe autism. “Izvi hazvina kunge zvabatwa nana chiremba kunyange mwana akarwara kwenguva refu ndichienda kunana chiremba vakasiyana siyana nekunana mukoti vakasiyana siyana.” Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Pakashayikwa kana mumwechete akatibatsira chaizvo kuti mwana wenyu condition yake inonzi autism. Aiti akachema zvainzi ah, baba hamuzivi mwana anongochema, zvinoreva kuti haasi kunzwa zvakanaka kana kuti muri kumuitira zvaasingadi. Asi uchiedza kutsanangura kuti aiwa, mwana uyu pane zvaanoita zvandisinganzwisise zvakafanana nekuti dzimwe nguva anoramba kupfeka bhutsu, dzimwe nguva anoramba kugerwa musoro.” Baba Pencil vanoti vabereki vakawanda vanokatyamadzwa nekugumbuka zvikuru pavanoona kuti mwana wavo ari kukura zvakasiyana nevamwe vana. Vanoti ivo vakaita mhanza yekukurumidza kuziva zvaiitika kumwana wavo. “Vana ava vanenge vane ma censory issues anenge akavhiringika, haana kuita seevamwe vana. Saka kana achigerwa ane zvaanonzwa zvisinganzwiwi nevamwe vana vose saka achiita muitiro waanoita iwowo.” Vatiwo, “ Saka izvozvo ndizvo zvakaita kuti tinzwisise kuti ho mwana wedu condition yaaninayo inonzi autism. Izvozvo ndinoda kuti nditsinhire kuti izvi handina kuzviwana kunana chiremba kana kunana mukoti. Ndakatozvinzwawo kune mumwe mubereki akanga ari affected, akatoenda pa radio akanotaura. Ndopatazowana information yakadaro.” Baba Pencil vanoti murume nemudzimai vanofanira kubatana kwete kunongedzerana kana mwana asangana nedambudziko. “Saka izvozvo zvakatipa simba rekuti kuti mwana wedu aite zviri nani, tikwanise kumumaneja, regai tinorisecha.” Vatizve, “ Tikabva taenda pa internet. Iripo information pa internet. Ukaiwana zvinoita kuti umaneje mwana wako zviri nani. Zvinoita kuti kuwadzana kwako naye kuve kuri nani, kuwadzana kwake nenharaunda yakamukomberedza kuve nani.” Amai Emma Muchefa avo vane mwana ane autism, vanoshandira hurumende vari pa Domboshava training centre. Vanoti madzimai mazhinji ane vana vane autism anoshungurudzika zvikuru. “Vazhinji vana baba vanotiza, uye hama hadzizvitambiri. Kazhinji burden inosiyirwa amai, seni as a mother of three, two vari disabled murume akabva aenda ndikasara ndiri a single mother.” Amai Muchefa vatizve, “ Saka dambudziko rinenge rave rekuti unenge uchida kuenda kubasa, uri kuda ku physio nemwana iyeye, uri kuda zvekudya uri kuda zvekupfeka zvevana ivavo, uri kuda medication. Saka kazhinji kacho uri kuda zvekufambisa, hauna kana motor kana wheel-chair.” Amai Tendai Kamutero veku Domboshava vane mwana wavo ane autism. Vakatozozviziva mwana uyu ave nemakore matatu kuti ndizvo zvaari. Amai Kamutero vanoti kuriritira mwana uyu zvinovanetsa semunhu ari pamushando. “Pandinoenda kubasa, munhu anosara naye haanzwisisi zvaanoda nekuti haatauri.” Vatizve, “Sign language haaizivi, haakwanisi ku communicator naye. Asi iye takatozomudzidza kuti kana ave nenzara kana chikafu chiri paanosvikira anotora ega. Kana kuti ukaona akukudhonza, isaini yekuti ane nzara.” Amai Constance Mandishona vane vana vana, uye vaviri vavo vakaremara. Amai Mandishona, avo vanoshanda muhurumende vakapihwa imba yekugara kuMufakose mushure mekunge vakuru vavo vaona kutambura kwavaiita. Vanoti vakaremara vanofanira kusimudzirana. “Ipapo ndisati ndapihwa imba ndakanga ndisina pfungwa dzekuti I can advocate kana kumiririrawo kana kutsigira munhu akaremara.” Amai Mandishona vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Ndakazogara pasi ndikazvibvunza kuti, hongu ndamiririrwa, ko vari kunze uko vasina anovamiririrawo tochiita sei? Nekuti inini pandakabatsirwa nemba, Permanent secretary mai Nhekairo vakandiudza kuti, Cony, dai vana vako wanga wakavachengetesa kumaraini, vachiita kunge musara pavana, I wasn’t going to assist you. But pese patinotaura unotungamidza vana vako kumberi kuti ma’am vangu vazodai nekuti hauna kunyara navo saka tazokudai. Ndakakwanisa kubatsira vamwe vabereki vairi. Mumwe wacho anonzi mai Boora anoshanda ku President’s department. Ane mwana wakewo ane autism. Ndikamuti akoma nyaya yangu yakamira yakadai, inini ndakawanawo imba. Imimi can you not write a letter mukwanisewo kuti mubatsirwe? Vakapihwa flat ku Ardbennie.” Dr Cotilda Mangoma mugari wemuHarare uye vanofamba vachipa dzidziso pamusoro pe autism. Vanoti vabereki vevana vakadai vanofanira kushingaira kutsvaga ruzivo kuitira kuti vana vavo vave nepundutso. “Inini ndiri kuona kuti zvakakosha kuve neruzivo mukati memhuri nemhaka yekuti chinhu chawave kuziva unoziva kuti unochibata sei, unochibata nemutoo upi.” Dr Mangoma vanotizve, “Saka ini ndinoti vana baba nana mai vane vana vavasinganzwisisi kuti ingave autism here kana kwete zviri nani vatsvake rubatsiro kubva ku clinic level. Kana vabva ikoko voudzwa kuti enda ku rehabilitation. Rehabilitation yoferefeta kuti itype ipi ye autism, pamusana pekuti akasiyana siyana, akawanda. Nekuonekwa kunoita mwana, nemaitiro ake unobva waudzwa kuti aiwa ichi ndechakati, then rubatsiro rwobva rwauya. Angave anogona nezvemaoko, angave munhu ari bright kuchikoro, zvese zvinobatsirika along those lines.” VaPardon Gonorashe mushandi wehurumende ane hunyanzvi hwekubatsira veruzhinji, kunyanya vanotambura kuti vave neraramo iri nani. Vanoti vabereki vevana vane autism vanofanira kuve padyo nepavanowana ruzivo pamusoro pe autism.“Saka paida kuti patange pawanikwa centre yekuti vanhu vari kumaruwa, vangadai vari kuBinga, Muzarabani kana kuti kuMberengwa vakaona kuti vane vana vane autism they can refer vana ivavo kuno.” Vatizve,“Tikashevedza ma parents vari kumaruwa vanogona kuuya kuma campaign akaita seaya.” VaGonorashe vanoti hurumende inofanira kuisa mari yakawanda gore rega rega kuzvirongwa zvakanangana ne autism. “Hakuna zviri kunyanya kuitwa about disability as a whole.” Vatizve, “Then mukazopinda mudisability sector imomo munozoona kuti autism is relegated kuzasizasi kune other forms of disability. Saka ngatitorei disability sector se ine mari shoma mu budget. Then yapihwa mari shoma already, autism iri kuzasizasi zvekuti ikoko kunosvika one cent. Ndosaka kune vanhu vashomanana vari kutari nezve autism as a right.” Sangano guru rezvehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation rinoti pavanhu zana nemakumi matanhatu ega ega mumwechete wavo anenge aine autism. Vamwe vanhu vane autism vanokwanisa kuzviriritira asi vakawanda vavo vanotozoda kuchengetwa hupenyu hwavo hwese. No media source currently available  .

column2: VaMnangagwa Vanorumbidza Muchakabvu Mandela kuMusangano weNelson Mandela Peace Summit
column3: Mutungamiriri wenyika, Va Emerson Mnangagwa, vapinda neMuvhuro mumusangano we Nelson Mandela Peace Summit uyo waitirwa mu New York kumucheto kwemisangano yeUnited Nations Annual General Assembly, UNGA, iri kuitwa muguta iri svondo rino. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, Va Mnangagwa varumbidza mabasa akaitwa naVaMandela mumazuva avo vachiti pasi rose harikanganwi zvakasiya zvaitwa naVaMandela panyika vachiri vapenyu. Va Mnangagwa vati vanhu havafaniri kungotaura mabasa aVaMandela vasingazadzisi nekuita zvido zvavo. VaMnangagwa vati VaMandela, avo vakava mutungamiri weSouth Africa wechitema wekutanga, munhu akagara mujeri kwemakore akawanda achirwira rusununguko rwemunhu wese wemuSouth Africa. Vamwe vanga vari pamusangano uyu vanosanganisira mutungamiri weSouth Africa, Va Cyrl Rhamaphosa, shirikadzi yaVaMandela, Amai Graca Machel. VaMnangagwa vakasanaganawo nemusi weSvondo nezvizvarwa zve Zimbabwe zvinogara mu America ne kuCanada umo vakataura nezvehurongwa hwehurumende yavo uye kukumbira vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika kuti vadzoke kumusha kuzobatsira mukusimudzira nyika vazoisawo ruoko mubudiriro nematongerwo enyika ye Zimbabwe. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwawo kutaura pamberi pemusangano mukuru uchaitwa nemusi weChitatu. Uyu musangano wekutanga waVaMnangagwa vachitaura semutungamiri wenyika. Kwemakore anodarika makumi matatu nemanomwe, vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vaitaura pamusangano wepagore weUNGA. Nguva zhinji VaMugabe vaitora mukana uyu kunyomba America neBritain nemadzisahwira adzo vachiti nyika idzi dzaipindira mumatongerwo enyika muZimbabwe dziine chinangwa chekuvabvisa pachigaro. Asi VaMugabe vakazobviswa pachigaro nemauto avo, achitungamirwa nemunhu wavakagadza pachigaro chemukuro wemauto ose, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakazoitwa mumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaMnangagwa. No media source currently available

column2: Vanoona neZveKufambiswa kweMari yeHurumende Amai Chiri Vokurudzira Kubatwa Zvakanaka kweMari dzeMitero
column3: Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari dzehurumende kana kuti Auditor-General, Amai Mildred Chiri, vanoti hupenyu hwevanhu munyika hunogona kusimuka kana mapazi ehurumene, makambani ayo pamwe nemakanzuru akatevedzera zvavanokururudzira kuti zviitwe mushure mekuongorora mashandisirwe anotwa mari yehurumende. Muhurukuro neStudio 7 Amai Chiri vanoti ongororo dzavanoita pamashandisiro avanoita dzinogona kubatsira chete kana mapazi ehurumende, makambani ayo pamwe nemakanzuro akatevedza gwara rakanaka rekushandisa mari dzehurumende. Vanoti chinangwa chavo pavanotaura nezvekusafambiswa zvakanaka kwemari, vanenge vachida kuti zvigadziriswe kuti vanhu vabatsirikane. Ongororo dzinoitwa nemahofisi avo kusanganisira ichangobva kuitwa ya2020, inoratidza kuti mari hadzisi kushandiswa zviri pamutemo, dzimwe hadzizivikanwe kuti dzakasashandiswa sei. Semuenzaniso muna 2020 bazi rezvemati rinonzi rakapa mapazi ehurumende mari dzinodarika zana remabhiriyoni emunyika kana kuti 100 billion Zimbabwe Dollars pasina mvumo yedare reparamende sezvinokurudzirwa. Kanzuru yeHarare yakatadza kutsanangura kuti mari inodarika miriyoni yemadhora ekuAmerica yakawanikwa pakutengeswa kwenzvimbo dzekuvakira yakashandiswa sei. Gore rimwe chetero Auditor General vakaburitswa gwaro rairatidza kuti mari inodarika miyoni yemadhora ekuAmerica iyo yaifanira kupihwa vanotambura, vakaremera pamwe nemhuri dzinotumgamirwa nevana panguva yeCovid-19 dzakapihwa vanhu vasingakodzeri kana vasingazivikamwe nebazi rezvemagariro evanhu. Amai Chiri vanoti zvinoita kuti veruzhinji varasikirwe sezvo variivo vanofanira kubatsirikana nemari idzi. Vanotiwo kunyange hazvo zvichitora nguva kuti mapazi ehurumende, makambani ayo nemakanzuru agadzirise zvinhu, vanofara kuti pari zvino pane mamwe mapazi nemakambani ave kugadzirisa zvinhu. Vaenderera mberi vachiti, vari kushandandawo neZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission (ZACC) nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemashandisirwo emari dzehurumende kuona kuti nyaya dzehuwori nekusashandiswa kwemari dzehurumende zvakanaka dzakagadziriswa. ZACC ndeimwewo yakanzi nehofisi yawo haisi kushandisa mari zvakanaka uye yakabvuma mhosva yavo ikati iri kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Mapurisa nebazi rezvemari anonziwo haana kufambisa mari zvakanaka nehofisi yaAmai Chiri. Amai Chiri vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vazive kuti mari dzavo dzemitero kuhurumende, kana kuti maPublic Funds dzinonoshandiswa sei nekudaro vave kudhinda gwaro nemitauro yemuno vachitanga neChishona neNdebele vozoenda kune mimwe mitauro. Vatiwo ishuviro yavo kuti dai vawedzerwa mari kuti vakwanisa kuvhura mahofisi mune mamwe matunhu munyika kuti vakwanise kuita basa ravo zvakanaka. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti ichokwadi kuti nyika inorasikirwa nemari yakawanda inofanira kubatsira veruzhinji nekuti hapana chido chekugadzirirsa nyaya dzehuwori kubva kuvatungamiriri venyika ino. Kunyange hazvo Amai Chiri vasina kukwanisa kutaura kuti imarii inorasikrwa nenyika nekuda kwekuda kwehuwori kana kusafambiswa zvakanaka kwemari, Transparency International inoti Zimbabwe inorasikirwa nemari inosvika bhiriyoni remadhora ekuAmerice gore rega rega nekuda kwehuwori. Hofisi yaAuditor-General, inosungirwa nemutemo kuongorora mashandisirwo anoitwa mari nemapazi ehurumende, makambani ayo makomisheni nemakanzuru uye kuti iture gwaro rezvainenge yawana nezvinofanira kuitwa kuparamende.

column2: Bazi rezveKugara Kwakanaka kweVanhu Rinoti Vakaremara Vari Kubatsirwa muNguva Ino yeCovid-19 Lockdown
column3: Gurukota rezvemabasa, vashandi nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vanoti bazi ravo riri kubatsira vakaremara vakarasikirwa nemihoro munguva ino yemutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu, kana kuti lockdown, kuburikidza nechirongwa chavakaparura chakanangana nekubatsira vanotambura. Vachitaura neStudio 7 vari kuCongo Brazzaville, uko vari kumusangano wechinomwe webudiriro mudunhu reAfrica, kana kuti "Africa Regional Forum on Sustainable Development", uyo wakapetwa nemusi weChina, Professor Mavima vanoti bazi ravo rakakwanisa kunyoresa vanhu vanosvika zviuru mazana matatu negumi, kana kuti 310 000, pasi pechirongwa ichi. Vanotiwo vave nemakore maviri vaumba bazi rinomirira vakaremara, iro riri kutungamirwa naDoctor Christine Peta. Professor Mavima vanoti munguva ino bazi ravo riri kubatsira vakaremara kuburikidza nehomwe yemari yavakaisa parutivi yekubatsira vanoda kutanga zvirongwa zvekuzvibatsira, uye ivo segurukota vari kukurudzira kuti vanhu vanyorese kumahofisi ebazi ravo ari nyika yose kuti vabatsirwe. No media source currently available

column2: Zimbabwe Haisati Yavhura Mabhodha Ayo?
column3: Vamiriri vehurumende kumuganho weBeitbridge neSouth Africa vanonzi nezuro vakazivisa kuti nyika haisi kuzovhura miganho yayo nhasi, zuva riri kuvhurwawo miganho yenyika yeSouth Africa, sezvanga zvakatarisirwa nevakawana. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotenga nekutengesa kunze kwenyika, reInternational Cross-Border Traders Associationa, VaDenis Juru, vanoti vakaudzwa nezvedanho iri nezuro pamusangano wavakaita nevamiriri ava. South Africa inonzi yakazivisa kuti yaizovhura miganho yayo nhasi, izvo zvakapawo vana veZimbabwe tarisiro yekuti nyika yavo yaizoitawo zvimwechete. Asi hurumende yeZimbabwe yakagara yazivisa zvayo kare kuti yaizovhura chete nhandare dzendege musi wa 01 Gumiguru, unove nhasi. Miganho pamwe nenhandare dzendege zvakavharwa muna Kurume senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, kanawo munyori mubazi ravo, VaNick Mangwana, kunyange hazvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichirira. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaKindness Paradza, vatiwo vanga vasati vanzwa nezvenyaya iyi. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yaitwa naJonga Kandemiiri weStudio 7 naVaJuru. No media source currently available

column2: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Voratidzira muHarare
column3: Vanotengesera mumigwagwa neChipiri vanopfuura mazana matatu vakaratidzira mu Harareku nyangwe hazvo mapurisa akayedza kuvarambidza kusvitsa gwaro renyunyuto kudare reparamende. Vairatidzira ava vaipika kuti havasi kuzobvuma kubviswa mumigwagwa mavanoshandira pakati peguta kana hurumende isati yavapa nzvimbo dzekushandira dzakanaka. Varatidziri ava vakatangira kuratidzira pakatarisana nemahofisi ekanzuru yeHarare pana Rezende ndokupinda muna Nelson Mandela vakananga kuparamende apo pavazomiswa nemapurisa panosangana Nelson Mandela na Julius Nyerere kwenguva inokwana awa imwe chete mapurisa achiramba kuti varatidziri ava vaendese gwaro ravo renyunyuto kuparamende. Asi apo mapurisa ainge ari pakati pekurambidza varatidziri kuenderera mberi, mumwe wevanga vachitungamira varatidziri ava, VaJustice Munayi ,vanove munyori mubhodhi rerimwe remasangano anga achiratidzira aya re National Vendors Union Zimbabwe, kana NAVUZ, vakaudza varatidziri ava kuti sevanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa havasi kuzofa vakabvuma kubviswa mumigwagwa musi weChishanu uyo wakatarwa nehurumende kuti vange vabva mumigwagwa. Zvakataurwa naVaMunayi zvakatsinhirwawo nemutungamiri weNAVUZ, VaSamuel Wadzai. Mumwe wevanga vachiratidzira ava uye vari nhengo yeMDC-T inomirira Bulawayo East muparamende, Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kutanga yagadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika kuitira kuti vanhu vari kutengesera mumigwagwa vawane mabasa. Varatidziri ava vakazobvumirana nemapurisa aya ainge akatakura zvombo kuti gwaro renyunyuto ravanga vainaro riendeswe kuparamende nevanhu vana chete uye kuti vamwe vese vasare vakamira panosangana Nelson Mandela na Julius Nyerere pavasara vachiimba zvakaomarara. Kuratidzira uku kunouyawo apo dare repamusoro ranga rabvumidza vanhu ava kuratidzira mushure mekunge mapurisa ange aramba neMuvhuro kuti vaenderere mberi nekuratidzira nyangwe zvazvo mapurisa akambenge abvuma. Zvichakadaro, sangano re Zimbabwe Informal Sector Organization kana kuti ZISO rasvitsawo gwaro renyunyuto kugurukota rinoona nezvematunhu, VaIgnatious Chombo. Sangano re Ziso riri kuda kuti hurumende isiyane nehurongwa hwayo hwekuda kudzinga vanotengesera mumigwagwa uye kuti igare pasi nevemasangano anomirira vanhu vese ava kuti vawirirane nzira dzokuti nyaya iyi yogadziriswa sei. No media source currently available

column2: South Africa Inoti Vabvakure Vachabaiwavo Nhomba yeCovid-19
column3: Hurumende yeSouth Africa yakazivisa kuti vanhu vese vari mu South Africa vachakwanisa kubaiwa mushonga wenhomba, kana kuti vaccine, wekudzivirira chirwere che Covid-19. Izvi zvinotevera gurukota reSouth Africa rinoona nezvehutano, VaZweli Mkhize, vazivisa kuti South Africa ichangobaya mushonga uyu pazvizvarwa zveSouth Africa chete, kwete vabvakure. Mushure mekushorwa zvikuru nenyanzvi dzezvehutano nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vakazivisa neMuvhuro kuti vanhu vakuru vose vari munyika iyi vachabaiywa mushonga uyu zvisinei kuti zvizvarwa zvekunyika ipi. Sangano reHuman Rights Watch, iro rakashoravo zvikuru hurumende yeSouth Africa payakange yataura zvekusarura vabvakure mukudzivirira chirwere ichi, rinoti izvi ndizvo zvinotarisirwa kuitwa munyika dzose, kusanganisa muSouth Africa. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti sezvo South Africa ine mbiri yekusarura vabvakure, sangano ravo richange rakatarisisa kuona kuti South Africa inoita here kana kuti kwete, zvayavimbisa kuita izvi. No media source currently available

column2: Seneta Rejoice Timire, Avo Vakashaya neChirwere cheCovid-19, Varadzikwa Nhasi muHarare
column3: Mumwe wevanga vachimirira vakaremara mudare reSenate, Amai Rejoice Timire. avo vakashaya nezuro nedenda reCovid-19, varadzikwa nhasi kumarinda eGlen Forest muHarare. Vachitaura pakuradzikwa kwaAmai Timire, sachigaro veNational Disability Board, Amai Mercy Maunganidze, vati vachaedza nepose pavanogona napo kuti mabasa akanaka aiitwa naAmai Timire, aenderere mberi. Vasara vakamirira vakaremara mudare reSeneti, VaWatson Khupe, vati vakaremara vasiyirwa chisveru chekuti vagare vachishanda zvakasimba sezvaiita Amai Timire. Mukuru weDeaf Zimbabwe Trust,Amai Babra Nyangairi, vatiwo vakaremara vanofanira kufambisa mberi mabasa aibatwa naAmai Timire. Hanzvadzi yaAmai Timire, Bishop Sevenzile Msiza, vati semhuri varasikirwa zvikuru. Muzvare Pamela Timire, avo vaishanda pamwe chete naamai vavo, vatiwo ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwarasikirwa nekushaya kwaita Seneta Timire. Amai Timire, avo vakadomwa kuva nhengo yeSenate muna 2018, vashaya vava nemakore makumi matanhatu nemaviri ekuberekwa, uye vasiya vana vashanu nevazukuru. No media source currently available

column2: Ishe Charumbira Vanoudzwa neDare Kuti Madzishe Haapindiri Munyaya dzeMatongerwo eNyika
column3: Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaClement Phiri, vakatura mutongo neChitatu wekuti Ishe Fortune Charumbira vakatyora mutemo apo vakataura mashoko ekuti madzishe anotsigira bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF. Dare iri rakati Ishe Charumbira vanofanirwa kurangwa nemitemo yezvematunhu. VaPhiri vakapawo Ishe Charumbira mazuva manomwe ekuti vaudze vanhu kuburikidza nemapepanhau, nhepfenyuro nepaterevhizheni kuti hapana ishe anofanira kutora divi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Dare iri rakakomekedza kuti Ishe Charumbira vaburitse pachena kuti vakanganisa nekutaura kwavo kuti madzishe anotsigira bato riri kutonga. Bumbiro remutemo wenyika rinoti madzishe nemasabhuku havafanire kupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kunyange hazvo vamwe vavo vachiramba vachiita izvi. Nyaya iyi yakakwidzwa kumatare nesangano reElection Resource Center, ERC. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Ishe Charumbira sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembosha yavo. Mukuru weERC, VaTawanda Chimhini, vanoti vafara zvikuru nemutongo uyu vakati madzishe anofanira kutonga asina divi raanorerekera. No media source currently available

column2: Barcelona yotenga Martial
column3: kugadzirira mari inosvika 60 miriyoni paunzi yekutenga mutambi weManchester United, Anthony Martial.   Martial zvinonzi haasi kufara kuOld Trafford uye hurukuro dzekuwedzera imwe kondirakiti yake hadzisi kufamba nekuda kwekushaya mikana yekutamba yakawanda muchikwata chaJose Mourinho. Kondirakiti yake yaanayo parizvino ichapera mugore ra2019, asi ine chimwe chibvumirano chekuti inogona kuwedzerwa rimwe gore pamusoro.   Kubva Alexis Sanchez auya kuchikwata ichi muna Ndira, Martial haasati ambonwisa, angotamba mitambo mina chete inosanganisira uyo vakakundwa neTootenham pamwe neNewcastle uye akazoburitswa angotamba maminitsi 64 chete apo vakasangana neChelsea. Martial anonzi haana kufara paakaudzwa kuti ave kuchinja nzvimbo yekutambira zvichitevera kuuya kwakaita Senchez kuchikwata ichi.   Barcelona yaida kutenga Martial mwaka uno  ndokuzosarudza kutenga Ousmane Dembele kubva kuBorrusia Dortmund, asi inogona kuzodzokera mutambi uyu panopera mwaka uno.   Barcelona ine chivimbo chekuti inogona kutenga mutambi weFrance – Antoine Griezmann – kubva kuAtletci Madrid uye inonzi iri kuongorora Ryan Sessgnon weFulham. – SportsMail Football

column2: Mutungamiri weSangano reYARD, VaMliswa Vanoburitswa neDare muHusungwa
column3: Mukuru wesangano revechidiki reYouth Advocacy for Reform and Democracy, YARD, VaTemba Mliswa, avo vakasungwa neSvondo kuEsigodini mudunhu reMatabeleland South, vakamiswa pamberi pedare redzimhosva kuEsigodini kwakare vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo wePublic Order and Security Act kana kuti POSA. Gweta raVaMliswa, VaLizwe Jamela vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vanoti mutongi wedare aona zvakakodzera kuti VaMliswa vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo vasina kubvisiswa mari yechibatiso. “VaMliswa vakasungwa nezuro (Svondo) vaine vamwe vavo 23 vavaifamba navo, vachibva kuBulawayo vakasvika kuEsigodini vakati regai timbotura zvedu mafemo, vavane zvekudya sezvo aive masikati, vachibva vatonzi watove musangano,” VaJamela vanodaro. Vanoti vakabva vasungwa vari makumi maviri nevana vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita musangano vasina kutanga vapiwa mvumo. VaJamela vanoti VaMliswa dzimwe nhengo makumi maviri nenhatu dzeYARD idzi dzakazoregwa dzisina mhosva yadzakapomerwa, kukasara VaMliswa, avo vakarara usiku humwechete muchitokisi chemapurisa. VaJamela vanoti VaMliswa vanzi vadzoke mudare musi wa 22 Chikumi. Vasati vasungwa, VaMliswa vanonzi vakambonetsana nemumwe kanzura mudunhu iri, VaPatson Sibanda, avo vaiti VaMliswa vakanga vavazvidza zvikuru nekuita musangano mudunhu ravo vasina kutanga vavakumbira mvumo kana kuvazivisa. No media source currently available

column2: Huwori, Kusarongeka Zvonzi Ndidzo Honzeri Dzekushaikwa hweHupfu muNyika
column3: Dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu munyika rinonzi nevamwe ratodzika midzi, panguva iyo paine kunakurirana nyoka mhenyu pakati pehurumende nevanogaya upfu, avo vari kunzi vari kunzvengesa upfu, zvikuru hweRoller Meal. Hurumende yakabhadhara kare chidimbu chemari inofanirwa kutengeswa nayo rudzi rwehupfu urwu, ivzo zvinozoita kuti vatengi vahuwane nemutengo uri pasi, asi izvi zvinonzi hazvisi kubatsira sezvo hupfu hwacho huri kuramba huchishaikwaq muzvitoro asi huchiwanikwa kumusika mutema, uko kwahuri kuwanikwa nemari iri pamusoro.
