Vanogaya upfu vari kupomerwawo mhosva yekuwanza upfu hweNgwerewere, uhwo hunodhura, pachinzvimbo chekuti vagaye hweRoller Meal hunokwaniswa kutengwa nevanhu vose nemutengo uri pasi. Ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika rwunonzi rwave kuswera rwuchifudza zvitoro kuri kumirira kuti rwungangosangana nemotokari dzinodhirivhara upfu, pachinzvimbo chekunge rwuchiita zvinopa pundutso kumhuri pamwe nenyika. Mumwe anoti aswera akagarira upfu ndaAmai Rufaro Chakanyuka vekuGreendale muHarare, avo vanoti vazohuwana asi huchitengeswa nemadhora zana nemakumi mashanu patsapo yemakirogiramu gumi, pane mutengo wakatarwa nehurumende wemadhora makumi manomwe pamakirogiramu gumi. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu riri kukonzerwa nekusarongeka kwechirongwa chehurumende chekutsigira vanogaya upfu nemari kuitira kuti vagohutengesa nemari iri pasi. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanotiwo chanyanya kukonzera dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu huwori, uhwo vanoti hwatekeshera munyika. VaChirumhanzu vanoti veruzhinji munyika vari kutarisira kuti hurumende ichakasika kutora matanho ekuparadza midzi yehuwori iyi isati yasunga nekusvina nyika yose. Svondo rapera vanogaya upfu vakapomerwa mhosva yekutengesa hwehupfu hwavanofanirwa kutengesera vanhu munyika kuDemocratic Republic of Congo, uko vanonzi vari kutengesa nemari iri pamusoro. Mukupera kwesvondo mapurisa anonzi akapinda mumabhizimusi evanogaya hupfu, uko anonzi akawana upfu hunosvika matani zviuru zvishanu hwakanga hakachengetedzwa, hunofungidzirwa kuti hwaida kuendeswa pamisika mitema. Asi mutauriri wesangano revanogaya hupfu, reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaGarikai Chaunza vakaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti hapana chinoshamisa kuti vanogaya upfu vawanikwe vaine hupfu, sezvo riri iro basa ravo. VaChaunza vakatiwo vamwe vanogaya hupfu vari kuita dambudziko rekushaya chekutakurisa upfu uhwu kuendesa kune vezvitoro. Sachigaro weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Musarara, vanoti sangano ravo riri kupinza chibage munyika kubva munyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, Mexico, Brazil neThailand. Uganda yakazivisawo kuti ichatengesera Zimbabwe chibage. Asi VaKuchera vanoti panotoda kuti pagadziriswe mitemo yemunyika kuitira kuti zvinhu zvakaita sehupfu zvisashaikwa munyika. Kusvika matambudziko ose, kusanganisira huwori, zvagadziriswa No media source currently available vakawanda vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu munyika richaramba riripo kunyangwe nyika yakapinza chibage chakawanda zvakadii kubva kunze, nekuti pane vanenge vachiwana cheuviri kubva kumutengeswa kwehupfu pamisika mitema.

column2: VaMnangagwa Vowedzera neMavhiki Maviri Mazuva eKuti Vanhu Vagare Mudzimba Kurwisa Coronavirus
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro vakazivisa kuti vainge vawedzera nemamwe mavhiki maviri mazuva ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba kusvika musi wa 3 Chivabvu. Izvi zvinotevera kusvika kumagumo kwemavhiki matatu avainge vambotara kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba ayo ange achifanira kupera nhasi. Vachitaura kunyika kuState House, mumashoko apihwa Studio 7 mvumo yekushandisa nebazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaMnangagwa vakati zviri pachena kuti mumavhiki matatu avainge vambotara huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi hutori kuwedzera. Vakati Zimbabwe haisatiwo yazadzikisa zvose zvinoda kunzi zviitwe neWorld Health Organization kuti vanhu vanzi vabude mudzimba. Bazi rezvehutano razivisa kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus hwawedzera kusvika pamakumi maviri nemashanu mushure mekunge mumwe mudzimai abatwa nechirwere ichi kuManicaland. Mudzimai uyu ainge adzoka munyika kubva kuFrance. Asi pane vanhu vaviri vapona kusvika parizvino. Vanhu vatatu ndivo vafa nechirwere ichi. Asi vati vemakambani emigodhi vanofanira kutanga basa mushure mekunge vashandi vose vavhenekwa. Vatiwo vemakambani akakosha vanokwanisawo kuita basa. VaMnangagwa vati bazi rezvemagariro evanhu richabatsira vamwe vave kunonga svosve nemuromo parizvino nenyaya yenzara. Vanhu vakawanda vari kuudza Studio 7 kuti nzara yapfunya chisero mudzimba dzavo. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa kuStudio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kusangano rinoongorora nyaya dzezvirwere muAfrica reAfrica Centres for Disease Control Prevention anoti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAfrica vave kudarika churu chimwe chete nemakumi masere Vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave kusvika zviuru makumi maviri nechimwe. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora nyaya dzechirwere checornavirus pasi rose inoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere checoronavirus hwadarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana. Vanhu vafa vave kudarika churu zana nemakumi matanhatu. America ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vanodarika zviuru zvina

column2: VaDouglas Tapfuma Vanonyimwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso
column3: Mumwe mukuru mukuru muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika nedare remakurukota, VaDouglas Tapfuma, vamiswa pamberi pedare ramejasitiriti nhasi vachipomerwa mhosva nhatu dzehuori. Muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, VaCharles Muchemwa, vaudza dare kuti VaTapfuma vakashandisa masimba avo zvisirizvo pavakakonzeresa kutengwa kwemotokari nomwe kubva kuSouth Africa dziri muzita rehurumende asi vakazodzishandisa sedzavo. VaMuchemwa vati motokari dzose idzi dzakakonzera kuti hurumende irasikirwe nemari inoita madhora ekuAmerica zviuru gumi nechimwe nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nenhanhatu (US$11 936) sezvo pasina kubhadharwa mari yekupinza motokari idzi munyika kana kuti import duty. Rimwe remagweta aVaTapfuma, VaEsau Mandipa, vaudza dare pavanga vachikumbira mukana wekuti musungwa abhadhariswe mari yechibatiso kuti VaTapfuma vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa sezvo vachiti motokari idzi ndedzehurumende sezvo mapepa ekuti dzisabhadhare mari yekupinzwa munyika akasainwa nemunyori mukuru muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika pamwe nedare remakurukota, VaMisheck Sibanda. Mupurisa ari kuferefeta nyaya iyi achishanda nekomisheni inorwisa huori yeZimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission, VaTimothy Guta, vaudzawo dare kuti VaTapfuma havafanire kubuditswa muhusungwa sezvo vachiti vachiri kuvaferefetwe nenyaya yekupinzwa kwedzimwe motokari munyika dzinodarika zana vachishandisa chinzvimbo chavo zvisirizvo. Vati VaTapfuma, avo vave Chief Director Monitoring and Evaluation kuhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, vanogona kuvhiringidzana nevafakazi vasina kudomwa mudare uye vanogona kusazomirira kana vakapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso sezvo vachiti humbowo huri kuvaroverera huri fararira. Asi mutongi wedare, VaHosea Mujaya, vatura mutongo wekuti VaTapfuma varambe vari muhusungwa sezvo vachiti vanogona kuvhiringidzana nevafakazi zvisinei nekuti havachashanda kuState House. Zvaturwa nedare zvatsinhirwa nerimwe remagweta aVaTapfuma, VaValentine Mutatu. VaMutatu vati vave kukwidza nyaya iyi kumatare epamusoro. VaMujaya vati VaTapfuma vadzoke musi wa15 Nyamavhuvhu pachaenderera nyaya iyi Mberi. VaTapfuma vakambodomwawo munyaya yehuori kukambani yemarasha yeWankie Colliery uko kunonzi kwakashayikwa mamiriyoni matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica. VaTapfuma ndivo vave musungwa wechipiri anove mukuru muhurumende asungwa nenyaya yehuori kubva pakagadzwa komisheni itsva yeZacc nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa musi waChivabvu 30, 2019. Asi MDC yakaburitsa mashoko ekuti komisheni iyi, iyo inotungamirwa naAmai Loice Matanda Moyo, vanove mudzimai wegurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, haina mazino. VaMoyo, ndivo vakabuda pachivhitivhiti muna Mbudzi 2017 vachizivisa nyika kuti mauto ainge opindira mune zvematongerwo enyika zvakazokonzeresa kuti vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa. No media source currently available

column2: Baba neMwana Vokonzera Mutauro nekuHwina Makwikwi ekwaTM Supermarkets kuChinhoyi
column3: Kuhwina makwikwi eTM Bonanza promotion kwababa nemwana ane makore mashanu kokonzeresa mutauro muChinhoyi vamwe vachiti vanoshandisa mushonga kuti vahwine. VaClifton Mandla nemwana wavo Clinton ane makore mashanu ndivo vakahwina mibairo mukuru yeTM Bonanza promotion yakaitwa muChinhoyi neMugovera. Clinton akahwina mubairo mukuru wemari inosvika zviuru gumi, baba vake avo vanogaro vachihwina mibairo pachitoro cheTM muChinhoyi vakahwina zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora. Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti VaMandla vanoshandisa mushonga wekuti vahwine kana kuti vanorotswa. Amai Sobangile Kamudyariwa mumwe wevanofunga kuti VaMandla vanoshandisa mushonga kuti vahwine. Amai Kamudyariwa vanoti chimwe chinoshamisa ndechekuti VaMandla vari kuhwina pamakwikwi echitoro chimwechete izvo vanofunga kuti pane chitsotsi chirikuitwa nevashandi veTM. Asi VaMandla vanoti hapana mushonga wavanoshandisa vachiti vanohwina nekuti vanopinda mumakwiwi ose anoitika muzvitoro. VaMandla vanoramba kuti vanohwina makwiwi anoitwa muchitoro cheTM chete vachiti vanohwina makwiwi emunezvimwe zvitoro. VaMandla vakambohwina mamwe madhora zviuru zvishanu mugore ra2016, gore rakapera vakahwina firiji mumakwiwi ekwaTM Bonanza promotion. Vanoti mari yavahwina vachaishandisa kuvaka imba panzvimbo yavakatenga mushure mukuhwina mari yekutanga uye vanoti vacharamba vachipinda mumakwikwi ekwaTM nemunezvimwe zvitoro. Kunyange hazvo mutemo unoona nezvekupinda mumakwikwi usingabvimire kuti vana vane makore ari pasi pegumi nemasere vapinde mumakwikwi, chitoro cheTM chakaiswa panguva yakaomwa sezvo vainge vasina kunyora kuti makwikwi aya ayipindwa nevanhu vane makore mangani. Mukuru anoona nezvekushambadzirwa muzvitoro zvekwaTM Muzvare Paida Moyo vanoti vakaona kukanganisa uku Clinton atohwina vakatya kusamupa mubairo wake sezvo vaizoendeswa kumatare. Muzvare Moyo vanoti zvekuhwinisa mwana mudiki hazvichaitika zvakare. Zvitoro zvakawanda zvave kuita makwiwi ekuwanisa mibairo kuti vanhu vatenge zvinhu zvakawanda nechinangwa chekuhwina mibairo. No media source currently available

column2: Basketball yogeda-geda
column3: MURAIRIDZI wechikwata chebasketball cheJBC Basketball Club — Addison Chiware — anoti vatambi vakawanda vemutambo uyu vanoda kuziva remangwana ravo zvichitevera kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yose gore rapera senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Chiware, uyo akamborairidza chikwata chenyika chebasketball, anoti Covid-19 yakavhiringidza zvakawanda mumutambo uyu zvekuti havachazive kuti vodii kuti udzoswe.   “Vatambi vedu vazhinji vave nemibvunzo yakawanda zvikuru, vanoda kuziva kuti remangwana ravo rakamira sei uye zvichafambiswa sei kuti mutambo uyu udzoswe.   “Vatambi vaitoraramiswa nemutambo uyu uye vamwe vaitoushandisa kuti vagokwanisa kuwana mikana yekuenda kunze kwenyika saka kana usingatambwe mukana wekutengwa nezvikwata zvekunze hapatorina.   “Covid-19 iyi yavhiringa zvakawanda. Saka isu tave kungomirira kuti zvinhu zvinake chete.   “Ndiyo nzira yega inoita kuti zvitifambire uye mutambo uyu udzoke pasina chinokanganisa,” anodaro Chiware.   Gore radarika rave kunopera, zvikwata zvebasketball zvakasiyana zvakange zvave kutanga kuita gadziriro paine tarisiro yekuti mutambo uyu waigona kuzodzoswa asi zvose zvakaenda mudondo nekuda kwekunyuka zvakare kweCovid-19.   “Pane patakambotanga kugadzirira tikafunga kuti zvave kuendeka manje asi takabva tadzoserwa shure neCovid-19 yakatanga kunyuka zvekare.   “Izvezvi kana mutambo uyu ukanzi wadzoka zvichatitorera nguva sezvo vatambi vave nenguva huru vasingatambe,” anodaro Chiware.

column2: Hurumende Inonzi Inogona Kuendeswa kuMatare neKuroverera VaMaingehama naVaMadzokere Mhosva Yavasina Kupara
column3: Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu Amai Beatrice Mtetwa avo rakamirirawo nhengo dzeMDC dzakatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore makumi maviri VaLast Maingehama naVaTungamirai Madzokere vanoti neMuvhuro vachataura nevatori venhau kuti votora matanho api kuhurumende nekuvakanda mujeri kwemakore vasina mhosva. Amai Mtetwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya yekuti vaende kumatare iri kuna VaMaingehama naVaMadzokere asi vanoti pane mukana mukuru wekuti vachada kuripwa. Vaviri ava vange chipomerwa mhosva yekuponda mupurisa VaPetros Mutedza paGlen View 3 Shopping Centre muna 2011. VaMaingehama, VaMadzokere naMuzvare Yvonne Musarurwa vakazobatwa nemhosva yekuponda nemutongi wedare repamusoro VaChinembiri Bhunu muna 2016 ndokuendeswa kujeri reChikurubi. Asi mutongi wedare repamusoro soro Amai Rita Makarau vakati vaviri ava havana mhosva zvakapa kuti vabve vaburitswa muhusungwa. Muzvare Musarurwa vakaburitswa muhusungwa muna 2018 mushure mekupihwa ruregerero nemutungamiri wenyika pakaburitswa vamwe vasungwa. Asi mumwe ainge anziwo ane mhosva Muzvare Rebecca Mafukeni akashaya ari mutirongo akamirira kutongwa. Vana ava vaive pachikwata chevechidiki veMDC makumi maviri nevapfumbamwe vakasungwa muna 2011 vachipomerwa mhosva yekutema nematombo inspector Mutedza vachibva vashaya. Vazhinji vainge vasungwa ava vakabva vasungunurwa vachinzi Havana mhosva. Gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe vari kugara vachiendeswa kumatare nemhosva dzekutyorwa kunenge kwaitwa mutemo nemapurisa. Mwedzi wapera VaKazembe vakapotsa vakandwa mujeri mushure mekunonoka kubhadhara mari inodarika zviuru zana gumi nemakumi pfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe nemazana mashanu kana kuti RTGS 199, 500 kuna VaSimon Mandoza mumwe mudzidzi wekuGweru vainge varohwa nemapurisa muHarare vakangozvimirira havo. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuna VaKazembe negurukota rezvemitemo vaZiyambi Ziyambi sezvo vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira tisati taenda pamhepo. Asi VaKumbirai Mafunda mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights sangano rakashanda naAmai Mtetwa naVaCharles Kwaramba panyaya yenhengo dzeMDC idzi vanotiwo pane mangwana vanotarisira kuti VaMaingehama naVaMadzokere vajekesere vatori venhau matanho avari kuronga kutora. No media source currently available

column2: Asamoah Gyan Ndiye Shasha yeKurova Mambure muAfrica Munhoroondo yeWorld Cup
column3: Mutambi weGhana kana kuti Black Stars, Asamoah Gyan ndiye mutambi wemuAfrica akanwisa zvibodzwa zvakawandisa kudarika vamwe vatambi vose munhoroondo yemakwikwi eWorld Cup. Gyan akanwisa zvibodzwa zvitanhatu kumakwikwi aya. Munhoroondo yeGhana, Gyan ndiye akanwisawo zvibodzwa zvakawanda zvinova makumi mashanu nechimwe. Mutambio uyu akaberekwa kuGhana muna 1985 uye ari kutambira chikwata cheLegon Cities FC kuGhana.  Akatambira Ghana muWorld Cup yakaitwa 2006, 2010 na2014. Aakatanga kutambira maBlack Stars aine makore gumi nemanomwe. Zvibodzwa zcake kuWorld Cup akanwisa muna 2010 pamutambo neSerbia, Australia, United States. Muna 2014 kuWorld Cup akanwisa pamutambo neUnited States of America, akanwosawo chimwe chibodzwa pamutambo neGermany achibva aenzana naRoger Milla wekuCameroon pakugohwesa zvibodzwa zvishanu kuWorld Cup. Akazonwisa chibodzwa chechitanhatu pamutambo nePortugal chakamupinza munhoroondo pakunwisa zvibodzwa muAfrica.  Pane shasha dzekurova mambure kuWorld Cup kubva kuAfrica” Asamoah Gyan 6 (Ghana) Roger Milla 5 (Cameroon) Samuel Eto’0 3 (Cameroon) Papa Diop 3 (Senegal)

column2: ‘Mutambo waChiwandire uchiri kurongwa’
column3: CHIKWATA chaKudakwashe Memory ‘Take Money’ Chiwandire chinoti chakakumbira mwedzi mumwe chete kuti chipedzise kuita gadziriro dzekuronga mutambo wake naZulina Munoz wekurwira bhande rake reWBC Female Interim Super-bantamweight.   Take Money ange achifanirwa kurwa naMunoz wekuMexico nemusi weMugovera svondo rino kuHarare International Conference Centre (HICC).   Asi chikwata chake chinoti chakakumbira kuti mutambo uyu upfuudzwe kumberi kuti vawane nguva yekupedzisa kuita gadziriro dzekuuronga.   Maneja waTake Money arizve murairidzi wake, Clyde Musonda, anoti kudivi ravo, gadziriro dzekuti mutambo uyu uitwe hadzisati dzanyatsopera.   Anoti Chiwandire, uyo ange ari kuSouth Africa masvondo adarika achiita gadziriro dzake, akagadzirira kusangana naMunoz asi chakamisa kuti vaviri ava vabandane svondo rino inyaya yekuti pane zviri kuda kugadziriswa mukurongwa kwemutambo uyu.   “Kudivi redu, tange tisati tapedza kuita gadziriro dzekuronga mutambo waTake Money naMunoz. Munoziva kuronga mutambo mukuru wakaita seuyu, panoda zvakawanda saka tichiri kuita gadziriro dzacho.   “Takakumbira mwedzi mumwe chete kuchikwata chaMunoz kuti tipedzise kuita gadziriro dzekuronga mutambo uyu nekuti pane zvakawanda zvange zvichida kugadziriswa.   “Asi tinoda kuti muzive kuti Kuda akagadzirira kurwa, iye zvake kudivi rake ange achiita gadziriro dzake dzichifamba zvakanaka,” anodaro Musonda.   Mutambo wevaviri ava, uyo wakatarisirwa zvikuru nevazhinji, ndiwo uchange uri waChiwandire wekutanga kurwira kuchengetedza bhande rake iri.   Kana akabudirira kuri chengetedza, anenge awaniswa mukana wekurwira bhande reWBC Gold iro rina Yamileth Mercado wekuMexico zvakare.   Chiwandire akahwina bhande rake reWBC Female Interim Super-bantamweight mushure mekukunda Cathrine Phiri wekuZambia mwedzi yadarika.

column2: Nhengo dzeZIBAWU Dzinoratidzira paBhanga reStanbic
column3: Nhengo dzeZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union (ZIBAWU) dzaratidzira muHarare pabhanga reStanbic riri muna Samora Machel dzichinyunyuta nekudzvanyirirwa kwadzinoti kuri kuitwa vanhukadzi nebhanga iri. Vashandi vemumabhanga ava vanga vachinyunyuta nekudzingwa kwemumwe mushandi wechidzimai nebhanga reStanbic, Amai Verity Mutsamwira. Amai Mutsamwira vaitungamirira sangano revashandi vekuStanbic. ZIBAWU inoti ndivo vaive mukadzi wekutanga kumiririra vashandi vebhanga. Vachitaura neStudio7 apo vanga vachiratidzira, Amai Bernice Maluleke, avo vanoona nezvekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhurume nevanhukadzi muZIBAWU,vati nhengo dzavo dziri kunyunyuta zvikuru nekumbunyikidzwa kunoitwa kodzero dzemadzimai kubanga reStanbic. Amai Maluluke vanoti Amai Mutsamwira vakadzingwa nekuda kwekuti vaimirira kodzero dzevashandi. Imwe nhengo yeZIBAWU, MuzvareRumbidzai Choto, vati kutsikirirwa kwevanhukadzi pamabasa ndozviri kukonzera kuti vanhukadzi vasawana zvigaro zvepamusoro mumapazi akasiyana-siyana munyika. Muzvare Choto vayambiro bhanga reStanbic vachiti rikasagadzirisa mabatiro ariri kuita vanhukadzi, sangano ravo richaramba richiratidzira. Mutungamiriri weZIBAWU, VaFarai Katsande, vati vanoda kuti bhanga reStanbic ridzosere Amai Mutsamwira pabasa. VaKatsande vapomerawo bhanga iri mhosva yekuramba richidzvanyarira vashandi vakati izvi zvinofanirwa kuchinja sezvo nyika yakasununguka. Vamwe vashandi vebhanga iri varamba kudomwa nemazita vati hutungamiriri hwebanga iri hauremekedzi vanhukadzi uye vanotsikirira vanhukadzi kuti vasawana hutungamiriri kana kusimukira pabasa ravo. Nhengo dzeZIBAWU idzi dzakatozoenda kumatare edzimhosva kuti vapiwe mvumo yekuratidzira mushure mekunge mapurisa avarambidza. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rebhanga iri sezvo vakuruvebanga iri vanga vasiri mumahofisi avo.

column2: ARTUZ Inopedza Kongiresi Yayo Ichiti Kushandira Mahara Kwete
column3: Kongiresi yeAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, yapetwa muGweru sangano iri richibuda nezvisungo zvakasiyana siyana kusanganisira kusadzokere kubasa kwevarairidzi panovhurwa zvikoro svondo rinouya. Musangano uyu wasarudza vatungamiri vatsva vana kuti vave vamwe vevatungamiri vatanhatu vanoumba National Executive Council yesangano iri. VaObert Masaraure vanoramba vari mutungamiri wesangano iri, ukuwo VaRobson Chere, vari munyori mukuru mushure mekunge vaviri ava vasarudzwa pasina avakwikwidza. Aitwa mutevedzeri waVaMasaraure, ndiMuzvare Gaudencia Mandiopera; ukuwo vasarudzwa kuva mutevedzeri waVaChere, ndiVaMunyaradzi Masiyiwa. Asarudzwa kuvamutauriri weArtuz ndiVaNation Mudzitirwa, ukuwo Muzvare Brenda Musavengana vaitwa mubati wehomwe. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, avo vange vari munyarikani pamusangano uyu, vakorokotedza ARTUZ nekukwanisa kuita kongiresi yayo zvisinei nekuoma kwakaita zvimhu. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vose munyika vabatane kuti vakwanise kubuda mumatambudziko avari. VaMasaraure vabvuma kuti kubatana kwakakosha vakati sangano ravo richaramba richiedza kushanda nemamwe masangamo kuti kubatana uku kuvepo. VaChere vaudza Studio7 kuti chimwe chezvisungo zvabuda ndechekuti varairidzi havazi kuzodzokera kuzvikoro pazvinivhurwa asi vati izvi hazvirevi kuti vari kuramwa mabasa. Vamwe varairidzi vange vari pamusangano uyu vaudza Studio7 kuti vanotsigira zvizere zvisungo zvabuda izvi. Muzvare Mary Mupatsi, avo vanodzidzisa kuSilobela, vati varairidzi vekumaruwa vari kurarama hupenyu hwakaoma. Sangano reARTUZ rakavambwa mugore ra2014, uye kongiresi inotevera ichaitwa mushure memakore mashanu. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende Yokundikana Kuwirirana neVashandi paMari Dzavanotambira
column3: Munyori mukuru musangano reApex Concil, mubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi vehurumende VaDavid Dzatsunga vanoti mushure memusangano wemaawa mana vatadza kuwirirana nyaya yemari dzavanotambiriswa nehurumende. Pari kutarisirwa kuitwa mumwe musangano nemusi weChitatu. Vashandi vanoti vanoda kuwedzerwa mari kubva pamazana mana negumi nemana kusvika pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana manomwe. Vashandi ava vange vati vachatanga kuratidzira nemusi weMuvhuro asi vakazoti vave kuda kumbopa nhaurirano mukana.

column2: Hurumende Yokurudzira Kushandiswa Magwenya eZuva
column3: Zvinhu zvinonzi zviri kuramba zvichioma munyika, zvikuru sei nekushaikwa kwemagetsi pamusoro pemamwe matambudziko agara akatarisanawo nenyika. Kambani yemagetsi yeZimbabwe Electricity Suppy Authority, ZESA, yakatozivisa vagari kuti vachange vachishaiwa magetsi munguva dzayakatara, dzingangosvika maawa manomwe pazuva, asi vazhinji vari kutaura neStudio 7 vanoti magetsi munzvimbo dzavanogara ari kudzimwa kwenguva dzinotodarika maawa makumi maviri pazuva. Vamwe vanototi vave nemazuva matatu vasina magetsi. Mukuedza kurerutsa dambudziko iri, gurukota rehurumende VaSamuel Undenge neChitatu vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vachinyanya kushandisa moto wezuva, kana kuti solar energy seimwe nzira yekuwana nayo magetsi sezvo emvura ave kunetsa. Asi vamwe vanoti kurudziro yehurumende iyi haina zvainoreva sezvo pasina hurongwa hwekuti vanhu vangawana sei magetsi ezuva aya kana hurumende isina kuvapa zvekushandisa zvacho. Mvura mudhamu reKariba, uko kunogaiwa magetsi, inonzi yadzikira zvakanyanya izvo zvoita kuti itadze kutenderedza magwenya anozogaya magetsi. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu vanoti dambudziko rose iri riri kubva pakuti hurumende iri kukundina kuona matambudziko achiri kure. VaMaguwu vanoti dai hurumende yakachenjera ingadai yakaita kuti matunhu ose azvibikire oga magetsi awo, sezvo aine madhamu asina zvaari kuita. “Muchitaura Masvingo kunana Lake Mutirikwi, Manicaland kunana Osborne Dam, saka hurumende yedu ihurumende isingatarisi mangwana,” vanodaro VaMaguwu. Vanotiwo nyika inokwanisa kubata moto wezuva ichishandisa kuita magetsi, sezviri kuitwa nenyika dzakawanda dzisina magetsi anogayiwa nemvura. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemoto wezuva, vachishanda nekambani ye Exempla Solar Systems iri kuBulawayo, VaTendai Mukucha vanoti izano rakanaka riri kukurudzirwa nehurumende rekuti vanhu vatange kushandisa zvakanyanya moto wezuva. Asi VaMukucha vanoti dambudziko riri pakuti vanhu vese vanokwanisa here kuzowana zvikwanisiro zvinodiwa kuti munhu awane magetsi e solar. Vanoti vanofara nedanho ratorwa nehurumende sezvo zvichireva kuti kana yakurudzira kushandiswa kwemoto wezuva, naivovo zvinovasimudzira. “Asi takatarisa kuhurumende, tinenge takatarisawo matanho anotibatsira sevano provider equipment,” vanodaro VaMukucha. No media source currently available

column2: VaJoram Gumbo Vopomerwa Mhosva yeHuori-ZACC Ichiti Haisati Yasumwa
column3: Gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaJoram Gumbo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori apo vaive gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti kambani yavo yekusona hembe inonzi JMCD yakapihwa basa nekambani yeZinara uye vachinzi vaitorawo mari kubva kukambani iyi yaive pasi pebazi ravo. Asi vachibvunzwa nebepanhau reHerald, VaGumbo vakaramba kuti vanoita zvehuori vachiti kambani yavo inotengeserawo mbatya kuZanu-PF mauto nemamwe mapazi ehurumende. VaGumbo vanonzi vaipihwawo mari kubva kuZINARA dzekuenda kuMalaysia kunoita basa reAir Zimbabwe risinei nekugadzira migwagwa sezvinoshandiswa homwe iyi. Komishina weZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission VaGoodson Nguni vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vasati vasumwa nezvenyaya iyi nekudaro hapana chavangataure parizvino. Nhengo yedare reparamende inomirira MDC kuKambuzuma VaWillas Madzimure vanove nhengo yeAfrican Parliamentarians Network Against Corruption uye vari mukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemashandiro emapazi ehurumende avo vanoti zvakakosha kuti makurukota nenhengo dzedare reparamende vabude pachena panyaya yehupfumi hwavo vachangotora mhiko. No media source currently available  .

column2: Nhumwa yeUN, VaClement Voule, Vanoita Musangano naVaMudenda
column3: Nhumwa yeUnited Nations munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu, VaClement Voule, yasangana nemutauri weNational Assembly pamwe nemasachigaro emakomiti ose eparamende vakazeya nyaya dzakasiyana siyana dzinosanganisira kuvandudzwa kwemitemo yesarudzo, kodzero dzevanhu, pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika. Kunyange hazvo VaVoule varamba kutaura nevatori venhau mushure memusangano uyu, mutauriri weparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vati vaudza VaVoule nechikwata chavo kuti hurumende inoita zvinhu zvayo zvese pachena ndosaka vakakokwa kuzozvionera pamhuno sefodya. VaMudenda vati vazeya zviri kuitwa neparamende mukushandura mitemo inoona nezvesarudzo nehupfumi. VaMudenda vati VaVoule nechikwata chavo vange vachidawo kuziva zviri kuitwa neparamende mukuona kuti zvakataurwa neMotlanthe Commission pamwe nemasangano nenyika dzakauya kuzoongorora sarudzo zvatevedzwa here. Asi VaMudenda vati hapana zvataurwa panyaya dzekupambwa kuri kuitwa vanhu munyika. VaVoule avo vari munyika kwemazuva gumi, vachasangana nemakurukota ehurumende, pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira akawanda munzvimbo zvinji munyika. Sachigaro wesangano reChurches and Civic Society Forum, Reverend Anglistone Sibanda, vaudza Studio7 kuti kushanya kwaVaVoule kwakakosha chose sezvo kuchaburitsa pachena zvese zviri kuitika munyika. Vati vanovimba kuti masangano ese achawana mukana wekutaura naVaVoule. Asi vamwe vakaita semukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana zvizhinji zvavanotarisira kubva parwendo rwaVaVoule. VaRuhanya vati pane dzimwe nhumwa dzeUN dzakamboshana munyika panguva yeMurambatsvina asi hapana chakashanduka. VaVoule vari munyika mushure mekukokwa nehurumende kuti vazoongorora kuti zvinhu zvakamiraa sei munyika panyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu pamwe nezvimwe. Vange vakamirira bazi rezvemutemo pamusangano wanhasi vati VaVoule ndivo chete panyanzvi nhanhatu dzinoona zvakasiyana siyana muUN dzakakokwa nehurumende kuti dzione kuti zvinhu zvakamira sei munyika. VaVoule nechikwata chavo vari munyika panguva iyo vanachiremba navanamukoti vari kuramwa mabasa vachiratidza kusafara nekupambwa kwakaitwa vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr. Peter Magombeyi. Vashandi vemuzvipatara ava vari kuti vachadzokera kubasa kana Dr. Magombeyi vawanikwa vari vapenyu. Hurumende inoti iri kushushikana nekupambwa kwakaitwa Dr. Magombeyi, panguva iyo nhumwa dzeUN dziri muZimbabwe. Gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vakaudza vatori venhau kuti kupambwa kwaDr. Magombeyi kunogona kunge kwakaitwa nevamwe vanhu vasiri muhurumende, vaine chinangwa chekusvibisa chimiro chehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Asi mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti ibasa rehurumende kuona kuti yaferefeta zvakadzama, kuitira kuti vakapamba Dr. Magombeyi vaniswe pamberi pematare edzimhosva vachitongwa nenyaya dzekutyora mitemo yenyika, pamwe nekodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

column2: Vane Makadhi emaATM Vorasikirwa neMari
column3: Dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari rave kupa vamwe vanhu vafambe namakadhi emaATM vachipihwa mari nevanenge vachida kutenga muzvitoro zvikuru vobhadhara kamutero kadiki. Kuita uku kwatekeshera muzvitoro zvose zvinokurudzira kushandiswa kwemakadhi ekubangi kudarika mari sezvo mari iri kushayikwa kumabhanga munyika kunyangwe bhanga guru renyika rainge rati kuuya kwemabond notes kwaizobatsira kupedza dambudziko iri. Vanhu vanenge vaine makadhi vanofamba vachibvunza vatengi kuti vari kutenga nemari here kana kuti vari kuzoshandisa kadhi. Vanokwezva vatengi vanenge vachida kushandisa mari kuti vashandise kadhi ravo vozovapa imwe mari pamusoro peyavanenge vavapa. Munhu anenge aine mari anopihwa masendi makumu mashanu pamadhora gumi. VaOnisimo Zemura mumwe weavo vatenga nekadhi vakapihwa mari. VaZemura vanoti kutengerana uku kune kachitsotsi sezvo paine mari inobviswa pamusoro asi vanoti hapana zvekuita sezvo vanga vachida mari yekufambisa kuenda kubasa mangwana. Asi VaEdmore Mazarure vekuAlaska vanoti kushaikwa kwemari ndiko kuri kukonzera kuti mari itengeswe. VaMazarure vanoti izvi hazvishamise sezvo zvichitika pane chinhu chose chinenge chichishayikwa munyika. VaMazarure vanoti dambudziko remari ratekeshera munyika richaramba rakadaro nekuda kwezvizvarwa zvekuChina izvo vanoti hazvidi kutambira makadhi muzvitoro zvavo. VaMazarure vanofungidzirawo kuti zvizvarwa zvekuChina izvi hazviise mari kumabhangi. Zvitoro zvinokurudzira kushandisa makadhi zvakaita seOK neTM zvinopa munhu mari inosvika madhora makumi mashanu ($50) kana munhu atenga zvinhu zvemari inosvika madhora makumi maviri ($20). Chitoro cheOK mugwaro racho rinoratidza mamiriro akaita kambani iyi chinoti chakaita mari yakawanda kana kuti profit inosvika mamiriyoni maviri gore rino kubva muna Ndira kusvika muna Chikumi (June) nekuda kwevanhu vaitenga zvinhu nemakadhi kuti vazopihwa mari.

column2: Musona asiya kutambira maWarriors
column3: MUTAMBI wenhabvu Knowledge Musona nhasi asendeka shangu dzake dzekutambira chikwata chenyika cheZimbabwe Warriors.   Pachinyorwa chaatumira, Musona uyo ange ari mutungamiri wevatambi vemaWarriors ati ave kusiya kuti ape nguva kuchikwata chake cheAl-Tai pamwe nekupa vamwe vatambi mukana wekutambirawo maWarriors.   “Mhuri yeZimbabwe, nhasi ndokuzivisai kuti ndamira kutambira chikwata chedu chenyika chemaWarriors. Danho iri handina kuritora nyore sezvo ndange ndave nemakore 12 ndichimirira nyika yangu, iyo ndakatanga kutambira musi wa3 Kurume 2010, mumutambo uyo takasangana neSouth Africa.   “Ndave kusiya kuti ndipe nguva kuchikwata changu pamwe nekupa vamwe vatambi mukana wekumirira maWarriors.   “Ndichagara ndine ndangariro yekutambira nyika yangu ndichienda kumitambo yakaita seyeAFCON neCOSAFA Cup, nekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup.   “Chimwe chikuru kupihwa chiremerera chekuve kaputeni kwemakore mashanu adarika,” adaro Musona.   Mutambo wekupedzisira waMusona achitambira maWarriors waive wekuAFCON musi wa18 Ndira wekuCameroon apo maWarriors akakunda Guinea 2-1 mumutambo uyo akanwisa chibodzwa chekutanga.

column2: ‘GEMS TAVE KUMBERI’
column3: uyo ange ari kuLIVERPOOL, England naAbel Ndooka ari muHarare SHASHA yemutambo wenetball inotambira chikwata cheZimbabwe chemaGems — Adelaide Thandeka Muskwe — uyo aive kuLiverpool uko aimirira nyika kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup, anoti ave kumberi kwehanzvadzi yake, Admiral, uyo anotambira nhabvu maWarriors.   MaGems akanyora nhoroondo yekuve chikwata chekutanga chenetball chakanokwikwidza kuWorld Cup uye ndokutamba zvinonwisa mvura apo akakunda zvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira Sri Lanka, Barbados neNorthern Ireland.   Adelaide naAdmiral mapatya uye vose vakaberekerwa muno ndokuzoenda kunogara kuEngland uko kwavakakurira.   Mukukura kwavo, Adelaide aitamba netball kozoti Admiral ari mutambi wenhabvu. Admiral iye zvino anotambira Leicester City inove chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru zvenhabvu muEngland.   Muchinda uyu haana kuenda kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations kuEgypt asi akambotamba mumakwikwi eCosafa Castle Cup kuSouth Africa nguva yadarika.   Adelaide anotambirawo chikwata cheSeven Stars kuEngland uye anoti ari kunzwa manyuku-nyuku nekuwaniswa kwaakaita mukana wekumirira nyika kumutambo weVitality World Cup.   Adelaide anoti anogara achitsigira hanzvadzi yake kumitambo yake yenhabvu uye akafara zvikuru kuona Admiral achiuyawo kuzomutsigira apo maGems aikweshana neNew Zealand.   Admiral pamwe nevabereki vavo vaive muchaunga nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rapera pamberi vachitsigira Adelaide pamwe nemaGems apo aitamba neNew Zealand mumutambo uyo akakundwa 36-79.   “Hanzvadzi yangu ndiyo ine mukurumbira asi ndinonzwa mufaro chaizvo kumuona achiuya kuzonditsigira mumitambo yangu.   “Ini kubva kare ndogara ndiri kunhandare dzakasiyana ndichimuona achitamba nhabvu saka tinotsigirana tese mitambo yedu uye vabereki vedu havashaikwe kumitambo yedu, saka ndinonzwa kufara ndichiona kuti rutsigiro tinarwo. Isu maGems tave kumberi nekuti takakwanisa kukwikwidza kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup,” anodaro Adelaide.   Zvakadai, chikwata chemaGems chakapedza makwishu aya chiri pechisere zvichitevera kukundwa kwachakazoitwa mitambo yacho miviri yekupedzisira apo wekutanga chakakundwa 43-59 neMalawi kozoti 58-47 neUganda.

column2: Vakawanda Vanoti Mari Iri Kuda Kupihwa Bazi reHutano Ishoma
column3: Mari iri kuda kupihwa bazi rezveutano nekurerwa zvakanaka kwevana pabhajeti regore ra2018, yatambirwa zvakasiya-siyana munyika. Asi vanhu vazhinji vari kunyunyuta kuti ishoma. Bazi iri riri kuda kupiwa mamiriyoni mazana mana nemasere emadhora kubva pamabhiriyoni mashanu nemamiriyoni zana emari yebhajeti. Kunyangwe hazvo mari iyi yawedzera kubva pamamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi masere akapihwa bazi iri gore rino, sangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti mari iyi ishoma zvikuru kana pakatariswa zvinodiwa mubazi iri. Munyori musangano reZADHR, Doctor Evans Masitara, vati mari yaiswa kubazi rezveutano ishoma zvikuru. "Mari yapihwa bazi iri iri pasi pezvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana zvebhajeti renyika yose sezvakabvumiranwa kuAbuja," vadaro Dr Masitara. Vanokokera nhengo dzeMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai muparamende, huye vari mumiririri weMutare Central, VaInnocent Gonese, vatiwo vange vaine tarisiro yekuti hurumende izadzise zvibvumirano zvayakasaina. "Isusu tanga takatarisira kuti hurumende icharemekefza chibvumirano chakaitwa kuAbuja mubhajeti regore rinouya iri'" VaGonese vaudza Studio7. Vachitaura bhajeti risati raitwa, gurukota mubazi rezveutano nekurerwa zvakanaka kwevana, Doctor David Parirenyatwa, vakaudza Studio7 kuti vanoda mari inosvika biriyoni imwechete nemamiriyoni zana emadhora kuitira kuti vafambise mabasa ezveutano zvakanaka. Asi sachigaro wedare remadzishe, Mambo Fortune Charumbira, vati vanogutsikana nemari yapiwa kubazi rezvehutano. VaCharumbira vati mamwe mapazi mana apiwa mari yakawanda kudarika yehutano akakosha kuti vanhu vave nehutano hwakanaka. Bazi rehutano rakatarisana nematambudziko akasiyana siyana anosanganisira vashandi vashoma, kuparara kwezvipatara, kushaikwa kwemishonga nemichina yechimanje manje inoongorora zvirwere huye mari zhinji inoshandiswa mubazi iri inobva kumasangano akazvimiririra. No media source currently available

column2: Monalisa okunga tsiva
column3: SHASHA yetsiva yechidzimai — Monalisa “Queen Monalisa” Sibanda — inoti yadzoka mugym umo iri kuita gadziriro dzekurwira kuchengetedza bhande rayo reWomen International Boxing Association (WIBA) World Inter-continental light-weight iro yakahwina mugore ra2019.   Monalisa akahwapura bhande iri mushure mekukunda Joice Awino wekuKenya uye aifanirwa kunge akarwira kurichengetedza kare asi izvi hazvina kukwanisika zvichitevera kumiswa kwakamboitwa mitambo pasi rose senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Muhurukuro svondo rino, Monalisa anoti Covid-19 yakakanganisa hurongwa hwake hwa2020 hwekurwira kuchengetedza bhande rake.   “Ndadzoka manje, ndiri mushishi kugadzirira kuti ndigorwira bhande rangu, zvange zvakaoma kungogara mutambo wandinodisisa tisiri kuwana mukana wekuutamba.   “Asi kudzoka kwemitambo nekupihwa kwatakaita mikana yekuti tigokwikwidza zvave nechiedza kwatiri isu vari mune zvemitambo. Dai pasina iyo Covid-19 ndakatorwa kare asi zvose zvange zvakangomiswa nekuda kwedenda iri,” anodaro.   Shasha iyi iye zvino yave kufanirwa kuzorwira kuchengetedza bhande rake musi wa10 Chikunguru asi pari zvino hapasati pazivikanwa kuti achatatsurana nemutambi upi.   Anoti hutungamiriri hwetsiva huri mushishi kumutsvagira mutambi wekuzosangana naye saka ari kugara akagadzirira kuzorwira kuchengetedza bhande rake.   “Iye zvino pachiri kutsvagwa mutambi wandichazosangana naye, hapasati pazivikanwa kuti ndicharwa nani nekuti mazuvaano nekuda kweCovid-19 panotombotanga paongororwa kuti mutambi ari kubva kunyika ipi sezvo dzimwe nyika dziri muboka redzinoonekwa sedzinopisa nekuda kweCovid-19.   “Zvakafanana nekuti ini chaiye mutambo uyu ndinoda kuutambira muno asi zvikakona ndinenge ndakutonzi ndiende kunorwira kuTanzania uko kwange kusina lockdown kana kumiswa mitambo nekuda kweCovid-19,” anodaro Monalisa.   Anoti anotenda zvikuru vakotsveri vake nevamwe vatsigiri vakamira naye panguva iyo mitambo yakange isiri kutambwa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   “Ndine hama dzakawanda dzakanditsigira zvinhu zvakaoma, vashoma vanonzwisisa isu vatambi vetsiva vechidzimai. Saka ndinopa kutenda kune avo vange vachimira neni,” anodaro Monalisa.

column2: Warriors muna 2021 . . . • Pamitambo 15 vakakunda 1 • Vasimuka kuenda kuAFCON
column3: GORE ra2021 rakaona chikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors chichitamba mitambo 15 uye zvakarakidza kuti chadzikira zvikuru sezvo chakangokwanisa kuhwina mutambo mumwe chete.   Gore richitanga, maWarriors airairidzwa naZdravko “Loga” Logarusic uyo akarairidza mitambo 14 kubva paakagadzwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi kusvika azodzingwa basa munaGunyana.   Loga paaitungamira maWarriors, akangokwanisa kuhwina mutambo mumwe chete uye akaita mangange mishanu ndokukundwa misere.   Asi tichitarisa mitambo yakatambwa nemaWarriors gore ra2021, akatamba 15 yemakwikwi anosanganisira African Nations Championship (CHAN), Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) Qualifiers, Cosafa Cup neyekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup kuQatar.   Pamitambo iyi, maWarriors akangohwina kamwe chete apo akakunda Botswana 1-0 kunhandare yeFrancistown Stadium kunyika iyi mumutambo weAFCON wekurwira kuenda kuCameroon, ndokuita mangange mitambo mina uye ndokukundwa ka10. Tichitarisa mitambo yakatambwa nemaWarriors, tichitanga neyeCHAN iyo yakatambwa munaNdira, akatamba mitambo mitatu ndokukundwa yese – 1-0 neCameroon, 3-1 neBurkina Faso uye 1-0 neMali.   Mitambo yaitevevera yakatambwa munaKurume yaive miviri yekurwira kuenda kuAFCON iyo yakaona maWarriors achikunda Botswana 1-0 panove ndipo akabva ahwina tikiti rekuenda kumutambo uyu. Mutambo wekupedzisira muboka ravo chikwata chenyika ichi chakakundwa 2-0 neZambia.   MunaChikunguru, maWarriors akaenda kumutambo weCosafa Cup kuSouth Africa uko akanotamba mitambo mina akakwanisa kuita mangange miviri 0-0 neMozambique, 2-2 neMalawi asi ndokukundwa miviri 2-0 neNamibia uye 2-1 neSenegal. Achibva kuCosafa, maWarriors akatamba mitambo mitanhatu yekurwira kuenda ku2022 Qatar World cup apo angokwanisa kuita mangange miviri ndokukundwa mina.   Panguva iyi, ndipo pakadzingwa Loga basa ndokutsiviwa naNorman Mapeza uyo ari kutungamira maWarriors kuAFCON pari zvino.   Pamitamo iyi, maWarriors akaita mangange 0-0 neSouth Africa muno kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium uye 1-1 zvekare munyika muno neEthiopia, ndokuzokundwa mimwe mina inoti 3-1 neGhana kuGhana, 1-0 neGhana muno, 1-0 neEthiopia kuBahir Dar kuEthiopia ne1-0 neBafana Bafana kuFNB Stadium.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza maonero ake pamusoro pematambiro emaWarriors aya, maneja wechikwata ichi — Wellington Mpandare — anoti haakwanise kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro penyaya iyi uye varairidzi ndivo vanofanirwa kunge vachitaura nezvazvo.   “Ndiro basa revarairidzi iroro, mofanira kuvabvunza kuti vakazvifambisa sei. Asi, tinoziva kuti mitambo mizhinji yakatambwa 2021 akairairidza wacho haasisipo,” anodaro Mpandare.   Chikwata chemaWarriors chakasimuka nemusi weChitatu chakananga kuCameroon uko chiri kunoita gadziriro dzekutanga kwemutambo we2021 Africa Cup of Nations nemusi wa9 Ndira.

column2: Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa, Vanosaina Mutemo Mutsva weSarudzo
column3: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasaini bhiri reElectoral Amendment Act of 2018 kuti uve mutemo wenyika, izvo zvave kupa mukana wekuti nyika iite sarudzo pachishandiswa mutemo mutsva uyu. Izvi zvaziviswa mugwaro rehurumende reGovernment Gazette, iro raburitswa neChipiri, uye chiziviso ichi chinoti mutemo uyu wakatanga kushanda neMuvhuro. Vachiutaura mushure mekuburitswa kwechiziviso ichi, vanokokera nhengo dzebato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC-T inotungamiririrwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaInnocent Gonese, vati havana kufara nekuti VaMnangagwa vasaina mutemo uyu usina zvizhinji zvaidiwa nevemapato anopikisa kuti zvigadziriswe kana kuwedzerwa. Vati semaonero avo nyika haigona kuve nesarudzo dzisina mutauro kana pasina kuwirirana pazvinhu zvakawanda zvakaita sekudhindwa kwemagwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot paper. MDC-T yaida kuti kudhindwa nekwema ballot paper kuitwe pachena vese vari kupinda musarudzo varipo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kunyange hazvo mutemo mutsva uyu uchirambidza zvemhirizhonga, haupi matare mazino ekuranga vanenge vakonzera mhirizhonga panguva yesarudzo. Munyori anoona nezvemutemo mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaPaul Mangwana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara chose nedanho ratorwa nemutungamiriri wenyika, vachiti vave kugadzirira sarudzo pasi pemutemo mutsva uyu. Panyaya yekunyunyuta kuri kuita vemapato anopikisa, VaMangwana vati mapato aya aifanira kugadzirisa zvichemo zvawo kuparamende uye mutungamiriri wenyika anoshanda nezveanenge apihwa neparamende. VaMnangagwa vanotarisirwa kudoma zuva richaitwa sarudzo nguva ipi zvayo, uye izvi zvinoteverawo kupera kwechirongwa chekuongororwa kwegwaro revavhoti neveruzhinji. No media source currently available

column2: VaPromise Mkwananzi veTajamuka Vogariswa Mujeri
column3: Mutauriri weTajamuka, VaPromise Mkwananzi avo vakazvipira kumapurisa nemusi weChishanu vave kugara mutirongo mushure mekunge mutongi wedare ramejastiriti muHarare ati haasi kunzwa zvakanaka akati nyaya iyi izonzwikwa neMuvhuro. VaMkwananzi vakaenda kunozvipira kumapurisa negweta ravo VaTrust Maanda vanova nhengo yeZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights kana kuti ZLHR. Rimwe rinova nhengo yeZLHR, VaJerremiah Bamu vakaudza Studio 7 kuti pavakaenda kumapurisa ekuHarare Central neimwe nyaya yavanhu vakasungwa mukuratidzira kwemusi weChitatu, vakaudzwa kuti mapurisa ari kutsvaga VaMkwananzi uye Pastor Evan Mawarire veHash Tag This Flag. Mapurisa ainge ambobvunzurudzawo VaStern Zvorwadza avo vari kutungamirawo kuratidzira munyika. VaMkwananzi vakaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vainge vakazvipira kuenda kumapursa nekuti kuratidzira kwavari kuita kunotenderwa nebumbiro remutemo. Pastor Mawarire vakaudzawo Studio 7 kuti pane vanhu vari kuvafonera vachiva tyisidzira uye kuvatevera nekuuya kuhofisi yavo. Mapuria akasunga vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu uye ari kutsvaga kusunga vamwe nekuyedza kudzisiva kumwe kuratidzira kwadaidzirwa nemusi weChitatu nemusi wechina svondo rinouya. Vari kuratidziora vanoda kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vaferefete vari kuita zvehuori zvikuru makurukota avo, kutambirisa vashandi vehurumende mari dzavo dzemihoro nenguva uye kubvisa mutemo uri kurambidza kupinda kwezvinhu munyika zvakaita sezvekuduya zviri kutengeswa nevanhu kuti vararame. Vamwe vari kutiwo VaMugabe ngavasiye basa nekuti vakundikana. Asi VaMugabe nemusi weChishanu vakave nemukana wekutaura nezvezvichemo izvi apo vakaita musangano kunhandare yeChipadze kuBindura asi vakangoti zvinhu zvaoma nekuti Zimbabwe yakatemerwa zvirango nevekunze.

column2: Hurumende yoKurudzirwa Kurapa Zvirwere zveGomarara Pachena
column3: Veruzhinji vari kuchema-chema kuti dai hurumende yaita kuti chirwere chegomarara chirapwe pasina muripo, uye kuti kuzvipatara zvese kusanganisira zvekumaruwa kuiswe michina inoongorora magomarara akasiyana-siyana. Apo nyika iri pakati pekuchema vaive mutungamiriri webato reMovement for Democratic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, avo vakafawo nechirwere chegomarara, veruzhinji vanoti hurumende ikasakoshesa chirwere ichi sezvakaitwa chirwere cheHIV/ AIDS, vanhu vakawanda vacharasikirwa nehupenyu. Amai Thandaza Mhlanga vaudza Studio 7 kuti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende ione kuti zvipatara nemakirinika zvarapa chirwere chegomarara pachena sezvo chopedza vanhu vakawanda. Izvi zvatsigirwawo naMuzvare Fortune Moyo avo vawedzerawo vakati pamusoro pekurapwa pachena hurumende inofanirwa kuita dzidziso dzakasimba zvakanyanya kuti veruzhinji vazive nezvechirwere chegomarara. Muzvare Moyo vati zvinosuwisa kuti nguva zhinji vanhu vanobatwa chirwere ichi chakomba. Muzvare Petronella Furusa vakurudzirawo kuti hurumende itsvage mari yakangonangana nekurwisa chirwere chegomarara. Vati kuchengetedza hutano hweveruzhinji hurumende inofanirwa kutora matanho yowona kuti kuzvipatara zvese kusanganisira kumamisha zvawaniswa michina nemishonga inoongorora gomarara kuti veruzhinji vapote vachitariswa. Munguva shoma yapfuura, sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezveutano mudare reparamende, Amai Ruth Labode vakaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iite dzidziso nezvechirwere chegomarara sezvakaitwa kuneHIV/AIDS. Amai Labode vakati zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vazive kuti chirwere chegomarara chikakurumidza kubatwa chinorapika. Cancer Registry inoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa negomarara huri kuramba huchikwira. Chirwere chegomarara ichi chinoda mari yakawanda kuti munhu arapwe, uye veruzhinji vanoti havaikwanisi kuwana mari dzinodiwa idzi. No media source currently available

column2: Huwandu hweMadzimai Akazvitakura Ari Kuonekwa neNyanzvi Hwokwira
column3: Madzimai akazvitakura muZimbabwe anonzi ave kukoshesa kuenda kune vezveutano kunoongororwa nhumbu dzavo inonzi pachirungu Antenatal Care visits zvichienzaniswa nemakore akare. Mumwe chiremba, Doctor Fortune Nyamande, vanoti zvakakosha zvikuru kuti madzimai akazvitakura vave vachinoonekwa nguva nenguva kuitira kuti kana pane zvinonetsa zvigadziriswe. VaNyamande vatiwo madzimai akazvitakura ari kunoongororwa sezvinotarisirwa asiwo vakati pachine mamwe madzimai anononoka kunyoresa pamuviri kana vasinganoongororwi. Izvi zvatsigirwa naDr Nicholas Wazadza avo vatiwo zvakakosha kuti madzimai akazvitakura apote achinoongororwa vachiti izvi zvinodzikisa hupenyu hwemadzidzimai nevana hunorasika. Mumwe mukuru musangano rinoshanda nemadzimai munyaya dzehutano oasi rose, reUnited Nations Population Fund, Amai Abigail Musemberi, vati madzimai mazhinji ava kukwanisa kunoonekwa kana vabata pamuviri. Amai Musemburi vati zvimwe zvezvipingaidzo zviri kutadzisa kuenda kwemadzimai akazvitakura kunoongororwa inyaya yemufambo unenge uripo. Madzimai aitarisirwa kunovhenekwa pamuviri kana kusvika vabatsirwa asi sangano reWorld Health Organisation rakakwidza kuti madzimai achive achishanyira zvipatara kasere pavanenge vakazvitakura. Amai Musemburi vanoti vachiri kuongorora kuti madzimai ari kuzvigona here ikana kuti kwete zvekuonekwa kasere apo anenge aine pamuviri. No media source currently available

column2: France Yowana Imwe Mhando yeCovid-19 Asi WHO Ichiti Vanhu Vasanyanye Kutya Havo
column3: France inoti yakawana imwe mhando itsva yeCovid-19 inonzi IHU iyo ichiri kuongororwa hayo kuti inokonzera hurwere hwakaita sei navanamazvikokota munya dzezvirwere. Mhando yeIHU iyi inonzi yakawanikwa mune munhu ainge ashanyira nyika yeCameroon. Pari zvino, vatambi venhabvu vemunyika nevamwe vemuAfrica vari kuCameroon kumakwikwi eAfrica Nations Cup. Asi vachitaura nenhepfenyuro yeBloomberg nevamwe vatori venhau nemusi weChipiri, vanoona nezvezvirwere zvitsva musangano reWorld Health Organization, VaAbdi Mahamud, vanoti mhando itsva yeIHU iyi haisi hayo kunyanya kuvavhundutsa sezvo isiri kupararira zvakanyanya kubva zvayakatanga kuonekwa uye vave nenguva vachiiongorora. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa, Muzvinafundo Davison Saungweme, avo vanodzidzisa paUniversity of North Georgia muno muAmerica, vari kukurudzira vanhu kuti vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 sezvo chirwere ichi chiri kuramba chichiuya nedzimwe mhando. Muzvinafundo Sangweme vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvirwere zvemavirus zvakaita seCovid-19 zvinoramba zvichiuya nedzimwe mhando. dzimwe mhando itsva dzinogona kuuraya vanhu, asi dzimwe dzinenge dzisina simba rakanyanya. Zvichakadaro, vanhu makumi matatu nemumwe vakafa nechirwere ichi nezuro zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru zvishanu nemakumi manomwe nevasere. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumu mapfumbamwe nemumwe chete kana kuti 1 591 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro. Izvi zvakasiya vabatwa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru mazana maviri negumi nezvinomwe nemazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevasere, kana kuti 217 678. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vave mamiriyoni mana nezviuru zana nemakumi mana nechimwe zvine zana nemakumi mashanu nevasere, kana kuti 4 141 158. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zana nemakumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine makumi mashanu nevasere ,kana kuti 3 153 058. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba katatu zvikuru vanoshanda muzvipatara, vakwegura nevari munjodzi yekurawara zvakaipisisa vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zvinomwe nemazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevana kana kuti 7 254. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshanda zvakanaka. No media source currently available

column2: ‘NHABVU INODA PAINE VATSIGIRI’
column3: MUTAMBI wechikwata chenyika cheZimbabwe Warriors necheYeni Malatyaspor chekuTurkey, Teenage Hadebe, anoti nhabvu hainakidze kutamba munhandare isina vatsigiri.   Mwaka wenhabvu weTurkish Super Lig – uko Hadebe ari kutambira – unotarisirwa kudzoka mumasvondo ari kutevera.   Mitambo mizhinji pasi rose yambenge yakamiswa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chaurauya vanhu vakawandisa. Asi kutanga masvondo achangodarika, kune dzimwe nyika nhabvu yava kuita ichidzoka asi ichitambwa munhandare dzisina vatsigiri.   Muhurukuro dzange dzichiitwa kuTurkey, pane fungidziro huru yekuti mitambo yenhabvu yeko inogona kusimudzira musi wa12 Chikumi.   Achitaura neKwayedza ari kuTurkey, Hadebe anoti ari kufara kuti nhabvu yave kudzoka asi anoti zvikwata zvinofanirwa kugadzirisa pavanotambira kuti pange pakachena uye pakachengetedzeka panyaya dzeutano.   “Kunyangwe hangu ndiri kufara kuti tave kudzoka kuzotamba nhabvu zvekare, asi zvandaona nekudzidza zvange zvichityisa. Vanhu vari kufa kunze uko, saka tinofanirwa kunge takachengetedzeka uye takangwarira tichitevedzawo mutemo nekurudziro dzeveutano.   “Ndanga ndasuwa nhabvu yangu nekuti ndiyo inondichengeta, saka ndiri kutarisira kutamba zvakanaka zvekare,” anodaro.   Kunyangwe zvazvo achiti ari kutarisira kudzoka kwenhabvu, Hadebe anoti zvichamuremera kutamba munhandare dzisina vatsigiri sezvo iye ange ajaira kutamba pamberi pechaunga chevanhu.   “Tajaira kutamba nhandare dzakazara nevatsigiri vachitikuza. Zvino izvi zvitsva kwandiri, saka zvichandiremera nekuti vatsigiri vanotipa manyuku-nyuku ekutamba zvakanaka.   “Asi totongojaira zviripo nekuti pakupera kwezuva tinofanirwa kubata basa, uye tiine utano,” anodaro muchinda anoti kana achitamba kumashure kwechikwata chemaWarriors uyu anoita zvekusunga chishwe chaicho.   Svondo richangodarika nhabvu yakatanga kutambwa kunyika yeGermany asi munhandare dzisina vatsigiri.   Mimwe yemitemo yakaiswa mitsva ndeyekuti vatambi venhabvu havachatenderwa kukwazisana nemaoko uye kana vakanwisa, pakupembera havabvumidzwe kumbundirana.

column2: Vashandi vekuMizinda yeNyika Voyawura neKusatambiriswa Mihoro kweMwedzi Yakawanda
column3: Vashandi vekumizinda yeZimbabwe pamwe nevamiriri venyika munyika dzakawanda pasi rose vanonzi vari kunonga svosve nemuromo sezvo vachinzi vamwe vatove nemwedzi inodarika mitanhatu vasati vawaniswa mihoro yavo. Izvi zvinonzi zvave kukonzera kuti vamwe vashandi vaburitswe mudzimba dzavari kugara, vamwe vachikundikana kubhadharira vana vavo mari dzezvikoro munyika dzakasiyanasiyana dzavari kudzidza. Vamwe vashandi vekumizinda iyi vataura neStudio 7 vatisingakwanisi kudoma nemazita sezvo vasingabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau, vati havachamboziva kuti remangwana ravo rakamira sei, sezvo pasina kana tarisiro yekuti vanobhadharwa riini. Vashandi ava vati chiri kunyanya kuvarwadza ndechekuti vanoudzwa kunzi nyika haina mari yekunze inodiwa kuti vakwanise kubhadharwa asi vanoona vamwe vakuru-vakuru muhurumende vachiita nzendo dzimwe dzisina kana nekukosha kwese. Mumwe mushandi ati haaonewo njere pakuti hurumende inodoma vamwe vamiriri venyika vatsva iyo ichikundikana kubhadhara vari pamabasa kare. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachangobva kudoma vamiriri venyika gumi nevashanu kutsiva vakaenda pamudyandigere nevamwe vakashaya. Zvinonzi mimwe mizinda yenyika yakatarisana nekuvharwa nekuda kwekukundikana kubhadhara mari dzekushandisa zvivakwa izvi. Kutanga kwegore rino bepanhau reNew Zimbabwe rakazivisawo nezvekuramwa mabasa kwevamwe vashandi vekumuzinda weZimbabwe kuMozambique, vachinyunyuta nekusatambiriswa mihoro yavo kwemakore matatu. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, Ambassador James Manzou, avo vanga vachinzi vabuda muhofisi mavo, kuti tinzwewo divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, vari mumiriri weMakonde, VaKindness Paradza vanoti komiti yavo inoziva nezvematambudziko akatarisana nevari kumizinda yenyika iyi, asi dambudziko guru rakatarisana nenyika ndere kushaya mari yekunze inodiwa pakubhadhara vashandi ava. VaParadza vanoti vave nehurongwa hwekuti vashandi vekumizinda yenyika vese vadzokere pasi pebazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kuitira kuti zvigove nyore pakuvabhadhara mihoro yavo. Vanoti pari zvino vashandi ava vari kutambira mihoro yavo pamwechete nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vose, danho ravatenda kuti harisi kufamba zvakanaka. No media source currently available

column2: Vamwe Vashandi Mubazi reKurima Vanoti Hurumende Haisi Kuvabata Zvakaenzana.
column3: Sangano rinomirira vashandi mubazi rezvekurima, reZimbabwe Agricultural Professionals and Technical Association (ZAPTA) rinoti hurumende haisi kubata zvakanaka vanhu vanoshanda mune zvekurima richiti nhengo dzaro dziri kushandiswa dzisina zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuCovid-19. Munyori weZAPTA, VaZivaishe Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vashandi vebazi rezvekurima vanoshandira mumaguta akaita se Harare vari kubatsirwa nezvekuzvidzivirira asi avo vanonzi vashande mazuva ose mumaruwa havasi kupiwa zvekuzvidzivirira kubva ku Covid-19. VaZhou vanoti hurumende inofanira kukoshesa hupenyu hwevashandi vose kusvika kuma wadhi emumaruwa. Studio7 yakundikana kubata mukuru anoona nezvevashandi mubazi rezvekurima, VaGibson Chijarira, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. No media source currently available

column2: Ndamirira: Manyuchi
column3: Ndooka   SHASHA yetsiva, Charles manyuchi, anoti ari kugadzirira kusangana naMuhamad Sebyala wekuUganda munaNyamavhuvhu apo vacharwira bhande reWorld Boxing Federation uye reWorld Africa Boxing Association Supreme Middleweight.   Vaviri ava vaifanirwa kusangana munaChivabvu asi mutambo wavo wakakanzurwa senzira yekurwisa kupararira kweCovid-19.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Manyuchi anoti chikwata chake chakakumbira kuHurumende kuti mutambo uyu uitwe ndokutenderwa saka chasara ndechekuti Sebyala atenderwe nenyika yake kuti auye kuZimbabwe kuzosangana naye.   “Takapihwa mvumo yekuti mutambo wedu uenderere mberi saka tamirira kunzwa kunyika yaSebyala kuti vanomutendera here kuuya kuno, kana akanzi auye anosvika otombotanga agara mu’quarantine’ kwemasvondo maviri ari muno,” anodaro.   Mutambo wevaviri ava ukabudirira unogona kutambwa munhandare isina vatsigiri sezvo mutemo usiri kutendera kuungana kwevanhu pari zvino.   “Zvevatsigiri pari zvino hazvina basa, chinongodiwa chete kuti iye Sebyala auye topedzerana tiri vaviri. Ndiye wandiri kuda uye pakati pedu tinofanira kurakidzana mukuru.   “Ini ndinenge ndiri munyika yangu uye handifanire kushoresa nyika saka ndiri kushanda nesimba kuti ndimubike zvakasimba,” anodaro Manyuchi.

column2: VaJuly Moyo Votarisirwa Kupa Rekupedzisira Pakuti Harare Yokwereta Here Mari Inodarika Bhiriyoni yemuNyika
column3: Gurukota rinoona nezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo vave kutarisirwa kupa rekupedzisira pachikumbiro chekanzuru yeHarare chekuti ikwanise kupihwa mukana wekukwereta mari inodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana emunyika. Nyaya iyi yaunza kusawirirana pakati pekanzuru nemasangano anomirira vagari. Vakafanobata chigaro chameya wemuHarare VaStewart Mtizwa vebato reMDC- Alliance vaudza Studio 7 kuti sezvinodiwa pamutemo vakaendesa kuhofisi yaVaMoyo chikumbiro chavo pamwe nezvakataurwa nevagari. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMoyo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. VaMtizwa vaatti kanzuru yavo haikwanise kuita mabasa makuru kana vakasapihwa mvumo yekukwereta mari iyi. Vagari vainge vapihwa kusvika musi wa 7 Kubvumbi kuti vape pfungwa dzavo uye vakawanda vari kutsika madziro. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revagari reHarare Residents Trust vaPrecious Shumba varamba zviri kutaurwa naVaMtizwa. Asi mutauriri weguta reHarare vaMichael Chideme vatiwo zvakakosha kuti kanzuru ikwereteswe mari iyi.nekuti izvi ndizvo zvinoiutwawo nemakanzuru ose pasi rino kana vachida kuita mabasa makuru. Izvi zvapikiswa nevanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mune rimwe sangano rinomiririra vagari reCombined Harare Residents Association VaReuben Akili vati kanzuru haibude pachena kuti yawana marii pazvirongwa zvakafanana nekubhadhariswa kwevanhu mari dzekumbosiya motokari muguta reHarare. Pamutemo, kana kanzuru ichida kukwereta mari inofanira kutanga yagara yobuda nechisungo chinozotambirwa nameya. Kanzuru inozozivisa vanhu kuburikidza nekushambadzira mumapepanhau uye vanhu vane mazuva makumi maviri nerimwe kuti vapindure. Kana izvi zvapera chikumburo uye zvinenge zvataurwa nevanhu zvinozoendeswa kugurukota rezvematunhu kuti rione kuti kanzuru yebvumidzwa here kana kuti kwete kukwereta mari. No media source currently available

column2: VaMwonzora Vanoti Ndivo Vave paNyanga Sezvo Vachiti Vakakunda Zvine Mutsindo
column3: VaDouglas Mwonzora vanoti vakasarudzwa zviri pachena kutsiva mushakabva Morgan Tsvangirai semutungamiri webato reMDCT pakongiresi yechimbichimbi yakaitwa nemusi weSvondo. VaMwonzora vakakunda Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaElias Mudzuri pamwe naVaMorgan Komichi pakongiresi yechimbichimbi yekutsiva mushakabvu Tsvangirai. VaMwonzora vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakakunda zviri pachena kunyange vakakundwa ava vari kugunun’una kuti sarudzo hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka uye Muzvare Khupe vachiti vambomisa VaMwonzora basa. Asi Amai Khupe vakaudza vatori husiku hweSvondo kuti sarudzo hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka vachiti VaMwonzora vakashandisa chikiribidi kuti vakunde musarudzo idzi. Izvi zvatsinhirwa neumwe wevaikwikwidza musarudzo idzi VaElias Mudzuri avo vatiwo mhirizhonga nekusavhota zvakanaka kwevanhu vaifanira kuvhota zvinhu zvisingatarisirwe mubato rakaita seravo. VaMudzuri vati havasi kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo dzanezuro vachiti chavekudikanwa ndechekuti vagare pasi sehutungamiri hwebato kuti vaone kuti votora matanho api. Mibvunzo yatatumira Muzvare Khupe nevamwe vakakwidza musarudzo idzi VaMorgen Komichi yanga isati yapindurwa. Zvichakadaro, VaMwonzora vati vatotanga basa rekuumba musangano wavo kubva zvino zvichienda mberi vakati zviri kutaurwa nevakakundwa musarudzo zvinhu zvisina musoro. Tichiri panyaya iyi, nhengo yekomiti yepamusoro muMDC Alliance, VaLovemore Chinoputsa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kongiresi yakaitwa neMDCT haisi pamutemo sezvo vachiti paive nevanhu vashoma panevanofanira kunge varipo. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika muMDCT vanoti kusafamba zvakanaka kunonzi kwakaita kongiresi yebato iri kunogona kusiya bato iri ratsemuka zvakare. No media source currently available

column2: Zanu-PF Yotanga Musangano wePagore kuGoromonzi
column3: Musangano wepagore weZanu-PF uri kutanga mangwana uchipera musi wesvondo pasi pedingindira rakanangana nekugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi panosvika gore ra2030 kana kuti ‘Mod­ernise, Mech­a­nise and Grow the Econ­omy To­wards Vi­sion 2030’. Vanhu vanosvika zviuru zvinomwe vari kutarisirwa pamusangano uyu. Asi kunyangwe hazvo sarudzo dziriko muna 2023, matunhu akawanda ebato iri atotanga kuti achatsvagira mutungamiri wenyika uye vari mutungamiri webato iri VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti vakwikwidze zvakare musarudzo idzi. Munyori anoona nezvevechidiki muZanu-PF VaPupurai Togarepi vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti vaite chisungo chekuti vati VaMnangagwa ndivo vavanoda kuti varambe vari panyanga nekuti bato ravo nderechimurenga rinotungamirwa nemunhu mumwe chete panguva imwe chete. No media source currently available Asi mutungamiri wevechidiki muMDC Youth League VaObey Sithole vanoti zviri kuitwa neZanu-PF hazvina nematuro ose sezvo vachiri vati VaMnangagwa havana chavari kuita chine musoro kusimudzira nyika. No media source currently available

column2: Sikandar odzoka kuzc
column3: MUTAMBI wecricket, Sikandar Raza, akasarudzwa kuti agove muchikwata cheZimbabwe Cricket icho chichaenda kunokwikwidza neBangladesh mumitambo mitatu yeone day international uye nemiviri yetest match.   Asi achange asiri muchikwata chemaChevrons icho chiri kuSouth Africa kunokwikwidza mumitambo yakasiyana iri kutanga svondo rino musi weSvondo.   Shasha iyi yange isina kusarudzwa kuti iende kunomirira maChevrons zvichitevera nyaya dzake dzekondirakiti dzainetsa, asi zvakazogadziriswa apo pakaitwa hurukuro pakati pake neZimbabwe Cricket contracts committee svondo rino.   Raza akatsanangura mamiriro aive akaita nyaya yake uye akakumbira ruregerero ndokuzvipira kumirira Zimbabwe mumitambo inotevera.   Apo maChevrons akasimuka kuenda kuSouth Africa kare kunokwikwidza mumitambo mitatu yeODI iyo ichange ichitambirwa kuKimberley uye neyeTwenty20, vanosarudza chikwata ichi vakaronga kuti vamusiye asi vachizomusarudza pakuenda kuBangladesh.    “Ndine mufaro mukuru nezvakaitika izvi uye ndinopa kutenda kuZC iyo yakwanisa kugadzirisa nyaya dzangu.   “Ndinoda kusiyana nenyaya iyi ndotanga kuita zvekuti nditambe cricket yangu kwete kufunga zvakawanda,” anodaro Raza.   Akafanobata chigaro chamanaging director weZC –  Givemore Makoni – anoti anotambira nemaoko maviri kudzoka kwaRaza muchikwata ichi.   “Tine mufaro mukuru kuti takakwanisa kuwirirana naSikandar uyo anove mumwe wevatambi vedu vepamusoro. Tinomutambira nemaoko maviri kudzoka muchikwata chedu uye tinovimba kuti patichaenda naye kuBangladesh nemimwe mitambo achatibatsira zvikuru,” anodaro.   Masvondo adarika, Raza akabuda pachena kuti akange asiri kuzotambira maChevrons kumitambo yeSouth Africa neBangladesh zvichitevera kusapihwa kondirakiti itsva neZC izvo akatumira pandemutande rake retwitter.

column2: Sangano reAnti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa Roburitsa Huori paKutsvaga Rutsigiro muSarudzo
column3: Sangano re Anti-corruption Trust of Southern Africa (ACT-Southern Africa) rakabuditsa gwaro rinoburitsa pachena kubiridzirwa kwarinoti kuri kuitwa sarudzo nevamwe vari kukwidza. Zvinonzi vamwe vari kushandisa zvekudya, zvicherwa uye dzimotokari mukuyedza kutenga mavhoti. Mukuru we sangano re Anti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa VaAlouis Munyaradzi Chaumba vanoti kutengwa kwemavhoti kwanyanya ku dunhu reKwekwe uko kwavanoti zviri kuitwa pachena chena nevamwe vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dziri kuuya. Vati kune mumwe wevanoita zve kuchera goridhe ane mukurumbira ari kutengera hutungamiriri dzimotokari iri nzira yekuvatenga nayo kuti awane rutsigiro. Kunonzi kune vazhinji vari kugara mudzimba dzekuroja vakavimbiswa kubhadharirwa mari dzerendi. Vamwewo vakabatsirwa kunobvuta migodhi ye goridhe zvine chisimba kumugodhi weGlobe & Phoenix uri mu Kwekwe makare. Vechidiki vanonzi vari kushandisirwa doro nezvimwe zvinodhaka kuti vateverere vari kuda kutsigirwa musarudzo dziri kuuya idzi. Mumwe anoshandawoi naVaChaumba, VaObert Chinhamo vakatiwo izvi zvinowanzokonzera nyonga nyonga nekurwisana kana vadhakwa zvoshaya chazvinobatsira. Sangano reAnti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa rinoti harizorori kuongorora nekumhan’ara zvose zviri kuitika.

column2: Vanhu Vanodarika Mamiriyoni Matanhatu (6M) Vafa neCovid-19 Pasi Rose
column3: Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 pasi rose inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matanhatu kana kuti 6 million vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva zvachatanga kupararira pasi rose muna 2019. MuAmerica chete vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe zvine makumi matanhatu nechimwe kana kuti 961 000 vafa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vasina kubayiwa nhomba vakawanda ndivo vari kunzi vari kufa zvakanyanya. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro vanhu mazana mashanu nemumwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kusanganisira vana vechikoro zana nemakumi matatu nevatanhatu. Vanhu makumi manomwe vanonzi vari kurwara neCovid-19 vari muzvipatara zvakasiyana siyana munyika. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro hakuna munhu akafa nechirwere cheCcovid-19 zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira munyika muna 2020 vachiri zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 5 399.

column2: Mari Itsva Yotarisirwa Munyika Mukati meMasvondo Maviri
column3: Bhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, razivisa kuti richadhinda mari itsva ichange ichishandiswa mumabhanga serimwe rematanho ariri kutora mukugadzirisa nyaya yekushomeka kwemari munyika pamwe nekugadzirisa zvinhu mumabhanga nemisika yemari munyika. Gavhuna webhanga iri, zvakare vari sachigaro vekomiti yebhanga iri inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari, yeMonetary Policy Committee, Dr John Mangudya, vati mari iyi inosanganisira madhora maviri emakoini nemadhora mashanu ebepa ichange yave mumabhanga mukati memasvondo maviri ari kutevera. Vachitaura mumushure memusangano wekutanga weMonetary Policy Committee, VaMangudya vati komiti yavo haisi kufara kuti mumaabhanga hamuna mari inokwanira munhu wese ndosaka vatora danho rekuunza mari itsva. VaMangudya vatiwo vari kuwedzera mari pamusika wemari yekunze kana kuti Interbank Rate vachiti matanho aya achederedza mitengo yezvinhu. VaMangudya vatiwo pane mari yakawanda isina zvairi kushandiswa yakangogara mumabhanga uye komiti yavo yatora danho rekuti mari iyi ishandiswe pakurima pamwe nekugadzirisa zvinhu kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Vaenderera mberi vachiti pamari yose iri mumabhanga munyika, mabhirioni gumi nemapfumbwamwe emadhora, makambani makumi mashanu chete ndiwo ane zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana zvemari iyi. Munguva pfupi yapfuura, RBZ yakavhara maAccounts emakambani akaita se Sakunda, Croco neAccess Finance achinzi aishandisa mari zvisina tsarukanao uye afaingudzirwa kuti ndiwo aiita zvekutenga nekutengesa mari pamusika mutema. Sachigaro vesangano rinomirira mabhanga munyika, reBankers Association of Zimbabwe, VaWebster Rusere, vati semaonero avo, Monetary Policy Committee yabuda nematanho akanaka chose. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti danho rekuwedzera mari mumabhanga rakanaka chose asi sezvo vanhu vange vatambura nekutengeserwa mari nemakoronyera. Vaenderera mberi vachiti zvakakosha kuti bhanga guru renyika ritorewo matanho anoshaisa makoronyera anotengesa mari mukana wekuramba achiomesera vanhu. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti nyika inofranirwa kungwarira kuti munyika musawanzwe, akana kudhinda mari inodarika hupfumi hwenyika, sezvo izvi zvichikonzera kuparara zvakanyanya kwesimba remari munyika. No media source currently available

column2: Dzimwe Nyika Dzobatana neVanhu muZimbabwe Mukuvigwa kwaVaTsvangirai
column3: Vamiriri vedzimwe nyika muZimbabwe vakwanisa kubatana neruzhinji rweZimbabwe kumusha kwemutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai. Vamiri ava vanosanganisira venyika dzinoti America, Britain, Sweden nedzimwe nyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachidzidzisa paHuddersfield College kuBritain, Doctor Nkululeko Sibanda, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu pamwe chete nekuwanda kwevamiriri vedzimwe nyika kunoratidza kuti VaTsvangirai vange vari mutungamiriri anodiwa uye nyika zhinji dzange dzichivaona saivo mutungamiriri weZimbabwe chaiye. Mumwe ange aripo pakuvigwa kwaVaTsvangirai mutungamiri webato rinopikisa muKenya, VaRaila Odinga, avo vanoti vakatanga kuziva VaTsvangirai muna 1993. No media source currently available

column2: Madhokotera neVakoti Voshanda Hana Dzichirova Vachityira Kubatwa neCovid-19
column3: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere che Covid-19 hwava kupa kuti vashandi vanobatsira vanhu vanenge vachirwara nedenda iri, vapindwe nekutya, vachityira kuti vanogona kupinzwawo munjodzi nechirwere ichi, icho chava kuita chamurambamhuru munyika. Vashandi vezvehutano vanoti vave kusangana nevanhu vane chirwere ichi nguva dzose pavanenhge varipabasa sezvo huwandu hwevanhu vanenge vachibatwa nechirwere ichi huru kuramba huchikwira Mumwe mushandi wezvehutano, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMD Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati vari kusiririswa zvikuru nehuwandu hweavo vari kufa nechirwere cheCovid-19. VaMadzorera vati vashandi vezvehutano vanotoda kubatsirwa mukugadzikana kwepfungwa nekuti zvavari kuona vari pabasa zvinotyisa. VaMadzorera, avo vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, vatiwo apo vashandi vezvehutano vanenge vodzokera kumba, vanenge vakutyirawo kutapurira mhuri dzavo kana vachinge vabatwa nedenda iri asi risati rabuda pachena. Asi VaMadzorera vati sevashandi vezvehutano varikutorawo matanho ekuderedza njodzi iyi sezvo riri basa ravo rekubetsera vanenge vachirwara Mumwe mukoti anoshanda muguta reHarare, VaSimbarashe James Tafirenyika, avo vanotungamira Zimbabwe Urban and Rural Council Nurse Worker’s Union, vati zvinhu zvinotyisa zvakanyanya kuenda kubasa. Asi vati kubaiwa kwavakaitwa nhomba kwakadzikamisa hana yavo. VaTafirenyika vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vezvehutano vapiwe zvekushandisa zvakakwana kuitira kuti vasabatwe neCovid-19 apo vanenge vachibetsera veruzhinji. VaTafirenyika vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vezvehutano vese vapiwe zvekufambisa kuitira kuti vasasangane neveruzhinji. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaGodknows Homwe, vati vashandi vezvehutano vanofanirwa kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro sezvo vari kubata basa rakakosha huye rinotyisa. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu makumi matanhatu nevaviri vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi pazviuru zviviri nemazana masere nevapfumbamwe 2809. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vave zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe nezana nemakumi maviri,91,120 , zvichitevera kubatwa kwevanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana manomwe nevashanu 2705 nezuro wakare. Kusvika nezuro, hurumende inoti vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vakange vave miriyoni imwechete nezviuru mazana maviri makumi mapfumbamwe nezviviri nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mana nevaviri, 1 292, 642 Vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nezvitanhatunemazana maserenemakumi matatu, 656 830. Huwandu uhwu hunogona kukwira apo hurumende ichazivisa zvabuda muongororo dzanhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhutu kubva muzana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika. No media source currently available

column2: VaChamisa Vanoti Zimbabwe Ichange Yave neMutungamiri Mutsva Musi weChipiri
column3: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vaita musangano kuChibuku Stadium kuChitungwiza uko vaudza veruzhinji kuti Zimbabwe ichange yave nemutungamiri mutsva svondo rinouya. Vachitaura kumhomho yevanhu vaungana muChibuku Stadium kuChitungwiza, VaChamisa vati yasvika nguva yekuti zvinhu zvishanduke munyika, izvo vati zvichaitika svondo rinouya mushure mesarudzo. VaChamisa vaudza vanhu kuti havana moyo murefu sezvaive zvakaita vaimbove mutungamiri weMDC-T, muchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai, uye vayambira mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachiti zvekudzvanyirira vanhu zvakapera uye hazvichaitiki zvekare nekuti nguva yekuchinja zvinhu yasvika. “Vana Chiwenga nanaMnangagwa ngavanzwisise nyaya iyi kuti vanhu veZimbabwe havadi zvemhirizhonga. Vanhu ava ndivo vakatidenha. Vakatidenha nekutadza kutongwa kwavo; vakatidenha nekusatevedzera mutemo kwavo; vakatidenha nekubira pasarudzo kwavaiita,” VaChamisa vaudza vanhu. Asi VaChamisa vati vanokudza vakuru vakaita semutungamiriri we Zapu, VaDumiso Davengwa, nekuti ndivo vakarwira rusununguko rwenyika. VaChamisa vatiwo kudzoka kweavo vakange vambobuda muMDC-T vakaita saVaTendai Biti naVaWelshman Ncube, chiratidzo chekuti MDC-T ndiwo musha wevanhu wega. VaChamisa vatsananguriravo vanhu pamusoro pezita rebato ravachashandisa pasarudzo vachiti bato reMDC-T rasimba kubva zvarakange riri parakaumbwa. VaChamisa vati Zanu-PF yange ichida kuti varamwe sarudzo kuitira kuti igosara iri yega musarudzo. Vavimbisa mapurisa nemasoja kuti kana vakakunda musarudzo vachagara zvakanaka kupfuura zvavari pari zvino. Musangano uyu wange uri wechitanhatu wavaita muzuva rimwe, uye uri wechimakumi manomwe nepfumbamwe mumwedzi miviri vachitsvaga rutsigiro. No media source currently available

column2: Nyanzvi yeZvehupfumi Inoti Haione Makambani eMunyika Achikwanisa Kugadzira zveKudzivirira COVID-19 Zvakakwana
column3: Imwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi inoti nekuda kwemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezveupfumi munyika, haioni makambani emunyika achikwanisa kugadzira zvikwanisiro zvinodiwa mukudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana hwecoronavirus. Zvinodiwa zvinosanganisira magorovhosi, zvekuvharisa miromo nekumeso (masks), zvekuzora zvinouraya hutachiwana (sanitizers) kanawo mbatya dzinodzivirira (protective suits) izvo zvinodiwa mukudzivirira kutapuriranwa pamwe nekuparadzirwa kwehutachiwana hwe coronavirus. VaMasimba Kuchera, avo vanoshanda vakazvimirira, vanoti makambani akwanda emunyika haasi kushanda zvakakwana, uye vanhu vakawanda vave kuzvishandira izvo zvavanoti zvinoderedza huwandu hwezvinhu zvingagadzirwe munyika nemakambani kana dambudziko rechirwere ichi rakazokura. Nyika dzakawanda dzine dambudziko rechirwere che COVID-19 kusanganisira America, dziri kuchema nekushaya zvekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi zvakakwana zvekuti mamwe makambani anobika doro muAmerica ave kutobatsirawo kuburukidza nekugadzira hand sanitizer. Nyika zhinji kusanganisirawo Zimbabwe, dziri kutowana rubatsiro kubva kunyika yeChina, iyo iri kutumira zvekushandisa izvi asi zvinonzi nevamwe zvinogona kuzononoka kusvika kwazvinenge zvichidiwa nekukasika. Hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kuti yakagadzirira zvakakwana kudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hwecoronavirus. No media source currently available

column2: Matare eDzimhosva Ovhiringwa neChirwere cheCovid-19
column3: Judicial Service Commission (JSC) yavhara matare mumadhorobha matanhatu mushure mekunge vashandi vemumatare aya vabatwa nechirwere che Covid-19. JSC yavhara matare amajisitireti, kuBindura, Chinhoyi, Kariba, Karoi, Mt Darwin neMutare uko kwavharwawo dare repamusoro. Munyori weJSC, VaWalter Chikwanha, vati vatora danho iri kuti matare aya ambofiritwa nemishonga inodzvirira kupararira kweCovid-19, kuvheneka vashandi pamwe nekuita ongororo yekutsvaga chakapa kuti denda iri ripinde mumatare aya. Vati vanoda kukwidza nyaya dzavo kumatere, magweta nevamwe vanoda rubatsiro kumatare aya vanofanira kubata vatongi vakuru munzvimbo dzavo, Registrar Additional Sheriff kana Assistant Master uye mafoni evanhu ava achaiswa pamatare avharwa aya. VaChikwanha havana kutaura kuti vanhu vangani vakabatwa neCovid 19 kumatare avharwa aya asi vati vari kushanda nebazi rezvehutano kugadzirisa kuti avhurwe uye veruzhinji vachaziviswa kuti matare aya achavhurwa rini. VaChikwanha vati JSC iri kutora matanho ese anokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organisation nebazi rezvehutano kudzvirira kupararira kweCovid-19 kumatare ose ari kushanda. Vatiwo vave kusimbaradza kupfekwa kwemamasiki, kugeza maoko nekushandisa maSanitizer kuti munhu apinde mumatare. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakati mapazi ayo anofanira kuderedza huwandu hwevashandi vanoenda kubasa kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana, VaChikwanha vati havagoni kuita izvi nekuti matare anoita basa rakakosha. Gweta rinoshanda neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights kwaMutare, Amai Peggy Tavagadza, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hongu danho ratorwa neJSC rakanaka chose asi rinofanirawo kuitirwa kuvasungwa, mapurisa navose vanoshandisa matare. Vatiwo JSC ngaifambirane nenguva kuti vanhu vatongwe pachishandisa muchina yechizvino zvino vasingasangane nevamwe mumatare. Mutungamiri wesangano reMedical and Dental Priivate Practitioners of Zimbabwe Association, Dr Johannes Marrisa, vati hurumende inofanira kuvheneka vanhu vakawanda kuti izive huwandu hwevanhu vane denda iri. Vaive gurukota rehutano panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuwanda kuri kuita Covid-19 kunokonzerwa nekuti matanho ekudzivirira denda iri haasi kutevedzwa vakatiwo hurumende inofanira kuwanisa vanhu zvekufambisa vachiti vanhu vari kutapuriranawo denda iri vari mimitsetse yemabhazi. Nezuro vanhu mazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu nevatanhatu vakabatwa neCovid -19 izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika yose pazviuru makumi mana nezvitauru nemazana mana nemakumi masere (43, 480 cases). Munhu mumwe chete akafa neCovid-19 nezuro,izvo zvaskavitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa neCovid-19 munyika yosepachiuru nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbabwe nevaviri, 1 692. Kusvika nezuro vanhu vainge vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vave zviuru mazana manomwe nemagumi zvishanu nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, 715 056 uye vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana mana nemakumi mashanu nechimwe nemazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu, 451 793. Huwandu uhu hunotarisirwa kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichaburitsa zvayawana nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. No media source currently available

column2: Maitiro eMapurisa Ane Rusarura Otsamwisa MDC-T
column3: No media source currently available Mapurisa ekuKaroi, mudunhu reMashonaland West, arambidza MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai kuita musangano nevatsigiri vayo munhandare yeChikangwe. Musangano uyu wanga uchifanirwa kuitwa neMugovera, asi mapurisa anozi apa zvikonzero zvinonzi hazvina kutsanangurwa. Mutauriri weMDC-T, Vaobert Gutu, vanoti musangano uyu, uyo wanga uchitarisirwa kutaurwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaTsvangirai, VaNelson Chamisa, wanga wakanangana nekukurudzira nhengo dzebato ravo kuti dziende nehuwandu hwadzo kunonyoresa kuitira kuti dzigozokwanisa kuvhota musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Izvi zvinoitika panguva iyo mutungamiri wenyika uye vari mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kutarisirwawo zvakare kutaura pamusangano wevechidiki veZanu PF uri kuitirwa pamuzinda webato iri muHarare neMugovera. VaGutu vanoti zviri kuitwa nemapurisa zvinorwadza sezvo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo, uye mapato ose ezvematongerwo enyika achitarisirwa kupinda mumativi mana enyika zvisina dambudziko kuti asangane nevatsigiri vawo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi.

column2: VanaChiremba Vanoti Vave Kungorapa Vari Kurwarisa neKushaya Zvikwanisiro
column3: Vanachiremba vakuru avo vakaratidzira nemusi weChitatu kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa mabasa vanoti vari kurapa vanhu varikurwarisisa chete sezvo vachiti hurumende iri kutadza kuvapa zvikwanisiro zvekuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo. Zvichakadai, kuramwa mabasa uku kunonzi kwapararirawo kune zvimwe zvipatara zvehurumende muHarare.
