Vanachiremba vakuru vari kuramwa mabasa vanoti hapana chine musoro chakabuda mumusangano wavakaita negurukota rezvehutano VaObediah Moyo. Mumwe wavanachiremba vakuru vepachipatara cheParirenyatwa, Doctor David Chimuka, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti parizvino vari kungorapa varwere vari kurwarisisa muzvipatara zvehurumende sezvo hurumende iri kutadza kuvapa michina yekushandisa pamwe nemishonga yekurapisa varwere. Mumwe chiremba wepaParirenyatwa, Doctor Shingai Chiurunge, vati vave kungopa varwere mapepa ekuti vakwanise kunotenga mishonga yekuti varapwe kana kuti ma prescription sezvo muzvipatara zvehurumende musina mishonga iyi. Vamwe vanachiremba vekune zvimwe zvipatara zvehurumende zvakaita seHarare General Hospital neChitungwiza General Hospital vakaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havachakwanisiwo kuita basa ravo sezvo vakatarisana nematambudziko akafanana neanachiremba vekuParirenytwa. Vamwe vanachiremba vepa Harare General Hospital vakati vave kungorapawo varwere vari kurwarisisa sezviri kungoitwa paParirenyatwa vachiti bandiko reIntensive Care Unit, kana kuti ICU, iro ranga rave nemasvondo akati kuti risingashande, ratovhurwa neChina kuitira kuti anachiremba vakuru vakwanise kurapa varwere varikurwarisisa chete. Anachiremba ava vanoti kunyange hazvo vavhura bandiko reICU iri, vari kusangana zvakare nematambudziko ekushayikwa kwemimwe michina pamwe nemishonga yekurapisa varwere. Asi gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vakaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti bazi ravo riri kuyedza pose parinogona napo kuti ritsvage mari yekutenga mishonga yekupa varwere pamwe nekugadzirisa mimwe michina inonzi yakafa kuti anachiremba vakwanise kuishandisa. VaMoyo vakatiwo dambudziko ravainaro sehurumende nderekushaya mari yekunze yekutenga zvimwe zviri kudiwa nanachiremba ava kunyange hazvo vati vari mubishi rekuedza kuti vataure nagavhuna webhanga guru renyika VaJohn Mangudya kuti bazi rezvehutano rikwanise kupihwa mari yekunze kuti vatenge zviri kudiwa izvi. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende Yotenda Kuti Vanhu Vave Kufa neKuratidzira kwaVanaChiremba
column3: Sangano rinomirira ana chiremba vehurumende avo vari kuramwa mabasa parizvino rinoti munyika mungangosara musina anachiremba zvichitevera kudiwa kuri kuitwa madhokotera nezvipatara zviri kunze kwenyika. Mashoko aya anouya apo hurumnde yave kutenda kuti varwere vari kufa muzvipatara zvehurumende nekuda kwekutaridzira kwavanachiremba vave nemavhiki matatu vachiratidzira. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mu Harare neChina, mutauriri Zimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, VaFrancis Rwodzi, vati kuramwa kwemabasa nana chiremba kucharamba kuchienderera mberi zvichitevera kutadza kuwirirana kuri kuita ana chiremba nehurumende panyaya yekuwedzerwa kwemari dzemihoro. Madhokotera ari kuramwa mabasa anoti anoda kuwedzerwa mari yaari kutambiriswa kubva pamadhora mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemaviri ($282) kusvika pamadhora chiuru nemazana maviri ($1200) asi hurumende inoti homwe yayo yakabooka zvekuti haikwanise kupa ana chiremba ava mari dzavari kuda idzi. Zvichakadai, VaRwodzi vati zvipatara zvekunze kwenyika zvizhinji zvirikukoka ana chiremba vemuZimbabwe kuti vanoshandira kuzvipatara izvi zvavati zvichaita kuti hupenyu huomere veruzhinji. VaRwodzi vati hurumende haina hany’a neraramo yavana chiremba uye vanoti hurumende inokoshesa kupa mari yakawanda kumadzishe asina basa guru raanoita muhupenyu hwevanhu ichisiya kubhadhara madhokotera zvine mwero. Zvichakadaro, munyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano Dr Gerald Gwinji vanoti vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa vanofanira kuti vadzokere kumabasa. Vachitaura nebepanhau reHerald Dr Gwinji vanoti varwere vave kufa muzvipatara zvehurumende nenyaya yekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba. Dr Gwinji vanoti zvipatara zvehurumende zvinokwanisawo kudaidza vanachiremba kubva kumauto. Asi vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanachiremba vadzokere kumabasa nhaurirano dzichiitwa. Mashoko aDr Gwinji anoteverawo kurudziro yakapihwa negurukota rezvehutano Dr david Parirenyatwa yekuti vanachiremba vadzokere kumabasa asi hurukuro dzichienderera mberi. Asi mashoko aya anenge akatowedzera peturu mumoto nekuti vanachiremba muzvipatara zvekumatunhu makuru nemadiki vakabva vatangawo kuramwa mabasa. Sangano rakazvimirira reZimbabwe Peace Project raburitsawo mashoko richiti riri kushushikana nekuramwa mabasa kwavanavanachiremba richiti vanhu vave kurasikirwa nehupenyu. Sangano iri riri kuti riri kushushikana nemashoko akabuda mubepanhau reThe Southern Eye Newspaper nezuro ekuti pane varwere vana vakashaya kuMpilo nenyaya yekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba. Mune imwewo nyaya, sangano revanotengesa mumigwagwa re National Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti Navuz, rinoti harisi kutambira hurongwa hwekanzuru yeHarare hwekuda kubvisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa pakati pedhorobha. Munyori musangano re Navuz, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vati sangano ravo, iro ravati rine nhengo dzinodarika zviuru gumi nezvitatu, riri kushushikana zvikuru nehuruongwa hwekanzuru iyo iri kuda kubvisa vese vanotengesera mumigwagwa mudhorobha. VaWadzayi vati sangano ravo rine nzira dzakawanda dzarichashandisa kurwisana nezviri kurongwa nekanzuru iyo yavati yakaronga kluvadzinga ichishanda pamwechete nemauto. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naMeya we Harare, VaBernard Manyenyeni kana mutauriri wekanzuru VaLeslie Gwindi, kuti tinzwe divi rekanzuru panyaya iyi asi kanzuru inogara ichimhanyisana nevanotengesera mumigwagwa nguva nenguva. Mune imwewo nyaya zvakare, bhodhi resangano rinoshanda rakazvimirira re Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition rinoti harisi kuzosuduruka pachisungo charo chekuti mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaMcDonald Lewanika, vasiye basa pakupera kwegore panopera nguva yavakasainira kuti vange vari mutungamiri wesangano iri. Sachigaro webhodhi re Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaDewa Mavhinga, vakaudza vatori venhau muHarare neChina kuti nyangwe zvazvo panga paine mukana wekunyorerana patsva kuti VaLewanika vapinde muchibvumirano chitsva, bhodhi ravo rakawona zvakakodzera kuti VaLewanika vasiye basa sezvo pane humbowo hwekuti havana kufambisa zvakanaka mari yesangano iri. Zvichakadaro, VaLewanika vanoti vari kuronga musangano mukuru wemasangano ese anove nhengo dze Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition uchaitwa mwedzi uno uine chinangwa chekuchinja zvakabvumiranwa nebhodhi resangano iri asi VaMavhinga vati musangano uyu hauna zvaunoreva uye vati uri kunze kwemutemo. Mune imwe nyaya nemusi weChina wakare, mapositori gumi neumwechete vakabatwa vaine mhosva yekurova mapurisa nevatori venhau kuBudiriro uye vamwe vavo makumi maviri nevatanhatu vawanikwa vasina mhosva nedare. Vabatwa nemhosva ava vatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore mana. Mapurisa nevatori venhau vakarohwa nemapositori aya kuBudiriro mushure mekunge mapositori aya apomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevana zvinosanganisira kurambidza vana kuenda kuchikoro.

column2: VaChamisa Voenda kuMatare Vachipikisa Zec Yakati VaMnangagwa Vakakunda Musarudzo
column3: Nyanzvi munyaya dzebumbiro remitemo yenyika dzinoti kana MDC Alliance ikakwidza nyaya yayo kumatare edzimhosva yekuti VaNelson Chamisa vakakunda mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, izvi zvinomisa kugadzwa kwaVaMnangagwa. VaChamisa vanoti vari kuronga kuenda mutare kunopikisa zvakaburitswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, vachiti vane humbowo hunoratidza kuti vakakunda VaMnangagwa zvine mutsindo. Bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinopa vanenge vasina kufara nezvebuda musarudzo mazuva manomwe kubva panozviswa zvabuda musarudzo kuti vakwidze nyaya yavo kumatare. Kana izvi zvisina kuitika zvinoreva kuti vanenge vakunda musarudzo vanogadzwa semutungamiriri wenyika mukati memazuva mapfumbamwe kubva pazuva raitwa sarudzo. Vari kuziva zviri kuitika zvakare vari gweta muMDC Alliance, VaJacob Mafume, vaudza Studio 7 kuti MDC Alliance iri kuenda kumatare neMuvhuro kana Chipiri kuitira kuti inopikisa zvakaziviswa neZec. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzebumbiro remitemo yenyika, uye vari mutungamiri weNational Constitutional Assembly, VaLovemore Madhuku, vachitaura senyanzvi yemitemo vanoti kuti MDC Alliance ibudirire panyaya iyi, inofanira kuburitsa humbowo hwemagwaro ekuzvivisa zvakubuda musarudzo panzvimbo yega yega yakavhotera vanhu munyika uye magwaro avo anofanira kufanana neeZec pamwe nevamwe vakapinda musarudzo idzi. VaMadhuku vanoti matare anosungirwa kupedza nyaya iyi mukati memasvondo maviri uye panguva iyi VaMnangagwa ndivo vanenge vari mutungamiriri wenyika. Vanoongorora zvematonerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaJoy Mabenge, vaudza Studio7 kuti sekunzwa kwavari kuita, MDC Alliance ine humbowo hwekuti sarudzo idzi dzakabiridzirwa, uye kana humbowoi uhwu hukatambirwa nematare bato iri rinogona kubudirira. Asi vanoti zvinogana kunetsa kana MDC Alliance ikatadza kuburitsa humbowo. Sachigaro veZec, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vakati VaMnangagwa vakawana 50.8 percent, ukuwo VaChamisa vachiwana 44.3 percent musarudzo yemutungamiriri wenyika yaikwikwidzwa nevanhu makumi maviri nevatatu, kusanganisira VaMadhuku.

column2: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kuremekedza Kodzero dzeVanhu Isati Yatambirwa Kuva Nhengo yeCommonwealth
column3: Chikwata chesangano reCommonwealth icho chiri munyika kuongorora kuti Zimbabwe yodzorwa musangano iri here kana kuti kwete, chiri kusangana nehurumende, mapato anopikisa nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika dzinoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iremekedze kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nehutongi hwejekerere kuti kuti itambirwe zvakare muCommonwealth. Chikwata chenyika dziri mugungano reCommonwealth chiri munyika chiri kuenderera mberi nehurukuro nemapato nemasangano akasiyana siyana. Vataura neStudio 7 vakawanda vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti Zimbabwe idzorwere mugungano iri asi inofanira kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. VaTabani Mlambo avo vanogara kuChipinge East, ndemumwe ane muonero uyu. Mukururu wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum iro raita hurukuro nechikwata ichi, Doctor Musa Kika vati vanotsigira kudzokera kweZimbabwe muCommonwelath asi.. Dr Kika vaudza Studio 7 kuti havashamisiki kuti nhengo gumi dzeCitizens Coalition for Change idzo dzange dzave nemwedzi mishanu dzichinyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso panyanya yadziri kupomerwa yekukonzera mhirizhonga kuNyatsime dzapihwa mukana uyu nhasi nekuda kwekuti chikwata cheCommonwealth chiri munyika. Asi gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende haipindire panyaya dzinenge dziri kumatare. Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaErnest Mudzengi vati zvakakosha kuti vatori venhau vashande vakasungunuka Commonwealth isati ambundira Zimbabwe. Pari zvino chikwatai ichi chiri kuita musangano neZanu PF uye chiri kutarisirwa kuita hurukuro nemapato eMDC Alliance inotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora neCCC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaWitness Dube, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo rinoda chose kuti Zimbabwe ipinde muCommonwealth nekuti iri kurasikirwa zvikuru. Mutauriri weCCC, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere vati bato ravo richazivisa veruzhinhi parimire munguva inotevera. Mukuru mubazi reZanu-PF rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vat Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekudyidzana kwenyika zvakare vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaBekezela Gumbo vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zimbabwe ingona kudzorwa muCommonwealth kana pakatariswa nzira dzakashandiswa pakapinda dzimwe nyika dzakaita sana Rwanda. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutungamiriri wechikwata cheCommonwealth Muzvinafundo Luis Franschesci. Asi vachitaura mumusangano wavaakaita negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe, VaFrederick Shava nezuro vakati vachaedza nepavanogona kubatsira Zimbabwe kudzoka muCommonwealth. VaShava vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo asi Studio 7 ine hurukuro yayakaita nemutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika VaGeorge Charamba nezvenyaya iyi yatichakupai muzvikamu zvinotevera. VaCharamba vanoti donzvo reZimbabwe ndseekudyidzana nenyika dzose. Vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakaburitsa Zimbabwe muCommonwealth mushure mekunge Zimbabwe yambomiswa kuve nhengo yesangano iri ichipomerw mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu muna 2003. Asi zvichitevera kupidigurwa kwehurumende yaVaMugabe, VaMangagwa vakaisa chikumbiro kusangano iri kuti Zimbabwe idzoke izvo zvazoita kuti Commonwealth itumire chikwata ichi. No media source currently available

column2: Mumwe weVechidiki Anorwira Kodzero dzeVanhu Otyorwa Gumbo Mushure Mekupambwa neVasori
column3: Mumwe wevari kutungamira nyaya yekuratidzira kusatambira kuparurwa kwemari yemabond notes, VaIshmael Kauzani, vakapambwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori vakarorwa zvakaipisisa uye kutsikwa gumbo nemotokari richibva ratyoka. VaKauzani vari muchipatara chemuHarare mu “intensive care unit” munorapwa vanenge vachirwarisa. Mukoma wavo, VaGodfrey Kauzani, vakaurayiwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori muna 2008 apo panonzi pakaurayiwa vechidiki vakawanda veMDC-T munguva yesarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dzechipiri kana kuti run off. Vamwe vechidiki vatanhatu vakasungwawo nemusi weChitatu vachinzi vaikurudzira vanhu kuti vasatambire mabond notes vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso inosvika zana remadhora. Pane vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso, pane mukomana ane makore gumi nemashanu anonzi Costa Zvokusekwa. NeChina vamwe vechikwata cheTajamuka vatatu vanosanganisira VaPromise Mkwananzi vakasungwa neMuvhuro vakapihwawo mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso inosvika madhora mazana maviri. Vose vari kusungwa vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora chikamu chechimakumi matatu nenomwe chemutemo weCriminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act vachinzi vari kukurudzira mhirizhonga uye kuita musarinya. Magweta ari kumirira vanhu ava inhengo dzeZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaObey Shava naVaJeremiah Bamu. VaShava vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyangwe vanhu vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso vari kushaya mari kumabhanga zvopa kuti vasungwe vagare mujeri kwenguva yakareba. No media source currently available

column2: Varwere Votambura Zvichitevera Kuramwa Mabasa Kuri Kuitwa Muzvipatara
column3: Varwere vari kuchema chema zvikuru kuhurumende kuti igadzirise zviri kudiwa nanachiremba kuitira kuti vasarasikirwe nehupenyu hwavo. Varwere vanotiwo kuramwa basa kwavana chiremba kuri kuisa hutano hwavo parumananzombe. Pashanyirwa chipatara cheHarare Hospital nhasi neStudio7 varwere vanorwarisa chete ndivo vange vachibatsirwa vamwe vachinzi vadzokere kumba vozorapwa kana vana chiremba vadzoka kubasa. Amai Sekai Ganyani Mushandu, avo vane mwana ane dambudziko remoyo, vanoti havachaziva zvekuita nemwana wavo uyo anonyorerwa mishonga mwedzi wega wega. Amai Mushandu vati chikumbiro chavo ndechekuti hurumende igadzirise zviri kunetsa kuitira vanaChiremba vadzokere pamabasa. Amai Previous Sachinda, avo vaenda kunorapwa kuHarare Hospital vakadzokera kumba vasina kuwana rubatsiro, vaudza Studio7 kuti varwadziwa zvikuru kudzorerwa kumba vachidzimbikana nemuviri. Vamwe amai varamba kudomwa nezita vane mwana ane mazuva matanhatu azvarwa, pachishandiswa oparesheni sezvo matumbu ake aive akazvimba, vati vana chiremba havasi kuuya nguva dzese kuzowona vana vari muwadhi mavo izvo zvoitawo kuti vatyire hutano hwemwana wavo Mukuru weHarare Central Hospital, Amai Peggy Zvavamwe, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vanachiremba havasati vadzoka kumabasa. Amai Zvavamwe vati vanga vari kupinda mumusangano wekuongorora kuti kuramwa mabasa uku kuri kuvhiringa varwere zvakadii. Munyori mubazi rezveutano, Dr Gerald Gwinji, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuramwa basa kwanachiremba uku kuri kukanganisa mabasa ezveutano. VaGwinji vati bazi ravo richiri kukukurukura nehurumende kuti vangagadzirisa sei dambudziko asi vakatiwo chikumbiro chavo kunana Chiremba ndechekuti dai vakwanisa kudzokera kumabasa hurumende ichigadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Zimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association inoti nhengo dzayo dzinodarika chiuru dziri kuramwa mabasa. Zvichemo zvanachiremba ava zvinosanganisira mari shoma pamwe nekusapiwa mukana wekuti vatenge mota pasina kubhadhariswa mutero kubva kunze kwenyika kuitira kuti vafambe nyore vachienda kubasa. No media source currently available

column2: Mbappe oshuvira Kante
column3: Saint-Germain, Kylian Mbappe, anoti akaedza kukurudzira N’Golo Kante weChelsea kuti auye kuzotambira chikwata chekuLigue 1 apo vaviri ava vaive kumutambo weWorld Cup.   Mbappe, uyo ane makore 19 okuberekwa, akaudza muridzi wePSG Nasser Al-Khelaifi kuti atenge mutambi uyu kubva kuchikwata ichi chekuPremier League.   Kante, uyo akahwina mukombe wePremier League kaviri, ange achinzi ari kudiwa kuParc des Princes mwaka uno uye Mbappe ari kutsigira kutengwa kwemutambi uyu.   “Ndakaudza (Al-Khelaifi) zvakare kuti Kante anenge akatinakira mukamutenga auye kuchikwata chedu,” akaudza France Football.   “Ndakataura naN’Golo pataive kuWorld Cup asi ndisingamumanikidze nekuti ndinoziva zvinoitika kana zvikapinda mumusoro wako zvekuda kutengwa nezvimwe zvikwata.   “Pakupedzisira ndakangoisa mashoko mashoma muhomwe dzake zvandakanyora pakapepa, izvo zvandinoziva akazozviona adzokera kumba kwake.”   Mbappe naKante havasati vadzokera kuzvikwata zvavo zvichitevera kuhwina kwavakaita kumutambo weWorld Cup neFrance nguva pfupi ichangodarika. Vaviri ava vakabatsira Les Blues kuhwina mukombe weWorld Cup kechipiri munhorondo yechikwata ichi mushure memakore 20 zvichitevera kukunda kwavakaita Croatia 4-2 mufainari yemutambo uyu. —SportsMail Football

column2: ‘Mabhinya’ ava kuda Graham Potter
column3: CHIKWATA chenhabvu chekuEngland, cheChelsea chinonzi chiri kuita hurukuro nemurairidzi weBrighton & Hove – Graham Potter – uyo wavanoda kuti agotsiva Thomas Tuchel zvichitevera kudzingwa basa kwaakaitwa nezuro.   Varairidzi vakawanda vanosanganisira Zinedine Zidane naMauricio Pochettino vange vachifungidzirwa kuti vanogona kutsiva Tuchel sevarairidzi ve”Chele” kana kuti “Mabhinya”, asi pane mashoko anoti Potter ndiye ari kudiwa neChelsea.   Chikwata cheBrighton & Hove chakatopa Potter mvumo yekuti akurukure neMabhinya uye zvikafamba zvakanaka, anotarisirwa kunge akagara pabhenji reChelsea svondo rino apo ichasangana neFulham.   Kana Chelsea ikaita chibvumirano naPotter, inotarisirwa kubhadhara mari inosvika 12 miriyoni paunzi yekumutenga kubva kuBrighton.

column2: ZIBAWU Inoti Standard Bank Haina Chido cheKusimudzira Nyika
column3: Sangano rinomirira vashandi vemumabhanga, re Zimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, rinoti Standard Bank iri kuvhara mabhanga ayo mumaguta madiki akaita se Hwange, Chiredzi, Chinhoyi nemamwe, nekuti bhanga iri haridi kubatsira Zimbabwe kuti ibudirire. Mashoko aya anotevera mashoko ebhanga iri ekuti riri kuvhara mabhanga aro mumaguta madiki nekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzehupfumi. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti vashandi vavo vakawanda vari kurasikirwa nemabasa nepamusoro pemaitiro ebhanga iri. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reStandard Bank. No media source currently available

column2: ARTUZ Inocherechedza Zuva reInternational Day of Decent Work Ichikurudzira Kuti Vashandi Vabatwe Zvine Hunhu muMabasa
column3: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, rinoti kodzero yekuti munhu wese ashande basa rine hunhu inofanirwa kusimudzirwa uye kuwanikwa nemunhu wese. Kurudziro iyi inouya apo nhengo dzesangano iri dzabatana nevamwe vashandi pasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rekushanda kune hunhu pasi rose, kana kuti International Day of Decent Work. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti senzira yekucherechedza zuva iri, sesangano vakwanisawo kukurudzira kuhurumende kuti sevashandi vapiwewo mihoro yakaringana inoita kuti vakwanise kurarama, uye vari pamudyandigere vawaniswe mari dzinovararamisawo. VaMasaraure vanotiwo vakwanisa kuungana vachirechedza zuva iri vari mudunhu reMashonaland East vanhu vachiita nhaurirano dzekuti zvii zvingaitwe kuti vashandi vakwanise kurarama. No media source currently available Gurukota rezvemabasa nevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vanotiwo sehurumende havana kucherechedza zuva iri zviri pamutemo, asi vacharicherechedza pavachaparura munguva pfupi iri kutevera chirongwa chavari kuumba chekuti vashandi vange vari pamabasa ane hunhu, che Decent Work Program. No media source currently available Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, munyori mukuru wesangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi pasi rose, reInernational Trade Unions Confederation, ITUC, Amai Sharan Burrow, vati gwaro reITUC regore ra2022 rakaratidza kuti nyika dzakawanda dziri kutyora kodzero dzevashandi, kusanganisira sarudzo dzekuita hurukuro dzemihoro kuburikidza nedzihurumende dzichinyima vashandi mukana. ITUC inoti kubva mugore ra 2005, zvinoburitswa nevashandi mumabasa zvakakwira nezvikamu makumi matatu nemanomwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 37 percent, asi vashandi vachinyimwa zvehupfumi zvinowanikwa kubva mazviri kunyange hazvo vari ivo vanogadzira zvinhu zvinotarisirwa nehupfumi hwedzinyika pamwe nevagari. “Apo vashandi vane masangano anovamirira vari kuenderera mberi nekurwisana nekudzvinyirirwa kwemihoro pasi rose, tinoshandisare zuva reWorld Day for Decent Work iri kukurudzira dzihurumende kuti dzitonge dzichitevera zvinodiwa nevanhu, kwete kuramba dzichimora hupfumi kubva muvanhu dzichipa kumakambani,” Amai Burrow vakadaro. ITUC yakati mitengo yemhando dzemoto, zvekudya uye zvimwe zvinodiwa nevanhu zuva nezuva iri kukwirta nemutowo uri kuisa mamiriyoni evashandi muhurombo, uku vachiudzwa nedzimwe dzihurumende, nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi nevemabhanga kuti kukwidza mihoro kuti vakwanise kurwisana nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu, kana kuti inflation, hazvitambirike. MuAfrica, nyika mbiri dzinoti Egypt neEswatini ndidzo dziri panyika gumi pasi rose rinonzi sesangano reITUC dzinobatwa vashandi zvakaipisisa pasi rose mugore rino ra2022.

column2: Ongororo Yakaitwa neHofisi yaAmai Chiri Inoti Makanzuru Ari Kutadza Kuita Mabasa Awo neMazvo
column3: Mukuru wehofisi yaComptroller and Auditor- General, Amai Mildred Chiri, vanoti makanzuru emaguta nemadhorobha akawanda munyika haasi kuita basa nemazvo akaita sekutakura marara nekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena. Gwaro rakaburitswa nehofisi iyi rinoratidza kuti makunzuru akawanda munyika ari kuita basa asingatevedze mitemo inobata mashandiro emakanzuru aya. Gwaro iri rinoitwo pamusoro pekusatevedza mitemo, makanzuru aya ari kutadza kuita basa nemazvo. GWaro iri rinoti kanzuru yeChitungwiza iri kungopa vanhu nzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba nemabhizimisi pasina mvura, migwagwa nezvimwe zvinodiwa kuvepo nzvimbo isati yavakwa. Kanzuru yeMasvingo inonzi inogaya 30 megalitres dzemvura pazuva asi guta iri richida 48 mega litres pazuva. Kanzuru yeMutare inonzi haiendesi kubhanga mari yese yainowana uye kuGweru makanzura anonzi haasati abhadhara masitendi aakapihwa nemutengo uri pasi pasi kunyange hazvo aisungirwa kunge akabhadhara masitendi aya. Zvimwewo zvakawonekwa inyaya yekuti midziyo inenge yatengwa nemakunzuru inotora gore kana kudarika isati yaendeswa kumakanzuru aya. Sachigaro weUrban Councils Association of Zimbabwe, zvakarre vari meya veGweru, VaJosiah Makombe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanobvumirana nemaonero aAuditor-General, asi vakati zvimwe zvacho zvakatogadziriswa. Asi VaMakombe vati nyaya yekupa vanhu mvura yakakwana nekutakura marara inonetsa kugadzirisa nekuti havasi kuwana rutsigro rwakakwana kubva kuhurumende. Vati mafuta emotokari dzekutakura marara anotengeswa nemari yekunze asi ivo vachibhadharisa mitero nemari yemunyika. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo vakapihwa mvumo yekuti vagari vanoda vabhadhare mitero nemari yekunze, hakuna vari kuita izvi nekuti simba remari yekunze rakadzikira mumabhanga kana zvichienzaniswa nepamukoto. Vati nekuda kwaizvo vanhu vanochinja mari yavo pamukoto vobhadhara mitero kumakunzuru nemari yema RTGS. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano rinomirira vagari vemuMasvingo, Amai Rumbidzao Mugurupira, vaudza Studio 7 kuti gwaro raAG raburitsa pachena zvavanogaro taura kuti hapana chinobatika chiri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo kuratidza kuti vari kubhadhara mitero. Sachigrao veHarare Metropolitan Residents Forum, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vatiwo hurumende inofanira kuvandudza bumbiro remitemo yenyika kuitira kuti makanzuru akwanise kushanda akasanunguka. Vati pari zvino pane kupindira kunoitwa nehurumencde uko kunokanganisa makunzuru aya. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vange vasiri kudaira nhare mbozha yavo. Vachitaura mushure mekutambira mabhajeti emakanzuru aya gore rino vasina kuaderedza, VaMoyo vakati vainge vaita izvi nekuti vaida kuti makanzuru aya awane mari yekuti akwanise kuita mabasa akaita sekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena nekutakura marara nguva dzose. VaMoyo vakatiwo vanotarisira kuti makanzuru achashandisa mari dzekuvandudzwa kwematunhu kana kuti Devolution kusimudzira magariro evanhu. Asi VaMakombe vati makanzuru akatomirira mari idzi nemaziso matsvuku kubva kuhurumende, sezvo asati apihwa mari idzi. No media source currently available

column2: Kushungurudzwa kweVabva Kure Kwoenderera Mberi muSouth Africa
column3: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa zviri kuenderera mberi zvichityidzira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe nezvekune dzimwe nyika muzvipatara nemumisha inogara vazhinji. Izvi zviri kuitika kunyangwe hazvo mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, neChipiri vakashora zvikuru vamwe vanhu vemuSouth Africa vari kuratidzira pane zvimwe zvipatara, vachidzivirira kuti vabvakure varapiwe. VaRamaphosa vakaudza dare reparamende kuti maitiro aya anokonzera kuvengwa nekurwiswa kwevabvakure uye haasi pamutemo. Vakati South Africa inyika ine hutongo hwejekerere asi ine dambudziko revabvakure vane magwaro ekugara munyika iyi nevasina, vachiti kuvhundutsira nekushungurudza vabvakure vose hakubvumidzwi nemutemo wenyika. . Chikwta chinonzi Operation Dudula chiri kuratidzira pachipatara che Kalafong, muguta reAtteridgerville riri pedyo neguta re Pretoria, chichirambidza kupinda muchipatara kwevarwere vasiri zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. Asi VaRamaphosa vakati mapurisa ari kurwisa kupedza nekumisa vabvakure vari muSouth Africa zvisiri pamutemo, vachiti zviri kuitwa nevanhu veOperation Dudula hazvienderani nezvinangwa zvehutongo hwe jekerere, vachiti vanhu vemuSouth Africa havavengi vabvakure uye vanovatambira zvakanaka. Vanodzidzisa zvematongerwo enyika paWellesley College kuMassachusetts, Muzvinafundo Chipo Dendere, vanoti VaRamaphosa vakamanikidzwa kutaura izvi zvichitevera mabasa esangano reOperation Dudula. Muzvinafundo Dendere vanoti nyaya iyi inogona kupedzwa nenhaurirano pakati pehurumende yeSouth Africa nehurumende yeZimbabwe, pamwe nemapato anopikisa nevamwe vane chekuita nezve magariro evanhu mu Zimbabwe. No media source currently available

column2: Dunhu reGauteng Roronga Kudzika Mitemo Inosarura Vabvakure
column3: Mukuru wedunhu reGauteng muJohannesburg, VaDavid Makhura, vakazivisa neChipiri kuti nekufamba kwenguva, dunhu ravo richadzika mutemo unorambidza vekune dzimwe nyika kutanga mabhizimisi mudunhu ravo, sezvo izvi zviri kutadzisa zvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa, kuti zviwanewo chekubata. VaMakhura vakataura mashoko aya mudare ravo redunhu, apo vakange vachipindura mibvunzo yaibva kune dzimwe nhengo dzedare ravo. Vanoona nezvekodzero dzavanhu vanoti mashoko akataurwa naVaMakhura anokonzeresa kuti pave neruvengo pakati pevanobva kunze kwenyika nezvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa. Mumwe muzvinabhizimusi muSouth Africa neZimbabwe, VaBrighton Sangore, vanoti mashoko akadai anobata zvizvarwa zvisiri zvemuSouth Africa, agara achitaurwa kwenguva yakareba muSouth Africa. Sachigaro weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti mashoko akadai haafanirwe kunge achibva pamuromo pemunhu anonyarikana saVaMakhura. VaMavhinga vanoti mashoko aVaMakhura anotyora kodzero dzevanhu uye handicho chaive chido chevaimbove mutungamiri weSouth Africa, mushakabvu Nelson Mandela. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, VaGabriel Shumba, vanotiwo mashoko aVaMakhura anotyora mitemo yenyika, iyo isina rusarura pakuvambwa kwemabhizinesi. VaShumba vanoti kana vekunze vachivhura mabhizimusi muSouth Africa, vanenge vachibatsira kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika iyi. VaShumba vanoti VaMakhura vanofanirwa kukumbira ruregerero kuzvizvarwa zvose zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa. VaShumba vanoti sangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum riri kuita hurukuro nemamwe masangano akasiyanasiyana, senzira yekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa. Mashoko aVaMakhura anouya mushure mokunge zvitoro zvezvizvarwa zvekunze kweSouth Africa zvapazwa nekupiswa, ukuwo vatyairi vemagonyeti vachimbunyikidzwa kodzero dzavo, vamwe vachimanikidzwa kusiya basa nesangano rinozviti All Truck Drivers Foundation. Sangano reHuman Rights Watch rinoti vanhu mazana maviri vafa mumhirizhonga yemuSouth Africa kubva muna Kurume gore rapera, vazhinji vavo vari vatyairi vanobva kune dzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

column2: Haye osendeka tsiva
column3: (37) ari kutarisirwa kusendeka magirovhosi ake etsiva izvo zvichamuona achizorora kubva mumutambo uyo waatamba kwemakore anodarika 16. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ange achibva kuruzhinji ekuti shasha iyi ngaichisiya tsiva.Haye akataura padandemutande reTwitter svondo rino kuti ramagwana rake acharizivisa nekuchimbidza uye SportsMail iri kuziva kuti akaronga kuti achisiya mutambo uyu zvichitevera kukundwa kwaakaitwa kaviri kakatevedzana naTony Bellew.   Vazhinji vanoti shasha iyi yaifanirwa kuve yakasiya tsiva paakakundwa naBellew pekutanga gore radarika, apo paakakuvara gumbo rake, uye kuzorikitwa kwaakaitwa zvakare mwedzi uno ndiko kwave kumutuma kuti achisiya mutambo uyu izvo zvakarakidza kuti haasisiriye mutambi waaive kare apo akahwina bhande reWBA heavyweight mugore ra2009.   Mabhande aakahwina mumakore masere ekutanga mumutambo uyu acharangarirwa zvikuru mumakore anotevera sezvo Haye akave mumwe wevatambi vetsiva vepamusoro kwemakore akawanda. Asi anoteverwa nenyaya dzakawanda dzinosvibisa zita rake kubva pakunyepera kutyoka chigumwe zvichitevera kukundwa kwaakaitwa naWladimir Klitschko uye kurwa naDereck Chisora pamberi pevatori venhau (press conference) zvichitevera kukundwa kwakaitwa Chisora naVitali Klitschko mugore ra2019. – SportsMail boxing

column2: NDAKARASA MUKANA: CHARLES MANYUCHI
column3: SHASHA yetsiva – Charles Manyuchi – anoti akarasa mukana mukuru mugore ra2017 apo akakundwa naQudratillo Abduqaxorov wekuUzbekistan, kuSingapore izvo zvakamuona achitorerwa bhande raaive naro reWorld Boxing Council Silver Tittle asi kudzoka kwaaita ane chishuwo chekurwa nedzimwe shangwiti dzepasi rose dzinosanganisira Floyd Mayweather (Jr).   Kukundwa kwakaitwa Manyuchi mumutambo uyu kwakamudzorera kumashure sezvo akange ave pedyo nekukwanisa kurwira mabhande makuru etsiva akadai seWBC Championship uye nekusangana nevatambi vane mukurumbira vakaita saAmir Khan wekuEngland, Manny Pacquiao wekuPhilippines naShawn Porter wekuAmerica. Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Manyuchi anoti iye zvino ave munzira kugadzirisa zvakakanganisika kumashure uye achiri nemukana wekudzokera zvakare pamusoro mumutambo uyu.   “Ndakarasa mukana paye pandakakundwa kuSingapore naAbduqaxorov nekuti dai ndakahwina mutambo uyu ndakange ndatosvika pedyo nekutosangana nanaPacquiao uye nedzimwe shasha dzetsiva dzepasi rose. Zvakaitika hazvo asi ndiri kuzvigadzirisa nekuti chishuvo changu kuti ndirwe naManny Pacquaiao, Amir Khan kana naFloyd Mayweather (Jr) chaiye nekuti ndinoti dai adzoka mutsiva nekuti ndiri kuda kumbosangana nayewo,” anodaro.   Manyuchi mwedzi yadarika akahwina mutambo wake weRestoration Fight naPablo Ezequiel Acosta wekuArgentina ndokuhwina mabhande maviri eUBC neGBU izvo zvakamusimudza. Parizvino ave kutarisira kusangana naNordine Orik wekuFrance mwedzi unotevera uye mutambo uyu anofanirwa kuuhwina kuti akwanise kudzokera padanho raaive kare.   Manyuchi anoti mutambo wake naAcosta kudai asina kuuhwina ndipo paibva paperera kutamba kwake tsiva sezvo wainge wakamukoshera mukudzoka kwake.   “Mutambo wangu naAcosta ndiwo wandisvitsa nhasi pandave iye zvino, dai ndakakundwa zvingadai zvakabva zvaperera ipapo asi ndakahwina saka mukana uchiripo uye ndiri kutarisira mutambo uri kutevera naOrik. Ndozviziva kuti ndikauhwina aihwa ndenge ndadzokera pandaive chaipo uye iye zvino ndiri kuvimbisa kuti zvakaitika kare hazvichadzokorodzeke.   “Ndave kumberi chaiko uye ndiri kubata basa sebasa nekuti ndiri kuhwina, handidi kukundwa zvakare,” anodaro.   Muchinda uyu anoti akavamba boka rake iro ari kudzidzisa vatambi vetsiva vari kusimukira rinonzi Charles Manyuchi Boxing Academy.   Vamwe vatambi vari muboka iri vacharwa mitambo yakasiyana apo shasha iyi ichatatsurana naOrik musi wa28 Gunyana kuHarare International Conference Centre.

column2: Nyanzvi Dzokurudzira Hurumende Kuti Igadzirise Dambudziko reMari Munyika
column3: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira hurumende kuti ikasarovanisa misoro nevashandi nevashandirwi, Zimbabwe ichadzokera kumakore ekuma 2007 uko mitengo yezvinhu yaikwira katatu pazuva. Nemusi weMuvhuro, Zimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats yakazivisa kuti inflation yemunyika yakwira kusvika pazvikamu makumi matatu nechiga chimwe kubva muzana kana kuti 31.01% kubva pazvikamu makumi maviri nezviga makumi masere nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 20,85%. Aka ndekekutanga mitengo yezvinhu ichikwira zvakadai mukati memakore gumi. Zimstats inoti mitengo yezvinhu zvakaita sechingwa, zvinwiwa nehembe ndizvo zvapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu ikwire. Kukwira kwemitengo uku kuri kupesana zvikuru nemashoko egurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, avo vainge vati inflation mukupera kwegore yaizopera iri pazvikamu makumi maviri nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 25%. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi muAmerica ichidzidzisa paJohns Hopkins University, Muzvinafundo Steve Hanke, vanoti inflation yemuZimbabwe yakatodarika zana kare kare uye yananga kumakore ekuma2008 apo vanhu vakaomerwa nehupenyu zvisina mukare akamboona. Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, Doctorr Simba Makoni, vanoti zvainge zviri pachena kuti inflation ichakwira zvakanyanya nenyaya yemashandisirwo ari kuitwa mari munyika zvikuru kuda kuenzanisa dhora rekuAmerica nemari yemaRTGS nemabond. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwao nenyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Godfrey Kanyenze. Munyori mukuru musangano reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti vashandi vakaomerwa zvakanyanya sezvo zvinhu zvaramba zvichiita chamurambamhuru. Ko zviri kunzi naVaNcube vakwanisa kuisa mari parutivi inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe emadhora mukushanda kwavo? Vachipindura, Dr Makoni vati chiri kunetsera hurumende inyaya yekungoita gudziramukanwa. Kugadzirisa dambudziko iri, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vasiyane nemari dzebond notes nemaRTGs uye kumutsiridza nyaya dzekurima kuti nyika isarasikirwe nemari yekunze. Vamwe vari kukurudzirawo kuti hurumende igadzirise hukama hwayo nedzimwe nyika kunyanya America nenyika dziri muEU kuti isabatwe seyakageza negoka munyama. No media source currently available

column2: Vanachiremba Vanoti Mamasiki Ashandiswa Asabatwabatwa Kunze Kwekuarasa
column3: Zvichitevera kutaurwa pachena kwekuti vamwe vanhu vari kunhonga zvinoshandiswa kuvhara mhuno nemiromo, mamasiki, (face masks) anoshandiswa nevanhu mukudzivirira chirwere che coronavirus, bazi rehurumende rinoona nezvehutano rakurudzira vanhu paTwitter paro kuti vanhu vachekecheke mamasiki avashandisa vasati vaarasa kuitira kuti vamwe vanhu vasaanhonga vachiawacha kuti vazoatengesa zvekare. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ekuti vamwe vanhu varikufamba vachinhonga mamasiki akasviba awa, vachiawacha vachizoatengesera kuvanhu zvekare. PaTweeter pavo, bazi rehurumende rinoona nezvehutano rinokurudzira vanhu kuti vatore mamasiki avo avashandisa vachiachekacheka vasati vamarasa kudzivirira kuti vamwe vanhu vasazoanonga vachiatengesa zvekare. Asi vamwe vanachiremba vanoti bazi rehurumende rezvehutano ririkukurudzira vanhu kuita zvinovapinza munjodzi dzehutano, vachiti mamasiki ashandiswa anenge ave tsvina isingafanirwi kubatwa asi inofanirwa kuraswa isina kubatwa nemaoko kunyange nemuridzi wayo. Dr Simbiso Ranga, vanoshanda mudunhu reNorth Carolina, muAmerica, vanoti kana ‘face mask” yashandiswa, haifanirwi kubwatwa kunze nemuridziwayo asi achiibata zvakanaka uye akachenjera paanoirasa nekuti ndiyo yakabata nekutakura hutachiona hwese hwange huchida kupinda mumuviri wake. Dr Ranga vati kana iri masiki yako unogona kuibata zvakanaka, pakuiwacha nepakuiwomesa kuti ugoishandisa zvekare, iwe muridzi wayo. No media source currently available

column2: Dare reSeneti Rinotambira Kudomwa kwaAmai Amanda Bennett seMukuru Kana Kuti CEO weBoka reNhau reUSAGM
column3: Dare reseneti muAmerica nemusi weChina rakatambira kudomwa kwaAmai Amanda Bennett semukuru, kana kuti Chief Executive Officer mutsva weboka rehurumende yeAmerica rakazvimirira rinotepfenyura nhau nekuburitsa mashoko, reUnited States Agency for Global Media, kana kuti USAGM. Vachizivisa nezvekudomwa kwaAmai Bennett uku, vakafanobata chigaro chaChief Executive Officer veUSAGM, Amai Kelu Chao, vakati Amai Bennett mutori wenhau ane hunyanzvi hunoratidzwa kuburikidza nekuwana kwavo mubairo wePulitzer Prize kaviri. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti munhu ari kuunza pachigaro ichi ruzivo rwunodarika makore makumi mana rwekuferefetwa kwenhau muAmerica pamwe nekunze kweAmerica, ruzivo rwekutungamira boka remabhizimusi, uye kutungamira muhurumende. Amai Chao vakati chakanyanya kukosha ndechekuti Amai Bennett vanogoverana nevamwe kuzvipira kwakadzama kwekutorwa kwenhau kwepamusoro, chidokwadokwa chekutorwa kwenhau dzechokwadi uye kwakasununguka, kuzvipira kuchengetedzeka kwevatori venhau nevateereri vavo, nekusarerekera mativi pakuzadzisa zvisungo zvemashandiro eboka reUSAGM. Amai Chao vakati kutambirwa kwaAmai Bennett nedare reseneti mucherechedzo wekukosha kweboka reUSAGM mukuwanisa vanhu nhau dzechokwadi uye kutsigira rusununguko nehutongo hwejekerere pasi rose.

column2: Simudzirai nhabvu yevechidiki’
column3: ZVIKWATA zvenhabvu zvinokwikwidza muDivision One kana muPremier League zvokurudzirwa kuti zvikoshese vatambi vechidiki nechinangwa chekusimudzira matarenda avo kuti vagozove vatambi vemangwana.   Kurudziro iyi yakapihwa nasachigaro weNorthern Region Division One, Martin Kweza, achiti kuti nhabvu yemuno ibudirire zvakakosha kuti zvikwata zvipe mikana kune vechidiki.   Anoti kuNorthern Region, zvikwata zvose zvinokwikwidza vakazvitaurira kuti zvinofanirwa kuve zvine vatambi vashanu kana kudarika vane makore ari pasi pe18 ekuberekwa avo vavanoda kuona vachitamba masvondo ese.   Izvi, anodaro Kweza, zvinobatsira kuti nhabvu irambe ichikura pamwe nekuti vatambi ava vagofambira mberi mumutambo uyu.   Anoti kuwanza vatambi vechikuru muzvikwata hakubatsire sezvo zvichidzosera nhabvu kumashure uye nekushaisa vechidiki mikana yekusimukira mumutambo uyu.   “Donzvo redu isu kuvaka vatambi vechidiki kuti vasimukire vagotimirira vachienda kunotambira kunze kwenyika kune zvikwata zvakasiyana. Ndiko kusaka isu tichikurudzira zvikwata zvose zvinokwikwidza muNorthern Region kuti ngazvive nevatambi vashanu kana kudarika vane makore ari pasi pe18 ekuberekwa nekuti chatinoda kuona vechidiki vachivakwa tarenda ravo.   “Kungowanza madhara ega hakubatsire uye hakuna kwamunosvika nechikwata nekuti madhara anenge achembera. Ndiko kusaka muchiona kuti zvikwata zvinobva muNorthern Region pazvinopinda muPSL zvinosvika zvichitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura nekuti chikwata chinenge chakaumbwa chine vechidiki vakawanda.   “Tinoona kuti madhara mazhinji kana apera anouya kuzopedzera nguva yavo muDivision One voshaisa vechidiki mukana. Asi tinoti ipai mukana kune vechidiki uye madhara musamarase zvachose nekuti vanodiwa kudzikamisa vechidiki nekubatsira kuvaumba,” anodaro Kweza.   Pari zvino pazvikwata zvinokwikwidza muPremier League, zvitatu zvinoti Ngezi Platinum Stars, Harare City neHerentals ndizvo zvine vechidiki vanokwikwidza muNorthern Region Division One.   Zvikwata zvevechidiki izvi zvnoti Ngezi Platinum Under-19, Harare City Curbs neHerentals U-20.   Kuchitiwo Highlanders ndiyo yega ine chikwata chinokwikwidza muSouthern Region Division One.   Kweza anoti kana zvikwata zvakawanda zvemuPSL zvikave nevatambi vanokwikwidza muDivision One zvinobatsirikana kuburikidza nekubika vatambi uye hazvizombonetsekane nekutenga vatambi.   “Zvikwata zvose zvemuPSL zvikaita vechidiki vanokwikwidza muDivision One, zvinobatsira kubika vatambi vakawanda uye hakuna chikwata chinozombonetsekana nekutenga vatambi nekuti vanenge varipo vakawanda.   “Saka kurudziro iri kuzvikwata zvose kuti itaiwo zvikwata zvenyu zvevechidiki zviri muDivision One uye koshesai kubika vatambi vechidiki,” anodaro Kweza.

column2: ‘Batsirai Dynamos’ . . . zvave kuda Mwari: Romario
column3: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vezvikwata zvakasiyana vokurudzirwa kuti vabatane nezvikwata zvavo mukuzvibatsira kupedza matambudziko azvinenge zvichisangana nawo kwete kukonzera nyonga-nyonga nekupindira munyaya dzine chekuita nezvehutungamiriri.   Mashoko aya akataurwa nemutungamiri wevatsigiri veDynamos, Benjamin Munzira, achiti harisi basa revatsigiri kutaura kuti hutungamiri hwechikwata ngaushandurwe asi kutsigira vatambi nhabvu.   Mwaka uno Dynamos haisi kunyatsotamba zvinonwisa mvura izvo zvaiona ichihwina mitambo mitatu chete kubva pa12 yayatamba ndokuita mangange mitatu zvakare uye ikarakashwa mitanhatu.   Svondo radarika, chikwata ichi chakakundwa neFC Platinum 2-0 apo murairidzi wacho – Biggie Zuze – akashoropodza vatungamiriri veDeMbare achiti vanofanirwa kupa vatambi mari kuti vatambe zvemhando yepamusoro.   “Chandinoziva kuti vatsigiri venhabvu harisi basa ravo kuti vataure kuti hutangamiri ngaubve, kwete izvozvo hatizvitambire. Hutungamiri ngausiiwe hwakadaro, chedu kutsigira zvikwata chete zvakadaro,” anodaro Munzira.   Nguva yadarika, rimwe bandiko revatsigiri veDynamos rakakurudzira vatsigiri vechikwata ichi kuti vasaende kunochitsigira kusvikira hutungamiri hwechikwata ichi hwashandurwa.   Asi Munzira anoti nzira yakatorwa nevatsigiri ava handiyo uye inotaridza kurasikwa kwavo gwara.   “Vatsigiri hatifanirwe kurasika kudaro, harisi basa redu kutaura mashoko akadai aya. Isu ngatitsigire chikwata sezvachiri kwete kuda kukonzera nyonga-nyonga, kwete.   “Dai tiri kutsvaga nzira dzekubatsira zvikwata zvedu chete. Zvikwata zvese zvakaomerwa, zvingori zviviri chete zvine mari FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum ndiko saka zvichigara zvichihwina nekuti morarari yevatambi vavo inenge yakasimuka,” anodaro.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa nemutungamiri weDynamos Kadoma Chapter, Hurbet Manyowa, achiti nehuwandu hwevatsigiri vezvikwata zvakasiyana – kunyanya Dynamos – vanogona kubatsira nezvakasiyana kusanganisira mari izvo zvinobvisa mutoro unenge une hutungamiri hwezvikwata izvi.   “Isu Dynamos tinoziva kuti tine vatsigiri vakawanda chaizvo, nehuwandu hwedu kana tikati munhu wega abvise $1 kana $0,50c pamwe tinounganidza mari yakawanda chaizvo yoenda kunobatsira vatambi vechikwata chedu.   “Zvino vamwe ndivo vanongona kutaura chete asi tikasvika pakuti ngatibatsirei chikwata havawanikwe ipapo. Basa kukurudzira vamwe kuti vasauye kunhandare kuzotsigira chikwata, zvino zvinobatsirei zvamunenge maita?   “Zvinozivikanwa nemunhu wese kuti seDynamos chaiyo inotorarama nemari yapagedhi saka mukasaenda kubhora kwacho zvino hapana chaichawana, vave kukuvara vatambi manje ivo vatiri kuda kubatsira,” anodaro Manyowa.   Zvakadaro, mumwe mutsigiri mukuru weDynamos, Chris “Romario” Musekiwa, anoti kudzikira kuri kuita chikwata ichi kwave kuda nyasha dzaMwari chaidzo.   “Zviri kuitika izvi zvinowanikwa, zvichadarika, asi zviri kurwadza hazvo wena. Zvave kuda nyasha dzaMwari chaidzo. Hutungamiri hwechikwata ichi ngavape murairidzi wacho Biggie Zuze mari atenge vatambi chaivo uye ngavapewo vatambi mari vafare,” anodaro Musekiwa.

column2: Hama neShamwari dzaVaItai Dzamara Dzoratidzira
column3: Munin’ina waVaItai Dzamara, mutori wenhau anorwira kodzero dzevanhu akapambwa gore rapera, VaPatson Dzamara neshamwari dzavo kusanganisa VaKumbirai Mafunda vanova sachigaro wesangano reMISA-Zimbabwe vachishandawo nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vakaratidzira murunyararo neChitatu muAfrica Unity Square muHarare. VaPatson Dzamara vakasvika makore makumi matatu ekuberekwa nemusi weChitatu asi vakabva vatora mukana uyu kuti varatidzire. VaPatson Dzamara vakanyora paFacebook peji yavo kuti vaipemberera zuva ravo rekuberekwa asi vasina mufaro mumoyo. “Nhasi ndasvitsa makore makumi matatu uye ndinoda kutenda Mwari nechipo chehupenyu. Apo ndinenge ndichipemberera zuva rekuzvarwa kwangu, mufaro wangu uri kukundwa nekudzimbikana kwekutsakatika kwakaita Itai Dzamara. Asi ndine chivimbo chekuti Mwari vachandipa mukana wekusangana nemukoma wangu pasi pano. Ndinovimbisa kuita zvose zvandinogona kuzadzikisa zvido zvemusiki, zvenyika yangu uye zvepasi rino kubatsira vamwe. Ndokunzwisisa kwangu kuda nyika yako nehutungamiri.” VaDzamara vakapambwa muna Kurume kuGlen View apo vaigerwa. Mapurisa akanzi nedare repamusoro atsvage VaDzamara asi kusvika parizvino vanoti hapana humbowo hwekuti aripi. Asi magweta nehama dzavo vanoti mapurisa haasi kutsvaga VaDzamara nemwoyo wose. VaDzamara nevamwe vavo vairatidzira muAfrica Unity Square vachikurudzira mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe kuti vaende pamudyandigere nekuti vainge vakundikana basa.

column2: Zvizvarwa Zviri Kunze Zvokwira Matare neNyaya yeKuvhota
column3: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika svondo rapera zvakakwira kudare zvichida kuti rirase zvikamu zvemutemo une chekuita nesarudzo unorambidza kuti vari kunze kwenyika vavhote vari munyika dzavagere. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa neUnited Kingdom zvakamirirwa nemagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu zvakaenda kudare repamusorosoro, reConstitutional Court, zvichipikisa mutemo wesarudzo uyu, zvichiti bumbiro remitemo idzva ravepo rinozvipa mukana wekuti zvivhote musarudzo dzinoitwa munyika. Vanhu ava vari kumirirwa neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, Pari zvino vari kunze kwenyika vachiita mabasa ehurumende kana kushandira masangano makuru akazvimirira ndivo chete vanobvumidzwa kuvhota vari munyika dzavagere. Muna Chikunguru wegore rino dare rimwechetero rakarasa imwe nyaya yakadai yakanga yakwidzwa nechimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuSouth Africa muna 2013, richiti hurumende haimanikidzwe pamutemo kuisa nzvimbo dzekuvhotera kunze kwenyika. Mutongi wedare repamusoro soro, Chief Justice Luke Malaba, vakati zvizvarwa zvose zvakasarudza kugara kunze kwenyika zvakasununguka kudzoka kumusha kunovhota munguva dzesarudzo. Hurumende yakazvisawo zvakare kuti haina zvikwanisiro zvekuti iise nzvimbo dzekuti vari kunze vavhotere, danho rinoonekwa nevanopikisa senzira yekurambidza vazhinji vevari kunze, avo vanoonekwa nehurumende sevanoipikisa, kuvhota. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzeavnhu vachishanda neHuman Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti danho rakatorwa nezvizvarwa zviri kunze kwenyika iri rakakosha zvikuru sezvo bumbiro remitemo idzva richipa munhu wese kodzero dzekuvhota. VaMavhinga vanoti kunyange hazvo mutongo wakapiwa muna Chikunguru wakarambidza kuti vanhu vavhote vari kunze kwenyika, nyaya iyoyo yakanga yakwidzwa kudare pachipikiswa mutemo waive mubumbiro rakare. No media source currently available

column2: Masimba eParamende eKutonga Nhengo Dzayo Ovandudzwa
column3: Hurongwa hwekuwandudza mitemo yenyika kuti ifambirane nebumbiro idzva remitemo hunonzi hwuri kuratidza kufamba negwara zvichitevera kugazetwa kwebhiri reGeneral Laws Amendment Bill svondo rapera. Bhiri iri rinonzi riri kuda kuti mitemo ingangosvika zana nemakumi mashanu, kusanganisira mutemo uchatapudza masimba edare reparamende mukuranga kwaro nhengo dzinenge dzatsautsira, ivandudzwe. Bhiri iri rinonzi riri kuda kuti paramende itorerwe masimba ekuendesa kujeri munhu anenge atsautsira, asi kuti abhadhariswe faindi, kana kuti pane dzimwe mhosva, paramende itsvage rubatsiro rwehofisi yemuchuchisi mukuru wenyika, kwete kuti iyo paramende itonge nhengo iyi. Mukokeri wenhengo dzeMDC T mudare reparamende, VaInnocent Gonese, vanoti kunyange hazvo vasati vaona bhiri iri, vanotsigira pfungwa yekuti matare edzimhosva atore iwo masimba ekuranga nhengo dzinenge dzatsautsira, kwete kuti vadare varangane pachavo. VaGonese vanoti dzimwe nguva vadare muparamende vanotonga mhosva vachitarisa kuti munhu abuda mumba maani kana kuti ane ruvara rwakadii. Nyaya inouya mupfungwa dzevakawanda ndeye vaive mumiriri weChimanimani mudare iri, VaRoy Bennett veMDC-T, avo vakakandwa mujeri mugore ra 2005 vachipomerwa mhosva yekurova vaive gurukota rezvemitemo panguvayo, VaPatrick Chinamasa. Paramende yakakanda VaBennett mujeri kwegore rose, danho rakaonekwa nevakawanda senzira yekupfidzisa vanopikisana nebato reZanu PF. Asi VaGonese vanoti zvanga zvatora nguva yakanyanya kureba pasati pabatanidzwa mitemo iyi, vachiti izvi zvaifanirwa kunge zvakaitika kare pakangotambirwa bumbiro remitemo idzva. Bhiri iri rave kutarisirwa kuverengwa muparamende kekutanga risati razeyiwa nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemitemo. No media source currently available

column2: Dare reDzimhosva Rinoramba Kuti VaNguwaya Vabhadhariswe Mari yeChibatiso
column3: Dare ramejisitireti muHarare rarasa chikumbiro chamuzvinabhimisisi ane mutauro mukuru munyika, VaDelish Nguwaya, chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo panyaya mbiri dzavari kupomerwa. VaNguwaya vari kupomerwa mhosva dzekukorovhera hurumende kuti ipinde muchibvumirano chekutenga mishonga kubva kumbani yekunze yavanomirira muZimbabwe, yeDrax Consult SAGL. Mutongi wedare, Amai Vongai Muchuchuti, vati VaNguwaya vadzoke kudare musi wa 30 Chikumi, asi pose apa vanenge vari mutirongo. Amai Muchuchuti vati vanobvumirana nevachuchusi panyaya iyi kuti kana VaNguwaya vakabhadhara mari yechibatiso vanogona kuvhiringidza kuferefetwa kwenyaya iyi uye vanogona kutiza munyika sezvo mhaka yavakapara yakakura chose. Vatiwo vamwe vavanonzi vakapara navo mhosva iyi vari kunze kwenyika. VaNguwaya vanonzi vakapara mhosva iyi pamwe nemuridzi wekambani yeDrax Consult, LIir Dedja, uyo anonzi ari kuItaly kana kuti kuti Hungary. Rimwe remagweta aVaNguwaya, VaTafadzwa Hungwe, vanoti dare raona VaNguwaya semunhu asingavimbike sezvo vakomboita dzimwe nyaya dzekukorovhera vanhu nguva yapfuura. Vatiwo havana kufara nemutongo wedare uye vanovimba kuti dare repamusoro richave nemuono wakasiyana panyaya. VaNguwaya, avo vanomirira kambani yeDrax Consult SAGL neDrax International, vakusungwa nemusi weChishanu chapfuura vachipomerwa mhosva yekutsotsa kambani yehurumende inoita zvekutenga mishonga yeNatpharm kuita chibvumirano chekutenga mishonga kukambani yavanomirira inokosha mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica. Vachuchusi panyaya iyi vanoti VaNguwaya vakanyepa kuti kambani iyi inogadzira mishonga izvo zvakaita kuti mapazi ehutano, nebazi remari ape NatPharm mvumo yekushanda neDrax. Asi VaNguwaya vari kuramba mhosva dzavari kupomerwa. Magweta avo anoti ivo semumiriri weDrax havana chavakatadza uye vachatura kudare humbowo hunoratidza kuti Dejda uyo akatombuuya munyika akaonana nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ndiye ainyora nekusaina matsamba ekutsvaga basa rekutengesa mushonga kubazi rezvehutano. Magweta aya anotiwo ane humbowo hunoratidza kuti Drax yakapihwa basa kuNatpharm mushure mekunge bazi rezvemari raita ongororo rikaona kuti kambani iyi yainge yakachena. VaHungwe vanoti kunyange VaNguwaya vaive ivo vaisaina matsamba ekutsvaga basa kubazi rezvehutano, hapana nhema dzakataurwa mutsamba idzi nekuti kambani yeDrax inoita mabasa akawanda kusanganisira kutengesa mishonga. Vatiwo pachibvumirano cheDrax neNatpharm, Drax yakabuda pachena kuti mishonga yainotengesa yaiiwana kupi uye hapana kana nhema dzakataurwa muchibvumirano ichi. Mutitikitiva ari kuita nyaya iyi akaudza dare kuti vakatanga kuferefeta nyaya iyi mushure mekunge bazi rezvehutano, raratidza kusafara nechibvumirano cheDrax neNatpharm. Asi magweta aVaNguwaya anoti vane humbowo hunoratidza kuti mapurisa emuno akatanga kufererfeta nyaya iyi mushure mekunge sangano remapurisa pasi rese reInterpol ranyorera kuZimbabwe Republic Police richida rubatsiro pakuongorora kuti mamiriyoni maviri emadhora ekuAmerica aiinge aiswa mubhanga reDrax kuHungary yainge iri yei. Interpol yaifungidzira kuti paive nekusafambiswa kwemari zvakanaka kana kuti money laundering sezvo Drax isina basa rayaiita raizikanwa kuti iwane mari yakawanda kudai. Mushure maizvozvo hurumende yakabva yamisa chibvumirano cheDrax neNatpharm. Svondo rapfuura mapurisa akabvunzurudza vakuru vakuru kuNatpharm, bazi rezvehutano pamwe nebazi rezvemari uye vazhinji vavo vanotarisira kupa humbowo kana kusungwa nekuda kwenyaya iyi. VaNguwaya vakabuda mumifananidzo yakawanda vaine mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Auxilia Mnangagwa, pamwe nevana vaVaMnangagwa, Shaun na Collins. Mifananidzo iyi yakakonzera mitauro yakawanda mu social media vamwe vachiti zvose zviri kuitwa naVaNguwaya, vari kutsigirwa nemhuri yemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

column2: MDC Alliance Inoshora SADC Pakusaita Hurukuro yeZviri Kunetsa muZimbabwe
column3: Zvichitevera kupera kwemusangano wevatungamiri venyika dzeSADC pasina zvataurwa pamusoro pezviri kuitika muZimbabwe, bato guru rinopikisa, reMDC Alliance, rinoti zvinorishamisa kuti vatungamiri veSADC vakaregera kukurukura zviri kunetsa muZimbabwe kunyange hazvo mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vakaona zvakakodzera kutuma nhumwa dzavo ku Zimbabwe kunoita hurukuro pamusoro penyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Mugwaro ravatumira kuvatori venhau, vanoona nezvekudyidzana nevekunze mubato reMDC Alliance, Muzvare Gladys Hlatywayo, vanoti hurumende yaVaEmerson Mnangagwa iri kushandisa dambudziko re COVID-19 senzira yekudzvanyirira vanhu munyika. Muzvare Hlatywayo vanoti vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, vatori venhau, magweta, vanomirira vashandi nevemasangano anomirira vanhu, vemakereke nevemapato anokwikwidza vanoshungurudzwa apo vachiita mabasa avo zviri pasi pemutemo. Muzvare Hlatywayo vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo richaramba richiedza kuita hurukuro neSADC, pamwe chete nevatungamiri venyika dziri musangano iri nevamwe, kusvika nyaya yeZimbabwe yagadziriswa. No media source currently available  Asi sachigaro vebato re Zanu-PF muNorth America, VaRegis Charumbira, vanoramba mashoko ese ataurwa mugwaro reMDC Alliance, vachiti chirwere cheCOVID-19 hachisi chekutamba nacho, naizvozvo hurumende inoisa mirairo inodzikisa mafambiro evanhu kuti ibatsire mukuchengetedza hupenyu hwevanhu vayo.  VaCharumbira vanoti SADC haina kukurukura pamusoro peZimbabwe nekuti muZimbabwe hamuna dambudziko rinokodzera kukurukurwa. No media source currently available

column2: Caps United Inoti Inoda Kutevera Tsoka dzeMamelodi Sundowns
column3:
Mumusha weCaps United hamusi kudaidzwa anonzwa nemhemberero. Mhemberero iri kuenderera mberi mumusha weCaps United mushure mekunge chikwata ichi chakatora mukombe weCastle Lager Premier Soccer League kwapera makore gumi nerimwechete vachikundikana. Muridzi weCaps United VaFarai Jere vanoti vatotanga kutsvaga mari yekutamba mumakundano emuAfrica egore rinouya eCaf Champions League. VaJere vanoti chinangwa chavo ndechekuita zvakaitwa neMamelodi Sundowns yekuSouth Africa iyo yakatora mukombe uyu gore rino. Vatsigiri vechikwata ichi havasi kudaidzwa vachinzwa nemufaro mushure mekutora mukombe wakakosha uyu mumwe wavo VaFadzai Muchichwa vachiti nguva yanga yarebesa vasina kumbofara. Caps United yakapedza iine mapoinzi makumi matanhatu nematatu, maviri pamusoro peFC Platinum mushure mekurova Chapungu 1-0 mumutambo wavo wekugumisira kuAscot Stadium nemugovera. Mumwe mutsigiri wechikwata ichi VaMisheck Mwayera vanoti varikufara zvikuru nezvakaitika izvi mushure memakore anodarika gumi vchitatarika Murairidzi wemaGreen Machina Lloyd Chitembwe anoti nguva yakadai inofadza zvikuru zvekuti ari kufara kuve mumwe wemhuri iri kupemberera kubudirira kwavo. Chitembwe ndiye aimbova mutambi wekutanga weCaps United kutora mukombe weLigi achirairidza chikwata ichi. Cricket Chikwata cheZimbabwe chemaChevrons nemusi weSvondo chakadamburwa neSri Lanka nemawiketsi matanhatu mufainari yeTri-Series iyo yaisanganisirawo West Indies Chikwata ichi chakanyadzisa zvikuru zvekuti mutambi wavo aive nemaranzi akawanda, Tarisai Musakanda, akakwanisa kukanda makumi matatu nematanhatu chete. ushure mekushandisa vatambi vavo vese, Zimbabwe yakakwanisa maranzi zana nemakumi matanhatu (160) ayo asina kutorera Sri Lanka nguva kudarika. Vashanyi veSri Lanka ava vakasvitsa maranzi zana nemakumi matanhatu nemana (164) vakasara vachiri nemawiketsi matanhatu mumaoko. Izvi zvirikuratidza kuti murairidzi mutsva wemaChevrons, Heath Streak ane mutoro mukuru mukuedza kuvandudza chikwata chake. Embed

column2: Chirongwa cheKudzidzisa Vachadzidzisa Vamwe Mabayirwo eNhomba yeCovid-19 Chinotanga Munyika
column3: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti ratanga chirongwa chekudzidzisa vanhu vachadzidzisa vamwe mumatunhu madiki nemakuru (district and provincial trainers) kubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 iyo yakapinda munyika neMuvhuro ichibva kuChina. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubazi iri, VaDonald Mujiri, vanoti chirongwa ichi chafamba zvakanaka, uye vanhu vanosvika mazana mana vabva kumapoka akasiyanasiyana vawana dzidziso pamusoro pemabairwo enhomba iyi. VaMujiri vanoti vanhu vapinda muchirongwa ichi vanosanganisira vezvehutano vabva kumatunhu maduku nematunhu makuru, mapoka akazvimirira, makanzuru, vekumajeri pamwe nemapurisa. Zvimwe zvinonzi zvadzidziswa vanhu ava zvinosanganisira machengeterwo enhomba, mabairwo, marasirwo ainofanirwa kuzoitwa, kufambiswa kwemashoko pamwe nekuongorora vanenge vabaiwa nhomba iyi. VaMujiri vanoti vadzidziswa ava vanenge votarisirwa kuti kutanga neChitatu kana kuti musi weChina vanenge vototangawo kudzidziva vachazobaya nhomba iyi mumatunhu avo. No media source currently available Mukuru wesangano rezvehutano, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti vanotambira chirongwa chedzidziso ichi asi vachiti zvinenge zvakanaka kuti vanezenge vachibaya vanhu nhomba iyi vange vaine ruzivo rwakakwana. VaRusike vanotiwo hurumende yaifanirwa kunge yakatanga kare kushanda nevezvehutano ava kubva pakatangwa mabasa ekutsvaga nhomba idzodzi, uyewo vanoti zvakakoshawozvakare kuti veruzhinji vapiwe mukana wekusarudza nhomba yavanoda pane dzose dzave kuwanikwa, kwete kuti vangopiwa iri kubva kuChina chete. No media source currently available

column2: Nyanzvi dzeHupfumi Dzozeya Kurudziro yeRBZ Yekuti Mari yeMunyika Ishandiswe Zvakanyanya
column3: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinoti kurudziro yagavhuna vebhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, yekuti vanhu vashandise mari yemunyika zvakanyanya ipfungwa yakanaka chose, asi izvi zvinoshanda chete kana mari yemunyika iyi iine huremu hunounza chivimbo muvanhu. Vachitaura kumusangano wavakaita nevemabhizimusi svondo rapera, VaMangudya vakati kushandiswa kwemari yekunze munyika kwakaonekwa muna 2008 kuti hakukudze hupfumi hwenyika kunze kwekungodzikamisa chete mitengo yezvinhu. Vanoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vanhu vemunyika vanofanirwa kuve nechivimbo nemari yemunyika kuitira kuti itambirike. Izvi zvinotsigirwa neimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, avo vanoti chivimbo nemari yemunyika chinofanirwa kutangira kuhurumende, iyo vanoti iri kutara mitengo yezvinhu kusanganisira mari dzinoripirwa pama Toll gate nemari yekunze. Vaimbotungamira sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Mutasa vanotiwo mari yemunyika inofanirwa kuzvishambadza yoga, kwete kuti iite zvekushambadzwa naVaNgudya sevanoshambadza mbatya dzekupfeka kana zvekudya. VaMutasa vanotiwo nyaya hombe yaita kuti mari yemunyika ipere simba inyaya yehuwori, zvikuru kumusika wemari yekunze, uko vanoti vamwe vari kutenga mari yekunze nemutengo wepasi vozoitengesa pamusika mutema nemari iri pamusoro. Asi pane chakaipa here kuti nyika ishandise mari yekunze? Doctor Chitambara vanoti kushandiswa kwemari yekunze hakuna kuipa sezvo kuchibatsira kuti hurumende isarambi ichidhinda mari sezvo isingazokwanisi kudhinda mari yekunze iyi. Asi vanoti mari yemunyika inokwanisa kutambirika chete kana nyaya yekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation, yadzikamiswa. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvemabhizimusi, vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanotsinhira pfungwa yekuti vanhu vaite chivimbo nemari yemunyika. VaMuponda vanoti izvi zvinogadziriswa chete kuburikidza nekuti nyika itengese zvigadzirwa zvayo kunze uyewo ichideredza zvainotengawo kunze. VaMangudya vakati nyaya ye inflation vachaigadzirisa kuburikidza nesimbisa kushandiswa kwemari yemunyika, pamwechete nekukasika kuwanisa vanenge vahwinha pamusika wemari yekunze mari dzavo mukati memasvondo maviri senzira yekuti mari yekunze iwande mumabhizimusi. Asi nyanzvi dzezvehupfumi idzi dzinoti kunze kwekunge hurumende yatora matanho amasimba kurwisana nehuwori, hupfumi hwenyika hunogadzirisika chete kuburikidza nekudzorwa kwemari yekunze kuti ishande munyika, kana kuti dollarization. No media source currently available

column2: Vamwe Vanhu Vashanu Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19 muNyika
column3: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakwira kusvika pagumi nevasere kana kuti 18 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu vashanu vashaya. Vanhu vatatu vakafa vari munharaunda dzakasiyana siyana vamwe vaviri vakafa vari munzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vaabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vanosvika mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi masere nevashanu kana kuti 985. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevamwe vanhu vatatu nechirwere ichi nezuro. Pavanhu ava, vaviri vakabva kuSouth Africa uye mumwe akachitapurirwa munyika. Harare ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanosvika mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemasere kana kuti 288 ichiteverwa neBulawayo ine vanhu zana nemakumi masere nevatatu 183, Mashonaland Central ndiyo ine vanhu vashoma vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanova gumi nemumwe. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vanosvika mazana matatu nemakumi maviri kana kuti 320. Vanhu vavhenekwa chirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru makumi masere nezvisere kana kuti 88 000. Kunyangwe hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nekufa kwechirwere checoronavirus huri kuramba huchiwedzera, vashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vave nemazuva makumi maviri nematanhatu vachiramwa mabasa nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari dzavari kutambiriswa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvehutano VaAmon Murwira sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakaudza dare resenate kuti hurumende yakazvipira kuita hurukuro nevashandi vayo vari kuramwa kuita mabasa. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti vari kusangana Muvhuro uno neveHealth Services Board vanoona nezvemari dzinotamburiswa vashandi vemuzvipatara. No media source currently available

column2: Nhabvu yePSL yodzoka
column3: Ndooka   ZVIKWATA zvose zvinokwikwidza muPremier Soccer League (PSL) zviri pakati pekunyoresa vatambi vazvo segadziriro yekudzoka kwemitambo yeCastle Premiership.   Mitambo iyi ichasimudzirwa nemusi wa12 na13 Kukadzi zvichitevera kumiswa kwayakaitwa munaZvita gore radarika nekuda kwezororo reKirisimasi uye kupa mukana kuchikwata chenyika chemaWarriors kuti chigadzirire kuenda kunokwikwidza kuAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) kuCameroon uko chakadzoka mushure mekuburitswa mumutambo uyu.   Mukushi wemashoko wePSL – Kudzai Bare – anoti mitambo yeCastle Premiership ichasimudzira masvondo anotevera.   “Hurongwa hwekudzoka kwemitambo yePSL huri kufamba mugwara uye kutaura kuno zvikwata zviri kunyoresa vatambi vazvo.   “Kana tapedza, mitambo inenge yave kusimudzira uye iri kutarisirwa kutanga musi wa12 na13 Kukadzi mazuva ayo atagara takazivisa kuti ndiwo mitambo iyi ichasimudzirwa,” anodaro Bare.   Zvisinei, mitambo iyi paichadzoka, mizhinji yacho inogona kukanganiswa nekunaya kuri kuita mvura uye izvi zvinotevera yambiro yakapihwa nebazi rinoona nezvemamiriro ekunze reMeteorogical Services Department (MSD) yekuti munyika muri kutarisirwa kunaya mvuya yakawanda kwenguva ndefu.   Bare anoti PSL ichabatana nemamwe masangano anoona nezvenhabvu mumazuva anotevera vachitenderera kunhandare dzakasiyana vachiongorora mamiriro akaita nhandare idzi.   “Nguva yatiri tinoziva kuti ndeyekunaya kwemvura saka mimwe mitambo inogona kukanganiswa nekudaro tichange tichiona mafambiro anenge achiita mitambo yacho.   “Zvagara hazvo kuti patichasimudzira nhabvu ndipo kubva kare paitanga mitambo yePSL asi kungoti apa chete tichangoti kurumidzei zvishoma. Asi mumazuva anotevera tichatenderera tichiongorora nhandare dzedu tichiona kuti dzakagadzirwa zvakadii uye dzinokwanisa here kutambirwa mitambo panguva ino yatiri,” anodaro Bare.   Zvakadaro, pakamiswa mitambo yePSL munaZvita, zvikwata zvakawanda zvange zvatamba mitambo mitatu uye zvimwe miviri.   Izvi zvakaona chikwata cheManica Diamonds chichitungamira palogo zvichitevera kuhwina kwachakaita mitambo yacho yose iri mitatu chiine zvibodzwa zvipfumbamwe.   Manica Diamonds iri kuteverwa neNgezi Platinum iyo, kubva pamitambo yayo mitatu, yakakwanisa kuhwina miviri ndokuita mangange mumwe chete uye ine zvibodzwa zvisere.   FC Platinum, iyo yakatora zvakare mukombe wePSL mwaka wadarika, ndiyo yakagara pechitatu iine zvibodzwa zvitanhatu izvo yakawana kubva mumitambo miviri.   Pechina pakagarwa neTriangle United iyo ine zvibodzwa zvitanhatu kubva mumitambo mitatu. Triangle yakahwina mitambo miviri ndokukundwa mumwe chete.   Kune rimwe divi, Bulawayo City ndiyo yakasenga iri pasi pelogo sezvo yangokwanisa kuwana chibodzwa chimwe chete kubva mumitambo mitatu yayatamba.   Chikwata ichi chakakundwa mumitambo miviri uye ndokuita mangange 3-3 neWhawha.

column2: VaBarack Obama Vanorumbidza Mabasa aMuchakabvu Nelson Mandela
column3: Vaimbove mutungamiri weAmerica, Va Barack Obama, vakarumbidza vaimbove mutungamiri weSouth Africa, mushakabvu Nelson Mandela, nebasa guru ravakaita rekurwira kuti munhu wese ave nerusununguko. Vachitaura neChipiri kuvanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvina muJohannesburg muhurongwa hwekurangarira VaMandela, VaObama vakarumbidza mabasa akaitwa naVaMandela, avo vaifanirwa kusvitsa makore zana gore rino, dai vakange vachiri vapenyu. VaObama vakati hondo yerusununguko haisati yapera, uye vanhu vanofanira kudzidza kubva kuhunhu hwairatidzwa naVaMandela. VaObama vakaratidzawo kushushikana nerusarura ganda ruchiripo munyika mavo nemuSouth Africa, zvinhu zvavanoti ndizvo zvakarwirwa naVaMandela kuti zvipere pasi rose. Mashoko akataurwa naVaObama ndeemhando yepamusoro zvichitevera kusiya kwavo basa semutungamiri weAmerica muna 2017, mushure mekunge vashanda muWhite House kwemakore masere. VaObama vakasangana naVaMandela muna 2005, makore matatu vasati vasarudzwa kuva mutungamiri weAmerica. Muna 2013, VaObama vakataura mashoko akadzama pahurongwa hwekurangarira VaMandela. VaMandela vakagara muhusungwa kwemakore makumi maviri nemanomwe, vakazoburitswa mujeri muna 1990, vakazoitwa mutungamiri wechitema wekutanga muSouth Africa muna 1994. VaTrust Masieleala, avo vari kuita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro soro pa University of Johannesburg, vakati kurudziro yaVaObama haina kunangana ne South Africa chete, asi kuti ikurudziro kunyika dzose kuti dziremekedze kodzero dzevanhu. Chipangamazano musangano re Political Economy Southern Africa, VaGideon Chitanga, vakatiwo mashoko aVaObama aburitsa pachena matambudziko ari kunetsa nyika zhinji pasi rose. VaTerrence Chitapi veAfrican Democracy Forum kuchamhembe kweAfrica, vakatiwo mashoko aVa Obama anoratidza kuti hapana munhu akakosha kupfuura mumwe. Mutungamiri weSouth Africa, Va Cyril Ramaphosa, pamwe nemudzimai waVaMandela, Amai Gracia Machel, vakarumbidza VaMandela vakakurudzira munhu wese kuti azadzikise chido chavo chekuda kuona munhu wese akasununguka. VaObama vasati vapinda muSouth Africa, vakashanyira Kenya kwemazuva maviri, uko kwakaberekerwa baba vavo. VaObama vakaita hurukuro nemutungamiri weKenya, VaUhuru Kenyatta, pamwe nemutungamiri webato rinopikisa, VaRaila Odinga nemusi weSvondo. NeMuvhuro VaObama vakaswera vari muguta rakaberekerwa baba vavo re Kogelo kuKenya kwakare, uko vakavhura muzinda wekudzidzira mitambo, uyo wakatangwa nehanzvadzi yavo. No media source currently available

column2: Zanu PF Yopomera Vari Kunze Mhosva yeKufurira Vari Kumusha Kuti Varatidzire
column3: Panonzi pave nekukandirana nyoka mhenyu pakati pezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvigere munyika nezvimwe zvigere kunze kwenyika pamusoro pekuratidzira kwanga kwakarongwa nebato reMDC, vari munyika, zvikuru veZanu PF, vachiti kuratidzira uku kuri kukuchidzirwa nevari kunze kwenyika. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo mapurisa munyika yose ari kurambidza kuratidzira uku kuburikidza nekuzara mumigwagwa pamwe chete nemauto akamirira kuparadza vanenge vaungana vachida kuratidzira. Imwe nhengo yeZanu PF, VaBelieve Gaule, vanoti vari kunze kwenyika vari kufurira hama dzavo kuti dzipandukire hurumende vachidzityisidzira kuti havazotumira zvakare mari kumusha kana vakasapinda mumigwagwa. VaGaule vanoti vari kunze kwenyika vanenge vagere zvavo pamutambarakede, vachishandisa vari kumusha ava. Vamwe ndivo vari kunyora pamadandemutande vachikurudzira vari kunze kwenyika ava kuti vadzoke kumusha munguva dzekuratidzira idzodzo vachibatana navo, kwete kuita vana tinhadzirwe. Asi mumwe wevari kunze kwenyika, vari sachigaro webato reMDC mudunhu reDC-Maryland-Virginia, VaCharles Mutama, vanoti vanogona kunge vari kunzi vari kufurira vari kumusha asi chavari kuda kugadzirisa zvinhu munyika. VaMutama, avo vanove zvakare mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Diaspora for Democracy, vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo, vanokurudzira hama neshamwari dzavo kuti vapinde mumigwagwa vachiratidzira senzira yekugadzirisa zvinhu.  No media source currently available

column2: VaPatrick Chinamasa Vanoti Hapana Kudzokera Kumashure paNyaya yeMabond Notes
column3: Gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vanoti hapana kudzokera kumashure pachirongwa chekuparura mari yemabond notes mwedzi uno. VaChinamasa vataura mashoko aya kumucheto wemisangano yepagore ye International Monetary Fund ne World Bank muWashington DC, muAmerica. Vanoti chirongwa chekuparura mabond notes chiri kuenderera mberi kupera kwemwedzi uno. "Chirongwa chema bond notes chiri kuenderera mberi munyika uye chichabatsira kuti avo vanoita zvekutengese zvirimwa nezvimwewo kunze kwenyika kuti vawanewo mibairo yemabasa avanenge vachiita pakuunza mari yekunze munyika," VaChinamasa vaudza Studio 7. VaChinamasa nagavhuna weRBZ VaJohn Mangudya ndivo vari kutungamira chikwata cheZimbabwe. VaChinamasa naVaMangudya neChipiri vakapinda mumusangano wemakurokota ezvemari emuAfrica wakaitwa nesangano re Macroeconomic And Financial Management Institute Of Eastern And Southern Africa (MEMFMI) apo vakaudza Studio 7 kuti varikushushikana nekuratidzira kurikuitwa nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica sezvo zviri kukanganisa mimwe misangano yavo. "Zviri kundishungurudza ndezve kuti unowona zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvichiratidzira kunzvimbo dzatinoenda kunoshava rubatsiro izvo zviri kuti katyamadza kuti seyi vana vedu vari ivo varikuda kuti nyika isawane rubatsiro," VaChinamasa vaudza Studio 7. VaChinamasa vanoti hurumende iri kuyedza zvese zvainokwanisa kuti pasawane mushandi wehurumende anowanikwa achishaya muhoro wake pane nguva. No media source currently available

column2: Vanhu Vakawanda Voenda Kunobayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Vachibhadhara Mari
column3: Vamwe vagari vekuMasvingo vava kuona zviri nani kuenda kunobayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 munzvimbo dzinobhadhariswa mari sezvo vasiri kubatsirwa munzvimbo dzinobayiwa vanhu nhomba pasina muripo. Mumwe mugari wemumusha weRujeko, VaKnowledge Matumba,vati vakandobayiwa nhomba kuchipatara chisiri chehurumende nekuti vakapedza masvondo maviri vachienda kunomira mumutstse asi vachitadza kubayiwa sezvo zvipatara zvehurumende zviri kubaya vanhu vashoma pazuva. VaMatumba vati kuzvipatara zvisiri zvehurumende hakuna mitsetse uye vanhu vanobhadhariswa mari inosvika madhora maviri ekuAmerica iyo yakatarwa nehurumende. Mumwe mugari, VaJohanes Chihwani, avo vati vakabayiwawo kuchipatara chakazvimiririra vati kunyange kuchibhadhriswa, mari yacho ishoma uye haupedzi nguva yakareba wakamirira kubayiwa. Mutauriri weZimbabwe National Family Planning Council muMasvingo, VaHebert Chikosi, vati vanhu vazhinji vari kuuya kuzobaiwa nesangano ravo senzira yekutiza mitsetse kuzvipatara zvehurumende. Chimwe chipatara chakazvimirira cheCIMAS, chiri kubayawo vanhu muMasvingo asi chinobaya nhengo dzacho dziri pachirongwa chekurapiwa chemedical Aid. Mumwe mushandi ataura ne Studio 7 paCIMAS aramba kudomwa nezita rake nekuti haabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau ati nhengo dzavo zhinji dziri kubayiwa nyore dzisingabhadariswi. Muridzi weMakurira Private Hospital, Dr Phenias Makurira, vati zvipatara zvakazvimiririra zviri kubetsera hurumende chaizvo kutapudza huwandu hwevanoda kubayiwa nhomba vachiti chipatara chavo chiri kutangawo kubaya vanhu svondo rinouya. Mutauriri weCovid-19 Taskforce muMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimayi, vati hurumende inotenda kubatsirwa kwairi kuitwa nevezvipatara zvakazvimirira uye inokurudzira vanhu kuti vaende ikoko senzira yekutapudza huwandu kuzvipatara zvehurumende. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuwedzera nzvimbo dzinobayiwa vanhu nhomba pamwe nekutenga nhomba dzakawanda. Nezuro vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri vakafa nechirwe che Covid-19 munyika izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vanhu vafa pazviuru zvina nemazana maviri nemakumi maviri, 4 220. Vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi masere nevatanhatu, 386 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi masere nevasere 122 288. Vanhu vabayiwa nhoba yekutanga munyika vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana maviri nemakumi manonwe nechimwe nemazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, 2 271 729. Vabiawa nhomba yepiri vave miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe nezana nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe, 1 427 159. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa denda reCovid-19. No media source currently available

column2: Isu tadzivirirwa 100pc –  PSL
column3: SANGANO rePremier Soccer League (PSL) rinoti riri kufara zvikuru kuti chirongwa chekubaiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 chiri kugamuchirwa nevatambi nezvikwata zviri pasi payo izvo zvaona vose vabaiwa vachisvika chikamu che99.9 percent.   Mukushi wemashoko wePSL – Kudzai Bare – anoti vatambi, varairidzi nehutungamiri hwezvikwata zvose zvinokwikwidza muligi iri vakabaiwa majekiseni eCovid-19 izvo zvinove zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvichaita kuti mutambo uyu utambwe vanhu vakasununguka.   Anoti mutambo uyu usati wadzoka, vakanyorerwa nesangano reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) kuti vatambi vose nezvikwata zvavo, kusanganisira hutungamiri vabaiwe nhomba kuitira kuti mutambo uyu ugodzoka uye ugotambwa vanhu vakachengetedzeka.   “Tiri kugutsikana kuti vatambi nevarairidzi vabaiwa nhomba kusvika pari zvino vanosvika chikamu che99.9 percent. Zvinofadza nekuti vanhu vakaterera, vakatevedzera matanho anodiwa kuti mutambo udzoke ugofamba zvakanaka.   “Kubaiwa majekiseni nekugara vanhu vachivhenekwa Covid-19 mamwe ematanho anotarisirwa kutevedzerwa izvo zvatakapihwa neSRC, saka zvikwata zvakatevedzera zvikabaisa vatambi vazvo nehutungamiri hwacho,” anodaro.   Bare anoti sePSL, vari kushambadza kuvatsigiri venhabvu kuti vaendewo kunobaiwa kuitira kuti zvigobatsira nguva inotevera kana votenderwa kuzonoona zvikwata zvavo zvichitamba.   “Tiri kuvakurudzira tichishandisa nzira dzakasiyana dzinosanganisira dandemutande kuparidza shoko rekuti vanobaiwewo nhomba nekuti tinoda kuti vazouya kuzotsigira zvikwata zvavo vakasununguka. Kana vakabaiwa, zvinobatsira kuti vange vakachengetedzeka nekuti hatidi kuti nhabvu izowedzera pakutapurirana denda iri,” anodaro Bare.   Zvichakadaro, Bare anoti PSL ichazivisa svondo rinotevera kuti mitambo yemuno inogona kuenderera mberi here kana kuti ichambomiswa sezvo pachange pane mutambo wenyika wekurwira kuenda kuQatar World Cup.   MaWarriors, ayo ave kurairidzwa naNorman Mapeza, achasangana neGhana mumitambo miviri yakatevedzana yekuenda kuWorld Cup.   Mitambo yemuGroup G iyi iriko nemusi wa9 na12 Gumiguru asi hapasati pajeka kuti mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup ichambomiswa here kana kuti kwete kuitira kuti Mapeza agowaniswa nguva yekushanda nemaWarriors.   Mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup neChitatu svondo rino mushure mekumbomiswa kwenguva yakareba nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   “Tiri panyaya iyoyo, tinoziva kuti kune mutambo mukuru uchauya saka tichazozivisa svondo rinotevera kuti tichazvifambisa sei. Iye zvino tiri kungofunga nezvemitambo iriko svondo rino chete,” anodaro Bare.

column2: Sangano reBill and Melinda Gates Rowanisa Vanhu Dzimba muHarare
column3: Rimwe sangano rekuAmerica, reBill and Melinda Gates Foundation, irapedza chirongwa charo chekuvakira vanotambura dzimba muHarare apo ratambidza dzimba zviri pamutemo kumhuri mazana mana nemakumi masere mumusha weDzivaresekwa Extenstion muHarare. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, mumwe mukuru anoona bezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa musangano iri, Amai Melanie Walker, vati chirongwa ichi, icho chine mamiriyoni makumi mashanu emadhora, chabudirira chose. Vati ishuviro yavo kuti kanzuro yeHarar,e ichashanda nemamwe masangano anopa rubatsiro,ichaenderera mberi ichivakira vanoshaya dzimba kuti vagare zvakanaka sezvo sangano ravo rapedza chirongwa charo. Meya veguta reHarare, VaBenard Manyenyeni, vatenda sangano iri uye vati chirongwa ichi chakabudirira chose zvekuti kanzuru yavo yave kutoronga kushandisa chirongwa ichimukugadzirisa dambudziko revanhu vari kugara munzvimbo dzisingakodzeri muguta. Pasi pechirongwa cheBill and Melinda Gates Foundation, kanzuru yakapihwa mari yekugadzira migwagwa, kugadzira pombi dzemvura nesiweji uyewo vanhu vakazopihwa mari dzekuvaka dzimba dzine mipanda miviri miviri. Vazhinji vakawana rubatsiro nedzimba pasi pechirongwa ichi ndevaya vakabviswa munzvimbo dzavaigara apo hurumende yaigadzirira kushanya muZimbabwe kwaMambokadzi wekuEnglanda, Queen Elizabeth, muna 1992 pamwe nevamwe vakaputsirwa dzimba dzavo paOperation Murambatsvina muna 2005. Mumwe wevanhu ava, Amai Grace Tagarisa, vanoti vanofara chose kuti vavewo nepekugara zvichitevera rubatsiro rwakabva kuBill and Melinda Gates Foundations. Vanoti kunze kwemba vakadzidziswa kuita mabasa ekuzvibatsira akaita sekusona. Mumwe wevanhu vakawana rubatsiro kubva kusangano iri, Ambuya Netty Mahachi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofara chose kuti vave nepekugara mushure mekutambura kwenguva yakareba. VaManyenyeni vati zvichitevera kufamba zvakanaka kwechirongwa ichi, kanzura ichabvisa mumhuri zana nemakumi maviri neimwe dziri kugara zviri kunze kwemutemo mumusha weGunhill vodzivakira dzimba kuMabvuku. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kanzuru yavo iri kuedza napose painogona napo kuti munhu wese awane pekugara muHarare zvisinei nekuti murombo here kana kuti kwete Vati kanzuro yavo ine chinangwa chekuvaka dzimba dzinodarika zana rezviuru kusvika mugore ra2018.

column2: Hatizivi pachadzoka nhabvu: PSL
column3: SANGANO rePremier Soccer League (PSL) rinoti harizive kuti nhabvu yemuno ichatanga kutambwa rinhi sezvo pari zvino vari kumbotevedzera mitemo yakatarwa neHurumende yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Kubva pakambomiswa mitambo yose munyika muno muna Kurume gore radarika apo pakatanga kunyuka denda reCovid-19, hakuna kuzombobvira kwatambwa mitambo yePSL.
