Muhurukuro neKwayedza, chamangwiza wePSL – Kennedy ‘Kenny’ Ndebele – anoti pari zvino havasi kumbofunga pamusoro pekuti nhabvu ichadzoka rinhi sezvo nyika iri mushishi yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi.   “Tiri kutevedzera mitemo yeHurumende iri kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vagare kudzimba,  takanzi tishandire kumba saka iye zvino takagara kumba uye tiri kushandira kudzimba dzedu.   “Nyika iye zvino iri palockdown, danho iro rakatorwa neHurumende kuti denda reCovid-19 risarambe richipararira. Saka isu tiri kutevedzera mutemo weHurumende.    Nguva ino, nyaya yekuchengetedza hupenyu hwevanhu yakakosha zvikuru,” anodaro Ndebele.   Kubva pakanyuka chirwere cheCovid-19 gore rapera, kune dzimwe nyika dzakadai seSouth Africa, Zambia neTanzania nhabvu yakadzoka ikatanga kutambwa munhandare dzisina vatsigiri nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri.   KuTanzania nhabvu ichiri kutambwa pamberi pevatsigiri uye nguva pfupi yadarika chikwata cheFC Platinum chakasangana necheSimba Sports Club kunyika iyi mumutambo weCAF Champions League qualifiers.   Gore radarika, zvikwata zvinokwikwidza muPSL zvakange zvambopihwa mvumo yekutanga kuita gadziriro dzazvo.   Izvi zvakaona chikwata chemaWarriors – icho pari zvino chiri kuCameroon uko chiri kukwikwidza mumutambo eCHAN – chiita gadziriro kuburikidza nekutamba mitambo yehushamwari nezvikwata zvemuno.   Mitambo iyi ndiyo yakashandiswa nemurairidzi wemaWarriors, Zdravko ‘Loga’ Logarusic, kusarudza vatambi vekuti vazopinda muchikwata chekuenda nacho kuCHAN.

column2: Gakava reMapurazi Rosimuka Zvakare paKuchemwa kwaVaChanetsa
column3: Gurukota rezveminda nekugariswa kwevanhu kumaruva, VaDouglas Mombeshora, vakayambira vakuru vakuru vebato reZanu PF kuti vasaite hudyire hwekuda kukumba mapurazi vachipa vana vavo nemadzisahwira avo. Gurukota rezveminda nekugariswa kwevanhu kumaruva, VaDouglas Mombeshora, vakayambira vakuru vakuru vebato reZanu PF kuti vasaite hudyire hwekuda kukumba mapurazi vachipa vana vavo nemadzisahwira avo. Vachitaura parufu rwevaimbove gavhuna wedunhu reMashonaland West, VaPeter Chanetsa, neChishanu chapfuura, VaMombeshora vakati nhengo dzebato reZanu PF dzinofanirwa kugoverana mapurazi avakatora nemhuri dzavo sezvakaitwa naVa Chanetsa kuitira kuti ivhu rose rishandiswe zvizere kuti nyika iwane zvekudya zvinoikwanira. VaMombeshora vakati VaChanetsa vakakumbira kuti purazi ravo reGreensleeves riri pedyo neguta reChinhoyi ridimurirwe vanakomana vavo vatatu sezvo vaitenda kuti raivakwanira ivo nevana vavo. VaMombeshora vakatenda kuti vakuru vakuru veZanu PF vakatsvagira vana vavo minda veruzhinji vachiishaya. Vachitaura paungano rimwe chete iri, nhengo yeCentral Committee muZanu PF, VaWebster Shamu, vakati vanhu vemuZimbabwe vanofanirwa kuremekedza mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, sezvo vakagadzwa nemidzimu yenyika. VaShamu, avo vakadzoswa mumusangano weZanu PF mushure mekumbomiswa kuva nhengo mugore ra2014 vachipomerwa mhosva yekutsigira vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joyce Mujuru, vakafananidza VaMugabe semukaka une ruwomba hwemhando yeCremora. VaChanetsa, avo vakashaya svondo rapera neMuvhuro, vakapihwa ruremekedzo rwegamba renyika vakaradzikwa pamarinda eNational Heroes Acre neMugovera muHarare. Asi VaChanetsa, avo vakafa nekuda kwechirwere cheshuga kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa, vakanga voomerwa nehupenyu sezvo vakanga voendeswa kumatare edzimhosva nebhangi reCBZ mushure mekutadza kudzosera mari yechikwereti inosvika zviuru gumi nezvipfumbamwe zvemadhora. No media source currently available

column2: VaMagaya Vokonzera Mutauro muNyika neKuti Vawana Mushonga weHIV
column3: Muporofita Walter Magaya vechicgi yeProphetic Healing Deliverance kana kuti PHD vakonzera mutauro munyika nezuro mushure mekunge vati ivo nevamwe vavari kushanda kubva kuIndia vachiti vawana mushonga wekurapa chirwere cheHIV. Aka hakasi kekutanga VaMagaya vachitaura mashoko akadai sezvo muna 2016 vakambotaura kwaMutare kuti mweya mutsvene kuburikidza nemavari unokwanisa kurapa chirwere ichi. Vakambotiwo vanorapa chirwere chegomarara. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMagaya kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi vakataura mashoko aya panhepfenyuro yavo yeYadar TV vachiti pane muti wavakawana unosanganiswa nemumwe unowanikwa kuMozambique. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera vati vanhu vanofanira kuramba vachinwa mishonga yavo yemaARV kwete kurega vachiti kwaita mushonga unorapa chirwere ichi kusvika vanachiremba vaita ongororo izere.

column2: IMF Inoti Haisi Kuzokweretesa Zimbabwe Imwe Mari Kudzamara Yabhadhara Zvimwe Zvikwereti
column3: Bhanga guru rinokweretesa mari nyika dzepasi rino reInternational Monetary Fund kana kuti IMF rinoti harisi kuzokweretesa Zimbabwe mari sezvo iine zvikwereti zvakawanda kunze zvairi kukundikana kubhadhara. Zimbabwe ine chikwereti chinosvika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora ekuAmerica chairi kutadza kubhadhara kuWorld Bank, African Development Bank, European Investment Bank neParis Club. IMF yakatura mashoko aya kuvatori venhau nemusi weChipiri mushure mekupedza mwedzi ichiongorora mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Izvi zvakaitwa kuburikidza nemadandemutande nenyaya yechirwere cheCovid-19. IMF inoti kuti Zimbabwe, yave nemakore makumi isina kukwereteswa mari nebhanga iri ikwereteswe mari, inofanira kubhadhara zvikwereti kana kutenderana nevayakakwereta kuti yobhadhara sei chikwereti ichi. IMF. Kunyangwe hazvo Zimbabwe yakakanganiswa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCovid-19 sedzimwe nyika. IMF inoti inotarisira kuti hupfumi huchakwira nezvikamu zvitanhatu kubva muzana gore rino. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe igadzirise zvimwe zviri kukurudzirwa neIMF kuitira kuti isimudzire hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

column2: Shumba yeSenegal Ingarume Nhatu dzeEngland Here kuWorld Cup?
column3: Chikwata cheSenegal chatarisana nekukunda kana kunyura apo chiri kusangana nemaThree Lions eEngland manheru ano. Chikwata ichi chirikupinda munhandare na9pm manheru mumutambo weRound of 16 chichiziva kuti Africa yese yakamirira kupemberera kurova England. Kukunda mumutambo uyu kunopinza Senegal mumakota fainari emakundano aya uyezve pedyo nekuita chikwata chekutanga muAfrica kusvika muma semi fainari eWorld Cup. Munyori wezvemutambo wenhabvu anogara kuEngland Admire Muhimeke anoti munyika iyi mune manyuku-nyuku anotyisa nezvemutambo uyu. Mutsigiri wenhabvu muZimbabwe VaWisdom Ncube vanotiwo varikuona Senegal ichirohwa nekuti hapana kunyatsowirirana mumatambiro munhandare pavatambi vekumasure nevepakati. Asi veruzhinji muZimbabwe kusanganisira muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaProsper Magoka vanoti Senegal icharatidza kuti ndiyo Shumba chaiyo. Mukuru weZimbabwe Friends Club VaTendai Barnes Zhakata vanoti cheSenegal chinokwanisa kubudirira Chimwe chikwata chemuAfrica, Morocco irikupinda munhandare neChipiri kusangana neSpain. Cameroon, Ghana, neTunisia dzakabuditswa munharaunda yekutanga mumakwikwi aya. Mitambo yeRound of 16 kuWorld Cup uku iri kupera neChipiri svondo rinouya. Parizvino France, Argentina neNetherlands ndidzo dzatove mukota fainari. KuEngland vatambi vari kutarisirwa vanosanganisira Harry Kane, Bukayo Saka, Marcus Rashford nevamwe. KuSenegal mutambi wavo mukuru Sadio Mane akakuvara aso kune vamwe vakaita sa Kalidou Koulibaly, Edouard Mendy, Boulaye Dia nevamwe.

column2: Dr Mahomva Vokurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19 Apo Vakawanda Vobatwa neChirwere Ichi Zvakare
column3: Mukuru anoona nezvekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vari kukurudzira vanhu munyika kuti vabayiwe nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire zvakanyanya munyika. Dr Mahomva vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti ongororo dzose dziri kuitwa munyika nekunze dziri kuratidza kuti vakabayiwa nhomba vane mukana wakakura wekurarama kunyangwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Bazi rezvehutano rakatozivisa kuti mhando yeCovid-19 inopararira zvakanyanya yeomicron yave kutotenderera munyika. Nemusi weSvondo, bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemumwe kana kuti 4, 701. Vanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 523 vabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zana rezviuru nemakumi matatu nepfumbamwe zvine makumi mana nematanhatu kana kuti 139, 046. Vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nemana zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 3 874 694 vakabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga. Vanhu vabayiwa kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi masere nemana zvine makumi mana nemashanu kana kuti 2 884 045. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba mukupefra kwemwedzi uno kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana.

column2: WFP Yopemha Imwe Mari Yekubatsira Vanhu Mamiriyoni Mana muZimbabwe
column3: Bazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvechikafu reWorld Health Organization raisa chikumbiro cheimwe mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemana kana kuti US$204 million yekubatsira vanhu mamiriyoni mana vemuZimbabwe vatarisana nenzara. Nzara iyi iri kukonzerwa nekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura, kukwira zvakanyanya kwemitengo yezvinhu uye chirwere cheCovid-19 chapa kuti vakawanda varasikirwe nemabasa. Nyaya yekuoma kwezvinhu iri kuuya hayo apo gurukoota rezvemari Muzvinafund Mthuli Ncube vari kuti mitengo yezvinhu iri kudzika. WFP inoti mwedzi yakaomesesa iri kutanga ikozvino kusvika muna Kurume gore rinouya apo vanhu vanenge votanga kukohwa. Vanhu vari kutarisirwa kuti vanenge vatarisana nenzara mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru zvipfumbamwe kana kuti 6,9 million. Huwandu uhu hunosanganisirawo vanhu mamiriyomi maviri nezvuru mazana matatu mumadhorobha vatarisana nenzara inotyisa. Mumiriri weWFP muZimbabwe Amai Francesca Erdelmann vanoti mari iyi ikasawanikwa nechimbi chimbi vanhu mamiriyoni mana vanoyaura nenzara zvisina mukare akamboona. Ongororo yakaitwa nehurumende nemamwe masangano inonzi ZIMVAC inoti vanhu mamiriyoni manomwe nezvuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 7,6 million vakatarisana nenzara munyika. No media source currently available

column2: Madzimai Obatwa Chibharo neKubirwa Zvowedzerwa Nekushomeka kweMabhazi eZUPCO
column3: Sangano rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe rinoti danho rehurumende rekubvisa makombi mumigwagwa nechinangwa chekuda kuvamanikidza kuti vaite mushandirapamwe nekambani yehurumende yeZUPCO rave kuisa hupenyu hwevanhu vakawanda munjodzi. Izvi zvinotevera kukwira kwehuwandu hwemadzimai ari kubatwa chibharo uye kubirwa zvakanyanya kwevanhu nevanhu vane motokari dzinozivikanwa nekuti mishikashika. Vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter, mapurisa anoti vanhu havafanire kukwira motokari dzemushikashika idzi uye havafanire kutakura mari yakawanda. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi mumashoko kuvatori vanhu vanotiwo muHarare ndimo manyanya nyaya dzekubatwa chibharo kwemadzimai uye kubirwa kwevanhu. Motokari dziri kushandiswa nematsotsi aya dzinosanganisira maHonda Fit nemaToyota Wish, vanhu vari kubirwa mari nenharembozha. Vanhu vakawanda vaudza Studio 7 kuti mabhazi eZUPCO mashoma nekudaro vanozogumisira vakwira chero motokari. Mutungamiri wePassengers Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Goliati vaudza Studio 7 kuti mabhazi mashoma zvosiya vanhu vokwira motokari dzematsotsi. No media source currently available

column2: ‘Siyai maWarriors akadaro’
column3: SHASHA dzakambonetsa dzichitambira nhabvu chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors dzinoti zvakakosha kuti chikwata chiripo parizvino chirege kusandurwa sezvo chinogona kusvika kure mumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations (Afocn) apo chiri kurwira kuenda kuCameroon gore rinotevera.   Svondo radarika, maWarriors akaita mangange 1-1 neCongo Brazzaville mumutambo wavo muGroup G.   MaWarriors ndiwo ari panyanga akatarisana nemutambo inotevera apo paachasangana neDemocratic Republic of Congo mumitambo miviri yakatevedzana musvondo rimwe chete.   Akakwanisa kuhwina mitambo yawo neDRC, maWarriors anenge ave nemukana mukuru wekubudirira kuenderera mberi mumutambo uyu izvo akamboita katatu kose asi achikoniwa kutamba zvinogutsa.   Zvakadai, svondo rino Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro nedzimwe shasha dzakambotambira maWarriors dzinosanganisira Leo Kurauzvione naHarlington Shereni avo vanoti chikwata ichi ngachirege kusandurwa zvachose.   Vaviri ava vamwe vevaive muchikwata chemaWarriors chekutanga kuenda kunomirira Zimbabwe kuAfcon mugore ra2004 kuTunisia.   Panguva iyi, Kurauzvione aitambira Dynamos FC kozoti Shereni aitambira Guingamp yekuFrance.   Kurauzvione anoti zvakakosha kuti chikwata ichi – icho chine vatambi vakaita saKnowledge Musona, Khama Billiat, Kuda Mahachi, George Chigova naEvans Rusike  – chirambe chakangobatana sezvachiri.   “Chikwata chedu chine mukana mukuru wekusvika kure asi hachidi kungoshandurwa-shandurwa zvisina tsarukano. Chiripo ichi ngachisiiwe chakadaro chiite basa racho chovakwa chakadaro, kwete kuti padiki mashandura kwauya vamwe vatambi.   “Zvikwata zvenyika hazvina nguva zhinji zviri zvese saka nguva shoma iyoyo vatambi vakambotamba vese kare vanenge vachizivana matambiro avanoita, manje kana muchivashandura-shandura pese pese zvinodzorera basa kumashure,” anodaro.   Gore rakatanga maWarriors kubudirira kuenda kuAfcon, chikwata chacho chaive nevatambi vashoma vaitambira kunze kwenyika.   Kurauzvione anoti mamiriro ezvinhu parizvino akakosha zvikuru nekuti vatambi vari kutambira kunze kana vauya havafanirwe kutanga kuchema-chema nekuda kwenyaya dzemari nekuti kuzvikwata zvavo zvavanenge vabva vanowaniswa zvese zvavanoda.   “Patori nemusiyano mukuru nechikwata chedu nekuti chikwata chavepo iye zvino chizere nevatambi vari kutambira kunze kwenyika uko kwavanowaniswa zvese zvavanoda, vanochengetedzwa zvakanakisa uye chavo kungofunga zvenhabvu chete. Saka kana vave kuuya kuzotambira maWarriors ngavafunge kusimudzira mureza wenyika kwete zvemari nekuti kwavari kubva kwakanuna kare.   “Chatiri kuda kuona basa richifamba, vakomana ava vane mukana mukuru uye ngavaushandise sezvauri,” anodaro Kurauzvione.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa naShereni uyo akatambira zvikwata zvizhinji zvekuFrance achiti maWarriors anofanira kuramba akabatana.   “Isu sevatambi vakambotambira kunze kwenyika uye kumutambo weAfcon uyu tinoda kupihwa mukana wekumbotaura nevatambi variko ava tichivarayira nzira dzavanofanirwa kuzvibata nadzo kana vachida kusvika kure.   “Ngavasati vakangoenda kuSouth Africa votozviona kuti vakatopenga, aiwa kwete. Ngavashingirire kusvika vasvika kuEurope vatambire zvikwata zvikuru uye mumaligi makuru akaita seEnglish Premiership, La Liga, Serie A neFrench Ligue 1,” anodaro.

column2: Masangano Akawanda Oshora Hurumende neKudzinga VanaMukoti Mabasa
column3: Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakazivisa neChipiri kuti yakanga yadzinga basa vanamukoti vose vari pakuramwa mabasa, sangano rinomirira vanamukoti, re Zimbabwe Nurses Association rakakurudzira nhengo dzaro kuti dzisavhundutsirwe, uye kuti hapana chati chashanduka. Sangano iri rakaburitsa gwaro nezuro richizivisa nhengo dzaro kuti rakaona mashoko akabva kumutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, ekuti vadzingwa mabasa, asi richiti nhengo dzaro dzakapinzwa basa neHealth Services Board pasi pezvibvumirano zvavakanyorerana nevashandi. Zimbabwe Nurses Association inotiwo nhengo dzayo hadzisati dzatambira matsamba ekumiswa mabasa kwadzo, uye mari inonzi navachiwenga yakaiswa parutivi kuti vagobhadharwa inoita mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe emadhora, imari yemisaridzirwa yavaifanirwa kunge vanamukoti vakabhadharwa muna 2010. Sangano iri rinoti rakasununguka kuenderera mberi nenhaurirano, uye razivisa Health Services Board kuti risazadzise zviri mutsamba yavachiwenga iyi nenguva dza 4:00pm masikati anhasi musi wa 19 Kubvumbi 2018, richiti kukundikana kwazvo vanamukoti vanozoenda kudare repamusoro kuti nyaya yekuchengetedza kodzero dzavo inzwikwe nechimbichimbi. Gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa vakaudzawo nhepfenyuro yeZBC nezuro manheru kuti vanamukoti vakadzingwa mabasa ava vakasununguka kunyorera zvakare vachitsvaga mabasa. Asi mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, Dr Fortune Nyamande, vanoti havaoni hurumende ichienderera mberi nedanho rekudzinga vanamukoti vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvinomwe iyo isina dzimwe nzira dzekuzadzisa nadzo basa ravo. Dr Nyamande vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kunzwisisa zvichemo zvavanamukoti nekukasika kuitira kuti nyika ienderere mberi. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mamwe masangano akaita sezimbabwe congress of trade unions, Zimbabwe Yadzoka/Mayibuye IZimbabwe, Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti PTUZ, Federation of Zimbabwe Educators Unions kana kuti FOZEU ari kushorawo zvikuru danho rehurumende rekudzinga vanamukoti basa. ZCTU inoti iri kuronga kuratidzira kwakasimba yakabatana nemamwe masangano. Doctor Takavafira Zhou vePTUZ vanoti hunhu hwakaitwa nehurumende hautarisirwe zvachose munyika ine rusununguko. Doctor Victor Chimhutu ve Zimbabwe Yadzoka /Mayibuye IZimbabwe vatiwo sangano ravo rinotsigirana navana mukoti mukuramwa kwavo mabasa uye vachamira navo pamwechete nemasangano achamira mukurwisana nemaitiro ehurumende aya. No media source currently available

column2: VaChiwenga Vovimbisa Kusimudzira Nzvimbo yeArcadia Vachiti Yakasarira Zvikuru
column3: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vanoti hurumende iri kuronga zvekudzosa dhora remuZimbabwe senzira yekuedza kupedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika. Vachitaura nevatsigiri veZanu PF pamusangano waitirwa paArcadia Community Hall muno muHarare, VaChiwenga vati hurumende ine hurongwa hwekudzosa dhora remuZimbabwe senzira yekuedza kupedza dambudziko rekushayikwa kwemari. VaChiwenga vakurudzirawo vezvitoro kuti vabvume kutambira mhando dzemari yakaita seEcocash pamwe nekuti vashandise makadhi ekumabhanga. VaChiwenga vati kudzoswa kwedhora remuZimbabwe kuchaitwa zvichienderana nekusimuka kunenge kuchiita hupfumi hwenyika vakati zvinhu zvese zvinofanira kunge zvanakira veruzhinji muna 2025. Mumwe mutsigiri weZanu PF anga pamusangano uyu, Muzvare Susan Mapisa, vati pfungwa dzaVaChiwenga dzakanaka zvikuru sezvo mari yave kungowanikwa pamukoto. Asi mumwe mutsigiri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Muzvare Rebecca Masukume, vanogara muArcadia makare umo maitirwa musangano uyu, vati zvataurwa naVaChiwenga izvi hazvina musoro. VaChiwenga vavimbisa kuti hurumende ichaita kuti vanhu vose vanogara muArcadia vatariswe zvakafanana nevamwe veganda dema vachiti makaradhi mazhinji ari kuonekwa sema alien vakati vachaita kuti vapihwe zvitupa zvisina kunzi alien. Vatiwo nharaunda yeArcadia inofanira kusimudzirwa munyaya dzemigwagwa, nzvimbo dzekutandarira pamwe nekuita kuti zvikoro zvepamusoro kana kuti secondary zviwande munzvimbo iyi sezvo mune zviviri chete. Mumwe mugari wemuArcadia, Amai Anne Downward, vati hupenyu hwakavaomera zvekuti vari kuswera vachipemha. Asi VaChiwenga vati kana veruzhinji vakavhotera Zanu PF musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru, zvinhu zvichavanakira. No media source currently available

column2: VaMnangagwa Vanoparura Hwaro Huchashandiswa Mukurwisa Covid-19
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaparura hurongwa huchatevedzerwa nenyika pakurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus panguva iyo masangano evadzidzisi ari kukurudzira kuti zvikoro zvose zvivharwe. Vachiparura hurongwa uhwu kuState House uhwo huri kudaidzwa kuti National Covid-19 Preparedness and Response Plan, VaMnangagwa vati ibasa remunhu wese ari munyika kuti aone kuti paagere pakashambidzika kuitira kuti chirwere che Coronavirus chisarambe chichitapuriranwa kana chichinge chazopinda munyika. Gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vatiwo vari kufara kuti chirwere ichi hachisati chapinda muZimbabwe vachiti izvi hazvifanire kuita kuti Zimbabwe irare nezamu mukanwa. Mumiriri weWorld Health Organization muZimbabwe, VaAlex Gasasira, vatiwo chirwere che Coronavirus chiri kupararira nekukasika zvekuti chavakutoda mushandira pamwe pakati pehurumende dzepasi rose pamwe neveruzhinji. Kunyange hazvo VaMnangagwa vakati vanhu vanodarika zana vasaungane seimwe yenzira dzekudzikisa mukana wekuti vanhu vasatapurirane chirwere ichi, mamwe masangano evarairidzi anoti zvikoro zvinofanira kuvharwawo. Muaturiri wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaNation Mudzitirwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti sangano ravo riri kukurudzira kuti zvikoro zvose munyika zvivharwe mangwana chaiye vachiti muzvikoro zvizhinji hamuna mvura zvinowedzera mikana yekuti chirwere che Coronavirus chitapuriranwe. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemunyori musangano reZimbabwe Teachers Association, VaTapson Nganunu Sibanda, avo vaudza Studio 7 parunhare vari kuBulawayo kuti vana vechikoro vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vanogona kunotapurira vamwe kudzimba chirwere ichi chopararira. Mutungamiri wesangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vati zvikoro zvikasavharwa mangwana vachakurudzira nhengo dzesangano ravo kuti dzisaende kubasa kubva neMuvhuro. Mumwe mubereki ane vana vaviri vanodzidza pane chimwe chikoro chiri muHarare, Amai Blantina Mukwesha, vati vave kutyirawo hupenyu hwevana vavo izvo zviri kupa kuti vatsigire zviri kutaurwa nemasangano evarairidzi. Gurukota rezvedzidzo, VaCain Mathema, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havataure neStudio7 vachiti havadi kubvunzwa zvinhu zvisina musoro. Asi VaMnangagwa vakaudza vatori venhau kuState House neChipiri svondo rino kuti zvikoro zvicharamba zvakavhurwa sezvo kwangosara mavhiki matatu chete kuti zvivharwe panopera kotoro yekutanga yegore rino. Sangano reWorld Health Organization rinoti Coronavirus yauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvisere uye vanhu vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi maviri ezviuru. No media source currently available

column2: VaKembo Mohadi naAmai Muchinguri-Kashiri Voenda Kunorapwa kuSouth Africa Mushure Mekuputikirwa neGirinedhi
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa avo vari kushanya ku Dar es Salaam kuTanzania kwemazuva maviri vanoti mumwe wevatevedzeri vavo VaKembo Mohadi, uye sachigaro webato iri vari gurukota rezvezviwanikwa Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri vakaendeswa kunorapwa kuSouth Africa mushure mekukuvara pakaputika girinedhe kuWhite City Stadium nemusi weMugovera. VaMnangagwa vakataura mashoko aya kuvatori venhau kumuchteo wemisangano yavo kuTanzania. Vanhu makumi mana nevapfumbamwe vakakuvara vamwe vaviri vakashaya. Pavanhu vaviri vakafa ava, mumwe aichengetedza VaMohadi, VaNelson Dube vakashaya vakavigwa nezuro papurazi ravo reFeatherstone mudunhu reMashonaland East uye vakabva vaitwa gamba rehondo yerusununguko sezvo vakarwa hondo muChimurenga. Amai Muchinguru-Kashiri vanonzi vakakuvara pachipfuva VaMohadi vachikuvara makumbo. Kunyangwe hazvo mapurisa achiri kuferefeta nyaya iyi, VaMnangagwa vakati vanofunga kuti vanhu vanodyidzana nechikwata chavainetsana nacho muZanu-PF chinonzi G40. No media source currently available   Asi vaimbova gurukota uye muzukuru waVaMuugabe, VaPatrick Zhuwao vanonziwo ndeveG40 vanoti havanesi nekuputitswa kwegirinedhi uku. Vamwe vari kushora nyaya yehurumende yekuendesa vatungamiri vehurumende kunorapwa kunze vachitadza kugadzirisa zvipatara zviri munyika. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaPromise Sande vanoti zvakakosha kuti vakakuvara vakwanise kurapwa vachipora asi hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa zvipatara zvemunyika.

column2: Vakawanda muBulawayo Votambira neMufaro Zvaitwa VaMugabe neMauto
column3: No media source currently available Vamwe vevanhu vataura neStudio 7 muBulawayo vanoti vanotambira kutora masimba ehurumende kwaitwa nemauto. Mumwe wevanhu ava, Muzvare Abegale Mupambi, vesangano re#This Constitution Our Constitution, vati sesangano ravo rinokurudzira kukosheswa kwebumbiro remutemo wenyika, uye vanotambira zvaitwa nevechiuto. Kunyange hazvo vati kubvuta masimba chinhu chakaipa, vati mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nevamwe vemubato ravo vange vave kutonga nyikavachiita madiro aJojina. Retired Lieutenant Colonel Brian Mutoti vatiwo havawone pachiitika mhirizhonga kana kudeuka kweropa kuchaitika sezvo vati vanoona vechiuto vari vanhu vakarongeka vanoita basa ravo nemazvo. Mutungamiri weZapu, VaDumiso Dabengwa, vati vaiwona kutorwa kwemasimba nevechiuto chiri chaigona kuitika munyika, uye chichitsigirwa neveruzhinji. Murwi wehondo yerusununguko pasi pevarwi veZipra, VaMax Mkandla, vati vanotsigirawo zvaitwa nevechiuto. Mune imwewo nyaya, dare ramagistrate muBulawayo neChitatu rabvuma kuti VaMagura Charumbira vabhadhare mari yechibatiso pamhosva yavari kupomhera yekukurudzira kukonzerwa kwemhirizhonga pamwe nekutuka kana kuzvidza mukuru wenyika,

column2: Paramende Yodaidza VaChinamasa Kuti Vajekese Kwakabva Mari yeKubhadhara Chikwereti kuWorld Bank
column3: Vanoona nezvehupfumi mubato reMDC, VaTapiwa Mashakada, uye vari nhengo yekomiti yedare reparamende inoona nezvehupfumi, vanoti komiti yavo ine hurongwa hwekudaidza kudare iri gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, kuti vataure nezvekubhadhara chikwereti chenyika. VaMashakada vanoti vanoda kuti VaChinamasa vazotsanangure nyaya yemari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora yavanoti vakawana kubhadhara mari yakawedzerwa pazvikwereti zveZimbabwe kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. VaChinamasa havana kutaura kuti mari iyi yainge yabva kupi. Asi bepanhau reZimbabwe Independent rakabva raburitsa nyaya yekuti mari iyi yainge yabva kukambani yekuSingapore inonzi Trafigura. Asi mutauriri wekambani iyi, Amai Zohra McDoolley-Aimone, varamba mashoko ekuti kambani yavo yakapa Zimbabwe mari inodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora yekuti ibhadhare chikwereti kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. Vachipindura mubvunzo kubva kuStudio7, Amai McDoolley-Aimone vati vainge vanzwa mashoko kubva kumapepanhau ekuti Trafigura yainge yapa Zimbabwe mari asi vakati aya manyepo. Vatiwo vane mabhizimisi muZimbabwe uye makambani avo akazvipira kuramba achifambisa basa achishanda nehurumende asi panyaya yekukweretesa Zimbabwe, asi kambani yavo iri kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya.. Kambani yeTrafigura Group yakapinda muZimbabwe muna 2013 kuburikidza nekuisa hupfumi mukambani yePuma Energy iyo yakaisa zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana mukambani yeRedan Petroleum. Redan ine nzvimbo dzinotengeserwa mafuta edzimotokari makumi manomwe nepfumbamwe, uye inopa mafuta endege panhandare ina. VaMashakada vanoti zvinonetsa kuti pawane mabhanga kana makambani angakweretese Zimbabwe mari kana asinawo kusviba. No media source currently available

column2: NAAZ yotumira shangwiti kuNigeria
column3: SANGANO reNational Athletics Association of Zimbabwe (NAAZ) rinoti rakanyorera kuHurumende richikumbira mvumo kuti rigotumira shangwiti dzerelay kunokwikwidza kumujaho weMoC relays (4×100) uyo uchaitirwa kuLagos kuNigeria svondo rino.   NAAZ yakashevedzwa kumutambo uyu neThe Athletics Federation of Nigeria (AFN) uye chikwata cheZimbabwe chinofanirwa kunge chave kuNigeria musi weChishanu chino chichigadzirira mujaho uyu uchamhanywa musi weMugovera neSvondo.   Mutungamiri weNAAZ — Tendai Tagara — anoti sangano ravo richiri rakamira mhinduro kubva kuHurumende uye kunzwa kubva kuAFN nevakotsveri vemutambo uyu kuti vagotumira matikiti endege nemaVisa evamhanyi vavo vavachatumira.   “Takangomirira kunzwa kubva kuHurumende yedu kuti tozvifambisa sei parwendo urwu uye kubva kuAFN nevakotsveri vemutambo uyu vekuNigeria avo vakatidana kuti tiende kunokwikwidza. Mujaho uyu uchashanda mukurwira zvekare tikiti rekuenda kumaOlympics saka tiri kuukoshesa zvakanyanya. Kana tapihwa mvumo, chikwata chedu chinofanira kunge chave kuNigeria musi weChishanu, choswera chakazorora chiriko nekuti musi weMugovera chinenge chakatobvondoka kumujaho uhu,” anodaro Tagara.   Anoti iye zvino havasati vaziva kuti ndevapi vatambi vavachasarudza kuti vapinde muchikwata ichi sezvo vari kumbomirira mvumo yekuenda ndipo vozotanga kudoma vatambi vekutakura.   “Pari zvino hatisati tave nechikwata asi vatinogona kutumira ndevari kurwira kuenda kumaOlympics vanosanganisira Ngoni Makusha, Chengetai Mapaya, Kundai Maguranyanga, Tinotenda Matienda nevamwe vari kurwira kuenda kuIAAF World championships,” anodaro Tagara.

column2: America Yobatsira Zimbabwe Kuti VanaChiremba naVanaMukoti Vasatapurirwe Zvirwere
column3: Hurumende dzeAmerica neZimbabwe nemusi wenhasi dzakaparura chirongwa chemakore mashanu icho chakanangana nekudzivirira vanachiremba navanamukoti kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere cherurindi kana kuti TB. Chirongwa ichi chiri kuitwa nebazi rezvehutano nekuchegetedzwa zvakanaka kweavana nemamwe masangano akaita seveThe Union, Biomedical Research and Training Institute chiri kutsigirwa neveCenters for Disease Control vekuAmerica zvichiburikitsa nemari inopihwa nemutungamiriri wenyika yeAmerica pachirongwa chake chekurwisana neHIV chePresident’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief kana kuti PEPFAR. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru weCDC muZimbabwe Amai Laurie Fuller vati vari kutsigira chirongwa ichi nekuti vashandi vezvehutano vakakosha uye zvakawonekwa kuti hapana change chiri kuitwa kuvadzviriri kubva kuchirwere cherurindi kana kuti TB. Amai Fuller vanoti vachashandisa miriyoni yemadhora nechidimbu pachirongwa ichi mugore rekutanga. Vange vakamirira munyori mubazi rezvehutano pachiitiko chanhasi, Dr Angela Mushavi vanoti chirongwa ichi chakakosha chose kuvashandi vezvehutano munyika. Vanoti vashandi vehutano vari padambudziko rekutapurirwa zvirwere vari pababsa uye chirongwa ichi chichaita kuti vagare vachiongororwa nguva nenguva. Mukuru wesangano reThe Union iro rine hunyanzvi mukurwisana nechirwere cherurindi, Dr Christopher Zishiri vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo richabatsira nehunyanzi hwaro mukuronga chirongwa chekudzidzisa vanachiremba navanamukoti kuti vakangazvidzivirire sei kubva kuTB. Vanoti chirongwa ichi chakakosha chose nekuti hapana ange ari kutarisa vanachiremba navanamukoti pamwe nekuona kuti vazvidzivirira here kubva kuTB. Chirongwa ichi chinotarisirwa kuitwa muzvipatara nemumakirinika munyika yose. Zimbabwe ndeimwe yenyika gumi neina dzinevanhu vakawanda vanotapurirwa chirwere cherurindi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana zvevanhu vane chirwere cherurindi vanenge vaine hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS kozotiwo vanhu vazhinji vane HIV/AIDS vanofa neTB. No media source currently available

column2: VaJob Sikhala Votanga Kutongwa Muna Ndira Gore Rinouya
column3: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro veMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaJob Sikhala, vaudzwa nedare redzimhosva kuMasvingo kuti nyaya yavari kupomerwa inofanirwa kuenda kunotongwa nedare repamusoro, sezvo vari kupomerwa mhosva huru ine chekuita nekuda kubvisa hurumende zvisiri pamutemo. VaSikhala vakasungwa muna Chikunguru vachipomerwa mhosva yekutaura mashoko anonzi nehurumende aive akanangana nekuda kubvisa hurumende zvisiri pamutemo. Munyori anoona nezvemitemo muMDC, VaInnocent Gonese, vanoti havana kufara nedanho iri sezvo zvose zviri kuitwa zviriine chinangwa chekushungurudza VaSikhala, avo vanove nhengo inomirira Zengeza West mudare reNational Assembly. VaGonese vanoti vachaenda kudare iri panotanga kunzwikwa nyaya yaVaSikhala vachivatsigira sezvo VaSikhala vasina mhosva yavakapara. No media source currently available

column2: MDC Alliance neZanu PF Dzotatsurana paNyaya yeSarudzo neKuvandudzwa kweMitemo
column3: Nyika yave kuziva kuti sarudzo dzekutsiva nhengo dzeparamende pamwe nemakanzuru dzakadzingwa kana kushaya, dzema by-election, dzave kuzoitwa muna Kurume wegore rinouya zvichitevera kuziviswa kwakaitwa nezuro nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachitaura vari kumusangano wePolitiburo yebato ravo reZanu PF. Asi VaMnangagwa vakabuda pachena kuti hapanazve kuvandudzwa kuchaitwa mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo, vachiti mudunhu reSADC rose Zimbabwe yakaisa kare mitemo yose ine chekuita nesarudzo mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. Ukuwo, mamwe mapato anopikisa anosanganisira reMDC Alliance rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, anga achiti hurumende yakanga isingade kuita sarudzo dzema by-elections idzi ichihwanda nedenda reCOVID-19. Mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvesarudzo muMDC-Alliance, Muzvare Ellen Shiriyedenga, vanoti sebato vagarawo vachiti mitemo yakawanda inobata sarudzo inofanirwa kuvandudzwa sezvakakurudzirwa nemasangano pamwe nemapoka akaongorora sarudzo dza2018 munyika. Muzvare Shiriyedenga vanotiwo zvakare komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo munyika yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, inofanirwa kunge yakazvimirira pasina kupindira kwehurumende kana bato reZanu PF sezvavanoti zviri kuitika pari zvino. Asi mumwe wevechidiki veZanu PF mudunhu reHarare, VaAlex Gakanje, vanoti zvese zviri kutaurwa nemapato anopikisa kusanganisira MDC Alliance izvi kutungana kwembudzi sezvo zviri kubva kumapato ari kutya kupinda musarudzo nekuziva kuti anokundwa neZanu PF. VaGakanje vanoti hapana asingazive kuti sarudzo dzema by-election dzakamanikidzwa kusendekwa parutivi nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19, vachiti Zimbabwe haifanirwe kumanikidzwa kuita sarudzo ichiisa hupenyu hwevanhu panjodzi sezviri kuonekwa kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita masarudzo, uko denda reCovid-19 rakakwira. No media source currently available

column2: VaMnangagwa Vanosvika kuMusangano weWorld Economic Forum kuSouth Africa
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasvika muSouth Africa kumusangano weWorld Economic Forum on Africa uri kuitirwa kuCape Town. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kubatana nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica nevamwe venyika dzakabudirira. Musangano uyu uri kutanga neChitatu uchipera nemusi weChishanu kuCape Town International Convention Center. Ko Zimbabwe pane chainobura here pamisangano yakadai sezvo VaMnangagwa vachangobva kumuysangano we Tokyo International Conference on African Development kuJapan vamwe vachiti vakafambira dhongi rakaora? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti misangano yakadai yakakosha zvikuru kuZimbabwe. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo namuzvinabhizimisi ari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, avo vati musangano uyu unopa Zimbabwe mukana wekuumba hushamwari nenyika dzakaitemere zvirango. VaJokonya vati Zimbabwe inofanira kunyatsouya nemazano akajeka kuti iwane chouviri pamisangano yakadai. Asi mumwe wevatevedzeri vebato rinopikisa reMDC, uye vaimbova gurukota rezvemari muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaTendai Biti, vanoti misangano iyi kuteya nzou neriva. Vati VaMnangagwa vanongoenda kumisangano pasina chinobuda nekuti hapana vekunze vanoda kudyidzana neZimbabwe nenyaya yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. VaBiti vati vanhu vemuZimbabwe vanofanira kutanga vabatana, asi vakati havaone VaMnangagwa vari ivo vangatungamire hurongwa uhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vemunyika vatange vataurirana vasati vaenda kunze kunotsvaga vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi munyika. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, mutauriri wemutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, Muzvare Khusela Diko, vati mutungamiri wenyika iyi achatungamira chikwata chemakurukota avo. Musangano uyu uri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rakanangana nekukurudzira kudyidzana munyaya dzezvekutengeserana kuburikidza nehumhizha hwechizvino zvino. No media source currently available

column2: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kutevedzera Bumbiro reMitemo Zvizere Kana Yoita Sarudzo Dzayo
column3: Nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo nesarudzo dzinoti Zimbabwe inokwanisa kuita sarudzo dzakachena chete kana ikatevedza bumbiro remitemo yaro uye kana mauto akasapindira munyaya dzesarudzo nedzematongerwo enyika. Vachitaura pamusangano wakarongwa neZimbabwe Democracy Institute kana kuti (ZDI wekuzeya kuti chii chingaitwa kuitira kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena muna 2023, mukuru weSAPES Trust, VaIbbo Mandaza, vati kunze kwekuteedza bumbiro pamwe nekudzorera mauto kumabharaki hapana chimwe chingaitwe kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzisingakipikiswe. Vati kunyange hazvo vamwe vachiti mutemo wesarudzo unofanira kushandurwa chikuru chiri kuita kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzinopikiswa nguva nenguva inyaya yekupindira kwemauto panyaya dzematongerwo enyika pamwe nekufambiswa zvakanaka kwesarudzo. Vati mapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira anofanira kushanda zvakasimba kuona kuti bumbiro remitemo ratevedzwa uye kuti mauto adzokera kumabharaki. VaMandaza vati hapana chikonzero chekuti mapato anopikisa apinde musarudzo kana bumbiro risingatevedzwi uye kana masoja akaramba achipindira munyaya dzematongerwo enyika sezvo bato reZanu PF richingokunda musarudzo idzi. VaMandaza vati bato reZanu PF rinoshandisa mauto uye range riri kuruza sarudzo dzese kubva muna2 000 asi richabatsirwa kuramba iri panyanga nemauto. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemutauriri webato rinopikisa reNational Patriotic Front, VaJelousy Mawarire, avo vati mauto pachawo akabuda pachena apo akabvisa vaive mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, muna Mbudzi 2017. Vachitaurawo pamusangano wanhasi, mutevedzeri wasachigaro webato guru rinopikisa munyika, reMDC Alliance, VaJob Sikhala, vabvumirana naMuzvinafundo Mandaza vachiti Zanu PF haigoni kukunda musarudzo kana ikasashandisa mauto. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remauto kana kubva kugurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kuita. Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, varamba mashoko VaMandaza ekuti bato ravo range richikundikana musarudzo kubva muna 2000 vachiti kunongova kutaura kwevavengi. VaMugwadi vatiwo manyepo kuti mauto anobatsira Zanu PF musarudzo vachiti mauto anopindira chete kana pachinge paita mhirizhonga. VaMandaza vatiwo mapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira anofanira kusunga dzisimbe kuunganidza mari yemaAgents, kuona kuti vanhu vanyoresa kuvhota pamwe nekudzivirira vhoti panguva yesarudzo. Asi VaMawarire vati mapato anopikisa anokwanisa kukunda chero pasina shanduko yaitika. Mumwe mushandi mukuru muZDI, VaBekezela Gumbo, vati musangano wanhasi waburitsa pachena kuti kunyange mutemo wesarudzo ukasandurwa, zvakakoshawo kuti bumbiro ritevedzwe uye kuti mauto asapindire musarudzo. Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakaudza musangano webato ravo wePolitiburo svondo rapfuura kuti Zimbabwe yakatoisa zvese zvinodiwa neSADC kuti paitwe sarudzo dzakachena uye vakati vaye vanochema kuti mutemo wesarudzo unofanira kushandurwa havasi kubuda pachena kuti ndezvipi chaizvo zvavari kuda. Asi izvi zviri kurambwa nevemapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira avo vanoti VaMnangagwa vanoziva zvese zvinodiwa kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena. No media source currently available

column2: Zifa Inotsamwisa Komiti yeParamende Inoona Nyaya dzeMitambo
column3: Nhengo dzeparamende dzashatirwa mushure mekunge sangano reZimbabwe Football Association (ZIFA) nekanzuru yeBulawayo vatadza kunopa humbowo kudare mushure mekunge sangano rezvenhabvu muAfrica reConfederation of African Football (CAF) rati nhandare dzese dzemuZimbabwe hadzikodzeri kutambirwa nhabvu. Nhengo dzekomiti inoona nezvevechidiki nemutambo dzaratidza kusafara nekuita kweZIFA dzichiti hazvishamisi kuti mutambo wenhabvu wasvika pauri munyika nekuti ZIFA haikoshesi basa rayo pamwe nedare reparamende. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, Muzvare Tatenda Mavetera veZanu PF, vati danho reCAF rakabata vakawanda nevatsigiri venhabvu munyika uye kana ZIFA isingakoshesi izvi, zvinoreva kuti haina hany’a nenhabvu. VaOmega Sibanda veZanu PF varatidzawo kusafara nekuita kweZIFA nekanzuru yeBulawayo vachiti ndivo vanhu vange vakanyanya kukosha kukomiti yeparamende VaGift Banda veMDC vatiwo zvange zvakakosha kuti ZIFA ive pamusangano wanhasi sezvo iri iyo inotaura neCAF ichizozivisa vamwe vese zvinenge zvabva kuCAF. Vachipa humbowo pamusoro penyaya iyi, vakafanobata chinzvimbo chemunyori mubazi rezvematunhu, VaJoseph Mhakayaora, vati zvose zvinodiwa neCAF zvingadai zvagadzirwa munhandare yeNational Sports Stadium dai vaipihwa mari nehurumende. Vati nhandare iyi yakapedzisira kugadziridzwa makore gumi apfuura nemari yakabva kuChina. Vati gore rapfuura chairo vakaisa bhajeti remamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi mana emadhora rekusimudzira National Sports Stadium, asi hapana chakabuda. Asi vakafanobata chinzvimbo chemunyori mubazi revechidiki nemitambo, VaBenson Martins Dube, vaudza paramende kuti hurumende yakataoudza ZIFA kuti inyorere kuCAF ichiikoka kuti izoongorora zvakare National Sports Stadium neBarbourfields sezvo nhandare idzi dziri kugadziriswa. Vati hurumende iri kushandisa mamiriyoni makumi matatu nematatu ekugadzirisa nhandare idzi uye vati vanovimba kuti dzichange dzapera kugadziriswa mukati memazuva gumi nemana ari kuetevera. Zvichakadai, CAF yanyorera ZIFA ichiramba chikumbiro chekuti iongorore zvakare nhandare idzi ikati inoda kuti Zimbabwe idome nhandare iri kunze kweZimbabwe yainoda kutambira mutambo weZimbabwe neAlgeria. Mutauriri ZIFA, VaXolisani Gwesela, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hongu vatambira gwaro iri kubva kuCAF mushure mekunyorera sangano iri neMuvhuro. VaGwesela vatiwo vatadza kuenda paramende nhasi sezvo vange vakabatikana uye vakanyorera kuparamende neChitatu vachiti musangano wanhasi uendeswe mberi. No media source currently available

column2: South Africa Yopa Magwaro Vakanga Vanyimwa Zviuru Gumi neZviviri
column3: Sangano re Global Zimbabwe Forum rinoti riri kufara zvikuru nedanho ratorwa nehurumende yemu South Africa rekuwedzera mazuva ekuti vanhu vaende kunotora magwaro anovapa mvumo yekugara nekushanda vari munyika iyi. Magwaro aya ari kupihwa pasi pechirongwa che Zimbabwe Special Permit (ZSP) kusvika musi wa 31 Ndira gore rinouya. Hurumende yeSouth Africa inoti vanhu zviuru gumi nezviviri vakambenge vanyimwa magwaro vava kupihwa magwaro aya kunze kwevanhu makumi maviri nevashanu. Sachigaro wesangano re Global Zimbabwe Forum, Va Solomon Chikowero, vanoti kuwedzerwa kwenguva yaphiwa vanhu kuchabatsira zvikuru sezvo vakambenge vanyimwa pakutanga vava kupihwa magwaro aya mushure meongororo itsva yakaitwa. "Tiri kufadzwa nedanho iri sezvo takaita misangano nebazi rehurumende rinoita nezvemapepa aya kutanga kwemwedzi uno tichivazivisa kuti zvange zvakakosha kuti vawedzere mazuva ekuti vanhu vapihwe mapepa aya uye kuti vawongorore zvakare avo vavange vanyima kuti vawaniswe mukana mutsva saka," Va Chikowero vaudza Studio7. No media source currently available

column2: ZVICHANGOITIKA . . . Pitso aenda kuSaudi Arabia
column3: wenhabvu wekuSouth Africa ane mukurumbira, Pitso Mosimane, aziviswa kuti ndiye ava kuzorairidza chikwata chikuru chekuSaudi Arabia, cheAl Ahli Saudi kutanga izvozvi.

column2: Mapurisa Anorambidza Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa Kufora Vachinyunyuta neKushungurudzwa neMapurisa
column3: Mapurisa muHarare nhasi anonzi anyima mvumo yekufora kunhengo dzesangano revanorarama nekutengesera mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VISET, idzo dzanga dzichida kuratidzira kwadzinoti hutsinye hwemapurisa zvichitevera kushaya kwemumwe wavo ari muhusungwa. VaTafadzwa Hilton Tamangani vakashaya vari muhusungwa kuHarare Remand Prison mushure mekusungwa pamwechete nevamwe gumi vanotengesera mumigwagwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekurova mupurisa. Mukuru wesangano reVISET, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti vakanga vakanyorera mapurisa neMuvhuro svondo rapera vachiazivisa nezvehurongwa hwavo hwekuda kuratidzira uhwu. Asi vanoti vazoshamisika vachiwana mhinduro inovaudza kuti tsamba yavo yakanga isiri kuwirirana nezvinodiwa nechikamu 25 chemutemo wePublic Order and Security Act (POSA) (Chapter 11:17), nekudaro vakanga vasingafanirwe kuenderera mberi nekuratidzira uku. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi. Asi vaWadzayi vanoti vari kupikisa danho remapurisa iri kuburikidza nekumhanyira kudare repamusoro reHigh Court. No media source currently available

column2: Sangano reCoomunity Working Group on Health Ropa Dzidziso Pamusoro peCovid-19
column3: Mukuru wesangano reCoomunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti sangano ravo riri kushanda mumatunhu akawanda emunyika richidzidzisa vanoita zvehutano munharaunda pamwe vechidiki pamusoro pekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19, avo vanozodzidzisawo vamwe. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo matunhu anoti Bulawayo, Matabeleland North neMatabeleland South ari kusangana nedambudziko rekukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kufa pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere kubva mwedzi wapera. VaRusike vanotiwo sangano ravo riri kushandawo mumatunhu anoti Manicaland, Masvingo neMidlands, uko vari kubatana nanambuya hutano mukupa dzidziso kuti veruzhinji vazive nzira dzekudzvirira kupararira kwedenda iri. Sangano reCommunity Working Group on Health riri kukwanisa kupinda mumaruwa kuburikidza nemabhasikoro arakapiwa nesangano reWorld Bicycle Relief. Asi vanoti kuti nyika ibudirire kudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hunokonzera chirwere ichi, hurumende pamwe nemakanzuru zvinofanirwa kuona kuti vanhu vawaniswa mvura kayachena yekushandisa kugeza maoko pamwe nekuzvishambidza, uyewo vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vachengetedze mitemo yakatarwa nebazi rezvehutano pamwe neWorld Health Organisation. Asi VaRusike vanoti kana hurumende yakazofunga kutora matanhu ekurambidza veruzhinji kufambafamba, haifanirwe kubva yavhara nyika yose sezvakamboitika pakutanga, sezvo vazhinji vevanhu munyika vachirarama nekuzviitira mabasa emaoko. No media source currently available

column2: EU Inobatsira Zimbabwe neMamiriyoni Makumi Manomwe eMadhora
column3: Sangano reEuropean Union, EU, rapa Zimbabwe mamiriyoni makumi manomwe emadhora ekuAmerica semari ichishandiswa mukabatsira kupedza nzara yakatarisana neveruzhinji uye kubatsira munyaya dzehutano nekurima. Izvi zvaziviswa nemumiriri weEU muZimbabwe, VaTimo Okonnen, pamusangano waitwa nechikwata cheEU nechikwata chehurumende yeZimbabwe pamusangano wekuedza kugadzirisa hukama pakati peZimbabwe neEU. VaOkonnen vati kuvandudzwa kwenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, hupfumi pamwe nekupedza huori zvinhu zvakakosha kuitira kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe ikwanise kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika zvakanaka. Mashoko aVaOkonnen anouyawo apo mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vakati hapana vekunze vanoda kusima mari yavo munyika isina kugadzikana, uye izere nehuori pamwe nekusachengetedzwa kwemitemo. Nyaya yekuchengetedzwa kwemitemo nekodzero dzevanhu inyaya yanga iri mudariro zvakare pakati hurumende yeZimbabwe neEU nhasi. Zvichakadai, vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvinoitika kunze kwenyika, VaJuly Moyo, vati vane chivimbo chekuti zvese zvavanenge vasingawirirane neEU vachasvika pakunzwisisana. Hukama pakati peZimbabwe neEU nedzimwe nyika dzekumavirira hwakatanga kusamira zvakanaka pakatemerwa zvirango vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nevamwe vavo vari muZanu PF zvichitevera kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika uye kusafambiswa zvakanaka kwesarudzo. Zvichakadai, hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inoti zvirango zvavakatemerwa ivo nevamwe vari muZanu PF zvinofanira kubviswa ichiti zvirango izvi zviri kunze kwemurawo uye zviri kurwadza ruzhinji rweZimbabwe. Asi veEU pamwe neAmerica dzinoti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanira kuvandudza nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nekuona kuti kodzero dzeveruzhinji dzachenegetedzwa zvirango izvi zvisati zvabviswa. No media source currently available

column2: Vogadzirira kupanana zvematsenganzungu
column3: VATAMBI vetsiva vane chitsama votarisirwa kubandana mumutambo wePound for pound Knockout Covid Boxing Series uchatambwa nemusi wa5 Chikumi kuHarare Showgrounds.   Mutambo uyu uri kurongwa neDeltaforce Boxing iyo inotungamirirwa naClyde Musonda uye uchaona vatambi 16 vachirwa mumitambo misere.   Mutambo mukuru pazuva iri uchange uri waFreeman Mabvongwe uyo acharwira bhande reZimbabwe Welteright naPeterson Machinjike.   Clyde Musonda, anove zvakare murairidzi wevatambi vetsiva vazhinji, anoti mutambo uyu uchabatsira zvakanyanya sezvo vatambi vange vave nenguva ndefu vasingakwikwidze zvichitevera kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yose munaKurume gora rapera senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Anoti chishuvo chavo kuona vatambi vari kusimukira vachiwaniswa mikana yekukwikwidza nekugadzira mazita avo kuitira kuti vagonorwira mabhande akasiyana kunze kwenyika.   “Isu chishuwo chedu kuona vatambi vetsiva vachisimukira nekuwana mikana yekugadzira mazita avo. Nekuda kweCovid-19, mitambo yange yakamiswa uye vatambi hupenyu hwavo hwakakanganiswa zvikuru. Saka isu taronga mutambo weKnockout Covid, tinoda kuirwisa kuti ngaiende Covid-19 itisiye tiite mabasa edu atange tajaira hupenyu hwedu hudzokere pahwainge huri kare,” anodaro.   Mutambo wePound for pound knockout Covid boxing series ndewechipiri wetsiva kurongwa muno kubva mitambo payakapihwa mvumo yekunzi ichiitwa munyika.   “Tiri palockdown, taienda nevamwe vatambi kunze kunyika dzakaita seTanzania vachinokwikwidza ikoko, asi vange vari vashoma. Saka iye zvino vatambi vakawanda vave nemukana wekuzoenda kunorwira kunze kwenyika asi hunge vakatamba zvinonwisa mvura mitambo yatinovarongera muno,” anodaro Musonda.

column2: Vamwe Votadza Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 yeKutanga Ichinzi Yapera
column3:
Vanhu vakawanda vari kuda kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 yekutanga mudunhu reMashonaland West vari kutadza kubaiwa zvichinzi hakuna nhomba yekutanga asi vanhu vachikwanisa kubayiwa nhomba yechipiri chete. Mumwe wevanhu vanga vachida kubayiwa nhomba muChinhoyi nhasi, VaTendayi Masakasa, vati vanzi vadzoke svondo rinouya sezvo kuri kungobayiwa nhomba yepiri chete.

Mumwe chiremba ari kuona nezvekubayiwa nhomba mudunhu reMakonde, Dr Paradzai Mudzengerere, vabvuma kuti pane dambudziko rekushaikwa
kwedzimwe mhomba asi vati zviri kukonzerwa nevanhu vari kunobayiwa
nhomba kunzvimbo dzisiri dzavakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga. Dr Madzengerere vati vave kupa nhomba yeSinopharm chete munzvimbo
dziri kubayirwa vanhu sezvo nhomba iyi iripo yakawanda kudarika dzimwe
nhomba. Dr Mudzengerere vakurudzira vanhu kuti vanobayiwa nhomba yepiri
kunzvimbo yavakambobayiwa nhomba yekutanga. Dambudziko riri kuMashonaland West rinonziwo riri kuwanikwa kumamwe matunhu ari munyika. Svondo rapera, mukuru anoona nezvehutano muBulawayo, Dr Welcome Mlilo, vakaudza bepanhau reThe Chronocle kuti dunhu ravo rakanga richitarisana nekushomeka kwenhomba dzeCovid-19 zvekuti vakanga vachibaya chete vabiyiwa nhomba kepiri. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirongwa zveCovid-19 National Task Force, Dr Agnes Mahobva, vati vakuru vezvehutano mumatunhu vari kuongorora nezvenyaya yekushaikwa kwenhomba mudzimwe nzvimbo sezvo vakatanga kuzvinzwa pama dandemutande. Asi vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance,Dr Henry Madzorera, vati kudzoserwa kwevanhu vari kuda kubaiwa nhomba zviri kuratidza kusarongeka kwehurumende munyaya yekutenga nekupa matunhu
nhomba dzinokwanirana.

Hurumende inoti mava nenhomba dzinodarika miriyoni imwe chete nemazana manomwe ezviuru idzo dzinosanganisira Sinopharm, Sinovac nedzimwe. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Mutsvangwa, vakazivisa svondo rapera kuti nyika iri kutarisira dzimwe nhomba zviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 500 000 kubva kuChina mwedzi uno. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kusvika
pari zvino vave chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 1594 zvichitevera kufa wevanhu vaviri nezuro. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vave zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nemumwe chete kana kuti 38 961, zvichitevera kubatwa kwevanhu gumi nevanomwe nezuro. Vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 yekutanga vave zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nezvishanu zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevasere kana kuti 675 678. Vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mana nezvina zvinemazana mana kana kuti 344 400. Izvi zvinoreva kuri nhomba dzashandiswa munyika yose dzasvika pamiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru makumi maviri nemakumi manomwe nesere, kana kuti 1 020 078. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu vanosvika
mamiriyoni gumi, 10 million, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva
muzana, 60%, zvevanhu vari munyika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira
kwechirwere cheCovid-19.

column2: ‘TSIGIRAI LOGA’
column3: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vanoti hapana chinokonesa Zimbabwe kuenda kumakwikwi e2022 Qatar World Cup zvichitevera kugadzwa kwemurairidzi mutsva wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors, Zdravko Logarusic.   Loga, sezita remadunhurirwa raLogarusic iro raakapihwa nevatsigiri venhabvu, akagadzwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi neZifa achitsiva Sunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa uyo akasiya basa gore rapera.   Joey ‘Mafero’ Antipas ndiye ange akafanobata chigaro ichi zvichitevera kubva kwaMhofu.   Chizvarwa chekuCroatia ichi, Loga, akaparurwa zviri pamutemo svondo radarika nesangano reZifa.   Mutungamiri weZifa, Felton Kamambo, akabva azivisa Loga kuti maWarriors anofanirwa kuenda kumakwikwi ese enhabvu anoti African Nations Cup (CHAN), Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) 2021 neFifa World Cup 2022.   Muhurukuro nevatsigiri venhabvu vakasiyana vanoti remangwana remaWarriors rakajeka zvikuru zvichitevera kugadzwa kwakaitwa Loga.   Mutungamiri wesangano reFriends of Warriors, Edward Chimedza, anoti kuuya kwaLoga kwaunza chiedza chakanaka uye pane tarisiro huru yekuti achabata basa sebasa.   “Loga auya, tinofanirwa kumupa nguva anyatsobika chikwata chake uye Zifa ngaimutsigire nekumupa zvese zvaanoda kuti agoita basa rake nemazvo. Tine mukana wekuita zvikuru munhabvu naLoga uye tiri kumutemba kuti achabata basa, 2022 ndaona tichienda kuWorld Cup naye. Asi anofanirwa kutanga atidzosera kuAfcon zvekare,” anodaro Chimedza.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa neshasha inozivikanwa pakutsigira nhabvu, Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa achiti Loga anofanirwa kuwana rutsigiro ruzere kubva kuZifa, mapoka akasiyana anoona nezvenhabvu pamwechete nevatsigiri.   “Murairidzi wedu mutsva tinaye uye tiri kufamba naye, toda kumuona achibudirira. Anofanirwa kupihwa rutsigiro rwese rwaanoda kuti agobudirira mubasa rake. Kana akataura kuti ane vatambi vaanoda, ngavauye nenguva kuitira kuti ashande navo agozivana navo.   “Tine mitambo mikuru iri kuuya saka tinoziva kuti tikamutsigira zvakasimba tinobudirira chete, kunyanya mumutambo weCHAN uri kuuya munaKubvumbi. Asi mikuru yeAfcon neWorld Cup yatiri kuda ndine chivimbo chekuti ari kuzotiendesa,” anodaro.   Munyori mukuru weFriends of the Warriors, Zivanai Muwashu anoti kuve nemurairidzi wekunze kunobatsira zvikuru mune zvakasiyana.   “Uku ndiko kubudirira kwatave kuita munhabvu yedu, tave kufamba mugwara chairo naLoga. Tine varairidzi vemuno hapana kwataienda nekuti vamwe vaisarudza vatambi vekuzvikwata zvavo kuti vagouya kumaWarriors, manje naLoga achanyatsoongorora vese osarudza vatambi vaanoda avo vaanoona kuti ndivo vanokodzera kutambira maWarriors.   “ Mumaonero angu, izvi zvichatibatsira kuti vatambi vanogona vachashevedzwa uye vachatamba nhabvu votisvitsa kure,” anodaro Muwashu. Mutambo wekutanga waLoga achirairidza maWarriors uriko musi wa23 Kurume apo achasangana neAlgeria, kuAlgeria mumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuAfcon 2021.   Svondo rinotevera racho, maWarriors achange ari pamusha apo achasangana neAlgeria mumutambo weAfcon zvakare.   MunaKubvumbi, Loga ane basa guru rekubata sezvo achatungamirira maWarriors kumakwikwi eCHAN achaitirwa kuCameroon.   MaWarriors akaiswa muboka reGroup A rine zvikwata zvinoti Cameroon, Burkina Faso neMali.

column2: HATITYE SRI LANKA: GEMS
column3: ari kuLIVERPOOL, England naAbel Ndooka ari muHARARE KAPUTENI wechikwata chenyika chenetball chemaGems — Perpetual Siyachitema — anoti vacharwa semvumba uye vanoda kusimudzira mureza weZimbabwe kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup ayo ari kuitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland.   Achitaura neKwayedza, Siyachitema anoti maGems achatamba nemwoyo wose kuti vagohwina mitambo yavo vagopedza vari pakati pezvikwata zvikuru zviri kumakwishu aya.   MaGems ari muboka reGroup A umo achasangana nezvikwata zvinoti Australia — iyo inove shasha ine mukombe wenetball — Sri Lanka neNorthen Ireland.   Mutambo wekutanga wechikwata chenyika ichi uriko musi weChishanu chino apo chichasangana neSri Lanka kunhandare yeM&S Bank Arena kuLiverpool Court Two.   Mushure mezvo, maGems achazosangana neAustralia musi weMugovera ozopedzisira neNorthen Ireland musi weSvondo.   Siyachitema anoti kubva zvavakasvika kuEngland, vange vachiongorora mitambo yeSri Lanka iyo yavachasangana navo mumutambo wekutanga ndokuona kuti vatambi vayo varefu zvikuru kusiyana navo sezvo vakati pfupikei.   “Takaongorora chikwata cheSri Lanka, chine vatambi varefu zvikuru kudarika isu asi murairidzi wedu akatsvaga nzira dzekuti tinogona kuvakunda sei.   “Zvekureba kwavo hatisi kuzozvitarisa uye hazvireve kuti vachatikunda, isu ticharwa semvumba mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Isu senyika pasi rese tiri pechi13 pakutamba netball saka kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup tiri kuda kurwa zvakasimba totamba sechikwata kuti tirpedze tiri mutop 8.”   Achitaura pamusoro perutsigiro rwavakawana kubva kumakambani akasiyana anosanganisira Simbisa Brands, Econet, National Foods nemamwe, Siyachitema anoti zvakavasimudzira morari yavo uye zvave kuvatuma kuti vashande nesimba kumakwishu aya.   “Tinotenda zvikuru makambani ese akatibatsira kuti rwendo rwedu rureruke kuenda kumakwishu aya, zvaisava nyore kudai vasipo saka tinotenda zvikuru.   “Rutsigiro rwatawana rwaunza mufaro kwatiri isu vanasikana veZimbabwe uye zvave kutituma kuti titambe nesimba kumakwishu aya,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Pazvikwata zvese zvemuAfrica, maGems ari kumakwishu aya nezvimwe zvikwata zvinoti South Africa, Uganda neMalawi.   Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Netball Association, Leticia Chipandu, anoti vasikana vemaGems vacharwa vamire mumitambo yavo.   Kubva kare, zvikwata zvizhinji zvaikwikwidza kumakwishu epasi rose akasiyana hazvina kumbobvira zvauya nemukombe izvo zvakapedzisira kuitwa nechikwata chemaGolden Girls icho chakahwina menduru yegoridhe kumaOlympics mugore ra1980.   Asi, Chipandu anoti rwendo rwuno zviri kuzoshanduka.   “Chandinovimbisa ndechekuti hatisi kungoburitswa mumutambo uyu uchangotanga, izvo kwete bodo.   “Vasikana vachatamba kusvika kumagumo uye ndinokuvimbisai kuti tichaunza mufaro mukuru kunyika yedu kubva kumakwishu aya,” anodaro Chipandu.

column2: VaChamisa Vovimbisa Huchi neMukaka Kana Vakasarudzwa seMutungamiri weNyika
column3: Mutungamiri we MDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vavimbisa vanhu veku Hwedza kuMashonaland East kuti kana vakasarudzwa semutungamiri wenyika, vachasimudzira dunhu reHwedza kuitira kuti vagari vemudunhu iri vasatambudzike sezvavari kuita pari zvino. Vachitaura kuvanhu vakawanda vaungana kumaruwa ekuHwedza, VaChamisa vatora mukana uyu kutenda mutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nemutevedzeri wavo, Va Constantino Chiwenga, nebasa guru ravakaita mukurwira rusununguko rwenyika. Asi VaChamisa vaudza vaviri ava kuti vachisiira matomu kune vechidiki vanokwanisa kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. VaChamisa vaudzawo vagari vekuHwedza kuti hurumende yavo ichagadzirisa nyaya dzemari kuitira kuti munyika musashandiswe ma bond notes. VaChamisa, avo vanogara vakataura nyaya yemigwagwa vachiti ichagadzirwa kuita kunge spaghetti, vatiwo vachasimbaradza nyaya dzekurima kumaruwa kuitira kuti vanhu vave nehupenyu hwakanaka. Vati hurumende yavo ichawanisa varimi vese matarakita kuitira kuti vasashandise mombe pakurima. VaChamisa, avo vari pamakakatanwa nemutungamiri9 weimwe MDC-T, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, panyaya yekuti ndiyani chaiye mutungamiri weMDC-T zvichitevera kushaya kwevaimbove mutungamiri weMDC, Va Morgan Tsvangirai muna Kukadzi gore rino, vatora mukana wemusangano wekuHwedza uyu kuudza madzimai kuti hurumende yavo ichasimudzira hupenyu hwevanhukadzi sezvo vari musimboti wenyika. VaChamisa vapedza kutaura vachivimbisa vanhu vekuHwedza kuti hurumende yavo ichagadzirisa zvipatara nemakiriniki kuitira kuti vanhu varapwe nyore. Dunhu reMashonaland East rinoziivakanwa zvikuru nekuvhotera Zanu PF munguva dzesarudzo. Musarudzo yemutungamiri yakaitwa muna 2013, VaRobert Mugabe veZanu PF vakawana mavhoti 320,719, ukuwo VaMorgan Tsvangirai veMDC vakawana mavhoti 90,165. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti MDC Alliance inofanirwa kushanda zvakasimba kuti ikunde VaMnangagwa veZanu PF musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

column2: VaMnangagwa Vanoshanyira Glen View Yanetseka neKorera
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vashanyira musha weGlen View uko kwapararira chirwere chekorera panguya iyo hurumende ichiti iri kuda mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora achashandiswa mukurwisa nechirwere ichi. VaMnangagwa vatambirwa nemufaro mukuru nevatsigiri veZanu PF vanga vaungana pachipatara pamwe nevana vechikoro vanga vachibva kuchikoro pavaenda kunoona vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere chekorera mumusha unogara veruzhinji muGlen View. Vachitaura pazvitoro zveTichagarika zviri mumusha weGlen View mushure mekushanyira chipatara cheGlen View Polyclinic uko kuri kurapwa vanhu vakati kuti vari kurwara nechirwere chekorera, VaMnangagwa vati hurumende yavo ichabatsira kanzuru yeHarare mukutakurwa kwemarara, kugadzirwa kwepombi dzinotakura tsvina pamwe nekuwanisa vagari mvura yakachena kuitira kuti chirwere chekorera chipere muHarare uye chisarambe chichipararira kune dzimwe nzvimbo dziri kunze kweHarare. VaMnangagwa vakurudzirawo kuti veruzhinji vagare vakashambidzika pose pavari kuti vasatapurirane chirwere ichi. Meya weguta reHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, avo vanga varipowo pashanywa naVaMnangagwa, vati sekanzuru vari kuedza pose pavanogona napo kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira. VaGomba vati pane zvibhorani zviviri zvavatovhrara zviri muGlen View zvange zvave kukonzera kupararira kwechirwere chekorera. Mugari wekuGlen View, Amai Mascelyn Chibweya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara zvikuru kuti kanzuru iri kugadzira pombi idzo dzanga dzave kusanganisa mvura yekunwa pamwe netsvina kana kuti masuweji. Mumwe mugari wemuGlen View, VaJoe Kadzviti, vati zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvingadai zvakafa dai pasina kumhanyidzana kuri kuitwa nevemasangano akazvimirira, vemabhizimusi, kanzuru pamwe nehurumende mukurwisana nechirwere ichi icho chapfunya chisero muHarare. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vaparura homwe yavari kukumbira kuti izadzwe nemari neveruzhinji yakanangana nekurrwisa chirwere chekorera. VaNcube vati hurumende iri kuda mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhati emadhora ichashandiswa mukurwisa chirwere chekorera. Gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vanoti pane vanhu makumi matatu nevaviri vafa nechirwere chekorera kusvika pari nhasi uye huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi hwave kudzikira. Chirwere chekorera chakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina muna 2008. No media source currently available

column2: Vorwisa Covid neKarate
column3: SHASHA yekarate — Sensei Tyson Mujuru — akavamba chikwata chemutambo uyu kwaNyamweda, kuMhondoro nechinangwa chekusimudzira vechidiki avo hupenyu hwavo hwange hwakanganiswa nedenda reCovid-19 pamwe nekuvakurudzira kuti vasiyane nekutora zvinodhaka.   Chikwata ichi chinonzi Mujuru Shukokai Karate Academy chakaumbwa kutanga kwegore rino apo nyika yaive palockdown iyo yakakonzerwa nechirwere cheCovid-19.   “Ini semugari wekuno neruzivo rwangu rwemutambo weKarate, ndakaona vechidiki – kusanganisirawo neni – vakagara kudzimba nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19. Vamwe vakanga vave kutora zvinodhaka zvakaita semutoriro nezvimwe nekuenda kudoro rekachasu nechikokiyana.   Ndakabva ndakumbira kuvakuru vemuno kuti nditange chikwata ichi, zano rangu ndokutambirwa,” anodaro Sensei Mujuru.   Anoti kubva zvaatanga kudzidzisa vechidiki ava, ari kuona shanduko huru muhupenyu hwavo uye anotarisira kuti vamwe vachave shasha dzetsiva mune remangwana.   Kunze kwazvo, Sensei Mujuru anoti ari kuvadzidzisa zvakare kukosha kwekuzvidzivirira kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere cheCovid-19.   “Tiri kutevedza nzira dzose dzekudzivirira denda reCovid-19 dzinosanganisira kupfeka mamasiki, kugeza maoko nemvura inochururuka nesipo, kuita daranganwa nezvimwe zvakawanda izvo tinotevedza,” anodaro.   Sensei Mujuru anoenderera mberi achiti, “Denda reCovid-19 machiremba anoti rinoda kuti vanhu vapote vachisimbisa miviri vachibuda dikita zvinova zvatinoita kuburikidza nemutambo wetsiva uyu.” VaRenious Gomba (63) vemumusha waSabhuku Manhanzva kwakare kuMhondoro vanotenda zvikuru chikwata chekarate ichi vachiti chiri kuwanisa vechidiki zvekuita.   “Vana vave kuwana zvekuita vachinosimbisa miviri uko vanotaurirwa kuipa kwekutora zvinodhaka zvinoita kuti vasawane nguva yekumberereka vachinyengerana zvekuba nekuita mimwe misikanzwa,” vanodaro.   Marshal Muzondo anove mumwe ari muchikwata chekarate ichi anoti vari kubatsirikana zvikuru kuburikidza nekudzidziswa kwavari kuitwa.

column2: Nyaya yeKuendeswa kweMasimba kuMatunhu Inotsviriridza paMusangano weStudio 7 kuBulawayo
column3: Nyaya yekuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu yakatsviriridza pamusangano wakaitwa muBulawayo neChishanu manheru, vamwe vagari vachitsutsumwa zvikuru nekwavanoti kusarangarirwa nehurumende kwematunhu ekuMatabeleland. Pamusangano uyu, uyo wakaitwa nenhepfenyuro yeStudio 7 yakabatana neMedia Centre, pakaita makakatanwa makuru pamusoro pekuti chii chaizvo chinoreva kuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu. Asi vanhu vakawanda vaive pamusangano uyu vakaratidza pachena kuti havazi kufara nenyaya yekuparara kwemaindasitiri muguta reBulawayo pamwe nekusarira kumashure munyaya dzebudiriro kwavakati kuri kuita matunhu eMatabeleland. VaNqobizitha Dube, vanove mudzidzisi muzvidzidzo zvehupfumi uye vari mumwe wevatauri pamusangano uyu, vakati hazvishamise kuti nyaya yekuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu inokonzera makakatanwa sezvo ichibata raramo yeveruzhinji. VaDube vakati zvakakosha kuti vanhu munyika vabvumirane gwara kana nzira yakajeka yekuti izvi zvichaitwa nenzira ipi. Takunda Madzana mumwe wechidiki vaive pamusangano uyu. Takunda akati haabvumirane nepfungwa yekuti hupfumi hugovanwe kuchishandiswa huwandu hwevanhu vari mumatunhu akasiyana-siyana, achitiwo maonero ake ndeekuti kuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu haizi nyaya inofanirwa kunetsa. Vamwe vanhu vaive pamusangano uyu vakati nyaya yekuti kune vanhu vakawanda vanogara munzvimbo dzavasingabvi, humbimbindoga pamwe nehuwori kunyanya hunoitwa nevezvematongerwo enyika ndezvimwe zvinhu zvinokonzera kusarira kumashure kwematunhu ari munyika. Asi mutevedzeri wameya weguta reBulawayo VaTinashe Kambarami, avo vaivewo pamusangano uyu, vakati vanhu vemuZimbabwe havafanirwe kuitirana rusarura kuchishandiswa nyaya yerudzi kana kuti munhu anobva kupi, vachitiwo matambudziko akatarisana neveruzhinji munyika akangofanana. VaKambarami vakabvuma kuti huwori idambudziko guru munyika asi vakati kana kuchitariswa makanzura, pave nemitemo yakajeka inobatsira kudzivirira nyaya yehuwori. Mutauriri webato reZAPU, VaIphithule Maphosa, avo vaivepowo pamusangano uyu, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti kuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu kunogona kubatsira kupedza matambudziko everuzhinji munyika, asi vakati havazi kugutsikana nenzira iri kutorwa nehurumende mukuti danho iri rizadzikiswe. Musangano uyu waive wekupedzisira muchikamu chemisangano yakaitwa neStudio 7 ichishanda nesangano reMedia Centre munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika senzira yekunzwa mafungiro everuzhinji panyaya dzebudiriro nezvimwe zvinovabata mumararamiro avo zuva nezuva. Misangano iyi yaiitwa nerutsigiro rwemuzinda wenyika yeAmerica muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

column2: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Kuratidzira kweVanopikisa Hakuvavhundutsi
column3: Mutungamiri weZanu PF, uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, vanga vari kuMatebeleland North uko vapa vagari vemudunhu iri matsiru anodarika chiuru chimwe chete muchirongwa che Command Livestock. VaMnangagwa vaita izvi vasati vaita musangano ku Lupane uko kwapindwa nevatsigiri vebato ravo. VaMnangagwa vaudza vatsigiri vavo kuti hurumende yavo itsva haifi yakakanganwa vakuru vakaunza rusununguko munyika kusanganisira vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyija, Va Robert Mugabe nevamwe vakashaya. VaMnangagwa vati pavakapinda panyanga gore rakapera vakaziva kukosha kwemadzishe nehutungamiri hwemakereke. Vati vakaita misangano nemadzishe ose uye hutungamiriri hwemakereke ose munyika kuti vanzwe kubva kwavari maererano nekufambiswa kwenyika kuenda kumberi. VaMnangagwa vati chikuru chavakaona kuti chinobatsira nyika kubva mumadhaka ayanga yakanyura, kumutsiridza mabhizinesi, izvo zvakaita kuti vaite misangano nevemabhizinesi munyika yese vachisunga zvibvumirano zvekushanda pamwe chete mukusimudzira nyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vati hurumende yavo yakazvipira kushanda nevanhu vese, mukugadzirisa zvose zvinoda kugadziriswa. VaMnangagwa vapeta musangano wavo nekushoropodza kuratidzira kuri kuitwa nevemapato anopikisa vachiti izvi hazvitadzisi bato ravo kukunda musarudzo nekuti kuratidzira hakusi kuchavhota. Va Mnangagwa vatenda rutsigiro rwevagari vemudunhu reLupane vakavakumbira kuti vagoziva pekuvhotera muzuva resarudzo. No media source currently available

column2: Vanamukoti Vanosungwa Mushure Mekuedza Kuungana paChipatara cheHarare Hospital
column3: Sangano rinomirira vanamukoti vanoshanda muzvipatara zvehurumende, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, ZINA, rinoti nhengo dzaro dzasungwa neMuvhuro mushure mekunge dzaedza kuungana pachipatara cheHarare Central Hospital apo dzanga dzichitarisira kuita musangano. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo vanoti vanamukoti ava vanga vachiedza kusangana kuti vazeye matambudziko ari kusangana navanamukoti anosanganisira mihoro, kuramwa mabasa kwavari kuita pamwe nekudzingwa kuri kuitwa vari kuramwa mabasa vari kugara mudzimba dzepachipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals. VaDongo vanoti vanamukoti vasungwa ava vabva kuzvipatara zvinoti Parirenyatwa, Harare Central neChitungwiza, uye panguva yataenda pamhepo vanga vasati vanzwa kuti vari kupomerwa mhosva ipi, asi vanga vakachengetedzwa pakamba yemapurisa yeMbare. Sangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights razivisa mugwaro raraburitsa kuti vanamukoti vasungwa vanosvika gumi nevatatu, uye vacharara muhusungwa vachitarisirwa kumira pamberi pedare neChipiri. Kusungwa kwavanamukoti ava kunouya panguva iyo vanamukoti muzvipatara zvehurumende zvekuBulawayo zvinoti Mpilo, United Bulawayo Hospitals neEngutsheni, varatidzirawo vachinyunyuta kuti hurumende haisati yavapindura zvichemo zvavo. Vanamukoti vari kuda kuti hurumende ivape mihoro yavo nemari yekuAmerica yavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018. Studio yaedza kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe pamusoro penyaya iyi, asi vati vanga vari pane imwe nhare nekudaro vanga vasingakwanise kutaura nesu. No media source currently available

column2: Mumimiriri weNkulumane VaThamsanqa Mahlangu Vanoshaya
column3: Vaimbova mutevedzeri wegurukota rinooona nezvevechidiki uye vari mumiriri weNkulumane muparamende vari nhengo yeMDC T, VaThamsanqa Mahlangu vakashaya neMuvhuro. Mutauriri weMDCT, VaObert Gutu vakazivisa kushaya kwaVaMahlangu avo vati vanga vachirwara nechirwere chegomarara. Mashoko abuditswa naVaGutu anoti VaMahlangu vakashayika mambakwedza uye vati bato ravo rarasikirwa zvikuru nemumwe wevanhu vakavamba musangano weMDC muna 1999. Vanoona nezvekurongwa kwemabasa muMDC-T VaAbednico Bhebhe vati bato ravo rarasikirwa negamba. Mashoko aVaBhebhe atsinhirwawo nevamwe vaimbova nhengo yeparamende VaFelix Magalela-Mafa. Vanoona nezvekurongwa kwemisangano mudunhu reHarare muMDCT, VaRhino Mashaya vati kushayika kwaita VaMahlangu kwavarwadza zvikuru vachiti chanyanyovarwadza ndechekuti VaMahlangu vange vasati vapedza rwendo rwavo rwekuti munyika muve nehutongi hwejekerere. Muzvare Yvonne Musarurwa avo vakashanda naVaMahlangu muboka revechidiki muMDC reYouth Assembly, vati gwanza rasiiwa naVaMahlangu richanetsa kuvhara. Imwe nhengo yeMDC yakapinda muparamende mushure mekudomwa nebato iri pasi peProportional Representation, Muzvare Susan Mutsunga vati vachasuwa basa ranga richibatwa naVaMahlangu muparamende pamwe nemubato ravo. VaMahlangu avo vakaberekwa musi wa27 Kubvumbi muna 1971 vakamboita mutungamiri weboka revechidiki mu MDC-T kwemakore mashanu zvichitevera kusarudzwa kwavakaitwa pakongiresi yebato iri kuBulawayo muna 2011. Vakazodomwa nemutungamiri weMDCT, VaMorgan Tsvangirai kuti vave mutevetedzeri wegurukota rinowona nezvevechidiki muhurumende yamubatanidzwa. Vakazotsiviwa pachinzvimbo ichi naVaTongai Matutu. Vasiya mudzimai Brenda Zaranyika nevanakomana vaviri vanoti Munyaradzi naZibusiso. Vanhu vakaungana panhamba 15053 Nkulumane 12 muBulawayo uye hurongwa hwekuradzikwa kwavo hwanga husati hwaziviswa. No media source currently available

column2: ZEC Inoramba Mashoko eKuti Vanhu Vavhota muSarudzo dzeBy-Election kuChipinge Ward 16 Vanga Vachimanikidzwa Kuratidza Pavavhotera
column3: Sarudzo dzema by-elections dzaitwa nhasi kuChipinge Rural District Ward 16 nekuKariba Ward 5, dzinonzi dzafamba zvakanaka kunyange hazvo kuchinzi kwanga kuine huwandu hwevanhu vabatsirwa kuvhota, zvikuru kuChipinge. Zvinonziwo kuChipinge vamwe vanhu vanga vachiudzirwa pekuvhotera uye kuti vatore mifananidzo yemagwaro ekuvhotesa kana vasarudza vavanoda kuratidza kuti vavhotera ani. Asi Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yaburitsa mashoko ekuti manyepo kuti vanhu vavhota musarudzo yeWard 16 by-election kuChipinge Rural District vanga vachimanikidzwa kutora mifananidzo yemagwaro ekuvhotesa vachiratidza pavavhotera. Mashoko aburitswa nemukuru wezvesarudzo muZEC, VaUtoile Silaigwana, anoti vashandi veZEC vanoziva chose kuti zviri kunze kwemutemo wesarudzo kuti vanhu vatore mifananidzo panzvimbo dziri kuvhoterwa, kunze kwekunge vatopiwa mvumo. Vanotiwo zviri kunze kwemutemo kuti munhu aratidze paavhotera. Kunyange hazvo paita zvimhingamipinyi zvakadai, vanhu vanonzi vabuda kunovhota vane huwandu zvichienzaniswa nesarudzo dzema by-election dzadarika. Vanga vachitevera sarudzo idzi vari kuChipunge Rural District Ward 5, mukuru vesangano revechidiki rePlatform for Youth and Community Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vaudza studio 7 kuti dzafamba murunyararo asi vaona kuti vanhu vanga vachibatsirwa kuvhota vanga vakawandisa. VaMadhuku vatiwo vaona kuti madzimai ndiwo anga akawanda kudarika vanhu vose vavhota. KuKariba, mukuru anoona nezvemabasa musangano rinoongorora sarudzo, reElection Resource Centre, VaSolomon Bobosibunu, vanotiwo kunyange hazvo sarudzo dzose dzaitwa murunyararo, sangano ravo raona kuti vanhu vanga vachinovhota vari muzvikwata zvikwata, zvikuru kuChipinge, kuita sekunge vanga vachiita zvekutinhwa. VaKwikwidzana kuChipinge vanoti Amai Gladys Muposhi veZanu PF, Va Rapheus Sithole veCCC, VaRemeredzai Ziki veNational Constitutional Assembly pamwe naVaZachariah Sigauke vebato re Patriotic Zimbabweans. Vakwikwidzana kuKariba ndaVaKudakwashe mafusire veZanu PF naVaTonderai Chikwati veCCC. Zvabuda musarudzo zvanga zvisati zvaziviswa pataenda pamhepo. No media source currently available

column2: FC Platinum Yokurudzirwa Kukunda Mitambo yepaMusha Kuti Ibudirire muMakwikwi eCaf Champions League
column3: Chikwata cheFC Platinum chirikuvhura makundano enhabvu egore rino asi paine mibvunzo. Vanotevera mutambo wenhabvu havasi kugutsikana nematambiro arikuita FC Platinum pamusha payo mumitambo yeCaf Champions League vakatarisana nemutambo mukuru neOrlando Pirates yekuSouth Africa iyo yakatora mukombe uyu muna 1995. Nhoroondo yenhabvu muAfrica inotaura kuti zvikwata zvinokunda nemutsindo pamusha ndizvo zvinowanzoenderera mberi nemakundano asi matambiro eKugona Kunenge Kudada muMandava Stadium asimudza mibvunzo mumukana wavo wekusvika kuma kota fainari. FC Platinum yakatatarika zvinotyisa neCnaps yekuMadagascar ndokuzokunda 1-0 mumutambo uyo vaitarisirwa kukanda zvibodzwa pamadiro, ndokuzoita zvekare mangange 0-0 ne Otoyo Oho yekuCongo. Muteveri wenhabvu VaFrancis Mwendamberi vanoti Kugona Kunenge Kudada inofanira kuwedzera mwando pamatambiro ayo pamusha kana ichida kubudirira mumakwikwi aya. Pamusoro peOrlando Pirates, FC Platinum iri mugungano rimwechete ne Esperance yekuTunisia iyo ine mukombe uyu pamwe ne Horoya yeku Guinea. Zvikwata zviviri zvinopedza zviri pamusoro mugungano iri ndizvo zvinoenderera mberi nemakwikwi aya. Muteveri wechikwata cheDynamos VaObert Masvotore vanoti FC Platinum isatarise mazita kana mukurumbira une zvikwata zvavari kusangana nazvo. Mumwe muteveri wemutambo uyu VaTatenda Makazhu ndivo vanofunga kuti Kugona Kunenge Kudada inokwanisa kusvika mufainari yemakundano aya. Asi murairidzi wePirates Milutin Sredojevic audza mapepanhau ekuSouth Africa kuti ari kutya kutamba nechikwata cheFC Platinum nenyaya yekuti chikwata chitsva mumakundano aya uye ati anoremekedza murairidzi wacho Norman Mapeza zvakanyanya. Ati sezvo Pirates iri kutamba neFC Platinum mumutambo wekutanga kuMandava Stadium kuZvishavane, zvinonetsa zvikuru kuenda iko nemugwagwa. Asi Pirates iri kubheja kuti inosimudza mukomb weChampions League kechipiri munhoroondo yayo. Asi FC Platinum ichange isina mutambi akatamba zvinonwisa mvura mwaka uno kana kuti Soccer Star of the Year, Rodwell Chinyengetere, uyo ave kuenda kunotambira Baroka FC ku South Africa naWinston Mhango uyo arikuenda kuSouth Africa zvekare. Kugona Kuenge Kudada irikutarisira kusvika kana kudarika chidanho chakasvikwa neDynamos iyo yakasvika mufainari yeCaf Champions League muna 1998 nemuma semi finari muna 2008. No media source currently available `

column2: VanaChiremba veHurumende Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa
column3: Vanachiremba vanoshandira muzvipatara zvehurumende vanoti vangangokanda mapadza pasi chero nguva mushure mekunge hurumende yakundikana kuzadzisa zvivimbiso zvayakavapa pavakamboramwa mabasa gore rapera. Mutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba ava, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Fortune Nyamande vanoti iri ndiro danho ravanogona chete kutora sezvo hurumende iri kuratidza kusave nehanya nemararamiro avanachiremba. Doctor Nyamande vanoti bazi rezvehutano rinofanirwa kunzwisisa danho ravo kana vakazoramwa mabasa sezvo hupenyu huri kuramba huchiomera vanachiremba. Vanoti hurumende yakanga yavavimbisa kuti ichaita kuti vakwanise kupinza dzimotokari dzavanenge vatenga kubva kunze vasingabhadhariswe mari dzemitero, asi hapana zvati zvaitwa kubva gore rakapera. Vanotiwo zvakare hurumende yakanga yavimbisa kuti ichatarisa nezvechichemo chavo chekuti itarise zvakare nyaya yepekugara, asi chave kuvashamisa ndechekuti mitero yedzimba ndiyo yakatokwidzwa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata vehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi Doctor Nyamande vanoti havasati vave nezuva rwekuti vachatanga kuramwa mabasa riini. “Handikwanisi kupa zuva, uye handikwanisi zvakare kutaura kuti ticharatidzira sei asi chandinongoziva ndechekuti zvinhu zvakaramba zvakamira mamiriro azvakaita izvi eeh, vanachiremba tichagara pasi,” vanodaro Doctor Nyamande. No media source currently available

column2: VaChasi Vanoti Hurukuro neEskom Dzichiri Kuenderera Mberi paNyaya yeMagetsi
column3: Gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto VaFortune Chasi vanoti hurukuro nekambani yeESKOM yekuSouth Africa panyaya dzekuti Zimbabwe itengeserwe magetsi dzichiri kuenderera mberi. VaChasi vaudza Studio 7 kuti parizvino South Africa haina magetsi ari kutengesera Zimbabwe. No media source currently available Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kukambani yeESKOM iyo yakaita chikwereti chemari inosvika mabhiriyoni makumi maviri emarands mukushanda kwayo kubva gore rapera kusvika muna Kurume gore rino. Kambani iyi yave kurarama nerubatsiro rwairi kupihwa nehurumende yeSouth Africa. Vakuru muESKOM vari kuti Zimbabwe inofanira kubhadhara chikwereti chinosvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu emadhora ekuAmerica kana ichida kutenga magetsi.
