Zvichakadaro, makambani mazhinji munyika ari kuti ari kutatarika nenyaya yekushaya magetsi zvopa kuti mamwe avhare kana kuti ati vanhu vashande maawa mashoma husiku panenge paine magetsi. Asi dambudziko iri riri kupa mukanha kune mamwe makambani akaita seZimplow iyo iri kutengesa magwenya emagetsi kana kuti magenerator. Kambani iyi inotiwo yakaita zviri nani gore rino kunyangwe zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika. Mukuru mukambani iyi kana kuti Group Chief Executive VaVimbayi Nyakudya vanoti kambani yavo iri kuitawo mari nekutengesa magejo anodonzwa nemombe munyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica. No media source currently available

column2: VaBiden Vanokunda VaTrump Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weAmerica
column3: Vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica zvichitevera kukunda kwavaita mudunhu rePennsylvania.  VaBiden, avo vane makore makumi manomwe nemasere ekuberekwa, vatora zvigaro zvose makumi maviri zve electoral college zvemudunhu rePennsylvania ndokuita zvigaro zvinodarika mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe vachidarika zvigaro zvinodiwa kuti munhu adomwe semunhu akakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaBiden vakunda mutungamiri weAmerica pari zvino, VaDonald Trump, avo vakabuda pachena kuti vari kupikisa mumatare maverengerwo akaitwa mavhoti mumamwe matunhu emuAmerica.  VaBiden vachaitwa mutungamiri weAmerica wechimakumi mana nematanhatu apo vachagadzwa zviri pamutemo muna Ndira gore rinouya. Kukunda kwaVaBiden kunoreva kuti mutevedzeri wavo, Amai Kamala Harris, vari kupinda munhoroondo yekuva mudzimai wekutanga, uye ari mutema, kuva mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika munhoroondo yeAmerica yemakore mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemana.  VaBiden vakashanda vari mutevedzeri waVaBarack Obama kubva muna 2009 kusvika muna Ndira 2017, apo pakatoreswa VaTrump mhiko yekuva mutungamiri wenyika mushure mekukunda Amai Hilary Clinton musarudzo yakaitwa muna Mbudzi 2016. VaBiden vakashandawo senhengo yedare Senate kwemakore makumi matatu nematanhatu. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika uye vari mudzidzisi paDeVry University kuOhio, Professor Elliot Masocha, vanoti zvanga zviri pachena kuti VaBiden vachakunda musarudzo iyi. Asi VaMasocha vanoti VaBiden vane mutoro mukuru wekugadzirisa zvinhu munyika pamwe nekunze kwenyika zvavati zvakavhiringwa naVaTrump. No media source currently available

column2: Madzimai ekuHwande Oratidzira muHarare Achinyunyuta kuHurumende
column3: Madzimai evashandi vekuHwange Colliery vari kuronga kuratidzira neChina muHarare vachinyunyuta nekusapindira kwehurumende mukugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nevashandi vepakambani inoshandira varume vavo. Madzimai ekuHwange ave nemazuva anodarika zana achiratidzira senzira yekutsutsuma kusabhadharwa kwevarume vavo kwemakore mashanu apfuura. Kuratidzira uku kuchange kuchitsigirwa nesangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development. Muzvare Janet Zhou, avo vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development, vati vacharatidzira serutsigiro kumadzimai ekuHwange, uye kuti hurumende ione kuti pane dambudziko rinoda kugadzirwa. Imwe nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvezvicherwa, Amai Fanny Chirisa, vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti hurumende haisi kubuda pachena panyaya yekusabhadharwa kwevashandi vepakambani iyi, kunyange hazvo hurumende ine zvikamu zvakawanda zvehupfumi mukambani iyi. Sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvemadzimai, Amai Priscilla Misihairambwi Mushonga, vanotiwo semadzimai ari mudare reparamende vanofanirwa kunyara nekuregerera madzimai aya achiratidzira kwenguva ndefu vasina kupindira munyaya iyi. Kambani yeHwange Colliery inonzi ine mari dzeveshandi dzinopfuura mamiriyoni makumi manomwe emadhora. Vachibvunzwa mudare reparamende nezvemadzimai ari kuratidzira aya kuHwange Colliery, gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Petronella Kagonye, vati madzimai aya ari kushandiswa nevanhu vari mune zvematongerwo enyika. Amai Kagonye vati sehurumende vakagadzirisa nyaya dzezvevashandi. No media source currently available

column2: Jordan Zemura anotambira mari shoma
column3: MUTAMBI wenhabvu weAFC Bournemouth nemaWarriors eZimbabwe – Jordan Zemura (22) – ndiye ari kutambira mari shoma kuchikwata chake mwaka uno apo chiri kukwikwidza muEnglish Premier League.   Mutsvakurudzo, zvaonekwa kuti Zemura, uyo akasaina chibvumirano chake kuBournemouth achiri kutambira chikwata chevadiki, anotambira mari inosvika £385 pasvondo.   Mari yaanotambira iyi yakaderera zvikuru kana ichienzaniswa nevamwe vatambi vemuchikwata chake vakadai saJefferson Lerma uyo anotambira mari inosvika £55 000 pasvondo.   Tichitarisa mari inotambirwa naZemura, zvinoreva kuti pamwedzi anotambira £1 432 uye mwaka wose achitambira £17 184.   Mari yaanotambira mwaka wose haisvike pane inotambirwa naLerma yepasvondo rimwe chete.   Muchikwata ichi zvekare, vamwe vatambi vakadai saDominic Solanke vanonzi vanotambira mari inosvika £50 000 pasvondo, kuchiti Phillip naLewis Cook vanotambira £40 000 pasvondo pamumwe nemumwe wavo.    Mari dzinotambirwa nevatambi veBournemouth – (spotrac.com)   Asi pane tarisiro yekuti Bournemouth ichatanga kuita hurukuro naZemura munguva inotevera kuti iwedzere kondirakiti yake iyo inotarisirwa kupera gore rinotevera. Mutambi uyu ari kutarisirwa kutamba zvikuru mwaka uno sezvo achidiwa zvakanyanya naScott Parker uyo aimushandisa mwaka wadarika apo vakahwina tikiti rekupinda muEPL.

column2: Zvizvarwa zve Zimbabwe Zvoratidzira Kutsigira Mauto eZimbabwe
column3: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muWashington DC nematunhu akapoteredza zvakaungana neMugovera pamuzinda weZimbabwe uri mu Washington DC zvichitsigira zviitiko zviri kuitika kumusha, zvichitevera kupindira kwemauto mune zvematongerwo enyika, uye kumanikidzwa kwaVaMugabe nebato ravo re Zanu PF, kuti vasiye chigaro, izvo zviri kutsigirwawo neveruzhinji. Mumwe wevakaronga kufora uku, Muzvare Shingi Mangwiro, vanoti vashamiswa nekubuda kwakaita zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, kunyange hazvo kwaitonhora zvekukwidza hamba mumuti. No media source currently available Ukuwo zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinonzi zvakabva kumatunhu ari kure akaita se Pennsylvania, New Jersey, New York, Virginia ne Maryland Zvizvarwa zve Zimbabwe nevamwe vanofarira Zimbabwe vanogara ku Texas, vaunganawo paCity Hall muDallas vachiratidzira kutsigira kwavo zviri kuitika kuZimbabwe. Mumwe wevakaratidzira Dr. Prisca Ngondo, vanoti vanotarisira kuti Zimbabwe itange patsva uye vanotarisira kuti dzimwe nyika hadzipindire munyaya yekupindira kwemauto mukutongwa kwenyika. No media source currently available

column2: VaDzvokora Vokurudzira Vana veZimbabwe Vari Kunze Kuti Vabatsire Mukugadzirisa Zvinhu Kumusha
column3: Mumwe wevari kushanda mukugadzirisa ramangwana rinotarisirwa ndaVaTawanda Dzvokora, avo vanozviti Chief Svosve. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvakawanda zvinoramba zviine shuviro yekuti zvinhu kumusha zvichanaka nerimwe zuva. Asi pahuwandu hwazvo, zvimwe ndizvo zviri kubatawo nepazvinogona napo mukuedza kuti hutongi hwejechetere huri kutarisirwa nevakawanda huitike nekukasika. Mumwe wevari kushanda mukugadzirisa ramangwana rinotarisirwa iri ndaVaTawanda Dzvokora, avo vanozviti Chief Svosve. Vanoti hapana chinombonakidza pakugara kunze kwenyika. “Ini ndiri munhu wekumusha, saka ndinoramba ndichitarisira kuti zvinhu zvichanaka chete, asi kwete nekuti vanhu vari kumusha chete ndivo vanofanirwa kushanda asi kuti kana nesuwo tiri mu diaspora,” vanodaro VaDzvokora. VaDzvokora, avo vaimbove murairidzi vakambodzidzisawo munyika yeBotswana vasati vasunga twavo nemhuri yavo vakananga kuUnited States of America kudunhu reNorth Dakota uko kwavakasvikopinda munyaya dzemhando dzemoto vachisiya zvekubata choko. “Ndagara mu diaspora kwe 15 years, 10 ndiri kuBotswana then five ndiri muno umu, asi pfungwa dzinenge dzingori kumusha nekuti muno tiri musango. Saka kare vakuru vaiti kunonzi kutetereka.” VaDzvokora, avo vane makore makumi mana nemashanu ekuberekwa, ndivo zvakare mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubato rinopikisa hurumende reZimbabwe First iro rinotungamirwa naVaMaxwell Zeb Shumba. Ndivo zvakare munyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mumubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weNational Electoral Reform Agenda, kana kuti NERA, vachimirira bato ravo reZim First, uyo uri kurwira kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena. Vanoti vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vanofanirwa kuitawo pavo mukuwedzera kuti zvinhu zvikasike. Kumusha vanoti vari kubatsirawo nekutumira mbatya, chikafu nezvimwe zvakadaro kuburikidza nechechi yavo yeZimbabwe Methodist Church. “Gore rega rega tinotumira munhu kumusha anonogovera zvinhu zvatinenge taunganidza pamwe nekutenga,” VaDzvokora vanodaro. Vanoti vari kutenga dzimba kumusha senzira yekuunganidza nayo hupfumi uye pari zvino vari kuvaka imba yekuti vari parwendo vanogona kurara kana kuti lodge kuChinhoyi. No media source currently available

column2: Mapurisa neVasori Vanosungwawo Munyaya yeGoridhe Yakasungirwa Muzvare Rushwaya
column3: Hurumende inoti yasunga vamwe vanhu vatanhatu vane chekuita nenyaya iri kupomerwa vanga vari mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Miners Federation, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, Muzvare Henrietta Rushwaya, avo vakasungwa vachida kubuda negoridhe munyika zvisiri pamutemo. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vasunga vamwe vanhu vatanhatu vanoti VaAli Mohamed, VaStephen Chengerai Tserayi, VaGift Karanda, VaRaphios Mufandauya, pamwe nemapurisa maviri anoti Superintendent Shoko pamwe naDetective Chief Inspector Chimhungu. VaTserayi vanga vachishanda vari musori anochengetedza mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, uye VaNyathi vati VaKaranda vainyepera kuzviita musori panguva yavanoti vakapara mhosva. VaNyathi vati VaMohamad, avo vane kambani yeAli Japan 786,iyo inoita zvekutengesa motokari ndivo vakanzi naMuzvare Rushwaya ndivo vaive muridzi wegoridhe. Vati pari zvino havasi kutaura zvakawanda sezvo vachiri kuferefeta nyaya iyi vachiti vasungwa ava vakatarisirwa kumiswa mudare. Muzvare Rushwaya vakatarisirwa kudzoka kudare ramejasitiriti mangwana apo pakatarisirwa kuturwa mutongo naVaNgoni Nduna wekuti zvinokodzera here kuti hurumende ishandure pfungwa dzayo dzekubvuma kwayakange yaita kuti Muzvare Rushwaya vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Vachuchisi venyaya iri kupomerwa Muzvare Rushwaya vakaudza dare kuti vakange voda kuchinja mabatiro enyaya iyi sezvo vachiti vakange vazoona kuti nyaya iyi yakakura kwazvo uye ine vanhu vakawanda vari mairi. Goridhe raida kuburitswa munyika zvisiri pamutemo naMuzvare Rushwaya rinokosha mari inodarika mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu ezviuru zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Vari kutevera nyaya iyi vanoti kusungwa kwaitwa mapurisa nevasori panyaya iyi kunoratidza kuti hurumende yadzikisa gejo mukurwisa huori. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, vati kusungwa kwemapurisa nevasori haisi nyaya yekuti hurumende yakazvipira kurwisana nehuori asi kuti zvikwata zveZanu PF zviri kurwira bhonzo renyama. Asi VaNyathi mapurisa haasi kuzorega kusunga munhu wese ane chekuita nenyaya iyi vachiti vari kuferefeta zvakare kuti goridhe iri rakanga rabvepi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya, avo vaimboshanda mubazi rezvemari, vanoti kubuda kwemari munyika zvisiri pamutemo kwakafanana nababa vanoba mari mumba vachinonwa doro mhuri ichisara ichiziya nenzara. Zvichakadai, bhodhi reZimbabwe Miners Federation rinoti rambomisa basa Muzvare Rushwaya richiti nyaya yavo inosvibisa zita resangano iri. Vanga vari mutevedzeri waMuzvare Rushwaya, VaMarufu Sithole, ndivo vave kumbofanobata chigaro chemutungamiiri weZimbabwe Miners Federation. No media source currently available

column2: Zimbabwe neSouth Africa Dzinonyorerana Zvibvumirano Munyaya dzezveUpfumi
column3: Zimbabwe neSouth Africa nemusi weChina dzanyorerana zvibvumirano zvakawanda zvakanangana nekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika mbiri idzi. Nyika mbiri idzi dzanyoreranawo chibvumirano chezvemuchadenga chichaita kuti ndege dzekuSouth Africa dzakawanda dzikwanise kumhara muZimbabwe. Izvi zvinotevera musangano waitwa pakati pemakurukota emapazi akasiyana-siyana ehurumende idzi wanga uchidaidzwa kuti bi-national commission unove wekutanga wakadai kuitwa nenyika mbiri idzi. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakurudzira vemabhizimusi vekuSouth Africa kuti vauye kuzosima mari dzavo muZimbabwe vachiti mabhizimusi avo haana chinoawana. "Ndinoda kusimbaradza vemabhizimusi vekuSouth Africa kuti mabhizimusi avo akachengetedzeka muno uye tinodawo kuona vemabhizimusi vemuZimbabwe vachivhurawo mabhizimusi avo kuSouth Africa," VaMugabe vadaro. Mashoko aVaMugabe aya anouyawo apa vekunze vazhinji vari kubatwa nenhetemwa panyaya yekusima mari yavo muno pamusana pemutemo wakaiswa nehurumende wekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema. Kunyange hazvo VaMugabe vasina chavataura pamusoro pekutya kuri kuita vekunze vakawanda kusima mari yavo muZimbabwe, vati chirongwa chekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema chazvara anamuzvinabhizimusi vatsva vanogona kuita kuti hupfumi hweZimbabwe neSouth Africa husimukire. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaJacob Zuma, vakurudzira kuti pawumbwe hwaro hunoita kuti vemabhizimusi vakwanise kushanda zvakanaka. "Patinoita izvi tinofanira kutarisa nyaya yekudyidzana munyaya dzehupfumi. Nokudaro tinofanira kuona kuti vemabhizimusi havana zvibingamupinyi zvavanosangana nazvo mukuita mabhizimusi avo. Tinofanirawo kuona kuti pavakwa muganhu mumwe chete pakati penyika dzedu kuitira kuti vanhu vafambe vakasununguka," VaZuma vadarowo. Zvichakadaro, gurukota rinowona nezve kunze kwenyika, VaSimbarashe Mumbengegwi vati zvimwe zvibvumirano pakati penyika mbiri idzi zvichiri pakati pekuzeyewa uye zvichasainwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera. VaMbengegwi vati nhaurirano dziri kuitwa dzakanangana nekuchengetedzeka hukama kwenyika mbiri idzi, zvekushanyirwa kwenyika nezvimwe zvakawanda. No media source currently available

column2: VaMugabe Vanoita VaJonathan Moyo Gurukota reDzidzo yePamusoro
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, neMuvhuro vakavandudza zvishoma dare ravo remakurukota vachibvisa VaJonathan Moyo kubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, vachivaita gurukota rinoona nezvedzidzo yepamusoro. Vanga vari gurukota redzidzo yepamusoro, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, vava gurukota rezvemvura nezviwanikwa. Vatora basa ranga richiitwa naVaSaviour Kasukuwere, avo vava gurukota idzva rezvematunhu, vachitora basa ranga richiitwa naVaIgnatius Chombo. VaChombo vava gurukota rezvemukati menyika, vachitora basa ranga richiitwa naVaKembo Mohadi, avo vatora basa raiitwa nevakadzingwa mubato, VaDidymus Mutasa, avo vanga vari gurukota rezvevasori. Brigadier General Ambrose Mutinhiri vave kutora chigaro chaVa Joel Biggie Matiza chekuva gurukota rezvedunhu reMashonaland East. VaMatiza havana rimwe basa idzva ravapihwa. Amai Nyasha Chikwinya ndivo vava gurukota rezvemadzimai. Gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Priscah Mupfumira, ndivo vari kufanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko zvichitevera kubviswa kwaVaMoyo. Amai Mupfumira vanoti vachabata chigaro ichi kusvika VaMugabe vatoresa gurukota idzva mhiko. No media source currently available Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muMDC, VaObert Gutu, vanoti zvaiitwa naVaMugabe kungopedzera hoko padehwe retsindi sezvo dare ravo remakurukota risina njere dzekunyukura nyika mumadhaka mairi. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaPedzisayi Ruhanya, vanotiwo VaMoyo kwavaenda kuchavapa mukana wekuvandudza zvinhu munyaya dzedzidzo, vachitiwo hapana zvavanotarisira zvitsva kuhurongwa hwaitwa naVaMugabe. VaRuhanya vanoti munhu anofanirwa kuvandudzwa ndivo VaMugabe pachavo, kwete zvavari kuita pamakurukota avo.. No media source currently available

column2: FC Platinum neTraingle Dzosimudza Mureza weZimbabwe muAfrica
column3: Chikwata cheTriangle chakashura mare nezuro mumakwikwi eCAF Confederation Cup mushure mekudambura chikwata cheRukinzo chekuBurundi. Asi chikwata cheFC Platinum chakaita mangange mumakwikwi eCaf Champions league neChikwata cheNyasa Big Bullets. Chikwata cheTriangle nezuro chakarova Rukinzo yekuBurundi 5 kwa 0 izvo zvapa chikwata ichi mukana wekuenderera mberi mumakwikwi aya. Mutambo wechipiri uri kutambirwa kuBurundi svondo rino. Mune mumwe mutambo neMugovera, chikwata cheFC Platinum chakaita manganga 0-0 nechikwata chinorairidzwa naCallisto Pasuwa uyu aimborairidza chikwa cheDynamos. Mutambo wechipiri uchatambirwa kuBarbourfields mavhiki maviri anotevera. Castle Premier Soccer League Iko zvino tombotarisa mitambo yeCastle Premier League yakatambwa mukupera kwesvondo. Chikwata cheChicken Inn neBlack Rhinos zvatambisa mukana mukuru wavanga vawana wekuenda panhongonya yeCastle Premier Soccer League mushure mekurohwa mumitambo yazvo, ndokuramba zviine mapoinzi maviri pasi peFC Platinum iyo irikutungamira. Black Rhinos yakarohwa 1-0 neHighlanders musi mumwechete Chicken Inn yakadamburwa 2-1 neZPC Kariba. FC Platinum iyo yaive isina mutambo muZimbabwe irikutamba mutambo wayo wePSL neChitatu apo irikusangana neHarare City. Nechitatu zvekare, Triangle ichatamba ne Ngezi Platinum Stars. Murwendo rwavo rwekuMalawi, mumutambo weCAF Champions League Pure Platinum Boys yakanoita mangange 0-0 ne Nyasa Bullets. Asi Makepekepe eCaps United ari murufaro mushure mekushanya kwaRusape ndokunorova Manica Diamonds 1-0. Izvi zvasiya maGreen Machine afamba nzendo refu ndokuenda pachinhanho chechipiri nemaponzi makumi maviri nerimwechete, poindi imwechete pasi peFC Platinum. Mumwe mutsigiri weCaps United Muzvare Leslie Marufu varikufara zvikuru nezvakaitwa nechikwata chavo vachiti ivo Kepekepe ndizvo. Mumusha weDembare mune rufaro mushure mekunge chikwata ichi charova Mushowani Stars 2-0 nezuro ndokuenda pamapoinzi makumi maviri nemanomwe. Murairidzi wavo Tonderai Ndiraya arikuti chiwata chake chakabatana zvekuti arikutarisira mashiripiti mumitambo inotevera.  Mimwe mitambo yaiveko yakapera seizvi…  Yadah 0 v Hwange 0 TelOne 1 v Herentals. 1  Kwatambwa mitambo gumi nemisre, zvikwata zvina zviri pamusoro soro ndeizvi..  FC Platinum 32 points Caps United 31 points Chicken Inn 30 points Black Rhinos 30 points. No media source currently available

column2: Vakarwa Hondo yeRusununguko Voronga Nhaurirano neBritain
column3: Vanotungamirira sangano revakarwa hondo yerusununguko reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association vanoti vari kuronga musangano neBritain nedzimwer nyika dzakabudirira kuti vagadzirise nyaya yemagariro avo sezvo vari kuti hurumende yavarasa. Vesangano re ZLHR ava vakataura mashoko aya apo vakaita musangano nevatori venhau muHarare nemusi weChina. Munyori mukuru musangano re ZNLWA VaVictor Matemadanda vati kunyangwe hazvo vakazoshorwa kuti vave kuita misangano nevekumawirira havana hany'a nazvo sezvo chinangwa chavo chiri chekuti varwi vehondo yerusununguko vabatsirikane. Vati vane chivimbo chekuti hurukuro dzavachaita idzi dzichabatsira kusimudzira hupenyu hwevarwi verusununguko. VaMatemadanda vashoropodzawo Brigadier General Retired Asher Walter Tapfumaneyi munyori mubazi revakarwa hondo vachiti vanofanira kuregedza kuda kutonga sangano revarwi vehondo yerusununguko. VaTapfumaneyi vanoti hurumende yave kuda vatungamiri vatsva sezvo isingakwanise kushanda nevatungamiri varipo nekuti vakati mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ngavaende pamudyandigere vachitiwo havachavatsvagire rutsigiro. VaMatemadanda vati bato reZanu PF harina kumboita hany'a nevarwi vehondo yerusununguko uye sangano ravo isangano rakazvimirira risinei nebato reZanu PF. Vatiwo vari kushushikana kuti kunyangwe vakarwa hondo, vana veZimbbwe havana rusununguko. Vanoona nezvemabasa musangano iri, VaFrancis Nhando vatsigira mashoko aya vachiti vakazvionera pamhuno sefodya apo vange vobvunzurudzwa nemapurisa kuti sei vange vakamira muHarare Gardens vari vana apo vaigadzirira kuita musangano wavo. Vanoona nezvekubuditswa kwemashoko musangano iri, VaDouglas Mahiya vati vanokatyamadzwa kuti hurumende inoda kupindira munyaya dzesangano revarwi verusunungukonekuyedza kuri putsa. Musangano uyu wange uine vanasachigaro vekumatunhu akasiyana-siyana avo vati kunyangwe hazvo hurumende ichida kuvanganisa, vari kuzoramba vachibatira pamwe nemukuru wavo VaChristopher Mutsvangwa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvevakarwa hondo VaTshinga Dube kana VaTapfumaneyi sezo vange vasiri kudarira nharembozha dzavo. No media source currently available

column2: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzoshushikaka neMadzimai Ari Kufa Achisununguka Vana
column3: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chinogona kunge chapa kuti huwandu hwemadzimai ari kufa achisungunuka huti wedzerei. Ongororo yakaitwa nebazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvevana reUNICEF muna 2019, inoratidza kuti madzimai mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu kana kuti 462 pamadzimai zviuru zana kana kuti 100 000 vanofa vachisungunuka muZimbabwe. Huwandu uhu hwange hwakati derere pane madzimai mazana matanhatu negumi nevana kana kuti 624 vaifa vachisungunuka pamadzimai zviuru zana kana kuti 100 000 muna 2017. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzemadzimai reWomen’s Action Group, Amai Edna Masiiwa, vanoti huwandu hwemadzimai ari kufa achisungunuka hwakaderera asi kufa kwemudzimai kana mumwe chete kunoshungurudza. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kugara kure nezvipatara kunopa kuti hupenyu hwemadzimai huve munjodzi sezvo vachizosvika pakuda kusungunuka vasati vavhenekwa nachiremba sezvinokurudzirwa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Tonotenda Michael Simemeza vatiwo zvimwe zvinokonzera kufa kwemadzimai zvinosanganisira denda remoyo uye zvimwe zvirwere zvinotapuriranwa pabonde. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga, vakurudzirawo zvakanyanya varume kuti vapote vacheperekedzana nemadzimai avo kuenda kumakiriniki kuti vanzwe zvinenge zvichitaurwa navanachiremba zvinozobatsira kuti madzimai asungunuke nyore. Vatiwo nekuda kwekupararira zvakanyanya kwechirwere cheCovid-19, hurumende dzakawanda kusanganisirawo yeZimbabwe hadzichakoshese hutano hwemadzimai akazvitakura nezvimwe zvirwere. Mukuyedza kubatsira madzimai akazvitakura munyika yeZimbabwe, sangano reUnited Nations Population Fund kana kuti UNFPA, rakanyorerana chibvumirano nenyika yeJapan chekubatsira nemari inosvika miriyoni imwechete nezviuru mazana matatatu emadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti USD1,3 million. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, vachishanda nesangano reUNFPA, Dr Edwin Mpeta vanoti chirongwa ichi chichabatsira zvipatara nemakiriniki zvemumaguta eHarare neBulawayo sezvo muri imo makaonekwa kuti mune madzimai akawanda ari kufa achisungunuka. Doctor Mpeta vanoti zvipatara nemakiriniki zvichatengerwa zvinoshandiswa pakubatsira madzimai akazvitakura uye nezvipfeko zvekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kweCovid 19 pakati pemadzimai akazvitakura nevakoti navanachiremba. UNFPA inoti pagore, madzimai zviuru gumi nezvishanu kana kuti 15, 000 vanosungunuka kuBulawayo ukuwo vamwe zviru makumi mana nevashanu kana kuti 45, 000 vachisungunuka muHarare. Pamadzimai ose aya, zviuru mapfumbamwe kana kuti 19, 000 vanoda kuvhiyiwa uye vachabatsirwa nemari yabva kuJapana iyi. No media source currently available

column2: Sangano reFamily Aids Caring Trust Rosvitsa Makore Makumi Matatu
column3: Sangano reFamily Aids Caring Trust, FACT rapemberera kusvitsa kwaro makore makumi matatu raumbwa richipa vagari vekwaMutare mukana wekuvhenekwa pachena zvirwere zvakasiyana-siyana zvinosanganisira gomarara, HIV, kuchecheudzwa nezvimwewo. Vanhu vakawanda vemaMutare vafara zvikuru mushure mekubatsirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzehutano pahurongwa hwekucherechedza mabasa anoitwa neFACT. Mumwe wevabatsirwa ndiAmai Bekiwe Mazuru avo vane gomarara. Amai Mazuru vati vafara nekubatsirwa kwavaita sezvo vasina mari yekuti vavhenekwe zvirwere. Studio 7 yataura nevabatsirwa avo vange vachirumbidza zvaitika izvi. Mumwe mugari wemuguta iri, VaAleck Matega, vafara zvikuru sezvo ivo nemhuri yavo, vabatsirwa pasina muripo. VaSolomon Makina, avo vanoshanda nesangano reFACT, vanoti chiitiko ichi chimwe chezvironga zvavari kuita mumatunhu akawanda munyika. Sangano reFACT rakatanga kwaMutare ndokuzopinda mumatunhu anoti Masvingo, Midlands, Mashonaland East neMashonaland Central. Chirongwa cheFACT, icho chapoindwa nevanhu vanosvika zviuru zviviri, change chichitsigirwa nemasangano anoti National Aids Council, UK-Aid, US Aid, Eco-Sure, Nyaradzo Funeral Service nemamwe, uye vaimbi, Killer T, Sir Calaz naHwindi President. No media source currently available

column2: Vofarira kuuya kweWC muZim
column3: SANGANO reZimbabwe Cricket rinoti riri kugutsikana nekusimukira kuri kuita mutambo uyu munyika zvichitevera kupihwa kwakaita Zimbabwe chiremerera chekuronga mutambo we2027 International Cricket Council World Cup ichibatsirana neSouth Africa neNamibia.   Chiremerera ichi chine chirevo chikuru kuZimbabwe pamwe nemutambo uyu sezvo zvinorakidza kuti nyika ino iri kufamba mugwara chairo panhau yecricket. Pari zvino, chikwata chemadzimai chemaLady Chevrons chiri pakati pekutatsurana nezvimwe zvipfumbamwe mumitambo yekurwira kuenda ku2023 ICC World Cup kuIndia. Kubva pamitambo iyi, panofanirwa kubuda zvikwata zvitatu chete uye malady Chevrons ari kutarisira kunge ari pakati pezvikwata izvi.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, managing director weZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) – Givemore Makoni – anoti ZC iri kuita basa guru mukusimudzira mutambo uyu.   Anoti sangano ravo riri kugutsikana nemafambiro ari kuita mutambo wecricket izvo zviri kuona zvekare malady Chevrons achikwikwidza mumitambo yekurwira kuenda ku2023 India World Cup.   “Kutaura kwatiri kuita kuno tine zvikwata zvipfumbamwe zvemadzimai zviri munyika yedu zvinosanganisira Pakistan, Sri Lanka, West Indies, Ireland, Netherlands neBangladesh izvo zviri kurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup gore rinotevera. Saka tinotarisira kuti chikwata chedu chemadzimai chibate basa gore remangwana chigoenda kuWorld Cup kuIndia.   “Zvinorakidza kuti tiri kusimukira panyaya dzecricket kana tichipihwa chiremerera chekuronga mitambo mikuru yakaita seiyi,” anodaro Makoni.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Nyika yose takapihwa chiremerera nekuti mukana wekuronga World Cup unounza mufaro uye zvinobatsira kana kusimudzira nyika chaiko sezvo kuchange kune zvizvarwa zvichabva kunze zvakasiyana-siyana zvichauya zvichizoona mitambo iyi.”   Aka ndekechipiri Zimbabwe ichitambirwa mitambo yeWorld Cup sezvakamboitika mugore ra2003 apo mitambo iyi yakatambirwa munyika muno nekuSouth Africa pamwe nekuKenya.   Makoni anoti Zimbabwe ikaramba ichisimukira ine mukana mukuru wekuzohwina mutambo uyu. “Aka ndekechipiri tichironga mutambo uyu, tine chivimbo chekuti nekusimukira kwatiri kuita mumutambo uyu tinogona kuhwina World Cup yacho ya2027,” anodaro Makoni.

column2: Vanhu Vatatu Vanofa neCOVID-19 paNguva Iyo Huwandu hweVari Kuwanikwa Vaine Denda Hwakwira
column3: Bazi rezvehutano razivisa neChipiri mangwanani kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa neMuvhuro neCovid-19, uye huwandu hwevanhu vakawanikwa vaine denda iri Muvhuro wakare hwakakwira zvakanyanya kusvika pazviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu nevashanu, kana kuti 2 555. Izvi zvakasiya vanhu vafa neCovid-19 vave pazviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi matatu, kana kuti 4 713, kuchitiwo vanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 kubva patanga chirwere ichi munyika vakasvika pazviuru zana nemakumi mana nechimwe namazana matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 141 601. Vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi masere nezvitatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevashanu, kana kuti 3,882 255 vakanga vabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira COVID-19 pakupera kwezuva neMuvhuro. Vamwe mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezviviri zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevatanhatu, kana kuti 2,892 366, vakanga vabaiwawo nhomba yepiri sezvinokurudzirwa. Huwandu hwevanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19 uhwu huri kukwira kubva pamazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevatatu, kana kuti 523, vakawanikwa vaine denda iri nemusi weSvondo, kuchitiwo neMugovera vanhu chiuru nemakumi masere nevaviri, kana kuti 1 082, vakawanikwawo vaine Covid-19. Hurumende yakazivisa svondo rapera kuti hutachiwana hweOmicron hwakanga hwawanikwa munyika pavanhu makumi mashanu vakavhenekwa kuMasvingo. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira hutano hwakanaka munharaunda, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti havasi kushamisika nekukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19 mazuvano sezvo paine kuvarairwa kweveruzhinji kwakanyanya. VaRusike vanoti nekupinda munyika kwehutachiwana hweOmicron, veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuramba vachitevedzera nzira dzekudzivirira nadzo kupararira kweCovid-19, dzakaita sekugeza maoko, kupfeka mamasiki, kugara madaranganwa pamwe nekusaenda munzvimbo dzakawanda vanhu. No media source currently available

column2: MaGems otarira mberi
column3: MUTUNGAMIRI wevatambi vechikwata chenyika chenetball chemaGems, Felisitus Kwangwa, anoti gadziriro dzekuenda kuWorld Cup gore rinotevera dzinotanga iko zvino sezvo vanoda kunorwa semvumba kumutambo uyu.   MaGems akadadisa nyika zvekare svondo radarika zvichitevera kuhwina kwaakaita tikiti rekuenda kuNetball World Cup 2023 iyo ichatambirwa kuSouth Africa.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chiri kudzokera kumakwishu aya uko chakamboenda mugore ra2019 kuLiverpool, kuEngland.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Kwangwa anoti zvinhu zvinofadza kutungamirira nyika yake kumutambo mukuru uyu.   “Ndinonzwa manyukunyuku kupihwa chiremerera ichi chekutungamira nyika yangu kumutambo mukuru uyu.   “2019 ndaivepo zvekare ndiri mutevedzeri waPerpetua Siyachitema saka kupihwa mukana wekutungamirira nyika yangu chiremerera chikuru uye ndinotenda.   “Sechikwata, ndinovimba kuti tichanotamba zvinonwisa mvura kuWorld Cup nekuti takambokuenda uye tave kuziva zvinodiwa kuti tigohwina,” anodaro.   Kwangwa, uyo anotambira chikwata cheSurrey Storm kuEngland, anoti murwendo rwavo kuenda kuWorld Cup vanoda kutamba mitambo yehushamwari yakawanda sezvo ichibatsira zvakanyanya mugadziriro dzavo.   “Kutanga iko zvino tinofanirwa kutamba mitambo yehushamwari yakawanda yekugadzirira iyo ichatibatsira zvikuru patichaenda kuSouth Africa.   “Mitambo yehushamwari yakakosha, ndiyo yega nzira ichatibatsira mugadziriro dzedu,” anodaro Kwangwa.   MaGems akabudirira kuenda kuWorld Cup zvichitevera kupedza kwaakaita ari pechitatu mumitambo yeAfrica Qualifiers yakatambirwa kuSouth Africa svondo radarika.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chakapedza chiri kumashure kweSouth Africa neMalawi.   Kumitambo iyi, maGems akatamba mitanhatu ndokuhwina mina uye akakundwa miviri neSouth Africa neMalawi ndokuhwina menduru yebhuronzi.   Dunhu reAfrica kuWorld Cup richange rakamirirwa neZimbabwe, South Africa neMalawi.

column2: ‘NHABVU HAIDI MAKAKATANWA’
column3: AIMBOVE mubati wepagedhi weDynamos FC nechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors — Gift ‘Umbro’ Muzadzi — anoti kuti nhabvu yemuno isimukire ibve mumadhaka mairi pari zvino, vanhu vanofanirwa kushanda pamwe chete kwete kuita “zvekudhonzerana”.   Kubvira makore adarika, nhabvu yemuno haina kumbosimuka sezvaitarisirwa nevazhinji nekuda kwezvikonzero zvinosanganisira kusabatana kuripo mumasangano anotungamira pamwe chete nevatsigiri vemutambo uyu.   Izvi ndizvo Umbro anoti zviri kukonzera kuti nhabvu yemuno isaririre kumashure. Anoti munhu wese ane chekuita nenhabvu anofanirwa kupihwa mukana wekushanda mumutambo uyu uye pfungwa dzake dzokosheswa.   “Chakuvadza nhabvu yedu inhau yekudhonzerana kuri kuitika chete, hakuna chimwe chinhu.   “Ngatibatanei tishande pamwe chete nekuti chinhu chinofanira kuhwina pakupera kwezuva inhabvu yedu. Hazvina basa kuti uyu mutsigiri wenhabvu here, uyu ane mari here kana kuti kwete, asi tikakoshesana tese sezvatiri tinokunda chete uye nhabvu yedu inosimukira.   “Kana tiri kurwisana hapana zvatinenge tichiita nekuti mhedzisiro tese tichangochema sezvatiri kuita iye zvino. Nhabvu yedu yakamira izvo zviri kukanganisa vechidiki,” anodaro.   Umbro anoenderera mberi achiti: “Tikatarisa iye zvino patave nhabvu yedu tiri kusarira kumashure zvakanyanya izvo zvakazokonzerwa nezvirango zvatakatemerwa neFIFA neCAF, zvave kuita kuti nyika dzatainge tasiya panyaya yebudiriro panhabvu dzave kutotibata uye dzimwe dzatotidarika.   “Saka ngatibatane tishande kuti zvirango izvi zvibve nekuti ndezvimwe zvauraya nhabvu yedu. Vana vedu vaomerwa havachazive kuti remangwana ravo richazovei munhabvu.”    Gift ‘Umbro’ Muzadzi   Mwedzi watiri uno ndeweWorld Cup iyo iri kutambirwa kunyika yeQatar uye Africa iri kumirirwa nenyika shanu kumutambo uyu dzinoti Ghana, Cameroon, Senegal, Tunisia neMorroco.   Umbro anoti nyika shanu idzi dziri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura kumutambo uyu uye ari kudzitsigira.   Asi anoti shuviro yake rimwe remazuva kuzoona maWarriors achinokwikwidza kumutambo uyu.   “Ini sechizvarwa chese chemuno chinofarira nhabvu, ndinoda kuonawo nyika yangu ichienda kuWorld Cup, nyika dzese dzinotoda kuenda kumutambo uyu.   “Ukaona wakwanisa kuenda kunotamba kuWorld Cup unenge watamba nhabvu yepamusoro. Saka ngatirongekei muno tigokwanisawo kuenda kumakwishu aya,” anodaro.   Mwaka wenhabvu wemuno uchangodarika, Umbro ange achishanda kuchikwata cheDynamos FC ari mumwe wevatevedzeri vaTonderayi Ndiraya.   Anoti vatsigiri venhabvu havachanyatsouya kuzotsigira zvikwata zvavo sezvavaiita kare uye zviri kukonzerwawo nekudhura kuri kuita kupinda munhandare.   “Nhabvu kuti inakidze, inofanirwa kunge ine vatsigiri, asi manje mazuva ano nhandare hadzichanyatsozare sezvaiitika kare. Nhau yandiri kuona hombe ndeyekuti kupinda munhandare kuri kudhuriswa zvakanyanya saka vatsigiri vari kutadza kuwana mari yacho.   “Saka zviri nani kunzi mari yekupindisa munhandare iendeswe paUS$1 chairo zvekuti kana nhandare ikazara nevanhu 50 000, imari yakawanda inoenda kuzvikwata zvemuno pane kunzi bhora ronzi US$3 kana US$5 mopinda vanhu vashoma munhandare.   “Nhabvu mazuva ano yave bhizimisi, ende zvakakosha kugona kuziva bhizimisi racho muite mari,” anodaro.   Umbro anobva kuMalawi asi akazvarirwa muZimbabwe ndokukurira muno. Kana vari muno, ndivanaHungwe asi kuMalawi ndivanaMbewe.   Kumusha kwavo muno kwakabva baba vake ndekwaLandas, kwaChihota.   Zita rekuti Umbro akaripihwa neshamwari dzake dzaakakura nadzo dzinoti Norman Mapeza, Lloyd Chitembwe naAlois Bunjira panguva iyo vese vaitambira Darryn T.   Anoti panguva iyo vaitambira chikwata cheUnder 14 cheDarryn T, akasonerwa juzi naambuya vake avo aigara navo.   Juzi iri ndiro raaiuya achitambisa nhabvu saka rimwe zuva akazosonerera zita rekuti Umbro pajuzi iri izvo zvakanakidza shamwari dzake ndokubva vamupa zita remadunhurirwa iri.   “Tichikura kuDarryn T, ndaiita gadziriro dzangu ndakapfeka juzi randakasonerwa naambuya vangu. Saka chikwata chevakuru chaive nemayunifomu eUmbro aibva kuUK, rimwe zuva ndakauya ndakasonera zita rekuti Umbro pajuzi rangu iri shamwari dzangu dzikanakidzwa nazvo ndokutanga kundishevedza kuti Umbro. Kubva ipapo, zita rakabva ratongogara kusvika nhasi.   “Umbro iyoyo yaive yakanaka uye iniwo ndaiida chaizvo,” anodaro Umbro.

column2: Chirongwa cheBVR Chinotanga muBulawayo Vanhu Vashoma Vachipinda Machiri
column3: Kunyoreswa kwevanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kwatanga muguta reBulawayo kuine vanhu vashoma vange vachinyoresa kuvhota, michina yeBiometric Voter Registration, BVR, ichitadza kunyatsoshanda pane zvimwe zvainotarisirwa kuita, ukuwo vamwe vanhu vachiti chirongwa ichi chinofanirwa kushambadzwa zvakasimba sezvo veruzhinji vasina ruzivo rwakakwana pamusoro pacho. Vanhu vange vachiuya vari vashoma, asi kunyoreswa kwavo kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kwazotanga nguva dzekuma 9 mangwanani pamahofisi eZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, muBulawayo, sezvo vashandi veZEC vambotanga nekuwona kuti muchina wavo unoshanda zvakanaka here. Kunyange hazvo muchina uyu wange uchishanda zvakanaka, wange uchimbotadza kuita zvimwe zvaunotarisirwa kuita zvakadai sekukwanisa kuburitsa mazita enzvimbo dzekuti vanhu vanyoresa vanokwanisa kuzonotarisa kuti mazita avo akanyorwa zvechokwadi here kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kana kuti polling center. Munhu atanga kunyoreswa pahofisi yeBulawayo District, VaAbel Ncube, vati vafara kuti vakwanisa kunyoresa, asi vange vachinyunyuta kuti izvi kwavatorera nguva, izvo zvatsigirwawo naVaWeston Dumba avo vaita munhu wechipiri kunyoresa. VaDumba vati kunyange hazvo zvingave zvinotora nguva, zvakakosha kuti vanhu vose vanokodzera munyika vave vanonyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. VaDumba vatiwo maonero avo ndeekuti veruzhinji havasati vave neruzivo rwakakwana pamusoro pechirongwa chekunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Mumwezve mugari wemuBulawayo VaAustin Moyo, avo vanogara mumusha weveruzhinji weCowdray Park, vaudza Studio7 kuti vange vachitevera nyaya yekunyoreswa kwevanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota saka vaona zvakakosha kuti vauyewo vanyorese. Chirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota chakaparurwa zviri pamutemo nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, svondo rapera muHarare asi nekuda kwekuti pari zvino michina yekunyoresa ichiri mishoma, kunyoreswa uku kuri kungoitwa panzvimbo shoma kunyanya pane mahofisi eZEC mumatunhu akasiyana-siyana munyika. Pari zvino pamahofisi eZEC ari kumahombekombe kweguta kwakadziva kumadokero ndipo pari kunyoreswa vanhu vari pasi peBulawayo District pamwe neveUmguza District. Mukuru anoona nezvesarudzo muBulawayo, Amai Sithembiso Khupe, vabvuma kuti muchina wavo wambovanetsa asi vati vari kufara nemafambiro aita chirongwa pakutanga kunyoreswa kwevanhu. Amai Khupe vati hofisi yavo yeBulawayo yakanzi ichapiwa michina zana negumi rimwe chete uye vachave nenzvimbo dzinopfuura mazana mana dzavachange vachinyoresa vanhu. VeZEC vanoti chirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu chichasimudzirwa zvakasimba kana vawana mimwe michina iyo vakati vanotarisira kuwana pakati pemwedzi unouya. Kuti munhu ukwanise kunyoresa kuvhota unofanirwa kuve uri chizvarwa chemuZimbabwe chine makore gumi nemasere, kana kupfuura, uye unofanirwa kuve nechitupa, cherata kana cheplastic, chine mufananidzo wechiso chako kanawo gwaro rekufambisa richiri kushanda. Rezinesi yemotokari haikwanise kushandiswa pakunyoresa kuvhota. Munhu unozodawo gwaro rinoratidza paunogara ingave tsamba yemvura iri muzita rako kana gwaro raunonyora rosainwa naCommissioner of Oaths, sabhuku kana mumwe munhu akadaro. No media source currently available

column2: Vanhu Gumi neVanomwe Vofa neCovid-19 Hurumende Ichikurudzirwa Kutevedzera Zvainotaura paNyaya yeKudzivirira Chirwere Ichi
column3: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu gumi nevanomwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMugovera zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zvina nemakamumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 4, 090. Vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi mana nevashanu kana kuti 345 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zana rezviuru negumi nepfumbamwe nemazana masere nemakumi mashanu nevatatu kana kuti 119, 853. Vanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 581 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nematanhatu zvine mazana manomwe negumi nevatanhatu kana kuti 96, 716. Vanhu mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 2, 036, 299 vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kekutanga. Vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere zvine mazana matatu nemakumi masere nechimwe kana kuti 1, 198, 381 vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kechipiri. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti chirwere ichi hachichanyanye kupararira zvakanyanya munzvimbo dzange dzichinzi dziri munjodzi huru richiti izvi zvakakonzerwa nedzidziso iri kupihwa nezvechirwere ichi. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rapera vakawedzera nguva yekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba nemamwe mavhiki maviri vachiti kunyangwe huwandu hwevari kyabtwa nechirwere ichi have kudzikira, huwandu hwevari kufa huchiri hwakawandisa pane zvinotarisirwa. Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, munyori anoona nezvehutano mubato reMDC Alliance Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti zvekungoti vanhu vagare mudzimba asi vamwe vachienderera mberi vachiunganidza vanhu vachiita zvematongerwo enyika hazvibatsire. Mamwe madzishe nebato reZanu-PF nevamwe vari mumubatanidzwa wemapato ari muPolitical Actors Dialogue kana kuti POLAD vari kuenderera mberi nekuita misangano kunyangwe veMDC Alliance nevamwe vasiri mugungano iri vari kurambidzwa kuita misangano yavo nemapurisa achiti ari kuda kumisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

column2: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzokurudzira Veruzhinji Kukoshesa Mitemo Inodzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19
column3: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neSvondo kuti hapana munhu akashaya nekuda kweCovid-19 uye vanhu gumi nemumwe, kana kuti 11, ndivo vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi kubva pavanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevashanu, kana kuti 535, vakavhenekwa nyika yose. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nedenda iri kubva parapinda munyika gore rapera muna Kurume vave zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nemumwe, kana kuti 36 271. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga vakasvika pachiuru nemazana mana nemakumi masere nevashanu, kana kuti 1 485, kuchitiwo huwandu hwevanhu vapona kubva kuCovid-19 hwakasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitatu zvine mazana masere nemakumi matatu nevana, kana kuti 33 834. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisawo kuti vashandi vari pamberi mukurwisana neCovid-19 vanosvika mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu, kana kuti 226, vakabaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm, yekudzivirira hutachiwana hunokonzera Covid-19. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba iyi kubva zvatanga chirongwa ichi pazviuru makumi matatu nezviviri zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mana, kana kuti 32 240. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano pamwe nemapurisa vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nehuwandu hwevanhu vasiri kutevedzera mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana yakatarwa neW-H-O pamwe nebazi rezvehutano kubva pakanyevenutswa mutemo we lockdown svondo rapera. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti lockdown yakabatsira chose kuderedza huwandu hwevari kubatwa neCovid-19. Asi vanoti panofanirwa kuramba paine dzidziso pamusoro penzira dzekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri kunyange hazvo mitemo yakanyevenutswa. Svondo rapera mapurisa akazivisa kuti kusvika neChishanu chapfuura vanhu vaidarika zviuru zvishanu vakanga vasungwa kubva musi wa 01 nemhosva yekusapfeka zvivharangozi,kana kuti ma mask, danho rinonzi nemapurisa vari kushushikana naro. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe, kana kuti 3,9 million, vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vadarika zviuru zana nezvishanu rine mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nevaviri, kana kuti 105, 722. Vapora muAfrica vadarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 3, 5 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere che coronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni zana negumi nematanhatu nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe, kana kuti 116, 9 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica, iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nezvishanu, kana kuti kuti 525, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemasere ane zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 28, 9 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 2,5 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nematanhatu kana kuti 66, million. No media source currently available

column2: Tunisia Yova Nyika yeKutanga muAfrica Kubuda Mumakwikwi eFIFA World Cup22
column3: Tunisia yave nyika yekutanga muAfrica kubuda mumakwikwi eFIFA World Cup 2022 ari kutambirwa kuQatar. Izvi zviri kuitika kunyangwe Tunisia iyo iri muGroup D yaita zvange zvisingafungidzirwe nevakawanda zvekurova France 1-0. Australia iri kuenderera mberi mumakwikwi aya neFrance yarova Denmark 1-0. Panyika dzimwe dzemuAfrica dziri kumakwikwi aya, Senegal kusvika parizvino ndiyo yabudirira kuenderera mberi muGroup A. Dzimwe nyika dzasara iGhana, Cameroon neMorocco.

column2: Kanzuru yeMasvingo Pamwe neHurumende Zvoendeswa kuMatare
column3:
Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vaendesa kanzuru yavo, bazi rinoona nezvezvicherwa pamwe nemakambani anochera goridhe mashanu mugomo reTarget Kopje, vachikumbira dare kuti rimisemabasa ekucherwa kwegoridhe sezvo ari kukanganisa dzimba dzavo pamwe nematangi emvura. Sangano reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance (MURRA), rasvitsa chikumbiro chechimbi chimbi mudare repamusoro richimirirwa naVaPhilip Shumba. VaShumba vaudza Studio7 kuti kunze kwekukanganisa dzimba nekugara zvakanaka kwevagari, vacheri ava vari kuchera pasi pematangi emvura nekudaro anogona kuwondomoka kukaita mashamu emvura vanhu vakarasikirwa nehupenyu mumusha uri pedyo. VaShumba vati pamusoro pezvo makambani mashanu anoti Lions Mining
Syndicate, Lions 2, Brossro, Edwards pamwe neGreat Zimbabwe Mining
Syndicates ari kushandisa mishonga yakaipa inogona kuuraya vanhu ikapinda mumatangi emvura. VaShumba vati vaendesa kanzuru kumatare nekuti ndiyo yakapa mvumo makambani aya. Vatiwo hurumende yaendeswa kumatare nekuti ndiyo yakapa marezenisi ekuti makambani aya aite basa rawo mumusha wevagari ve Target Kopje
pamwe neHillside. Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vati havasati vagamuchira
mapepa abva kudare, asi vati chero paachasvika mumaoko avo havasi
kuzopikisa kudare nekuti vakazoona kuti zviri kuitwa nekambani aya
zvinokanganisa vagari nematangi avo emvura. Vakafana kubata chigaro chemukuru webazi rezvicherwa muMasvingo,
VaMarshal Muzira, avo vatambira mapepa ekudare, varamba kutaura
neStduio 7 vachiti tibate munyori mubazi ravo kuHarare sezvo
vasingabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau. Munyori mubazi rezvezvicherwa, VaOnesimo Moyo, vange vasingadairi nharembozha yavo kana kupindura mibvunza yatavatumira. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMURRA, Muzvare Rumbidzai Magurupira, vati vanotarisira kuti dare richapa mutongo unomisa mabasa ekuchera goridhe munzvimbo dzinogara vanhu.

Nyaya iyi inotasisirwa kunzwikwa mudare kana vamhangarirwa vakapikisa
zviri kudiwa nevagari mukati memazuva gumi. No media source currently available

column2: Bill Antonio atengwa kuBelgium
column3: BILL Antonio ari kuramba achinyora nhoroondo mumutambo wenhabvu muZimbabwe. Mutambi wechidiki weDynamos uyu atengwa nechikwata cheKV Mechelen chekuBelgium.   Antonio anotarisirwa kuenda kuchikwata chake chitsva kunosangana nevatambi vaachange achitamba navo kuchikwata chekuEurope ichi.   Ange achitarisirwa kuongororwa utano hwake asati anyorerana chibvumirano nechikwata ichi apo ave kutanga rwendo rwake rwutsva munhabvu aine makore 19 okuberekwa bedzi. Mutambi akadzidza paPrince Edward uyu akaonekana nechikwata chake cheDynamos ndokuudza vatori venhau kuti ari kutarisira kunodzidza zvakawanda kuBelgium.   Antonio akafarirwa neMechelen zvichitevera kutamba kwaakaita masvondo adarika apo aiongororwa. Paimbove nefungidziro yekuti mutambi uyu aigona kuzotengwa gore rinotevera munaNdira, izvo zvaigona kuzomutadzisa kuenda kuchikwata ichi izvozvi.   Asi Antonio ava kutarisirwa kunyora chibvumirano chake mukana wekutenga vatambi kuBelgium usati wavharwa. Audza vatori venhau kuti zvose zvauya kuburikidza nekushanda nesimba uye acharamba achishanda nemwoyo wake wose kuBelgium.   “Zvinhu zvose unofanirwa kutungamidza Mwari. Kuenda kuEurope ndichibva kuDynamos kuita kwaMari kubva pakutanga. Kunamata mazuva ose kunoita kuti zvinhu zviendeke,” akadaro Antonio.   “Rutsigiro rwandange ndichiwana kubva zuva rekutanga handirwukanganwe uye handimbokoshiwa mhuri yeDynamos. Zvaifadza kutamba ndakapfeka jezi ravo, zvinhu zvekuti mutambi wose anongoshuvira. “Iniwo nemakore angu kutambira Dynamos, zvinhu zvekuti handaimbofungira kuti zvichaitika kwandiri, asi unoona kuti naMwari zvose zvinoitika.   “Muupenyu mune zvitsauko zvakawanda, kuenda kwangu kuEurope kutanga kwechimwe chitsauko chitsva uye kuzadzikiswa kwezvishuviro zvemwoyo wangu.   “Ndinovimba kuti ndichabudirira. Mwari haambokurasise, unoziva. Kungoshanda nesimba nekuterera, zvose zvinoita chete.”   Antonio akatanga kutambira Dynamos gore radarika uye angotamba mitambo 28 ndokunwisa kasere achibatsira vamwe vatambi kunwisa ka10.

column2: Hurumende Yononoka Kubhadhara Vashandi Vanobatwa neCovid-19 Vachiita Basa Ravo
column3: Vashandi vezvehutano vanoti vazhinji vavo havasati vawana mari dzavanofanirwa kupiwa kana vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid. Vashandi ava vanotiwo havasi kufara nekuvatyityidzirwa kwavari kuitwa nehurumende iyo iri kuti vasina kubaiwa nhomba vachanyimwa mari dzeCovid Allowance. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, Va Enoch Dongo, vati vashandi vezvehutano vakawanda vacho havasati vawana mari dzekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vari pabasa kunyange hazvo vave nenguva yakareba vanyorera kuti vawane mari idzi. VaDongo vati nhengo dzavo dzinenge dzichida mari iyi padzinenge dzichirwara kuitira kuti vdzikwanise kutenga zvikwanisiro. VaDongo vatiwo mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemashanu emadhora (75 million) anonzi akasendekwa parutivi kuitira kuti mari iyi ibhadhare vashandi vezvehutano vanobatwa neCovid-19, haikwani sezvo vakabatwa neCovid-19 vadarika zviuru zvina. Imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe Hospital Association, VaPrince Butau,avo vakabatwa neCovid-19 gore rapera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakazowana mari muna Kurume gore rino kunyange vakange vanyorera mari iyi gore rapera. Asi VaButau vati hurumende inofanirwa kunge ichipa mari kwehupenyu hwese munhu anobatwa neCovid-19 ari pabasa. Mumwe mukoti asina kuda kudomwa nezita audza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo akabatwa nechirwere ichi kutanga kwegore rino, haasati awana mari kunyange hazvo akanyora mapepa anodiwa. Panyaya yekutyityidzirwa nehurumende kuti vasina kubaiwa nhomba vachanyimwa mari dziri kupiwa vashandi vese vezvehutano dzeCovid-19 allowance, VaDongo vati zvakaipa zvikuru kumanikidza vanhu kubayiwa nhomba. VaButau vati mari inoita zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana maviri emaRTGS iri kupihwa seCovid-19 allowances ishoma zvakanyanya. Vatiwo hurumende inofanira kugara pasi nevashandi vezvehutano yotaurirana navo pamusoro pekubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuHealth Services Board asi gurukota rezvekubudiritswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakaudza vatori venhau nemusi weChipiri kuti hurumende iri kubhadhara mushandi anenge abatwa neCovid-19 ari pabasa mari inotangira pamazana matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica kusvika pachiuru chimwe chete chemadhora ekuAmerica. Pamusoro pezvo mushandi wezvehutano anopihwa zviuru zvitanhatu nemazanamaviri emaRTGS semari yekubatsirikana munguva yeCivid-19. Vakatiwo Health Services Board yainge yabhadhara vashandi mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevaviri pavashandi vezvehutano zviuru zvina nemazna mana ane makumi mana nevana vakanyorera kuwana mari iyi. Amai Mutsvangwa vakati mari yakaiswa parutivi nehurumemde haikwani kubhadhara vashandi vese vakabatwa neCovid-19 vakati zvinoda kuti hurumende iwedzere mari iyi. No media source currently available

column2: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muSouth Africa Zvotaura nezveCoronavirus
column3: Mutungamiriri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa nemusi weSvondo vakatora matanho akaomarara mukuyedza kurwisa pamwe nekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus chatekeshera pasi rose Vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika iyi. VaRamaphosa vakazivisa kuti South Africa kutanga nemusi weChitatu inenge yave kuvhara mimwe miganhu yayo uyo kurambidza kushanyira kana kutambira vanhu vari kubva kunyika dzabatwa nechirwere ichi dzinosanganisira Italy, Iran, South Korea, Iran, Spain, Germany, US, Britain ne China. Zvikoro zviri kuvharwawo musi uyu uye vanhu vari kurambidzwa kuungana kusanganisirawo kumiswa kwemitambo. MuSouth Africa mune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kubatwa mumambure ezviri kuitwa kudzivirira chirwere ichi. VaOffice Jaka, avo vanobva kuKwekwe, vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti South Africa ichakwanisa kupedza dambudziko iri kunyange hazvo riri basa guru. Asi va Jaka vanoti varikunyanyo shungurudzika zvikuru, nevana vavo vaviri varikuita zvidzidzo zveElectrical Engineering kuChina. VaEmmanuel Mboti vanotiwo kunyangwe hazvo zvaitwa naVaRamaphosa zvakanaka, vichakanganisa hupfumi hwenyika yavo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kumiswa kwemitambo kuchakanganisa kurarama kwevakawanda. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chechidiki, chinogara muSouth Africa, VaMunyaradzi Mukanyiwa, vanoti vanowirirana nemashoko ataurwa naVaMbote. No media source currently available

column2: Dare kuBulawayo Rokurudzirwa Kurasa Nyaya yeMutori weNhau Vachuchusi Vachinzi Vakundikana Basa
column3:
Magweta ari kumirira mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira ega Jeffrey Moyo azivisa dare ramejastiriti muBulawayo nhasi kuti achaita chikumbiro chekuti nyaya yaakatarisana nayo iraswe nekuti muchuchisi haana kubudisa humbowo hwekuti Moyo ane mhosva yaakapara.

Kunzwikwa kwenyaya yaMoyo kwapetwa nhasi, mushure mekunge dare ranzwa humbowo kubva kuna VaAcademy Chinhamora vanove mushandi weZimbabwe. Media Commission, avo vange vari mufakazi wechishanu vakasarudzwa nemuchuchisi kuti vape huchapupu hwavo munyaya iyi.

Mukuvhunzurudzwa kwavaitwa naAmai Beatrice Mtetwa, VaChinhamora vabvuma kuti zvinhu zvisiri pamutemo kuti bazi rekufambiswa kwemashoko rive nechekuita nekunyoreswa kwevatapi venhau vanobva kunze kwenyika, sezvo boka reZMC riri boka rakazvimirira rega pasi pebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Asi vati izvi zvinhu zvinogara zvichiitwa nekuti ndiwo mashandiro agara aripo pakati peboka ravo nebazi rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko.

VaChinhamora vabvumawo kuti munhu anenge achida kunyoresa kuboka iri semutapi wenhau kana kubatsira vamwe vanenge vachida kunyoresa, haana zvaangaziva zvakawanda zvine chekuita nemashandiro anoita veboka iri. Kune vafakazi vana vakatopa huchapupu hwavo kudare. Amai Beatrice Mtetwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vange vakatarisira kuti muchuchisi VaAcumen Khupe vachadeedza vamwe vafakazi asi izvi hazvina kuitika. Vati, “Tauya takatarisira kuti pane vamwe vafakazi vatatu vachapa huchapupu vanosanganisira akaferefeta nyaya iyi, nemumwe anoshanda kubazi rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko, pamwe naivo VaChinhamora.” Amai Mtetwa vaenderta mberi vachiti, “Asi VaChinhamora ndivo chete vazopa huchapupu, mushure mezvo muchuchisi achibva ati anga apeta nyaya yake.” Amai Mtetwa vati maonero avo ndeekuti muchuchisi haana kukwanisa kubudisa pachena kuti Moyo akapara mhosva izvo zvavapa kuti vazivise dare kuti vanoda kukwidza chikumbiro chekuti rirase nyaya iyi."


Mutongi wedare VaMark Nzira vati vachapa mutongo wavo musi wa7 Kurume. Moyo akasungwa muna Kubvumbi gore rapera akazobvumidzwa kubhadhara mari yechibatsio mushure mekugara muchitokisi kwemavhiki anopfuura matatu, achinzi akabatsira vatapi venhau vekuAmerica vaviri Christina Goldbaum naJoao Silva, avo vanoshandira bepanhau reNew York Times kuti
vapinde munyika zvisiri pamutemo.

Vaviri ava vakadzingwa munyika vasina kuwana mukana wekumiswa pamberi pedare pamusoro penyaya iyi.  Moyo anonzi akabatsira vaviri ava achishanda pamwe nemumwe mushandi
weZMC, Thabang Manhika uyo ari kupomerwa mhosva imwe chete, asi ari
kutongwa pachake ega.

Kusungwa kwaMoyo kwakashorwa nemasangano akawanda kusanganisira reCommittee to Protect Journalists iro rakati uyu waive muenzaniso wakaipa wekushungurudzwa kuri kuramba kuchiitwa vatapi venhau munyika.

column2: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Havadzokeri kuBasa Kusvika Hurumende Yagadzirisa Zvichemo Zvavo
column3: Apo kuramwa mabasa kwaana chiremba kwasvitsa masvondo maviri nemusi weChitatu, vamwe vana chiremba vamboratidzira kwekanguva kadiki pachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals. Studio7 yasvika pachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals, UBH, kuratidzira uku kuchangopera. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors’ Association, Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya, vanoti kuratidzira uku yange iri nzira yekuyeuchidza hurumende kuti igadzirise zvichemo zvaana chiremba. Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvikuru zvehurumende munyika yose. Vati kunyange zvakadaro, vana chiremba vadiki havazi kuzodzokera shure panyaya yekuramwa mabasa kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo, sezvo vati pave nenguva vachiudzwa kuti zvichemo zvavo zvichagadziriswa asi pasina chinobuda. Mumwe mukoti mukuru paUBH uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita kana kutaura pamhepo sezvo asingabvumirwe kutaura nevatapi venhau, ati vanhu vari kungorapwa pachipatara apa ndevaye vanenge vachirwara zvakaipisisa, sezvo vana chiremba vakawanda kunyanya vachangopedza zvidzidzo zvavo, vari kuramwa mabasa. PaRichard Morris Hospital, chinove chikamu cheUBH panorapwa vanhu maziso, vamwe vanhu vange vauya kuzorapwa vange vachiudzwa kuti vadzokere kumba sezvo panga pasina vana chiremba vanga vachikwanisa kuvaona. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 paMpilo Central Hospital, chimwezve chipatara chikuru muBulawayo, yaratidzawo kuti kuchikamu chechipatara ichi chinorapa vanhu vachibva kumba - kana kuti Outpatients Department - kwange kusina vanhu. Chiremba mukuru paMpilo, Dr Solwayo Ngwenya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vari kungokwanisawo kurapa vanhu vari kurwara zvakaipisisa, zvinhu hazvina kunyanya kuipa sezvo vana chiremba vakuru nevamwe vanoshanda vachibva kunze, kana kuti consultants, vari kushanda semazuva ose. Dr Solwayo Ngwenya vabvuma mashoko ekuti vana mukoti vanonzi vari kuda kutanga kuramwawo mabasa mangwana, asi vakurudzira vana chiremba pamwe naana mukoti kuti vakoshese varwere sezvinotarisirwa mubasa ravo. Studio7 haina nkukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi, kanawo kunzwa kugurukota rezvehutano, Va David Parirenyatwa. Vana chiremba naana mukoti vanogara vachiramwa mabasa nguva nenguva vachitsutsumwa pamusoro pemashandiro avo uye mari shoma yavanowana. Nekune rimwe divi hurumende inogarawo ichichema nerekuti haina mari. Asi Fortune Moyo, mumwe mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, ndemumwe wevanhu vanoti matambudziko ana chiremba pamwe nemamwe ane chekuita nezvehutano munyika anogona kugadziriswa, kana hurumende ikakoshesa nyaya yehutano munyika sezvainofanirwa kuita. Kunze kwemari yavanohora, zvimwe zvezvichemo zvaana chiremba ava zvinosanganisira nyaya yekushaya zvikwanisiro zvekushandisa muzvipatara. No media source currently available

column2: Vasope neVamwe Vasingaone Zvakanaka Vobatsirwa neMagirazi Pachena
column3: Mukuru weAlbino Trust of Zimbabwe, VaBrian Nyoni, vanoti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu, 300 000, vachawana rubatsiro rwekupiwa magirazi okuverengesa pachena pachirongwa cheSight To the World. Sangano iri riri kushanda nebazi rezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare. VaNyoni vanoti chirongwa ichi chichabatsira vanhu vanemazera ari pakati pemakore makumi mana nemashanu, 45, nemakumi matanhatu nemashanu, 65. Vaendera mberi vachiti chirongwa ichi chichaendawo kumatunhu mashanu enyika kwemakore mashanu anotevera. VaNyoni vatiwo chirongwa ichi hachisi kunangana nevanhu vanorarama nehusope chete. Vaendera mberi vachiti zvakakosha kuti munhu wese apinde muchirongwa ichi pasina rusarura izvo zvinozoita kuti vanhu vaone kukosha kwemasangano anomirira vanorarama nehusope uye nekunzwisisawo matambudziko avanosangana nawo. Imwe nyanzvi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano isina kudomwa nezita yaudza Studio 7 kuti kune zvakawanda zvinokonzera kuti vanhu varware maziso uye vaendera mberi vachiti vanosanganawo nevana vari pasi pemakore gumi nemashanu, 15, vanenge vavhiringidzwa maziso nenzira dzakasiyana siyana. Vati rimwe donzvo rechirongwa ichi nderekudzikisa huhwandu hwevanhu vanoita tsaona pamigwagwa nenyaya yekusaona zvakanaka. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Chiripanyanga vatsanangura zvimwe zvezvirwere zvinokonzera kupofomara kwemaziso. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti kune vanhu vakawandisa vanoda magirazi okuonesa zvekuti vari kukurudzira varapwi kuti vaende kumakiriniki anosanganisira Sekuru Kaguvi iri paParirenyatwa Hospital, Norton Eye Hospital, Sakubva Clinic kwaMutare ne Richard Morris Hospital kuBulawayo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano hwemaziso ine mukurumbira pasi rose Dr Solomon Guramatunhu vanoti zvinorwadza kuona varwere vachishaya rubatsiro munyika, asi dzimwe nyika dzichisimbaradza zvipatara zvehurumende kuitira kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kubatsirwa.

column2: Chin'ono naVaNgarivhume Vanobudiswa Mujeri Mushure Mekubvisa Mari yeChibatiso
column3: Mutori wenhau Hopewell Chin’ono pamwe nemutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso nedare repamusoro mushure mekugara mujeri kwenguva inoda kusvika kusvika kumwedzi miviri. Chin’ono, uyo anga ava nemazuva makumi mana nematatu ari mujeri, abvisiswa zviuru gumi zvemadhora, ukuwo VaNgarivhume, avo vanga vava nemazuva makumi mana nemashanu, vabvisiswa zviuru makumi mashanu zvemadhora emaRTGS. Vachitura mutongo pachikumbiro chaChin’ono chekuti atongwe achibva kumba, VaTawanda Chitapi vati dare ramejasiriti rakakanganisa pakusaona kuti musi wa31 Chikunguru wakange washevedzerwa kuratidzira wakange wadarika pakaenda Chin’ono kudare iri achiti pane zvashanduka kubva paakambonyimwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso nedare iri. VaChitapi vati Chin’ono abhadhare mari inoita zviuru gumi zvemadhora ari maRTGS uye kuti asiye magwaro emba yake, azvipire kumapurisa kaviri pasvondo, asiye pasipoti yake kudare uye kuti asaende padandemutande rake reTwitter. Rimwe remagweta aChin’ono, VaGift Mtisi, vatenda kuti izvi ndizvo zvaturwa nedare. Mutungamiri wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevatapi venhau reMisa Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati zvanzi nedare Chin’ono asaende paTwitter, zvinotyora kodzero dzake. Vachiturawo mutongo wakanyorwa naVaSiyabona Musithu, VaChitapi vati VaNgarivhume vabhadhare madhora zviuru makumi mashanu kana kuti $50,000 ari maRTGS, vasiye pasipoti yavo kudare ramejasitiriti, vazvipire kumapurisa katatu pasvondo uye vagare kumba yavo yekuWaterfalls kudzamara nyaya iyi yapera. Gweta raVaNgarivhume, VaMoses Nkomo, vati vafara zvikuru nemutongo waturwa nedare kunyange hazvo zvakatora nguva yakareba kuti VaNgarivhume vasunungurwe kubva pavakasungwa musi waChikunguru 20. Zvichakadai, mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vati mitongo yaturwa nedare nhasi inoratidza kuti matare emunyika anoshanda akazvimirira. Chin’ono naVaNgarivhume vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira veruzhinji munyika kuti varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga mukati musi waChikunguru 31. Vaviri ava vakanyimwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kaviri nedare ramejasitiriti uye kamwe chete nedare repamusoro vasati vapihwa mukana uyu nhasi. Mune imwewo nyaya yanga iri mumatare kuMasvingo, hurumende inonzi yabvisa imwe nyaya panyaya mbiri dzanga dzichipomerwa kanzura weMDC Alliance, Va Godfrey Kurauone, avo vari muchitokisi kwenguva inodarika mwedzi. Nyaya yaraswa ndeyekuimba kwavanonzi vakaita vachizvidza mutungamiri wenyika. Gweta riri kumirira VaKurauone, VaMartin Mureri, vati VaKurauone vari kudzokera zvakare mudare mangwana apo pari kutanga kutongwa nyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuvhiringidza kufamba kwevanhu pamwe nedzimotokari. No media source currently available

column2: Vatambi veZim kuEurope
column3: MUMASVONDO anotevera, nhabvu yekuEurope – iyo inoteverwa zvikuru muno – ichange yave kutanga uye vatambi vemaWarriors vari kutarisirwa kutambira zvikwata zvavo zvakasiyana.   Iye zvino vatambi vakaita saMarvelous Nakamba weAston Villa, Tino Kadewere weLyon yekuFrance naMarshall Munetsi weStade de Reims yekuFrance vange vachitamba mitambo yegadziriro kuzvikwata zvavo apo vakatarisana nekutanga kwemwaka mutsva wenhabvu.   Mwaka wekuEngland nekuFrance zvose zvichatanga musi wa5 Nyamavhuvhu.   Chikwata chaKadewere ndicho chichavhurira mwaka mutsva wekuLigue 1 apo chichasangana necheAjaccio musi wa5 Nyamavhuvhu.   Kuchiti zuva rinotevera, chikwata chaNakamba chekuEnglish Premier League chichazotamba apo chichasangana nechaJordan Zemura cheAFC Bournemouth.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakaita ongororo yevatambi vemaWarriors vanotambira kuEurope pamusoro pekuti gadziriro dzavo dziri kufamba sei panguva ino yepre-season.    Marvelous Nakamba   Nakamba: Mutambi weAston Villa uyu angokwanisa kutamba mutambo mumwe chete wegadziriro dzemwaka mutsva wechikwata chake kubva pamitambo mina yachatamba chiri kuAustralia uko chiri kuita gadziriro dzacho. Akatamba mutambo wechikwata chake neLeeds uyo vakahwina 1-0.   Mumutambo uyu, Nakamba akatanga akagara pabhenji ndokuzopinda muchikamu chechipiri vachibva pahalftime.   Mimwe mitambo yakazotevera, weBrisbane Roar neManchester United, kana pabhenji chaipo aive asipo uye murairidzi wake Steven Gerrard haana kutaura kuti sei asina kumutambisa.   Svondo rino, chikwata chake chichasangana neRennes mumutambo wekupedzisira wegadziriro mwaka wePremier League usati watanga.    Tino Kadewere   Kadewere: Mutambi weLyon uyu mwaka wadarika haana kunyatsotamba sezvaakaita paakatengwa nechikwata ichi paakanwisa ka10 kubva mumitambo 33 yaainge atamba. Mwaka wadarika, akangonwisa kamwe chete kubva mumitambo 15.   Pari zvino chikwata chake chatamba mitambo mishanu yehushamwari uye Kadewere atamba katatu apo vakasangana neBourge en Bresse (France) iyo vakakunda 4-2 uye akazotamba mutambo weAnderlecht (Belgum) apo vakakundwa 3-0.   Akazotamba zvakare mutambo wechikwata chake apo chakazvamburwa 5-0 neWillem II Tilburg (Netherlands).   Lyon iri kutarisirwa kutamba mutambo wekupedzisira wehushamwari apo ichasangana neInter Milan musi weMugovera.   Zvakadaro, Kadewere anonzi ari kudiwa nezvikwata zvakasiyana kusanganisira cheReal Valladolid chekuSpain.    Marshall Munetsi   Marshall Munetsi: Mutambi weStade de Reims uyu mwaka uno watatarisana nawo anonzi ange achidiwa neBrighton & Hove yekuEngland.   Pari zvino atamba mutambo mumwe chete hwehushamwari wechikwata chake asi ndokutadza kutamba yaitevera sezvo ainge akuvara.   Ange achitarisira kudzoka svondo rino kuzosimudzira gadziriro dzake apo chikwata chake chakatarisana nemwaka mutsva wemuLigue 1.    Tendayi Darikwa   Darikwa: Tendayi Darikwa ndiye kaputeni weWigan Athletic uye mugadziriro dzavo ange achitamba zvikuru izvo zvinorakidza kuti ari muhurongwa hwechikwata chake mwaka uno. Chikwata chake chichatambira muligi reEnglish Championship chichirwira kuti chigopinda muEnglish Premier League.   Mitambo yeChampionship iri kutanga svondo rino musi weChishanu apo pachaona Huddersfield ichisangana neBurnely.   Chikwata chaDarikwa mutambo wacho wemwaka mutsva chichisangana nePreston North End musi weMugovera.   Pamitambo yehushamwari mishanu yakatambwa neWigan, Darikwa akatamba yese apo chikwata chake chakasangana necheOldham Athletic chikwahwina 3-1, chichakunda Liverpool XI 6-0, chikaita mangange 0-0 neAccrington Stanley uye ndokuzokunda zvekare Bamber Bridge neSheffield Wednesday 5-1 ne4-1.    Jordan Zemura   Jordan Zemura (AFC Bournemouth): Zvakawanda zviri kutarisirwa kubva kuna Zemura uyo mwaka uno chikwata chake chichange chichitambira muEnglish Premier League.   Mwaka wadarika, Zemura aipisa zvikuru muChampionship izvo zvakamuona achitamba ka33 ndokunwisa katatu apo chikwata chake chakahwina tikiti rekupinda muEnglish Premier League.   Mumitambo mitatu yehushamwari yatambwa nechikwata chake, Zemura akatamba yese izvo zvakaona vachikunda Sheffield Wednesday 2-1, ndokukundwa 2-1 neSporting Braga yekuPortudal uye vakazokundwa zvekare 1-0 neBristol City yekuEngland.   Bournemouth iri kutamba mutambo wayo wekupedzisira hwehushamwari svondo rino musi weMugovera apo ichasangana neReal Sociedad yekuSpain.   Zvakadaro, vamwe vatambi vakaita saAdmiral Muskwe weLuton Town, Macauley Bonne weQueens Park Rangers naBrendon Galloway wePlymouth vose vari pakati pekuita gadziriro nezvikwata zvavo.   Kuchiti David Philani Moyo, uyo aitambira Hamilton Academical yekuScotland, haasati ave kuzivikanwa kuti nhabvu yake achange achiitambira kupi mwaka uno zvichitevera kubva kwaakaita kuchikwata ichi apo kondirakiti yake yakapera.

column2: Vatungamiri veSADC Votarisirwa Kuparura Gwara reHupfumi
column3: Vatungamiri veSADC neChitatu vari kutarisirwa kunyorerana chibvumirano chekuita mushandira pamwe pakugadzirisa maindasitiri kuitira kuti nyika dzavo dziwane pundutso. Chibvumirano ichi chiri kutarisirwa kuti chinge chiri chemakore makumi mana nemanomwe kubva muna 2015 kusvika muna 2063. Munyori weSADC, Dr Stergomena Lawrence Tax, vanoti chibvumirano ichi chikanyoreranwa, nyika dzemuSADC dzichabudirira zvakanyanya munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Hurongwa hwe SADC hwakanangana nekuumba maindasitiri, kuita mushandira pamwe mukutengeserana sezvinoitika mu European Union, pamwe nekukwenenzvera zvinotengeswa neSADC kuitira kuti zviwane mari yakawanda kana zvotengesa. Misangano yemakurukota navana mazvikokota yakatanga neMugovera senzira yekuronga hwaro hwemusangano wevatungamiri venyika idzi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Reserch Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanoti havaone Zimbabwe ichibuda nechouviri. Asi mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaDavison Norupiri, vanoti Zimbabwe ichakwanisa kubudirira ikashanda zvakanaka nedzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

column2: Tsigirai Division 1: Mushonga
column3: MUNYORI mukuru weZifa Northern Region Division One, Sweeney Mushonga, anoti makambani akawanda anofanirwa kutsigira nhabvu yeDivision One neTwo sezvo kuriko kunobikwa vatambi. Apo pavasisina mitambo yemikombe inoona zvikwata zvemuPremier League zvichitatsurana nezvemaDivision ari pasi, Mushonga anoti mitambo iyi inofanirwa kudzoswa sezvo ichibatsira kusimudzira nhabvu yemuno. “Mazuva ano zvikwata zviri mumaDivision pazvinowana mukana wekutamba nezvemuCastle Premiership panguva yepre-season chete, hapanazve pamwe pazvinosangana nazvo. “Izvi hazvina kunakira nhabvu yedu nekuti zvikwata zvedu zvinofanirwa kumbomhanyisana nezvemuCastle Premiership sezvatinomboona kune dzimwe nyika. “Zvakatonakira isu nhabvu yedu sezvo zvichibatsira kuti zvikwata zviwane mari uye kusimukira kwevatambi kuti vaonekwe nezvimwe zvikwata zvepamusoro,” anodaro Mushonga. Zvakadai, svondo rino kuchange kusingadanwe anonzwa apo zvikwata zvepamusoro zvemuDivision One zvichange zvichitatsurana. Mushowani Stars – iyo iri kutungamira palog mumujaho wekurwira kupinda muPSL – iri kuenda kuMorris Depot uko ichasangana neZRP iyowo yakagara pechitatu palog. Cranborne Bullets, iyo iri kufemera mugotsi meMushowani Stars, ichasangana neHarare City Cubs musi weSvondo kunhandare yeRufaro.

column2: Hurumende Inomisa Kanzuru yeGweru Kukwidza Mitero
column3: Kanzuru yeguta reGweru yamanikidzwa nehurumende, kuburikidza negurukota rezvematunhu, VaIgnatius Chombo, kusakwidza mitero sezvo bhajeti rayo risati ratambirwa nebazi rezvematunhu. No media source currently available Kanzuru iyi, iyo yaive yakwidza mitero kubvira pakupera kwemwedzi waNdira, yarambidzwa kuita izvi nebazi rezvematunhu sezvo bazi iri risati rapasisa hurongwa hwekanzuru iyi hwekushandisa mari gore ra2015. Muhurongwa hwayo hwekushandisa mari hwegore rino, kanzuru yaida kukwidza mitero yakasiyana-siyana nezvikamu makumi matatu nezvishanu kubva muzana. Asi sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvemari mukanzuru yeGweru, VaAlbert Chirau, vanoti vebazi rezvematunhu vakati kanzuru inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana, kusanganisira nyaya yekuti vakuru vakuru vekanzuru vapiwe mari yemihoro inoenderana neyakatarwa nehurumende, uye kuti mari inoshandiswa kubhadhara vashandi vekanzuru isapfuure zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana zvemari inowanikwa nekanzuru kubva kumitero. VaChirau vanoti kanzuru iri kugadzirisa zvakanzi zvigadziriswe izvi nevebazi rezvematunhu, uye vanotarisira kuti bhajeti rekanzuru richapasiswa munguva pfupi inotevera. Pakupera kwemwedzi waNdira nepakutanga kwaKukadzi vamwe vagari vemuGweru vakaratidzira vachitsutsumwa pamusoro pehurongwa hwekanzuru hwekuda kukwidza mitero, uyewo nyaya yekuti kanzuru iri kuendesa kumagweta vagari vari kukundikana kubhadhara zvikwereti zvemitero zvavainazvo kukanzuru. VaChirau vanoti pave nehurongwa hutsva hwekuti kanzuru haichaendesi vagari vane zvikwereti kumagweta pasina kutaurirana. Vanoti kanzuru yakatora danho rekuti kwemwedzi mitanhatu inotevera magweta ekanzuru haafanirwe kubata kana kutengesa midziyo yevagari vari kubhadhara zvikwereti zvavo kumagweta aya, uye kuti munguva imwe cheteyo, avo vanobhadhara mitero yavo nenguva vasina zvikwereti, vachabvisirwa zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana zvemari yavanobhadhara. VaCornelia Selipiwe ndivo sachigaro weGweru Residents and Ratepayers Association rinove sangano rine dzimwe nhengo dzakaratidzira nguva pfupi yapfuura. Va Selipiwe vanoti vanotambira nemufaro mukuru danho rekudzorera mitero payaive isati yakwidzwa pakupera kwaNdira. Vanoti tarisiro yavo ndeye kuti bazi rezvematunhu richapa pfungwa yekuti kanzuru yeGweru isakwidza mitero zvachose sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzemari Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kanzura nevagari vanofanirwa kugara pasi votaurirana kuitira vagari vaziviwo kuti zvavanoda kuitirwa nekanzuru zvinoda mari inobva muvagari. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo kanzuru inofanirwawo kuisa zvido zvevagari pamberi, uye kutambirisa vashandi vayo mari dzinoenderana nemari inowanwa nekanzuru kubva kumitero.

column2: MDC T Yoshora Mashoko eGurukota reDunhu reManicaland, Muzvare Chimene
column3: Bato rinopikisa reMDC-T rinoti riri kunyorera mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, tsamba yenyunyuto pamusoro pemashoko anonzi akautaurwa negurukota rinoona nedunhu reManicaland, Muzvare Mandiitawepi Chimene, ekuti vachavharisa mabhizimusi everudzi rwechi India kana vakaramba vasingapinde mumisangano yavari kushevedzera. Vachitaura pamashoko avo ekutambira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, mudunhu ravo svondo rapera, Muzvare Chimene vakati vemabhizimusi ava vari kuramba kupinda mumisangano yavari kushevedzera, vakati vari kuvapa mazuva mashanu chete ekuti vasangane navo, kutadza kwavo kuita izvi mabhizimusi avo aizovharwa. Asi mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti mashoko aMuzvare Chimene ane rusarura, uye vanhu ivava ndivo vashoma vevasara vachiri kuwanisa vanhu mabasa munyika zvichitevera kuvharwa kwemakambani akawanda. Studio7 yaedza kubata Muzvare Chimene asi tanzi tivabate neChipiri sezvo vanzi vanga vari mumusangano. VaGutu vanoti aka hakasi kekutanga kuti Muzvare Chimene vatyisidzire vanhu. Vanoti pavakainda muhofisi, Muzvare Chimene vakatyisidzira vemakambani anochera mangoda kwaChiadzwa kuti vasapinze nhengo dzeMDC mabasa, vachinzi vakati vanenge vatsaudzira vaizotorerwa marezinesi avo. VaGutu vanoti gurukota iri rakatyisidzira zvakare vekanzuru yeMutare nemashoko ekuti rinoda kuumba imwe kanzuru inenge iri pasi paro, isina nhengo dzeMDC. No media source currently available

column2: Choto otaura nezveFIFA ‘ban’
column3: Ndooka    SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu — Dickson Choto — anoti nyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe neFIFA pamwe neCAF zvekuti isakwikwidze mumitambo mikuru inofanirwa kugadziriswa nekukasika sezvo yadzosera kumashure zvakanyanya budiriro yemutambo uyu, zvikuru remangwana revechidiki.   Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaitwa chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors mumakwikwi ekurwira kuenda kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations 2023 uyo uchatambirwa kuIvory Coast, Choto anoti izvi zvinokanganisa kusimukira kwenhabvu sezvo shuviro yemutambi wese kutambira nyika yake.   Choto aive muchikwata chekutanga chemaWarriors chakakwikwidza kumutambo weAFCON mugore ra2004.   Anoti danho iri richaita kuti zvikwata zvemuno zvisawane mari iyo zvaisiwana kuburikidza nekutengesa vatambi kunze kwenyika sezvo zvimwe zvezvirango izvi zvichaona Zimbabwe ichitadza kudyidzana nezvikwata zvekunze.   “Remangwana renhabvu yedu, kunyanya vechidiki, rakanganiswa zvikuru nezvirango zvatakatemerwa neFIFA neCAF nekuti mutambi wese wenhabvu shuviro yake kuzotambira nyika yake. Manje apa nyika kana isisachatenderwe kutamba mumitambo mukuru yakadai zvadzosera zvinhu zvose kumashure.   “Zvirango izvi hazvina kutombomira zvakanaka nekuti zvikwata zvemuno hazvichakwanise kutengesa vatambi vazvo kunze kwenyika. Mari yekunze iyo vaifanirwa kuwana vatengesa vatambi haichauye izvo zvave kudzorera vatambi vedu venhabvu kumashure.   “Saka nyaya iyi tokumbira ngaigadziriswe nekuchimbidza, nhabvu yedu isimukire ienderere mberi,” anodaro Choto.   Anoti nerimwe divi, zvirango izvi zvinogona kutuma vatambi vari kunze kwenyika avo vaida kuzotambira maWarriors kuti vawore mwoyo nekuda kwekusarongeka kwenhabvu yemuZimbabwe.   “Danho iri rave kutidzingira vatambi venhabvu vakawanda vepamusoro, vamwe vakakurira kunze kwenyika. Hakuna mutambi angade kuuya kuzotamba paanoona kuti hapana kurongeka,” anodaro.   Zimbabwe yakatemerwa zvirango neFIFA uye neCAF zvekuti isakwikwidze mumitambo mikuru zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nesangano rinoona nezvemitambo reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) rekumisa basa bhodhi reZifa iro raitungamirirwa naFelton Kamambo vachipomerwa kutadza kuita basa ravo nemazvo.   Choto mumwe wevatambi venhabvu vakatambira kuEurope kwenguva refu izvo zvakamuona achitambira kunyika yePoland kwemakore anodarika 10 apo akatambira zvikwata zvakadai seGornick Zabrze, Pogon Szczecin neLegia Warsaw.   Anoti vatambi vemazuvaano vanofanirwa kuzvipira mubasa ravo voshanda nesimba zvakanyanya kana vachida kusvika padanho seraakasvika iye.   “Basa redu iri rinoda kuti munhu ashande nesimba azvipire uye agone kuzvibata. Ndizvo zvega zvinongodiwa kana uchida kubudirira.   “Ngakagara makore akawanda ndiri kuPoland kuburikidza nekushanda nesimba uye ndaiziva zvandaida muhupenyu.   Kurudziro yangu kune vechidiki ndeyekuti shandai nesimba muzive zvinangwa zvenyu muhupenyu, munosvika kure mumutambo uyu kana makazvipira chete,” anodaro Choto.   Kubva asendeka shangu dzake dzekutamba nhabvu, Choto ave kuita basa rekurairidza vechidiki kuchikwata chake cheDC Academy.

column2: PANE NYAYA: MAFERO . . .uku ndiri kumaWarriors, Chicken Inn
column3: MURAIRIDZI weChicken Inn nechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors Joey “Mafero” Antipas anoti mabasa maviri aya ari kumupedza simba, asi acharamba achishingirira kuti agobudirira maari ose.   Mafero anoti anoda kutora mukombe weCastle Premiership kechipiri munhorowondo yeGamecocks – sezita remadunhurirwa reChicken Inn.   Muchinda uyu akambofanogadzwa kuve murairidzi wemaWarriors nesangano reZifa apo kondirakiti yake ichapera musi wa31 Zvita.   “Zvinhu zvakaoma kuita mabasa maviri, kurairidza Chicken Inn muligi kozoti maWarriors chikwata chenyika. Zvakaoma asi unofanirwa kushanduka nekuchimbidza paunenge wave kuenda kune rimwe basa.   “Zviri kundipedza simba rakawanda asi ndinoramba ndichishanda nesimba nekuti ndiri kuda chaizvo kubudirira mumabasa maviri ese aya,” anodaro Mafero.   Parizvino Chicken Inn iri pechipiri palog ichitevera CAPS United.   Nerimwewo divi, Mafero mumasvondo anotevera achange achitungamira maWarriors apo achatanga kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwishu e2021 Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ayo achazoitirwa kuCameroon.   Sezvo kondirakiti yake ichapera musi wa31 Zvita, Mafero anoti haasati aziva kuti acharamba ari panyanga here.   “Parizvino ndichiri kumboshanda, tichagara pasi tozokurukura toona kuti zvichafambiswa sei,” anodaro Mafero

column2: Chizvarwa chekuChina Hachina Kufa neCoronavirus:Wilkins Hospital
column3: Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare Dr Prosper Chonzi varamba mashoko ekuti munyika mune chizvarwa chekuChina chakafa nechirwere checoronavirus. Dr Chonzi vati ongororo yavakaita yakaratidza kuti chainge chisina chirwere ichi.
