Chizvarwa chekuChina chechidzimai ichi chakatanga kurwara chiri kwaMutare chichibva chaenda kuna chiremba wacho wekuChina uyo akati chiende kuWest End Clinic. Asi vanachiremba pachipatara apa vakabva varamba kumuona vachibva vati aendeswe kuWilkins Hospital uko akafa ari munzira. Dr Chonzi vanoti kune chimwe chizvarwa chekuItaly chakaendeswa kuchipatara ichi chichiti chairwara asi chakazonzi hachinawo chirwere ichi. Vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu vafa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose uye muAfrica chiri kuSouth Africa, Nigeria, Algeria neEgypt. Vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vanodarika chiuru zana. No media source currently available

column2: MDC Inoti Tsika yeZanu-PF Yokuita Misangano kuMamisha Ichapa Kuti Coronavirus Ipararire
column3: Apo chirwere checoronavirus chotanga kupararira kumamisha, mumiriri weMutasa Central mudare reparamende, VaTrevor Saruwaka, vari kuyambira kuti Zanu-PF ikasamira tsika yekuunganidza vanhu mumaruwa chirwere ichi chinogona kupararira zvakanyanya. Bazi rezvehutano rakatozivisa kuti kune vanhu vana vari kumaruwa vabatwa nechirwere ichi, vatatu kuMhondoro Ngezi uye mumwe chete kwaMurewa. Hurumende ichiri mushishi kuita ongororo yekuti coronavirus yakasvika sei munzvimbo mbiri idzi. VaSaruwaka vari kupomera dzimwe nhengo dzeZanu-PF mudunhu ravo mhosva yekuunganidza vanhu uye kuita zvematongerwo enyika munyaya dzezvekudya mushure memisangan\o yavari kukokera iyi. VaSaruvaka vanoti izvi zvichadzosera kumashure hurongwa hwehurumende hwekurwisa chirwere checoronavirus sezvo paine kurudziro yekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba vasingaungane. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe kuti tinzwe divi ravo. No media source currently available Sezvo tichitema tisina divi ratinorerekera, tabata gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi nemagariro evanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, avo vanoti handi chokwadi kuti pane zvematongerwo enyika zviri kuitwa munyaya dzekupa vanhu zvekudya vachiti igudziramukanwa revanhu veMDC. No media source currently available

column2: Vadzidzi Vakawanda Vovhiringirwa Dzidzo neCoronavirus muZimbabwe
column3:
Vamwe vabereki vane vana vanofanirwa kunyora bvunzo dzakakosha
gore rino vanoti vari kutyira kuti vana vavo vacharasikirwa nenguva
yakakosha yekudzidza nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Vanwe vadzidzi vari kuzvikoro zvepamusoro vari kuchemawo nerekuti havana mari yekuti vaite zvidzidzo zvavo zvepaiundaneti sezviri kukurudzirwa nehurumende.

Vamwe vabereki vataura neStudio7 vati hurumende inofanirwa kubuda
pachena panyaya yekuti dzidzo yevana vekuprimary nesecondary
ichaenderera mberi sei uye kuti vanofanirwa kunyora bvunzo vachaita
sei.

Mumwe mubereki ane mwana ari kufanirwa kunyora bvunzo dzeGrade7 gore rino, Amai Rudo Makamure, vati vanofunga kuti dai bvumzo dzaendeswa mberi.

Muzvare Tafadzwa Musika avo vanochengeta vana vemukoma wavo vari
muGrade 7 neForm 4, vatiwo kunyange hazvo vana vachigona kuverenga vari kumba, maverengero aya anosiyana nepavanenge vari kuchikoro. Vati dai bvunzo, kunyanya dzemuna Chikumi dzaendeswa mberi kuitira kuti vadzidzi vawane nguva yekugadzirira yakakwana.

Zvimwe zvikoro zviri kukurudzira kuti vabereki vatengere vana vavo nharembozha kana makombiyuta kuitira kuti vakwanise kudzidza vari kumba vachishandisa indaneti.

Mumwe mubereki, Amai Oster Magqoka, vati havazi vose vabereki
vanokwanisa kuwana mari yekutenga zvinhu zvakadai, uye kubhadhara mari
inodiwa pakushandisa indaneti. Amai Magqoka vatiti hurumende inofanirwa kupindira ichitaura pachena kuti nderipi gwara rinofanirwa kutorwa panyaya iyi.

Murongi wemabasa mumubatanidzwa weNational Association of School
Development Associations and Committees, NASDAC, VaBanny Manokora, vati hurumende inofanirwa kuenzanisa kukosha kwehupenyu hwevana uye kukoshakwedzidzo.

Mutungamiri wesangano reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vatiwo hurumende haifanirwe kuda kumhanyira kuti zvikoro zvivhurwe kana chirwere chichiri kutekeshera. VaZhou vati pane vadzidzisi vari kudzidzisa vana nenzira dzakadai seWhatsApp vakati zvakakosha kuti hurumende itsigire nekuvandudza hurongwa uhu.

Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi regurukota rezvedzidzo, VaCain Mathema,
panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isingabatike. Asi VaMathema vanogara havo vakaudza Studio7 kuti havafi vakataura nayo nepamusana pezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa hurumende yavo neAmerica. Asi vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti ndeapi matanho ari kutorwa mune zvedzidzo kwakatariswa chirwere cheCoronavirus, munyori mubazi rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vati hurumende iri kugadzira hurongwa hwakazara hwekuona kuti dzidzo ingaenderere mberi sei. VaMangwana vabvuma kuti vadzidzi vakawanda, kusanganisira vekumaruwa, havakwanise kudzidza vachishandisa indaneti vakati hurumende ichabudisa hurongwa hwainahwo panyaya iyi uyewo pakuti zvikoro zvichavhurwa riinhi.

Zvichakadaro, vamwe vaddzidzi vemuzvikoro zvepamusoro vari kuchemawo
nerekuti havazi kukwanisa kudzidza vachishandisa indaneti nekuda
kwekudhura kunoita nzira iyi.

Mumwe mudzidzi uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Tafadzwa ati vabereki
vakawanda havakwanise kubhadharira vana vavo mari yeindaneti nekuda
kwekuoma kwakaita zvinhu munyaya ndzemari munyika.

Mumwezve mudzidzi, Tabeth Magigwana, ati dai vemakambani enharembozha neindaneti achipa vadzidzi mutengo wepasi.

Mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vari
muongorori akazvimirira ega, VaFelix Chari, vaudza Studio 7 kuti
kushandiswa kweindaneti mukuita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro hakusati
kwasvika padanho rakakura muZimbabwe nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyana-siyana.

Pari zvino zvikoro zvepamusoro zvemunyika zvakavharwawo senzira
yekuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus icho
chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi manomwe nezvisere pasi rose, kusanganisira vanhu vana vemuZimbabwe. No media source currently available

column2: Hatina chekutaura: Zifa
column3: MUTAURIRI weZimbabwe Football Association – Xolisani Gwesela – anoti havana chekutaura zvichitevera kumbomiswa basa kwaitwa vatungamiri veZifa neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) nhasi.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti Zifa inoti kudii nedanho ratorwa neSRC, Gwesela anoti, “Handikwanise kupindura mubvunzo iwoyo, kana muchida kuziva zvakawanda taurai neSRC mubvunze zvose vanokubatsirai.”   Nhasi mangwanani SRC yazivisa nezvekumisa kwayaita basa bhodhi reZifa nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakawanda izvo iri kupomera sangano renhabvu iro rinotungamirirwa naFelton Kamambo.   Zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvamisirwa Zifa basa zvinosanganisira kusashandisa nemazvo mari yeveruzhinji pamwe nekutadza kupa umboo hwekuti mari iyi yakashandiswei, kutumira zvikwata zvenyika kunokwikwidza kumitambo yakasiyana kunze zvisina kupihwa mvumo sezvinodiwa pasi pemutemo wekurwisa denda reCovid-19 uye mashoko ekushungurudzwa kwevaridzi vepembe vechidzimai.   Nyika yamirira kuona kuti sangano reFifa richatora matanho api kuZimbabwe sezvo isingatendere kuti hurumende dzipindire munyaya dzenhabvu.

column2: Zvinhu Zvoita Manyama Amire Nerongo kuChipatara cheMplilo
column3: Mukuru wechipatara cheMpilo abvuma kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka pachipatara ichi zvichitevera danho ravana chiremba vakuru munyika rekukanda mapadza pasi. Mukuru wechipatara cheMpilo VaLeonard Mabande vati pana vana chiremba vadiki makumi mashanu nemumwe vadzingwa basa pachipatara ichi kusvika pari zvino. Chipatara cheMpilo icho chinove ndicho chipatara chikuru chechipiri munyika china vanachiremba mazana maviri nevana uye VaMabande vati kudzingwa kwavana chiremba vadiki kuri kuita kuti zvinhu zviome. Asi vati vari kuedza nepose pavanogona kuti vabatsire varwere vachiti vari kubatsirwawo nemadhokotera echiuto asi havana kukwanisa kutaura kuti vangani. Vamwe varwere vange vachiuya kuzvikamu zvevanorapwa vachibva kumba zveOutpatients neCasualty vange vachidzorerwa kumba nekuda kwekushomeka kwavana chiremba. Mumwe wevanhu vakadai ndiVaJohn Ndlovu avo vati vanonzwa musana asi vaudzwa kunzi vadzokere kumba nekuti pachipatara pange pasina vana chiremba. VaNdlovu vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo zvavana chiremba. Pachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals pange paine varwerewo vakawanda kuzvikamu zveOutpatients neCasualty uye vamwe vange vachidzokera kumba vasina kukwanisa kuonekwa navana chiremba. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemukuru wechipatara ichi Amai Nonhlanhla Ndlovu sezvo vanzi vange vari mumusangano. Mumwe murume angozvidoma nezita rekuti Sithole ange aine mwana wake uyo ave nenguva achirwara. Ati nekuda kwekusave pabasa kwavana chiremba anomboenda nemwana wake uyu kuzvipatara zvakazvimirira asi ati haangakwanise kuita izvi nguva nenguva. Akurudzirawo kuti hurumende naana chiremba vataurirarane vanzwisisane. Dr Tawanda Zvakada avo vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors’ Association vanoti nhengo dzavo dziri kuti hadzisi kuzotsvaga basa kuhurumende zvekare sezviri kukurudzirwa nebazi rezvehutano. No media source currently available

column2: Vakawanda muNyika Votarisira Makwikwi eWorld Cup kuRussia
column3: Vatsigiri vemutambo wenhabvu muZimbabwe vanonokerwa nekutanga kwemakundano e 2018 World Cup ayo achaunganidza zvikwata zvine mukurumbira mumutambo uyu pasi rese. Kunyange hazvo chikwata chavo chisiri kuenda kuWorld Cup vateveri venhabvu munyika vanonokerwa nekutanga kwemabiko emakundano enhabvu epasi rese aya, ayo ari kupfungaidza utsi muRussia musi wa 14 Chikumi. Zimbabwe yakadzingwa mumakundano aya mushure mekunge veZifa vatadza kubhadhara, nemazuva aive atarwa neveFifa, murairidzi wekuBrazil, Valinhos, mari yake yemuhoro yemazuva ayo akamborairidza chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors. Asi izvi havina kubvisa manyuku manyuku eWorld Cup muZimbabwe vateveri vemutambo uyu vachiti ivo makundano aya atovanonokera kutanga. Vakawanda kusanganisirira muoongorori wemutambo wenhabvu, VaFarai Kambamura, vanoti kunyange dai Zimbabwe yakakwikwidza mumakwikwi aya hapana kwayaienda sezvo maWarriors aive aisina mongo wekurova zvikwata zvakabudirira kunomiririra Africa. Zvikwata zvichange zvichisimudzira zita reAfrica kumakwikwi aya iEgypt, Morocco, Nigeria, Senegal, ne Tunisia. Vamwewo vakaita saVaOliver Musegede ndivo vanonokerwa neWorld Cup nekuti vaoreswa moyo nenhabvu yemuno yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League iyo vanoti haichanidza nemhaka yekushaikwa kwevatambi vane tarenda. Vateveri venhabvu ava vanoti nguva yeWorld Cup ichavapawo mukana wekupedza gakava rekuti ari pamberi ndiani Christian Ronaldo kana Lionel Messi avo vanga vachitora mikombe kuzvikwata zvavanotambira kuSpain cheReal Madrid neBarcelona. Muteveri weDynamos, VaByron Munyuki, vanoti World Cup ndiyo icharatidza kuti ari pamberi ndiani Christiano Ronald wePortugal kana Messi weArgentina. Chikwata che Germany ndicho chine mukombe uyu mushure mekurova Argentina mufainari yemakundano akapedzisira kuitwa kuBrazil muna 2014. Asi tichitarisa matambiro anga achiita zvikwata munzira yekuenda kuRussia, zviri kuratidza kuti hazvisi kuzove nyore kuti Germany idzivirire mukombe wayo. Brazil ndiyo iri kunzi nevazhinji ndiyo ingangotora mukombe uyu nematambiro ayaiita munzira yekuenda kuRussia. No media source currently available

column2: Chingwa Chotarisirwa Kushomeka Zvakanyanya Mushure Mekunge Hurumende Yadzikisa Mutengo
column3: Mutungamiri weBakers Association of Zimbabwe, rimwe sangano revanobika chigwa VaWellington Peyama vanoti danho rehurumende rekuti chingwa chidzikiswe kubva pamadhora maviri nemakumi matatu nemashanu kuenda padhora nemakumi masere rinoshanda chete kana bhanga reRBZ richikwanisa kuvapa mari yekuAmerica kuti varitenge pamukoto zvopa kuti vatatarike. Kudzikiswa kwechingwa nehurumende kuri kutarisirwa kutokonzera kushaikwa kwacho kunzvimbo dzakawanda sezvo vanobika chingwa vatodzikisa huwandu hwacho nekushaikwa kwedhora rekuAmerica. Gurukota rezvemaindustry VaNqobizitha Ndlovu vanoti hurumende ichabatsira vanobika chingwa nemari yekunze. No media source currently available

column2: Zimbabwe Yocherechedza Zuva reKuwanira Vanhu Mvura Yakachena
column3: Zimbabwe nemusi weChipiri yakabatana nedzimwe nyika mukucherechedza zuva rekuchengetedza mvura kana kuti World Water Day. Dingindira regore rino riri kutarisa nyaya yemvura nemabasa kana kuti “Water and Jobs” Mukuru weHuman Settlement muUnited Nations Habitat Dr Thomas Chiramba vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuchengetedza mvura nekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena. Muna 1993, bazi reUnited Nations General Assembly rakatara musi wa 22 Kurume wega wega sezuva rekucherechedza kukosha kwemvura muhupenyu hwevanhu. Munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaBan Ki Moon vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vakoshese kuchengetedza mvura vakati kunyangwe mvura yakakosha, hapana zvakawanda zviri kuitwa kuichengetedza. Ongororo dzakaitwa dzinoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mazana makumi masere nematatu havakwanise kuwana mvura yakachena yekushandisa yakachena. United Nations inoti kukura kwedambudziko iri ndiko kwakapa kuti vatare zuva iri kuti ringe richicherechedzwa. Vanhu vanokurudzirwawo kuti vachengetedze nzizi. VaBan vanoti kuti zviga zve 2030 UN Sustainable Development Agenda zvibudirire zvakakosha kuti vanhu vakwanise kuwana mvura yakachena. Vanoti kuwana mvura yakachena zvinopa kuti vanhu vasabatwe nezvirwere izvo zvinopa kuti vaite basa vakagwinya. Zvichakadaro, sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reHuman Rights watch rinoti zvakanaka kuti nyika dzitongwe zvakanaka zvinozopa kuti pasave musiyano wakakura pakati pevanowana mvura nevanoshaya. No media source currently available

column2: Ambassador Thomas Vanoti America Yakagadzirira Kushanda neZimbabwe
column3: Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe VaHarry Thomas vanoti nyaya yehuori uye kutonga nedemo ndiyo yapa Zimbabwe kuti iyende kumawere kwete nyaya yezvirango. Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaHarry Thomas, vanoti nyaya yehuori uye kutonga nedemo ndiyo yapa Zimbabwe kuti iyende kumawere kwete nyaya yezvirango. Muhurukuro yavaita neStudio 7, VaThomas vati zvirango zvakatemerwa vanhu vashoma shoma uye America iri kudyidzana nevanhu vasiri pazvirango. Vatiwo chiri kupa kuti Zimbabwe isakwereteswe mari nenyika uye mabhanga akaita seIMF neWorld Bank inyaya yekutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti. VaThomas vatiwo America iri kubatsira vanhu vemuZimbabwe nechikafu uye mishonga pamwe nekudzidzisa vechidiki vemuzimbabwe. Vanotiwo vari kuvaka muzinda mukuru muzimbabwe urikuunza mabasa kuzvizvarwa zvezimbabwe. Mumiriri weAmerica uyu akurudzirawo Zimbabwe kuti isimbaradze nyaya yehutongo hwejekerere zvinosanganisa kusimbaradza kutsvaga murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu VaItai Dzamara uye kuita kuti bumbiro remutemo riyananiswe nemimwe mitemo. VaThomas vanoti zvizhinji zvavari kutaura zvido zvevana veZimbabwe kwete zveAmerica. Chipangamazano musangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition kuchambembe kweAfrica, VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe izadzikise zvido zvevana vayo kwete kuda kungonongedza zvigunwe kune vekunze. Asi sachigaro weZanu-PF kuBritain, VaNick Mangwana, vanoti zvirango zveAmerica zvauraya nyika. No media source currently available

column2: ARTUZ neZHDA Dzoronga Kusvitsa Nyunyuto Pamusoro peMihoro kuHurumende
column3: Sangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rinoti neChipiri riri kusvitsa gwaro renyunyuto kuboka rePublic Service Commission richizivisa kuti rinoda kuti nhengo dzaro dzipiwe mazuva mana ekunotora mari dzavo kumabhanga kubva nemusi weMuvhuro pachatambira varairidzi mihoro yavo. Vanoona nezvekurongwa kwemabasa musangano iri, VaPride Mukono, vanoti vari kukurudzirawo nhengo dzavo kuti dziratidzirewo nemusi weChishanu svondo rino kuburikidza nekuburitsa panze homwe nemidhebhe nemarokwe. VaMukono vanoti iyi ndiyo chete nzira yekuratidza nayo hurumende kuti homwe dzavo hadzina mari sezvo mari dzavari kutambiriswa dziri shoma zvikuru. Vanoti mari dziri kutambirwa nevarairidzi dzave shoma nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana nekuda kwekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu, asi mihoro isina kwairi kuenda. Vana chiremba vari musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association vari kurongawo kuendesawo gwaro renyunyuto kumakurukota ezvepfumi, hutano, pamwe nekubhodhi rinoona nezvehutano reHealth Services Board. Munyori mukuru wesangano iri, Doctor Alloys Muzvaba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kunyunyutawo nekuderera kwemari dzavanotambiriswa zvichienzaniswa nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. Sangano ravanachiremba iri rakaburitsawo gwaro rinoti mihoro yavana chiremba vanoshanda muzvipatara zvehurumende yaderera nezvikamu zana kubva muzana kudzika kuenda pamadhora mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu pamwedzi. Sangano iri rinoti riri kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise nyaya iyi nekukasika kuitira kudzivirira kuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba nyika yose, izvo zvinozokanganisa nyika yose. Doctor Muzvaba vati sangano ravo riri kukwenenzvera gwaro iri, vachiti panosvika kupera kwesvondo vanenge vari svitsa kwarinofanirwa kuenda. No media source currently available

column2: Vatsigiri vemaWarriors Vofara neGadziriro yeMakwikwi eAfrica Nations Cup
column3: Chikwata chemaWarriors chiri kuratiza kuti chiri munzira yakajeka apo chakananga kumakwikwi e2017 Africa Cup of Nations. Chikwata ichi nezuro chakadambura maTaifa Stars ekuTanzania 3-0 mumutambo wekuenzana masimba, izvo zvirikugutsa veruzhinji kuti maWarriors achanokwikwidza zvine mutsindo kuAFCON. Vanhu havana kuuya kunhandare sezvaitarisirwa asi vashoma vacho vaivemo vakanakidzwa nematambiro echikwata chavo icho chakawana zvibodzwa kubva kuna Knowledge Musona, Nyasha Mushekwi pamwe naMathew Rusike. Zvakabuda pamutabo uyu zvakakosha kumaWarriors kwete mugadziriro yavo yeNations Cup chete asi muma Fifa World rankings zvekare sezvo veFifa vanoshandisa mitambo yakadai kugadzira mamiriro ezvikwata muhurongwa hwepasi rese. Mutsigiri weDynamos VaObert Masvotore vanoti zvakaitika neTanzania zvinobatsira kutyisidzira zvikwata zvanga zvichitarisira Zimbabwe pasi kuma Africa Cup of Nations vachiwedzera ivo kuti ikozvino Zimbabwe iri kuenda kuGabon iinechiremera. Aimbotambira maWarriors neCaps United Alois Bunjira anoti kukunda kwemaWarriors zvinhu zvinofadza zvikuru achiti ivo semaonero ake tarenda rakazara muchikwata chenyika ichi. Mutsigiri weCaps United VaShingirai Mthombeni varikudada nemaitiro emaWarriors vachiti ivo dai varamba vakadai kusvikira pachapera maAfrica Cup of Nations finals. Mutambo weTanzania wauya svondo rimwechete maWarriors achangobva kukunda Zambia 1-0. Asi Bunjira anoti pachine zviviri kana zvitatu zvinoda kugadziriswa maWarriors asati ave kurota zvekutora mukombe wemuAfrica. Pamusoro pevatambi vakabva kunze kwenyika, murairidzi wemaWarriors Kalisto Pasuwa akashandisawo vatambi vanotambira zvikwata zvemuno vakaita saHardlife Zvirekwi weCaps United, Teenage Hadebe weChicken Inn pamwe na Tatenda Mukuruva weDynamos, avo arikuongorora kuti angaende navo here kuma fainari. Pasuwa anoti ari kuda mimwe mitambo miviri kana mitatu yekuedzana masimba kuti akwanise kugadzira chikwata chakasimba icho achaenda nacho kuGabon. Mutungamiri weZifa VaPhillip Chiyangwa vakavimbisa mitambo nezvikwata zvine mukurumbira muAfrica zvakaita seEgypt neIvory Coast maWarriors asati asimuka kuenda kumaAfrica Cup of Nations. Asi vatsigiri venhabvu vanoti zveZIFA kutenda maruva wadya chakata.
